la b+h+yo/ rtse gcig yengs pa med pas bya'o// lkugs pa ra dang lug gi rgyab tu bya ba ni/ log 'dren mthar byed yab yum gnyis// gzir ba ra dang lug gi steng// drag sngags 'gyur med bzlas pa ni// oM badzra bu

hu la mang ga la bi ta/ phye ma si pa ra na ha dun b+h+yo/ sa ma rak+ta khA hi/ che ge mo la thum ril rbad rbad/ srin mo byi la'i rgyab tu bya ba ni/ dmyal ba mthar byed yab yum gnyis// ling+ga bzlas pa snga ma bzhin// oM badzra

na rag ma a u ma la b+h+yo// ma ti pa ta tsu ru b+h+yo/ na ra ga ma ti dgra bo'i snying la b+h+yo/ rnga mo ma he'i thog tu bya ba ni/ byol song mthar byed gshin rje yab yum gnyis// gzungs dang bzlas pa gong ma

bzhin// oM badzra swa ta na ka ra ma ta ta Ta pra che ge mo b+h+yo/ g.yag dang spyang ki'i rgyab tu bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin mthar byed yab yum gnyis// gzungs dang bzlas pa gong bzhin bya// oM badzra pra khra/ badzra che ge mo la b+h+yo

b+h+yo/ a mu kaM thuM ril rbad/ khra dang 'ug pa'i rgyab tu bya ba ni/ srin po mthar byed yab yum gnyis// gzungs dang bzlas pa gong ma bzhin// oM badzra na ga ta che ge mo myags myags thuM ril rbad/ ri bong yan lag

rgyab tu bya ba ni/ klu rnams mthar byed yab yum gnyis// gzungs dang bzlas pa snga ma bzhin// oM badzra nA ga ta che ge mo myags myags thuM ril rbad/ ri mo bya na lag rgyab tu bya ba ni/ srin mo mthar byed yab yum

gnyis// gzungs dang bzlas pa snga ma bzhin// oM badzra ma ti pa tsa hUM b+h+yo b+h+yo che ge mo la b+h+yo// sbrul dang byi la'i rgyab tu bya ba ni/ dam sri mthar byed yab yum gnyis// gzungs dang bzlas pa snga ma bzhin/ oM badzra

hUM hUM dza dza che ge mo ma mu ti hri rbad/ mthar byed chen po'i las de ni// bslu med gnad zin lta bu'o// bdag nyid phyag rgyar gsal ba yis// rten rdzas mthun rdzas mchod pa'i rdzas// brnag pa thun gyi rdzas la
sogs// legs par bsogs te las rnams bya// the tshom med pa'i sems kyis su// ma lus grub pa'i don du bshad// ces gshed pos gsungs so// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ mthar byed kyi le'u
ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas phyogs skyong gi gshin rje rnams kyis thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i ched du/ bcom ldan 'das la phrin las zhi ba'i sgrub thabs 'di phul lo/ rab tu dkar ba'i yul dag

la// mgu ba'i sems dang ldan byas te// dad pas mgu ba'i las bya zhes// gshin rje gshed po nyid la phul// gshin rje gshed pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig zung zhig rdo rje 'dzin// thams cad zhi bar bya phyir
du// sa gzhi gnas dang ri brag dkar// zlum po nyams dga' bkra shis gnas// zhi ba'i las kyi dkyil 'khor ni// zlum po dkar ba'i dkyil 'khor bris// lte bar bcas pa'i rtsibs brgyad la// mkhas pas
bsgrim ste bri bar bya// dkar dang ldan pa'i zla gam la// gcig dang gsum nas mgo btsugs nas/ khams gsum rab tu mgu ba'i phyir// nyams su len par byas la bsgrub// dbus su ye shes bdag po

la// shar du nag 'joms chen po ste// lho ru ya ba ti zhes bya// nub tu khro bo rmig pa la// byang du bdud 'joms dgod par bya// shar lho lho nub nub byang dang// byang shar mtshams su dgod pa ni// glang mgo
kong tse gcod spyod rje// las grub brgyad de go rim bzhin// steng 'og dmar po nag 'joms gnyis// yab yum gnyis med bris te dgod// zla gam gsum la ma mo gsum// sgo bzhir sgo srung ma
rnams bri// de ni yum dang bcas pa rnams/ khro bo yab dang sku mthun pa'o// sems dpa'i 'dug stangs gnas byas la// sgeg mo g.yon du brten byas la// sngags g.yog mdzes pa tshogs par byas// mgu ba'i

phrin las brtsam par byas// ske tshe thal ba rus pa la// dzam b+ha la yi gzugs lta bur// byas pa'i snying gar bri ba ni// a ma sa la sid+d+hi 'am// gang 'dod pa yi yi ge de// phaT dang swA hA mda' ltar bya// ming byang

gong ltar bris byas la// gong ltar 'tshams pa bzhin du gzhag/ de la 'di yang rab tu brjod// oM a kro badzra shAn ti nA ga badzra swA hA/ oM a kro te ka shAn+tiM pa la cuM zhes brjod nas/ snying gar brgyab na thams cad
mgu nas dad pa'i sems kyis zhi bar gyur to// des ni zhi ba'i las byas zin nas phyogs bcu'i gdug pa zhi bar byas te/ bdag la mi dga' ba med na las 'grub pa yin no// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud
las/ thams cad zhi bar bsgrub pa'i skabs te le'u bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas phyogs skyong gi gshin rje rnams kyi phrin las rgyas pa'i sgrub thabs 'di/ thams cad rgyas par bya ba'i ched du/ bcom ldan
'das 'jigs byed gshin rje'i gshed chen po la phrin las rgyas pa'i sgrub thabs phul ba/ rab tu ser zhing gser las grub// btso ma 'dra ba'i dbyibs can la// dpal rgyas sems dang ldan byas la// rgyas

par bya ba'i sems kyis su// rgyas pa'i sgrub thabs bshad par mdzod// ces pa gshin rje gshed la phul// gshin rje gshed pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig zung zhig rdo rje 'dzin// thams cad rgyas par bya phyir

du// sa bzhi gnas dang ri rab ser// gru bzhi khod snyoms btso ma 'dra// rgyas par bya ba'i sems kyis su// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa yi tshul// ldong ros chag chag btab byas te// rnal 'byor dam pa blo ldan
pas// thig ni gdab par rab tu brtsam// gser las grub pa'i thig skud la// dpal dang gzi mdangs bsod nams tshogs// 'phel zhing rgyas pa'i sems dang chas// slob ma dam pa las grub
par// bsams la thig ni gdab par bya// pho brang gser la rtse mo g.yu// rdo rje'i brtsigs pa gser las grub// gru chad sgo snams lcags las grub// rnal 'byor sngags pa blo ldan pas// thig bzhir re cha
brgyad du 'gyur// mtha' nas thig gdab man ngag can// de la sogs pa bsam par bya// rin chen skyil krung 'dug byas la// rin chen rigs kyi ngos su blta// dbus su gsang sngags bdag po ste// phyogs

phyogs sgo ba dam pa rnams// snga ma bzhin du bsgoms nas kyang// rang sngags skyes bus de bskyed do// oM a kro te ka puSh+tiM pha la ni hUM/ oM a kro te ka puSh+tiM ti ba ta na s+t+waM/ zhes pas bdag po yab
yum la// 'khor bcas 'bru re pa las bsam// rang rang bskyed pa dam pa ste// sngags dang ldan par ting 'dzin bsam// gzhug dang brtan dang mchod pa dang// phyag byed pa la sogs pa yi// las kyi bya ba
ma lus pa// thams cad ma lus tshang bar bya// bskyed dang grub pa'i 'bras bu ni// rgyas par bsnyen te thag mi ring// rang grub 'bras bu de lags so// phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa yis// dngos grub dam
pa rab ste shes// 'dren pa dpa' bos yang dag bshad// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin byas la// sa zhag gser las grub pa las// gzugs ni dam pa rab tu bya// phyir rgan

gan rkyal gnan byas nas// hUM puSh+tiM A yu She swA hA/ snying gar bris nas brjod bya ba// snying po sngags kyi dam pa ste// bla med dam pas rab tu bshad// oM badzra puSh+tiM A yuHpha la ba shaM shrI puSh+tiM swA hA/ brjod na thams
cad rgyas par 'gyur ro// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ thams cad rgyas par bya ba'i skabs te le'u bco lnga pa'o//// de nas yang phyogs skyong gi gshin rje rnams kyis/ phrin las dbang gi
sgrub thabs 'di/ 'jigs byed gshin rje'i gshed po la phul lo// rab tu dmar zhing zangs las grub// zangs las 'brel ba'i yul dag la// rang dbang med par dbang bsdus nas// 'du ba'i sems dang
ldan byas te// dbang gi dkyil 'khor bshad par mdzod// ces pa gshin rje gshed la phul/ gshin rje gshed pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig zung zhig rdo rje 'dzin// thams cad dbang du bsdu phyir
du// zangs sam dmar po'i sa dag la// dkyil 'khor snga ma gong dang 'dra// legs par khod snyoms zin pa dang// thig ni rab tu gdab par bya// lte ba can la rtsibs brgyad la// kun tu zla gam dbang gis
mdzes// lte dbus gzhu bdungs bris byas nas// de steng bdag po dam pa gzhag/ thams cad ma lus mchog tu dgug/ ci la bya yang thogs chags med// ces ni yang dag bla med des// bshad par byas te
rab tu bstan// gzhan yang rab tu bshad bya ba// sems kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa de// bla med yang dag nges pa'i lam// sangs rgyas byang chub la sogs rnams// gzhung las 'byung ba'i tshig don rnams// ma
nor gsungs pa'i bka' bzhin du// bsgrub na 'grub par bshad pa'o// de dag dgug par 'gyur bas na// phal pa gzhan lta smos ci dgos// sdud dang 'dren pa byang chub lam// 'di dag go 'phang thob bya'i
phyir// nyung dkar rkang rjes sa'am gzhan/ khrag gsum thal chen bsres byas la// ga bu'i ['u'i] nang du blugs byas la// ga bu ['u] gnyis ni kha sbyar la// skud pa dmar po zangs la sogs// bcings
nas bsdams te dam dkris nas// dkyil 'khor gyi ni thog tu bzhag/ nyung dkar zangs ni bsres byas te// dud pas ga bu ['u] de la bdug/ de la bdugs par gyur pa dang// bzlas pa'i snying po brjod bya

zhing// lan grangs khri tshar du ma ru// brjod na sangs rgyas la sogs rnams// 'gugs par gyur na phal pa gzhan// smos ci dgos te nges par 'dug/ oM badzra a kro many+dzu shrI ba shaM ma ho sarba ti la b+h+rUM/ lan grangs
mang du brjod byas na// ji ltar bsam pa thams cad 'gugs// rgya shug bkrus pa'i khu ba dang// mi yi lag pa'i khu ba gnyis// snga ma bzhin du dgug byas na// 'gugs par gyur zhes dpa' bos bshad// yang
na rang gi lag kyang rung// zhes gsungs pas thams cad ma lus par dbang du 'dus pas dper na phyogs phyogs thams cad nas/ mtsho la sbrang ma 'du ba ltar 'dus te bdag gi dbang du gang la bya ba de dbang
du 'gyur ro// zhes pa gshin rje gshed pos gsungs so// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ thams cad dbang du bya ba'i skabs te le'u bcu drug pa'o//// de nas yang phyogs skyong gi gshin rje gshed
rnams kyis phrin las drag po'i bsgrub pa 'di bzhin gshin rje gshed la phul lo// rab tu gnag cing gnam lcags 'dra// mon nag sog po khros pa'am// srin mo'i mdung rtse gshibs pa 'dra// khro bo chen po'i
tshul can gyis// gdug pa'i sems dang ldan byas te// drag po'i dkyil 'khor bshad par mdzod// ces pa gshin rje gshed la phul// gshin rje gshed pos bka' stsal pa// nyon gcig zung zhig rdo rje

'dzin// phyogs skyong gshin rje ma lus kun/ khro bo'i tshogs su 'dul mdzad de// rang bzhin mthu chen 'di brjod do// 'byung med ye shes dkyil 'khor ni// dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin byas te// bdag nyid khro bo
chen po ste// yum yang de bzhin de yi 'od// yab yum gnyis med byin rlabs las// thams cad shes rab 'phro 'du las// thig skud rgyus pa dag las byas// de ni las kyi thig ces bgyi// thig bzhi btab pas

le'u tshe dgu// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas// kun tu grub bzhi gru chad can// gru chad rgyan ldan dur khrod rgyan// mdzes par bris te gzhan du min// bstan pa'i lha ste snga ma bzhin// bskyed pa'i sngags 'di

brjod byas pas// bdag dang 'dra bar bskyed par bya// oM a kro ti ka hUM a badzra be tA lI rag sha man/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yoH b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yoH b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yoH b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yoH b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yoH dzaHhUM baM hoH b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yoH
zhes brjod pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag g.yos so// rab tu kun tu g.yos so// rab tu kun tu ldeg go/ rab tu kun tu 'ur chem mo// dbus mtho na mtha' dma'/ mtha' mtho na
dbus dma'/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag rab tu g.yos par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i bdag nyid des 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rab tu gsung gi gsang sngags gsungs
pas bdag cag spro lags so// 'jig rten du mthu chen 'di lta bu la bdag zhu ba lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin khro bar mdzad pa de la/ bdag mngon du sems can thams cad kyi don rab tu

yang zhu bar 'tshal lags so// bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen pos [po sa] 'dul bar mdzad pa des 'di skad ces gsungs so// oM shrI ba ra yak+Sha g+hu h+ya sarba ta ki badzra kA la rU pa mA ra ya phaT zhes gsungs pas
'jig rten na dbang che ba dang/ mthu che ba la sogs pa btul nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang nas kyang// gsung du med pa'i chos nyid la// rang sems 'phro 'dur gyur pa
las// phyogs bcur gsung pa de dag yin// zhes gsungs so// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ drag po'i sgrub thabs te thams cad btul nas cho 'phrul bstan pa'i skabs te le'u bcu bdun
pa'o//// de nas nan tan bskyed byas te// 'jig rten gshed pos drag po'i tsham rngams bshad par bya/ 'jig rten bcud kyi gdug pa kun// tsham rngams glog ltar 'gyu ba las// ngo mtshar ya mtshan bsgrag
par bya// e ma'o yab yum gnyis med rol pa'i mkha' dkyil nas// phyogs bcur 'phro ba byang chub sems// rigs kyi yab dang de bzhin btsun mo ni// rtag par bsgom ste de bzhin shes par bya// rdzas dang

phyag rgya sngags dang bcas rnams ni// gzugs dang 'dod pa'i 'bras bu gang 'dod 'grub par rol// mi dge bcu dang ldan pa yis// rnam par 'dren pa des byas te// sngags dang phyag rgya rdzas rnams dang// ga
bu ['u] pad+ma dam pa dang/ kham sa pa yi 'jim pa ni// khrag sna gsum dang gi wang ngo// de dag phrin las mchog yin te// 'grub par 'gyur bar gdon mi za// bla med dpa' bos yang dag gsungs// phyogs
bcu'i gdug pa ma lus kun// 'dul bar 'gyur te the tshom med// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las// drag po'i skabs te le'u bco brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen
pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'gal ba cham la 'bebs 'dod na// dur khrod lung dang mthun pa'i gnas// dgon pa lta bur song nas ni// thog mar bsod nams tshogs kyang bsag/ phyi bshags 'bum la
sogs pa gdon// tshA tshA nye 'don la sogs bya// ye shes sems dpa' bsgom par bya// bA gI shwa ri 'bru drug 'don// 'jam dpal mtshan ni yang dag pa// rtag tu gdon par dam yang

bca'// grub pa'i nyi ma gang yin la// bsod nams tshogs ni ci nus bsag/ de nas drag po byed 'dod na// tha chung bzhi yi mar ngo la// man+Dal gtsang ma dris byugs la// dka' thub drag po'i sdom pa byas// ku

sha'i stan la 'dug nas ni// mgo bo rma bya bzhin du dgug/ ru rak+sha yi phreng ba bgrang// mgon po nyid la gus byas te// sngon du 'gro ba'i bsnyen pa ni// yi ge bcu bdun nus thang gis// drug 'bum dag tu

bzlas pa bya// de ni bsnyen pa dang po yin// phyis ni ri rab rtse mo la// gsum 'bum dag tu bzlas pa bya// de ni bsnyen pa gnyis pa yin// de nas dkyil 'khor gtsang ma'i steng/ khri'u 'am dkyil 'khor gtsang
ma'i steng// 'jam dpal sku gzugs ri mo'am// bzhugs pa'i spyan sngar gnyis 'bum bzlas// de ni bsnyen pa gsum pa ste// bye ba gcig 'bum thon pa dang// me tog la sogs mchod pa bya// phyi dang nang gi
mchod pas mchod// bstod pa la sogs ci rigs bya// bsnyen pa rdzogs nas rtags rnam 'byung// 'jam dpal sku yi zhal 'dzum mam// rtags ni bzang po 'byung ba ni// dngos grub la sogs blang bar bya// de

nas drag po'i sbyor la 'jug/ dur khrod ma la yar song la// mi skra ro tshil rab blangs te/ khrag chen dag tu spang bar bya/ khrag sna tshogs kyi khu bas bkru// brtsir la thal chen sa dkar gyis// mdog bsgyur phur
bzhis brgyang la bskam// zla ba nag po'i tshes drug nas// brtsams te phyir gtor la sogs gtang// mtho gzug dpang gzug gser skyems gtang// srid pa'i lha 'dre sde brgyad la// bden bdar rgyab brten

ma byed bsgo// khram dmar btab la khrag nag la// gshin rje'i drag sngags dag dang bsgrag/ shwa rde'u dkar nag brdeg par bya'o// bsnyen pa'i snying po hrIHSh+t+r-IHbzlas// zla ba nag po'i tshes drug ni// nyi shu gcig
la dbu btsug nas// nyi shu drug ni tshun chod du// nus thang du ni bzlas pa bya// oM hrIHSh+t+r-IHbi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ nyin phyed tshun chod bzlas pa

bya// mchod dang bstod pa la sogs bya// brgyangs pa'i ras chen blang nas su// gzhan med sol ba thal ba gnyis// ka na ka yi khu ba dang// sbrang rtsi sogs dang dug sna tshogs// til dang nyung dkar mar khu dang// rang gi srin lag khrag sna

ni// rnyed na phyi sa ra khrag dang// ske tshe sa dkar tsan+dan dang// rgya skyegs ldong ros yung bas bris// mA ra gshin rje'i lto bar bcug/ dbang ni chung ma'i snying gar bya// zhi ba tsan+d+ra'i dbus su bya// rgyas par 'dod na
glang pos so// dbye 'dod rta dang ma he'i 'phongs// bskrad 'dod rnga mo'i 'phongs su bskyon// lkugs pa lug gi khog par bya// gnan pa ri rab 'og tu bya// so so'i rdzas dang las rnams ni// rig

pa can gyis shes par bya// gshin rje zla gsang nag po 'di// zla ba gsang bar sngags pa yin// phrin las bya ba'i rim pa ni// gsang ba'i las su shes par bya// 'khor lo bca' ba'i rim pa ni// brgyangs pa'i

ras la dug byugs la// ma da tsha maN+Dal sdum bu thang phrom dang/ kha shog dug sna tshogs rnams la// rang gi srin las khrag dang sbyar// snag tsha byas la bri bar bya// smyi [smyu] gu bya rog 'ug pa'i sgro// mi grir shi

ba'i skra la yang// pir la sogs pa bya bar gsungs// sgro rtsa skud pa sngo dmar bcing// 'khor lo bri ba'i rim pa yang// gsang ba'i las su shes par bya// 'khor lo bris nas smon lam gdab// rang gi a mr-i ta
la sogs// mchod cing bstod pa la sogs bya// bdag nyid ya mAn+ta kar bsgom// sku mdog stang zil nag po'am// chu rlabs nag po'i sprin dang 'dra/ kham nag ral pa gyen du brdzes// sma ra kham la smin ma

ser// glog 'gyu smin ma zhal bgrad pa// ljags 'dril tshems gtsigs sus khyim che// lus dang yan lag nA' gas dkris// ro nye kha nas 'dzag kyang 'dzab kyang zlos// gdug pa'i mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin// de

lta bu ru bdag nyid bsgom// mkhas pas rang gi rig pas dpyad// thod pa 'og ma khri steng ngam// za ma tog gi khri steng gzhag/ steng ma'i thod pa smyug ma la// sngon dmar brgyangs la yas man dgab// nyi shu

bdun gyi snga dro la// nyi ma ri rab rtser shar nas// stag lpags bgo zhing bgrod dkar 'gro// ru rak+Sha yi phreng ba bgrang// dbyug to thogs la sdigs mdzub bsgreng// phyag kyang mi 'tshal lam mi bzur// phrad na

gang yin brlag par byed// smra bcad byas te khri khri bzlas// rnal 'byor nang la gtam zer na// lag gi brda yi gdab par bya// skom dang zas ni 'dod pa'i phyir// lag gi brda yis blang bar bya// smras na rnal

'byor rang don zad// de yi phyir na lag brda bya// de yi tshe na 'di yang gdon// ya ma rA dza sa do me ya che ge mo'i pra ma ya hUM phaT/ de nas dmar thag chad bar du/ khri khri bzlas pa bya ba yin// dmar thag chad

nas sngags gzhug gcad// phur bu gdab dang nyung dkar brdeg/ pho nya bcol bskul drag tu bya// ma nyes dpang btsug cho nges gdab// nyin gnyis pa la 'di yang gdon// ya me do ru Na yo da ya che ge mo rak+ta tsa

ra hUM phaT/ dmar thag chad nas sngags gzhug gcad// las kyi rim pa gong dang 'dra// nyin gsum po la 'di yang gdon// ya da yo ni ra ya k+She ya che ge mo mur tsa ya hUM phaT/ dmar thag chad nas sngags gzhug
gcad// las kyi rim pa gong dang 'dra// nyin bzhi pa la 'di yang gdon// ya k+She yats+tsha ni rA ma ya che ge mo zhig mA ra ya hUM phaT/ dus ni 'brug dang 'tshubs mas gdab// gdab yig nyi shu rtsa lnga
ni// mnan pa'i 'khor lo gzhug par bya// mnan pa'i gzugs ni ri rab bri// thod par rabs chad nag po'am// ngag dig glen pa bkra mi shis// nang du bcug la re bar 'gril// lha khang them pa'i 'og dag

gam// ro khang dur khrod dag tu gnan// gtad pa gshin rje nyid la ste// dong ni ral pa tshar dgu'o// rgya mtsho chen po'i 'og tu gnan// gnan pa'i lha ni ral pa tshar dgu ste// chu nag 'dra ba'i gzugs chen
la// ma he nag po dag la bskyon// gshin rje'i dbyug pa nag po thogs// de lta bu yi dngos po la// bdag gis ral gri'i phyag rgya bcas// sa gzhi chen po gshags nas ni// gshin rje yi ni lag tu gtad// ri
rab chen po nyid kyis mnan// don yod grub pa'i pho brang gdab// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ drag po bca' gzhi'i skabs te le'u bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed
chen pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// drag po'i las dag byed 'dod pas// yid 'ong mthun pa'i gnas lam du// rnal 'byor mos dang dad pa yis// bla ma mnyes byas dbang dag mnos// lung dang man

ngag thob nas kyang// brtson 'grus chen pos myur du bsgrub// gnas dang gzungs ma dag dang ni// lta spyod ldan pa dag gis kyang// 'khor lo'i rgyu dang snag tsha'i rgyu// smyu gu'i rgyu dang dus phyogs dang// mkhas

pas zla gsang rgyud nas bshad// drag po sa yi man+Dal yang// bskrad dang bzung dang bslang ba sogs// mkhas pas zla gsang rgyud las so// drag po'i dkyil 'khor bri ba yang// thig g.yog mtshan ldan gzungs

ma la// ba su ta yi thig dang thal chen tshon rgyu dang// rgyud dang man ngag shes pas bya// shar nub lho dang phyogs dang mtshams// phyogs cha rig pas blta bar bya// stegs bu 'dom gang gru bzhi la// chag chag

gsum dang skyang nul yang// zla gsang rgyud las shes par bya// byin rlobs gnam sa thig btab pa// zla gsang las las shes par bya// thig ni brgyad kyi cha ru bya// thig skor bzhi dang ldan pa la// thig skor

gsum la thig gsum gdab// le'u tshe dag ni dgu ru 'gyur// phyi rol thig skor rdo rje'i rwa// thig skor gnyis pa dag la ni// bcu gnyis rtsibs dang ldan par bya// ya ma me da k+She zhes bya// phyogs bzhi dbus kyi

le'u tshe// drag po sngags kyi yi ge dgod// bcu gnyis rtsibs dang ldan pa la// rA dza sa do bzhi dag dgod// ru Na yo ni dag dang yang// ra ya tsa ni zhes pa ni// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la dgod par bya// thig skor

gsum pa dag la ni// bcu drug rtsibs dang ldan pa la// hrIHSh+t+r-IH'i sngags kyi yi ge dag/ bsgrub bya'i ming dang spel la dgod// rdo rje rwa ba'i phyi rol du// sgo dang sgo khyud ldan pa bya// dbus ni drag po

gru gsum gnag/ ling tse bzhi ni phyogs dang sbyar// sa stong mdzes pa'i tshon du gtang// bcu gnyis drag po bcu drug rgyas// rdo rje lcags la gru chad ljang// mtha' ma lcags ri sgo ni phyogs dang sbyar// gshin rje

lha ni lho shar byang// bu don lho yi phyogs su dgram// sha khrag rdzas dang me tog sngo// lho yi phyogs nas dbul bar bya// drag po rdzas kyi ga bu ['u] de// mnga' gsol dbang bskur byas nas kyang// dkyil

'khor steng du bzhugs su gsol// 'khor lo bcu gnyis rtse la yang// phur pa bcu gnyis rim gyis so// 'khor lo bcu drug rtse mo la// ke sing bcu drug phur pa dgod// sgo bzhi sre mo'i phur pa bzhi// nyi shu rtsa

brgyad rtsang la yang// dbang phyug mnga' gsol bar khyams la'o// bsgrub bya'i dam rdzas gtor ma yang// bsgrub bya'i lha ste dpal la gcig/ bsnyen pa'i lha ste ya mAn+ta kar gcig/ las su gnyer ba'i lha ste nyi
ma bzhi pa la gcig/ phrin las gnyer ba'i lha ste gri thogs ging dang khram thogs bdud la gcig/ ma mo'i tshogs la gcig kyang dbul// zhi khro'i lha la las gzhung bsrang// de nas 'chi bdag las gzhung
bsrang// zhes pa gshin rje gshen pos bshad// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor gyi bca' gzhi'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// de nas mthu stobs kyi bdag po dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad
ces zhus so// he he dpa' bo 'jam pa'i mgon// phyogs skyong 'dul ba'i gshed po ste// dpa' bo'i 'khor du 'dus pa rnams// tshul bzhin bsgrub pa'i don bshad kyang// phrin las gzhung bsrang ji ltar
bsrang// ting 'dzin rnam gsum ji ltar bskyed// spyan drang bzhugs mchod ji ltar bgyi// 'jam dpal mgon las bdag nyan 'tshal// dpa' bo chen pos bka' stsol cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs
byed chen pos phrin las kyi le'u 'di ched du brjod do// dmar nag brag gam sog po khros pa 'dra// mi ro mang po yod cing rkang gcig shing gi rtsar// gcan gzan mang po 'grul zhing 'dab chags mang po
'du// lha 'dre mang po tshogs par drag po'i gnas btsal te// mchod pa bshams la dkon mchog gsum po spyan drangs la// mnyes par bya phyir mchod pa rnam lnga 'bul// sa bdag sa srin mang po spyan drangs

la// gtor ma chang phud mchod rdzas byin brlabs te// bsngos la sa slong tshig kyang brjod// nga rgyal rdo rje khro bo yis// rdo rje'i 'gros kyis sa bskor te// sa bslang sa gzhi sbyang ba ni// bdag nyid khro bor gyur
pa'i thugs ka nas// raM las ye shes me yis dngos mtshan kun bsregs te// yaM las rlung gis gtor nas khaM las chu yis bkrus// don dam stong pa'i ngang du bsgom// de nas kun rdzob mtshams

bcad de// dkyil 'khor rgya bcad dbus su bskor bar bya// rin chen sna lnga ldan pa'i chang phud sba// phung shul sa blangs mi rta'i khrag gis ljib// sa sbyangs grub nas dur khrod chag chag gdab// rdo rje dri chu rak+ta

dang// dug la sogs pa'i chag chag rab tu gdab// de nas thig gdab thig gi rgyu bstan pa// zhing gi rgyu ma yugs mo'i skra// gri bo log gnon ro sha kha ral skras// thig skud byas la byin brlab thig kyang

gdab// shar dang nub dang de bzhin byang// de bzhin byang shar mtshams su bya'o// shar lho nub byang lho nub dang// de bzhin byang shar mtshams su'o// dbus kyi shar nub dbus kyi lho dang byang// snam bu brgyad

la gnyis gnyis bcu drug dag tu bshad// mtha' thig la sogs bri ba'i las su shes// dang po dur khrod ras brgyangs te// 'khor lo bri ba man ngag las su shes// mA ra ya yi gzugs bcas la// dri chen dri chu

rkang rjes sa// ngar snabs gos kyi dum bu la// nang du tsher ma rus pas dgang// ming rus mgo dang snying gar gzhug/ lus la dug chu tsha ba gsum gyis byug/ skud pa sngon dmar byad sngags bzlas// skud pa
nag po dag gis ske nas gdabs// de nas thod pa mtshan ngan zhig btsal te// lus kyi ngos la yab bri sbyi bo'i ngos la yum// de bzhin gzugs de 'khor lo'i bar du gzhug/ 'khor lo thod pa'i nang du
gzhug/ mi lpags phreng bas rgya gram bcing// de nas phur pa bcu gcig la// gu gul dud pas rab tu bdug/ yungs kar rgyal po dag kyang brdeg/ gru gsum dbyings nas khro bo chen por bskyed// spyan drang
bzhugs su gsol te rang rang gdan la dgod// shar du kong tse brag gyon dri za 'dul// lho phyogs 'chi bdag ya ba ti// nub tu klu bdag rmig pa 'dul// byang du lha mchog gnod sbyin 'dul// shar lhor glang
mgo me lha 'dul// lho nub mig dmar srin po 'dul// nub byang tel pa rlung lha 'dul// byang shar las grub dbang ldan 'dul// steng du nag 'joms tshangs pa 'dul// 'og tu dmar po sa bdag 'dul// de

dag gshin rje'i yum rnams kyang// phur pa rang rang grib la gnas// ku ma da ri bdud 'dul shar// k+Shu ma da ri btsan 'dul lho// kang ka da ri gza' 'dul nub// tsa mun da ri klu 'dul byang// phur pa bzhi

yang sgo bzhi la'o// gshin rje'i bris sku lho ru dgram// thod pa 'khor lo bcas pa ste// gru gsum phub ste steng du gzhag/ g.yang gzhi 'phan la sogs pas brgyan// sha chen tshil chen keng rus dang/ khrag chen la
sogs ci mang sbyar// ske thag gshin rje'i phur la gdags// gtor ma la sogs gong bzhin gzhag/ nyung dkar ske tshe dug khrag rnams// g.yas g.yon dag tu gzhag par bya// mchod pa lnga dang
gtor ma gsum// chang phud la sogs bshams nas kyang// dkon mchog gsum po spyan drangs la// mchod dang sdig pa bshags pa bya// de nas chos kyi srung ma rnams// lha mgon klu mgon la sogs
dang// bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu dang// 'gro ba drug rnams la sogs par// gtor ma bsngos la bden pa bdar// 'di yi grogs ma byed par bsgo// dkyil 'khor bskor zhing dpang yang
gzug/ mtha' ma rdo rje'i 'gros kyis bskor// bgegs rnams bskrad la mtshams rnams gcad// de nas lho ru kha yang blta// de bzhin nyid dang kun tu snang// rgyu dang ting 'dzin rnam gsum bsgom// e yaM ra
suM keM raM b+h+rU~M las// gzhal yas gdan bcas gsal bar bsgom// de nang lha rnams gsal bar bsgom// dbus kyi ma he'i gdan thog tu// mthing nag 'bar ba'i hUM gcig bsgom// de las 'od zer 'phros

'dus pas// phyag mtshan rdo rje gcig tu gyur// de las 'od zer 'phros 'dus pas// rdo rje mthing nag 'od du gyur// oM a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka kA la rU pa badzra kro d+ha hUM phaT/ ces brjod pas/ 'od las ya mAn+ta
kar gyur// zhal gsum phyag drug mthing nag la// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// ral pa'i rtse las me 'bar ba'i// ral pa'i sked nas khrag 'dzag pa'i// ral pa'i rtse nas rgya mtsho
'khrugs// sdigs mdzub rgyu zhags lcags kyu g.yas// dung dmar mdung thung gsal shing g.yon// zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum ma he brdzis// dur khrod rgyan gyi rab tu brgyan// klad par oM bsam mgrin par

AMH/ tsit+ta'i nang du hUM gcig bsam// ye shes lnga ru byin brlabs te/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA kro d+ha dz+nyA na pany+tsa swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85 haM// sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlabs te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya wAka tsit+ta

At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ khro bo'i nga rgyal bskyed pa la// oM sarba ta thA ga ya mAn+ta ka ma hA kro d+hA hUM/ de nas hUM zhes rab brjod pas/ khro bo'i thugs kar hUM bton te// g.yon phyogs zhing gi gdan stengs su/ hUM de 'phros shing

gnas pa las/ oM AHhUM be tA lI rak+Sha man/ brjod pas hUM nyid yum du gyur/ khram bam g.yas la b+han+d+ha g.yon// sku mdog nag mo gsal bar bskyed// yab kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje ste// oM las nor bu bu gar

phaT// de nas yum gyi gsang gnas su// paM las pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad// e las nang du gru gsum ste// 'di skad brjod la gsang sgo dbye// pad+ma gu h+ya pra we sha phaT/ ces brjod gsang sgo phye ba yis// yab yum
rol par mdzad pa dang// lhag pa'i byang chub sems nyid de// rdo rje'i lam nas rab byung ste// yum gyi mkha' la 'phros pa dang// de la hUM zhes brjod pa yis// byang sems hUM bsgril bcur gyur

te// mkha' las bton nas 'khor lo yi// rtsibs kyi steng du gdan steng du// hUM hUM bsgril ma re re bsam// 'khor lo shar gyi rtsibs gdan la// hUM hUM bsgril ma de nyid las// oM ya man badzra kro d+ha hUM/ oM ya man

badzra kro d+hI hUM/ brjod pas hUM las khro bo'i sku// kong tse brag gyon kham rgya ma// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog gnag/ dur khrod rgyan dang ldan pa ste// g.yon pa b+han dmar yum la 'khyud// g.yas pa bdug

pa'i mtshon cha 'dzin// yum yang g.yas kyis yab la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar yab la stob// dur khrod rgyan rnams yab dang mthun// rtsa ba'i sngags de brjod nas kyang// phyogs skyong yab yum kun kyang

bskyed// rgyan dang cha lugs phyag mtshan rnams// gong bzhin thams cad gsal bar bskyed// g.yas kyi hUM las yab tu bskyed// g.yon gyi hUM las yum du bskyed// ro ka ma dun b+h+yo/ tsa mu ti dun b+h+yo/ nam gru ma

dun b+h+yo/ b+h+yo las du khrod ma mo gsum// zla gam gsum la bskyed par bya// sgo bzhir rdo rje bse mo bzhi// ku la d+ha ri shar du+u bskyed// k+Shu la d+ha ri lho ru bskyed// kang ka d+ha ri nub tu ba

skyed// tsa mun d+ha ri byang du ba skyed// ke'u sing dbang phyug ging dang bdud// man ngag las su shes par bshad// spyan drang phyag 'tshal bzhugs mchod 'bul// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ drag po'i phrin las kyi skabs te le'u nyer
gcig pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos drag po 'khor lo'i skabs 'di gsungs so// dur khrod ro ras rnying pa'am// gri bor shi ba'i ro shul la// mi tshig la sogs mi smra
bar// ske tshe lan tshwa nyung nag mar// dug dang nim pa'i lo ma dang// ka na ka yi khu ba dang// ro bsreg pa yi sol ba dang// rang ngam phal gyi mdzub mo'i khrag/ de rnams sbyar la snag

tsha bya'o// bya rog hu lu'i sgro rtsa la// 'khor lo bri ba'i smyu gu bya// 'khor lo rtsibs can gnyis bris te// srid gsum sems can thams cad kun// gshin rje'i lto na yod rtags su// 'khor lo rim pa gsum du+u bri// dbus su re'u mig dgu

par bya// phyi rim rtsibs ni bcu gnyis bri// tha ma dag la bcu drug bya// yab yum 'khor lo dag la bskyon// 'khor lo'i nang du sngags bri ba// re'u cha dgu dang bcu gnyis la// nyi ma bzhi yi gshed bzhi

bri// bcu drug hrIHSh+t+r-IH daM daM 'di med pa mang daM daM dam tshigs sngags// phyi rim ka kha bzhi bcu gnyis// yang rim dbyangs yig bcu drug bri// de yi phyi mar yang rim la// dzaHhUM baM hoH bri bar bya// yi ge re ga re'u mig
tu// de yang pho yi 'khor lo ni// yi ge'i kha rnams phyir la bstan// mo yig rnams ni nang du bstan// ya dang []mnyam ma dang Na// rA dang []mnyam dza dang []// sa da
[]mnyam do dang Do// me dang mnyam ya dang []// ya dang []mnyam me dang// do dang Do mnyam ru dang// Na dang na mnyam yo dang no// da dang Da mnyam
ya dang []// ya dang []mnyam da dang Da// yo dang []mnyam ni dang Ni// ra dang ra mnyam ya dang [ ]// k+She dang mnyam ya dang []// ya dang [ ]mnyam k+She dang//
ya dang mnyam ts+tsha dang// ni dang Ni mnyam ra dang []// ma dang mnyam ya dang []/ g.yas skor g.yon skor pho mo gnyis// ma nor ma log bri ba gces// dam tshig yi
ge dgod pa yang// oM dang mnyam hrI dang// Sh+t+r-IHdang mnyam bi dang b-i// kr-i dang kri mnyam tA dang TA// na dang Na mnyam na dang Na/ che dang cha mnyam ge dang// mo dang
mnyam hUM dang// hUM mnyam phaT dang// swA dang mnyam hA dang// dam tshig yi ge dgod par yang// ka kha dbyangs yig la sogs te// yi ge rnams kyi dgod
phyogs so// gnyis ka rnal mar bris gyur na// yab yum cho rol song gyur te// 'khor lo log nas rnal 'byor phung// de la dgug dang gnan dang myos// bskrad dang myos 'bros la sogs pa// zla gsang
las las shes par bya// de ltar 'khor lo bri ba dang// rabs chad pho mo'i thod pa dang// 'khor lo gong ma ltar bris la// de yi bar du bcug byas la// tshon skud nag pos phyogs bzhir bcings// gzhan yang
zhi rgyas las byed na/ kham sa'i gab tser gong bzhin bzhug/ so so'i rigs kyi gzungs thag gdags/ de yis gang yang gdon mi za// las rnams 'grub ces gshed pos gsungs// dpal gshin rje zla gsang
nag po'i rgyud las/ 'khor lo bca' gzhi'i skabs te le'u nyer gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// dang por ting 'dzin rnam gsum
gyis// las kyi bya ba gzhan zin nas// ting nge 'dzin la rab 'jug pa// ngas gsungs pa la sems thud cig/ hUM/ log rtog gzung 'dzin 'khrul pa'i chos nyid de// sems kyi brtags pas cir yang mi snang

ste// mi g.yo mi bsam chos kyi dbyings nyid ngang// rig pa spros bral mi rtog bsgom// oM ma hA shU n+ya dz+nyA na badzra swa b+ha wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ hUM/ dbyings nyid nam mkha' stong pa'i rang bzhin las// rang sems maM las

'khor te// 'od kyi thig le nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam// ma sUr+ya man+Dal hUM/ hUM/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od kyi dkyil 'khor te// hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga rab 'bar ba// brtan cing mi g.yo rdo rje 'bar

bar bsgom// badzra zhes 'phros 'dus pa las// rdo rje'i gur dang sa gzhi bsgom// hUM/ 'jig rten khams gsum ma lus kun// raM yaM khaM gis bsreg sbyangs nas// ye shes 'bar ba lnga ni rim gyi bsgom// e yaM

raM baM suM keM e// nam mkha' stong pa'i rang bzhin la// brtan pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsgom// de steng raM las gru gsum me// baM las bdud rtsi ngo bo las// smin pa sa yi dkyil 'khor bsam// keng rus ri rab

steng dag tu// ye shes 'bar ba'i gzhal yas bsgom// b+h+rUM las ye shes 'bar ba'i gzhal yas mchog/ gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs bcas// dkyil 'khor tshul du gzhal yas bsgom// b+h+rUM dz+nyA na tsakra b+h+rUM/ gzhal

yas dbus su nyi zla'i steng// chu skyes steng du sems nyid d+hIH/ 'phro 'dus ral gri d+hIHsa mtshan pa// 'od zhu 'jam dpal rdo rjer bsgoms// oM a ra pa tsa na d+hIH 'jam pa'i rdo rje gzhon tshul zur phud can// sku ni
gser mdog zhi ba'i cha lugs 'chang// zhal gcig phyag gnyis shes rab ral gri g.yas// gzhon nu'i skur sprul phyag g.yon ut+pal te// mi 'gyur shes rab po tis mtshan par bsgom// snying dkyil nyi ma'i
dkyil 'khor d+hI las ni// 'od 'phros phyogs bcu'i bde gshegs spyan drangs nas// nyi ma la zhugs mgon po nyid dang ni// bde gshegs spyan drangs 'od kyi gong bur bsam// 'od dpung de nyid kha dog

nag po'i hUM// 'phro 'du'i tshul gyis rdo rje rtse lnga gnag/ shin tu 'bar zhing brtan pa nyid du bsgom// badzra de las 'od zer rab 'phros pas// rdo rje phra mo'i 'phro 'du las/ khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje
gshed// dbu gsum phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// gyad kyi 'dor thabs yi dwags gnon// tri shul ral gri dbyug dgra s+t+wa// 'byin pa'i phyir na phyag brgyad pa// lcags kyu'i mtshon cha phyag na
bsnams// thod pa shag ti to ma ra// sdigs dang zhags pa g.yon pa ste// las la gsang ba'i yum gnyis kyang// g.yas g.yon gnyis su bsam pa yang// lus dang grib ma'i tshul du bsgom// oM a kro te ka

ya mAn+ta ka hUM/ be tA lI yak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM/ pad+ma rdo rje byin brlab pa// hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga pa// paM las pad+mar byin brlabs nas// brda yis bskul ba tshul bzhin bya// sa ma ya hoH/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ ra ho haM/ rA ga yA
mi/ hUM/ hUM/ hUM/ hUM/ hUM/ hUM// yab yum mkha' la hUM bcu gnyis// gshin rje bcu gnyis gsal ba'i rtsa// 'khor rnams bsam pa'i dbang gis bskyed// spyan
bzhugs mchod tshul bzhin bya// gshin rje gshed pos gsungs pa'i don// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las// bsgom khog gi skabs te le'u nyer gsum pa'o//// de nas yang
mthu stobs bdag pos 'di skad ces zhus so// gshin rje gshed pos gsungs pa'i don// bdag sdud 'di yi don shod cig/ bsod nams tshogs kyi yan lag bshad pa dang// bsnyen pa dang ni nyer bsnyen
po// dngos grub len dang bsgrub pa dang// 'chi bdag bdud dang gshin rje'i bsnyen pa dang// gsad pa las kyi bsnyen pa gang la bgyi// gshin rje gshed pos bka' stsol gcig/ gshin rje gshed pos bka'
stsal pa// nyon cig lag na rdo rje 'dzin// 'chi bdag rnams kyi bshad bya ba// ngas gsungs pa la sems thud cig/ dang por yid 'thad gnas btsal nas// tsha tsha nye'u 'don 'bum la sogs// bsod nams
dag pa'i tshogs bsag pa// tshad med bzhi dang yan lag lnga// bdun gyis kun rdzob sems bskyed la// don dam byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa// rnam par mi rtog ngang du ci rigs bsgom// de ltar ma

rtogs rnams la snying rje bskyed// ting 'dzin gnyis kyis rang rgyud dag sbyangs nas// rig pa'i yi shes ye ge muM du gsal// spros bsdus 'jam dpal sems dpa'i skur bskyed de// gong ma lta bu'i las dang bya ba
ni// bsod nams tshogs kyi las dag go/ rdo rje sems dpas rab tu sems la zhog/ dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ bsod nams tshogs kyi yan lag gi skabs te le'u nyer bzhi pa'o//// de
nas 'jam dpal gshin rjes 'di skad brjod do// yid 'thad mtshan ldan gnas dag tu// gong gis bsod nams tshogs la gnas pa yang// phyi nang gsang ba dag gi mtshams bcad nas// zhi khro la sogs
bskang bshags dag par bya// de nas ting 'dzin rnam gsum spro bsdu yis// bdag nyid gshin rje'i gshed kyi skur bskyed la// g.yon du yum bskyed mdun du sras mchog bskyed// g.yas su yum bskyed la
sogs rab byas te// sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlabs pa dang// ye shes chen po lnga ru dbang bskur nas// ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor spyan drangs dang// mchod bstod la sogs rdzogs pa
dang// bdag thugs phyag rgya bzhi las mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi// spros te spyan drangs phyag 'tshal bzhugs pa dang// mchod pa la sogs lha mo bzhis byas te// bzlas brjod bsnyen pa'i 'dzab grangs dbul ba
ni// rang rig ye shes gnas su dag pa'i rtags// snod kyi 'jig rten gzhal yas khang// bcud kyi 'jig rten lha yi 'khor// dbyings nyid gting mtha' med pa las// skye 'gro gzugs su snang ba
las// gshed po yab dang yum du ma gyur gang yang med// dper na til 'bru mar gyis gang ba bzhin// bdag nyid tsit+ta'i gzhal yas khang// rin chen gur phub 'dra ba ru// bdag nyid zla ba'i
man+Dal bsam// rig pa'i ye shes yongs su grub pa'i rtags// ye shes sems dpa' tshon gang gsal bar bsgom// thugs kar rdo rje rtse lnga bsam// de yi bum pa dag la yang// sngags kyi sa bon yi ge hUM// de
mtha' bcu bdun bskor ba bsgom// lha rnams thugs kar de bzhin ci 'drar bsgom// de nas bdag nyid thugs ka nas// sngags bzlas ljags steng sngags 'phros pas// 'dom gang pha rol phyir tshad du// sku
rnams phra mor gyur nas kyang// de dag zhal nas gsang sngags bzlas pa las// 'od zer mchod pa'i lha dang lha mor gyur// phar 'phros 'phags pa rnams la 'od zer phog/ sku gsung thugs nyid mnyes pa'i
mchod pa phul// 'od zer de dag bdag la tshur 'dus pas// sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs bdag la thim par bsam// de ltar bsnyen pa drug 'bum byas pa ni// sngon du 'gro ba'i bsnyen pa ste// lag na rdo
rjes rab tu zung// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ lha yi bsnyen pa bgyi ba'i skabs te le'u nyer lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// yid
'thad mtshan ldan gnas dag tu// man+Dal chag chag legs btab la// me tog bris sku la sogs bkod nas kyang// gong ma lta bu'i bsnyen pa gsum 'bum bzlas pa ni// nye ba'i bsnyen pa yin zhes gshed po
bshad// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ nye ba'i bsnyen pa'i skabs te le'u nyer drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// yid 'thad mtshan ldan
gnas dag tu// gong ma'i las rnams mthar phyung ste// nye bsnyen las la gnas nas kyang// des ni rtags bzang mthong bar 'gyur// grub pa'i rtags ni byung ba dang/ khyad par dngos grub rdzas bsags
te// dmar ser ba yi 'o ma dang// mar dang sbrang rtsi sbyar ba dang// dngos grub rdzas rnams bkod nas kyang// bdag gi thugs las 'od zer phar 'phros pas// bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs dam
bskul// bris sku dngos grub rdzas la thim bsams shing// 'bum phrag gcig gi bzlas pa bya'o// g.yal dang sbrid pa brkyang bskum gnyid kyang spang// de bzhin spangs pas ci bsam grub ces bshad// dpal
zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ bsgrub pa chen po'i skabs te le'u nyer bdun pa'o//// de nas yang gshin rje gshed pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// nyon cig zung zhig rdo rje 'dzin// ngas gsungs pa
la sems thud cig/ yid 'thad mtshan ldan gnas dag tu// 'bum phrag gcig gi bsnyen pa yang// snga ma'i las su bya bar gsungs// bdag nyid gshed po'i mthu ldan pas// mdun gyi ri rab
bsam pa dang// de bzhin gshegs pa'ang bsam byas te// bdag gi thugs kar yi ge ya// nag po me 'od 'od 'bar bsam// de mthar bzlas pa'i yig 'brus bskor bsam la// de bzhin bdag gi thugs ka
nas// sngags ni rab tu bzlas pa las// 'od 'phros las kyi gshin rje la// de yi 'od zer phog gyur pas// thugs dam bskul nas dar cig kyang// 'dug pa'i dbang med 'ong bar 'gyur// gshed po'i bka'
nyan gsung sdod bsam// las la sbyor ba'i bsnyen pa ste// 'chi bdag las kyi gshin rje rnams// gnas su gtong ba gshed pos bshad// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ 'chi bdag bdud dang gshin rje'i

bsnyen pa'i skabs te le'u nyer brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang 'di skad ces gsungs so// nyon cig zung zhig rdo rje 'dzin// ngas gsungs pa la the tshom med// gsad pa las kyi bsnyen pa ni// yid 'thad mtshan

ldan gnas dag tu// gong gi las la gnas byas te// de yang 'chi bdag bsnyen pa ni// sum cu rtsa gnyis dril la bzla zhes bshad// las la sbyor ka'i dus de ru// sna la ro tshas ras btsal te/ mas yar bgrang

ba'i tshes brgyad dam// nyi shu gnyis kyi nub mo ni// dur khrod gling nas ras blangs la// sme khrag gsum du bcug byas la// 'chi bdag gshin rje de la bstim// yab yum las la sbyor ka yin// sngags 'di nyid

kyang rab tu bzlas// oM sa ma ya many+dzu shrI/ a kro te ka kA la rU pa hUM phaT// ces bzlas la/ nyi shu drug gi snga dro la// ro ras bkru dang brgyang spyad bya// nyid phyed man chad snag tsha mnye// dbang du bsdu ba'i sngags
'di bzlas// oM du man+ta ka ra hUM hUM phaT phaT/ ces brjod/ snag tsha mnye ba'i las zin nas// de bzhin dgong ka 'khor lo bri// bri ba zin nas lhar phyag 'tshal// bka' bden pa 'grub par gyur cig ces
bya// yang na dur khrod ras med na// thod pa dag la 'khor lo bri// ag tse'i ngos su 'chi bdag gzugs bris la// gzugs kyi snying gar ming byad bris// dgra yi ming rus thod par gzhug/ 'khor lo dbus kyi
ya las kyang// 'chi bdag gshed po'i sku ru bskyed// phyogs kyi ya me me de k+She// bzhi las gshed bzhi'i skur bskyed pas// bdag gi mdun du ri rab las// gser gyi ri bdun bcas pa bsam// bdag nyid
gshin rje gshed po yi// rnal 'byor cha byad ldan byas la// lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong yang// chang par bcug la be con bsam// ri rab bdag gi sbyir brdeg ste// ri rab rgya gram gas par bsam// de bzhin

sngags 'di rab tu brjod// oM na mo bud+d+ha d+harma sang g+he b+h+yaH sarba ta thA ga ta kro d+ha bi dzA ya ag+ni dz+wa la ni dza hwa pre ta shi ya hUM hUM phaT phaT ces brjod pas/ ri rab rgya gram gshag bsam zhing// gnas kyi
gshin rje 'gugs bsam zhing// thugs ka'i yi ge ya nag po// tha ma dbang sdud sngags gyis bskor ba las// 'od zer 'phros pas 'og phyogs su// 'chi bdag gshin rje gtso bo 'khor// 'bum phrag bcas la
'od phog pas// rang dbang med par de bkug nas// de la sha khrag sna tshogs kyis// gtor ma rdzas kyis mchod par bya// b+han+da 'brub khung nang bcug la// dbang du bsdu ba'i sngags bzlas la// bdag las
'phros pa'i gshed po dag/ grangs med 'phros pas 'chi bdag tshogs// rang dbang med par bkug byas te// thod pa'i nang du bcug pa la// zhabs g.yas rdo rje'i phur pa yis// gzir bas skad ngan 'o dod
'bod// rang dbang med par dbang du bsdus// bka' nyan ci gsung brjod par bsgom// skya rengs dang po shar ba la// 'chi bdag gshin rje 'khor bcas la// gtor ma byin te gshin rje nyid// pho nyar bkye la

dgra bo 'gug/ lha dang dbral la sogs pa bya// nyi ma rtse la shar ba dang// b+han+da dkyil 'khor gru gsum steng du gzhag/ de bzhin bsad pa'i sngags bzlas te// bdag nyid thugs kar yi ge ya// sngo nag gnag

la 'tsher ba bsam// tha ma drag sngags 'bru bdun pa// me lce 'bar ba 'dra ba bsam// gsad pa las kyi sngags 'di bzlas// oM hrIHSh+t+r-IHbi kr-i tA na na che ge mo sha truM nA sha ya hUM phaT// ya ma rA dza sa do me ya che ge
mo a mu kaM pra ma ya hUM phaT/ ces brjod pas/ 'od zer bdag la phog gyur pas// rang dbang med par bskul gyur nas// gshed po ya ma rA dza bskul// de yis phyogs skyong gshin rje bskul// de yis ma mo
mkha' 'gro dang// rdo rje ging pho ging mo dang// bdud la sogs pa dbang med bskul// de bzhin gzas po dngos bkug nas// thod par bcug ste gnas pa las// gsad pa las kyi sngags bzlas pas// star

tshan rtsi sbur mi chags bzhin// gang la bya ba brlag par bsam// dgong gyi dmar thag chad pa dang// gshed chen ya ma rA dza la// sha khrag sna tshogs gtor ma bsham// be con phyag rgya bcas nas kyang// gnag
pa'i spyi bor de brgyab pas// tshangs pa'i rtsa bcad mgo 'khor bsam// nyi shar rtse nas las brtsams te// bdag nyid thugs kar yi ge ya// 'bru bdun me ri 'bar bar bskor// gsad pa las kyi sngags 'di

bzlas// oM hrIHSh+t+r-IHbi kr-i tA na na che ge mo sha trUM nA sha ya hUM phaT/ ya me do ru Na yo da ya che ge mo a mu kaM mur tsa ya hUM phaT/ ces brjod pas/ 'od zer bdag la phog gyur pas// rang dbang med par bskul nas
kyang// de yis myos byed 'bar ba bskul// de yis phyogs skyong gshin rje bskul// de bzhin ma mo mkha' 'gro dang// ging bdud 'dug pa'i dbang med bskul// de bzhin dmigs pa'i dngos
bkug nas// 'dug pa'i dbang med thod par bcug/ gsad pa las kyi sngags bzlas pas// star tshan rtsi sbur mi chags bzhin// gang la bya ba brlag par bsam// de bzhin dmar thag chad pa dang// gshed
po myos byed 'bar ba la// mnyes pa'i sha khrag gtor ma sbyin// gshed la bcol bskul drag tu bya// phyag rgya gong bzhin bcas nas kyang// be con lte bar brgyab pas ni// lus brgyal yid 'khrugs 'chi bar

bsam// bdag gi thugs ka'i ya nag po// drag sngags bdun gyis bskor ba la// gsad pa las kyi sngags bzlas te// oM hrIHSh+t+r-IHbi kr-i tA na na sha truM nA sha ya hUM phaT/ ya da yo ni ra yak+She ya che ge mo a mu kaM rak+ta tsa

ra ya hUM phaT/ 'od zer bdag la phog gyur pas// rang dbang med par bskul nas kyang// gshed chen Ar+ya ma ru bskul// de yis phyogs skyong gshin rje bskul// de bzhin ma mo mkha' 'gro dang// ging dang ging
mo bdud la sogs// 'dug pa'i dbang med bskul bar bsam// de yi gzas pa po bkug nas// dbang med thod par bcug par bsam// gsad pa las kyi sngags bzlas pas// star tshan rtsi sbur mi chags
bzhin// gang la bya ba brlag par bsam// de bzhin dmar thag chad pa dang// gshed chen Ar+ya ma ru la// sha khrag mnyes pa'i mchod pa dbul// be con mgrin par brgyab pa yi/ khrag tsar lhug gis song bar

bsam// bdag gi thugs kar yi ge ya// drag sngags 'bru bdun bskor ba la// gsad pa las kyi sngags bzlas te// oM hrIHSh+t+r-IHbi kr-i tA na na sha truM nA sha ya hUM phaT// ya k+She ya ts+tsha ni rA ma ya// che ge mo a mu kaM mA ra
ya hUM phaT/ ces brjod pas// 'od zer bdag la phog gyur pas// rang dbang med par bskul nas kyang// de yis ral pa tshar dgu bskul// de yis phyogs skyong gshin rje bskul// de bzhin ma mo mkha' 'gro
dang// ging pho ging mo bdud la sogs// 'dug pa'i dbang med bskul bar bsam// gzas pa bkug nas thod par bcug/ de bzhin bsad pa'i sngags bzlas pas// star tshan rtsi sbur mi chags bzhin// gang
la bya ba brlag par bsam// dgong ka'i dmar thag chad pa dang// gshed chen ral pa tshar dgu la// sha khrag sna tshogs gtor ma sbyin// drag po'i phrin las bcol bskul bya// de bzhin be con phyag rgya

yis// snying khar brgyab pas srog bcad nas// dbugs kun phyi la phyung bar bsam// gsad pa ma ra'i man ngag 'di// gshin rje gshed po bdag gis kyang// thugs kyi sgrom bu kha phye nas// rdo rje 'dzin pa khyod
la byos// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ gsang ba las kyi bsnyen pa'i skabs te le'u nyer dgu pa'o//// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// yab
kyi sku la 'khril zhing khams gsum sgrol mdzad tshogs// 'jig rten dbang du sdud cing srid gsum zil gyis gnon// bdud mo mi bzad tshogs kyi las rnams bshad du gsol// zhes brjod do// 'jigs byed

chen pos bka' stsal pa// las kyi srin mo'i tshogs kyis su khrag ka la pa// 'di ni nges par bstan gyis nyan par byos// zhes bka' stsal to// thig gdab rgya gram le'u tse brgyad cu gcig/ bdud mo'i grong khyer

bcu drug dang// bdud dang dkrug dang sdebs pa'i yan lag tshar// 'di ni yun du las de rdug pa med// mu khyud gsum gyi sngags kyi sbyor ba kun gyis 'gyur// yab kyi sngags dang spu gri'i sbyor bas dus dang kun

tu sbyar// 'khrugs byed sbyor ba'i sngags ni 'di lta ste// rag mo e ka dzA ti dum shi dun ma trag shaM be tA lI snying ro shan raM thun dza snying kha rag hri shi pu rag k+She re tra yaM ud/ tsit+ta rag ta hUM/ 'di ni sbyor ba'i las

chen te// brgya rtsa bzhi yis las grub pa'o// drag po spu gri'i sbyor ba ni// u rmo lta bu don bstan pa// ma mar thun gzer b+h+yo ru lu rbad// ya ma de ma b+h+yo ma b+h+yo ru lu rbad/ kha rag de ma b+h+yo ru lu b+h+yo rbad// di shi de ma

b+h+yo ru lu rbad/ pu tra de ma b+h+yo ru lu rbad/ rag sha de ma b+h+yo ru lu rbad/ de ba da ra la de ma b+h+yo ru lu rbad/ pa tra mug b+h+yo ru lu rbad/ tsit+ta de ma b+h+yo ru lu rbad/ de ni mu la'i sbyor ba ste/ mdo ru bsdus nas bshad pa
yin// zhes bka' bstsal pas 'khor rnams mos pas 'dun par gyur to// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// he he/ dpa' bo chen po 'jigs byed gshed// drag po gsang ba'i 'khor lo la// skyod pa'i rta dang

'debs pa'i sngags// sdeb pa'i grogs dang rno ba'i rdzas// de bzhi'i rkyen dang ma ldan na// 'dam la btab pa'i phur pa'am/ khri mun nang nas g.yu 'tshol 'dra// mthu stobs bdag pos 'di skad gsol// skyod
pa'i rta ni gang la bgyi// 'debs pa'i sngags ni gang la bgyi// sdeb pa'i grogs ni gang la bgyi// rno ba'i ngar ni gang la bgyi// yab cig 'jam dpal bka' stsol cig/ gshin rje gshed pos 'di skad

brjod// nyon cig zung zhig rdo rje 'dzin// drag po gsang ba'i 'khor lo la// skyod pa'i rta dang mi ldan na// rlung nag 'tshubs ma 'phyos pa 'dra// 'debs pa'i sngags dang mi ldan// nam mkha' sprin gyis 'gags

pa 'dra// sdeb pa'i grogs dang mi ldan na// dpa' bo gting gnon med pa 'dra// rno ba'i ngar dang mi ldan na// mtshon tsha rtse mo rtul ba 'dra// de bzhin grogs rnams ngas bshad kyi// lag na rdo rjes rab tu
zung// bka' dang gzhung bzhin ma nor ba'i// bsrung ba'i sdom pa ma nyams par// rdzas dang lag cha ldan pa dang// bsam ldan bzlas brjod sran tshugs shing// dam tshig bsrung zhing drag

shul spyod// lta spyod bsgrub pa ldan pa yi// dpal rtul can gyi rnal 'byor pas// bstan pa gnyen po bsrung don du// dgon pa chen po gnas mal der// bya byed zang zing 'du long spang// 'tshe ba'i yo byad
dbags te bstar// bya ba thams cad zin nas ni// bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni// bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa de// ting 'dzin gsal dang brtan pa yi// lha yi rnal 'byor rtse gcig bya// thun mong dam

tshig bsrung zhing bsgrub/ khyad par dam tshig spyod cing dor// bsnyen bsgrub phrin las gzhung bzhin bya// tshang zhing rdzogs pa'i grangs bsnyen la// 'khor zhing phyin pa dus bsnyen yin// mthong ngam thos sam nyams
su len// mtshan ma'i bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dang// zhi rgyas gnyis kyi 'khor los mchod// dbang drag gnyis kyi 'khor los mnan// zhi rgyas gnyis kyi bsrung phan gdags// dbang drag gnyis kyi bsgral bar

bya// 'khor lo gzhan yang ci rigs par// dbye bskrad dgug sogs gzhung bzhin bya// gang 'dod las de bsgrub byas na// 'khor lo'i rgyu dang snag tsha dang/ phyogs dang bsam sbyor rim pa dang/ kha dog so so'i

mthun rdzas ni// rim pa can gyi de shes bya// de la 'khor lo zhes grags pa// ngo bo nges tshig rnam grangs so// ngo bo spyi yi mtshan nyid ni// rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur zhing 'gro// so so rang gi mtshan nyid ni// gang la

btab pa de ltar snang// nges pa'i tshig kyang de bzhin te// rnam par 'gyur zhing 'gro ba dang// mi 'khor 'khor zhing 'gro ba dang// lte ba 'khor zhing rtse mos gcod// de la grangs ni mtha' yas te// mdor na rnam

pa gsum du shes// thugs rje sprul pa'i 'khor lo dang// las dang srid pa'i 'khor lo dang// 'jig rten phan gnod byed pa yi// bya ba bsgrub pa'i 'khor lo'o// dper na mo 'phang mgal me dang// glog dang sgra
ldan 'khor lo dang// shing rta zo chu'i 'khor lo sogs// las dang 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid ni// thugs rje sprul pa'i 'khor los ni// nyon mongs gcod cing sdug bsngal 'joms// bsgrub dang bsgrub par bya ba

yi// sems bskyed pa dang rgyud dgrol zhing// ye shes sems mtshon rnam grol byed// de las rnam pa gzhan du yang// zhi dang rgyas dang srung ba dang// dgug dang dbang du bya ba dang// dbye bskrad dgug dang smyo
'bog dang// gsad dang mnan pa la sogs pa// de yi rkyen dang rtsol ba dang// dus dang las thabs byed pa yi// 'phen zhing bskyod pa nus pa yi// 'khor zhing gcod cing 'bigs pa dang// bsnur dang 'khrul
zhing sdud pa dang// gzir zhing gnan cing 'bigs pa dang// brdeg cing rnam par 'joms par byed// las dang srid pa'i 'khor lo ni// las kyi 'phen pas srid par 'khor// phyi nang rten 'brel
'jig rten bskyed// nyon mongs las dang sdug bsngal gyi// rnam pa gsum dang 'khor shing 'gro// 'das dang da ltar gnas pa dang// 'byung dang ma 'ongs phyis 'byung dang// skad kyi 'byung ba'i rgyun gyis

na// skad cig ma yi rgyun gyis 'khor// de bzhin phyi rol don rnams kyang// dbyar dgun ston dpyid zla ba los/ bskal pa du ma 'khor zhing 'gro// ngo bo nges tshig rnam grangs su// 'khor lo'i rang bzhin bstan
pa yin// bde gshegs bka' la gnod pa la// 'chi bdag 'khor lo nag po bya// yi dwags grong khyer bcom byas la// snel gri mu su'i mgo thod blangs// yi dwags gos la khram bris te// dbyibs ni zla ba lta
bu ste// kun nas yongs su zlum pa ste// rim pa gsum ldan le'u tse dgu// bcu gnyis bcu drug rtsibs bcas te// le'u tse dgu dang bcu gnyis la// bcu bdun la sogs sngags kyis mdzes// 'di lta bu yi

'khor lo ni// phyin ci log gi bcings pa yi// log pa'i shes pa ldan pa des// rgyu mthun mtshan ma'i 'khor lo la// man ngag can gyi rnal 'byor pas/ kha nas drag po'i sngags bzlas te// chos kyi rgyal po la
sogs pa'i// las kyi shan pa'i go bkram ste// lcags kyu shag ti to ma ra/ kha twAM ber ka la sogs pas// brdeg cing 'joms par byed pa ni// 'dzab cing rgyud cing 'ded pa dang// 'dzin cing gsod par bsam

pa yis// gang la bya ba'i rnam shes de// log pa'i stabs kyis gnas su mthong/ khro bdag gshin rje gshed po ru// bdag nyid bsam pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// mtshan ma'i ming rus bcas pa la// ske tshe dug dang

nyung nag dang// thal chen gu gul nyung dkar gyis// brab dang gzir dang dbab pa dang// dgug cing rdo rje'i mtshon gyis gdab// sngon dmar byad du gzhug byas la// ga'u kha sbyar nang du gzhug/ smra bcad zhi
khro'i sngags bzlas pa'i// drag po'i sngags kyi phog 'gyur na/ gang la dmigs pa'i bsgrub bya ste// mgo 'khor ba dang khrag skyugs pa// myos par ma ra gdon mi za// drag po'i las rnams rdzogs pa dang/
mtshan ma ming rus bcas pa rnams// thod pa nag por rgyas btab la// sme bas bkrus pas tshan chus byug/ mu sa la yi g.yogs shing gtum/ kha ral ma yi zhabs mas gril// yi dwags grong ngam sme btsog

khyim// mchod rten 'og gam lha khang sgo// rgya mtsho'i 'gram mam lung mdo ru// rdo la ri rab gzugs bris la// steng du laM dang d+h+ri yis hri yang mnan// gshin rje'i lag tu gtad khram bya// thun kha brgyad kyang brdeg
par bya// sbos pa dug thun lkugs pa kha// nyi ma dang po'i thun gyi mnan// gzer ba mda' thun brla la gzer// nyi ma gnyis pa'i thun kyis brab// lkugs pa khrag thun myos pa phur// nyi ma gsum

pa'i thun gyis brab// gsang ba nyung nag sa yi tshon// nyi ma bzhi pa'i thun gyis mnan// mtshan ngan thod pa khrag gis byug/ khrag sna dug sna sbyar byas nas// shan mar dug skyog dug thun bzlas// glen lkugs thod

pa'i kha thun te// lcags mda' lcags gzhu mda' thun bzlas/ bzlas pa'i tshe dang bklag pa'i tshe/ 'dra min 'dug/ gri bo'i thod par mtshon brdar ba'o// mkhris nad thod par sa sar gser// gla ba gser thun sngags kyis

so// smyo ba'i thod pa khrag 'thung dang// smyos pa phur thun bzlas pa bya// rabs chad thod pa nyung thun dang// sa tshon thun du shes par bya// chu shel sgron ma rlab po che// lkugs pa mon mo'i lag g.yas kyi// srid
pa'i dmag dpung ra mda' bzlog/ ya ma rA dza'i g.yab kyis g.yab// gsur dang sme ba'i dud pas bdug/ gcer bu'i spyi tshugs ngu 'bod bya// mi mthun gnyen po'i phyogs dag tu// gzir gnon drag po'i

mngon spyod bya// drag po'i thun sngags kha nas bzlas// zhung thun ya rbad na thun ya rbad phung gung yang thun ya rbad/ khrag thun ya rbad/ gang po dang lo lo kyi gye/ srog la yaM yaM snying la thun/ kha brgyad thun yang brdeg

par bya// lha srin sde brgyad la sogs pa'i// srid pa'i dmag dpung phab nas ni// drang srong dmod pa'i sngags zor dang// sna tshogs sngags kyi sbyor ba dang// lha yi rnal 'byor ldan pas bya// khru gang gru bzhi

zabs yod par// ga'u rdzas kyi sbyor ba de// 'byung po'i gtor ma gshin rje la// byin la lag tu gtad khram bya// rang gi yi dam bsgom bya zhing// byin gyis brlabs pa'i gtor ma ni// sa sros tshe na lho phyogs
gtang// sgrol ba'i drag sngags brnag pa'i lung// bstan pa'i bsrung ba gnan pa'i gter// phrin las drag po sngags kyi mtshon/ 'khor lo thun sdebs sgrol ba'i 'phyong// rdo rje sems dpa' gzungs shing
chongs// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyun las// 'khor lo thun sdebs kyi skabs te le'u sum cu pa'o//// de nas gshin rje gshed pos 'di skad brjod// bstan pa srung ba brnag pa'i lung// thugs kyi

man ngag sngags zor mchog/ sgrol ba'i phrin las sbyor thabs su// 'khor lo byad sdebs man ngag 'phyong// bka' yi bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir// rang sems dag pa'i rnal 'byor pas// snying rje rtag tu srog ltar
brten// byams dga' btang snyoms de bzhin du// mdo sogs 'don zhing bsam gtan bya// rgyun gyi yi dam rtse gcig pas// bla ma dag la rtag tu bkur// des kyang dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin gzhug/ theg chen
dam tshig sdom pa bshad// rang gi sngags dang phyag rgya dang// sgrub thabs man ngag legs par blang// de nas mchod pa cho ga bzhin// nyin re dag tu byas nas kyang// sku gzugs dag kyang 'bad
de bya// bde ba'i stan la lus sems gzhag/ sum 'bum mi skyo'i bar du bzlas// de 'og ri rtser gnas byas la// rlung za zhing ni bzlas pa bya// 'bum bcu'i mtha' ru phrin las brtsams// nam mkha'i sgron ma
mar dus tshe// yi dwags grong bcom shi gos la// yi dwags 'khor lo gdug pa yi// 'khor lo gdug pa'i lte ba la// re'u mig dgu yi mtshams bor te// bcu gnyis 'khor lo gdug pa'i nang// bcu bdun la

sogs gsad sngags dang// zlum pos bskor ba'i phyi rim na// hrIHSh+t+r-IHming yig dbyangs tshogs rnams// dur khrod sol ba dug sol gyis// srin mtheb gung mdzub sbyar ba yis/ khru gang gos gnyis ras mchog

la// gdug pa'i yi ge g.yas g.yon bzlog/ de nang chud pa'i skyes bu gnyis// zhal bgrad spyan bzlog 'khor lo 'dzin// phyag zhabs mgur chu ro nyes brgyan// mi smra dbang po bsdams te bri// gnyis sbyar rgyab
la ro nye yis// bsdams pa'i tshul du mkhas pas bri// gdug pas bzung zhing thod nang du// gdug pa grub gcig thod nang du yang 'dug/ dril byas sngon dmar byad kyis bsdams// gdug pa'i thod nag ltos 'gro
bri// mngar dang klu sman rtsi mchog gis// mchod cing sbal la mgu bar bya// gdug pas bzung zhing thod par gzhug/ sngon dmar byad thag bzhis btab la// bzung ste nyin mtshan ma nor bzlas/ kha nas drag
po'i sngags bzlas pas// rdo rje rlung lce sbyar ba las// sngon dmar gdug pa'i ro nye'i tshogs// dur khrod sol bas dug sogs sbyar// lcags sam 'ug pa'i sgro rtsa yis// gsang ba'i sngags dang ming rus
bri// dug can nad kyis bsgrub bya la// dug lce nag pos bsdams par bsam// 'chi bdag bshan pa'i yi dwags tshogs// gtum po dug gi kha rlangs can// chos kyi rgyal po la sogs pas// 'jab cing sgugs
shing bzung nas ni// gshin rje gdug pa'i khang pa ru// dbang med las kyis 'jug par bsam// hrIHSh+t+r-IHgdug pa'i sngags kyi mthar// hUM dang ming spel A kar Sha// dza gnyis dgug pa'i gsang sngags
bzlas// ske tshe dug nyung sngags kyis brab// zla ba nag po'i mar dus tshe// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi gru gsum ste// lcags khri nag po'i steng dag tu// yi dwags gdug pa'i ga bu ['u] gzhag/ ya sogs

gdug pa'i gsang sngags rnams// zhi khro rdzogs nas ga bu ['u] de// rdza mkhan sa la ga bu ['u] rgyu// gdug pa'i ga bu ['u] shong ba'i tshe// gnyis byas nang du ro nye gnyis// phyi nang gnyis su 'bur du
bya// ga bu ['u] dag la 'khril ba'i tshul// me yi smin ma ga bu ['u] gnag/ gdug pa'i thod nag ga bur ['ur] gzhug/ sngon dmar gnyis kyi the gus bsdams// shar nub lho byang phyogs
mtshams su// gdug pa gnas pa'i yul dag la// sgo bltas khyim nas 'dom gang du// rdo la 'jig rten gzugs bris la// sa sgo phye la khyim bdag rbad// mthun pa'i rdzas byin mgu bar bya// ga bu ['u]

gdug pa'i sbyor ba de// legs sbas steng nas 'jig rten gzhug/ gang la bya ba'i dus dang lo// gnyen po gang shis mkhas pas dpyad// zla ba nag po'i mar dus tshe// drang srong rgyu ba'i sa phyogs su// byad stems
'khor lo'i btsan dug spyo/ khyab 'jug mchod cing khyim bdag rbad// gcer bu spyi tsug 'o dod 'bod// ma nyes dpang gzug ru dung 'dud// mi mthun gnyen po'i phyogs dag tu// bos shing mchod cing gtad

khram bya/ khyab 'jug gdug pa'i dmod pa bor// yi dwags gdug pa'i smon lam gdab// nA ga gdug pa'i dmod bcol bya// rang nyid lha yi nga rgyal gyis// dkar po rdo rje rgya bsam la// sa sgo bcad la rgya yis
mnan// sdom la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas// g.yeng ba med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// phrin las rdzogs dang gsang sngags bzlas// bsgrub bya'i gzugs phung ma zhig par// gdug pa sbrul gyi sems 'dra

bas// ma zhig bar du gtang mi bya// zhig ste mngon du gyur pa dang// spar zhing g.yo ba'i cho ga bya// bskyed dang spyan drang mchod bskul rnams// sgom rgyud mdzes thun nang du'o// bla ma'i gdams ngag dam pa
yang// yid la nan tan gzhag par bya// byang chub sems nyid sems la gzhag/ dam tshig bsrung sdom mi nyams bsrung// bka' la bshad pa rjes mthun par// rdzas dang lag cha mthun bsdebs shing// rtag tu

dur khrod dgon par dga'// dus dang lo tshigs dam bcas pa// mi 'da' gzhung ltar byed pa ste// mtshan ma mthong dang bzlas pa rdzogs// rgyun gyi yi dam che ba ste// de lta bu yi rnal 'byor pa// bden pa grub
pa'i nus pa yod// shes rab snying rje rab ldan pa'i// dbang thob dam tshig srog ltar bsten// mi 'jigs dpa' bo brtul bzhugs can// man ngag yod pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rang don phran tshegs ma yin
pa'i// dkon mchog dbu 'phang smod pa dang// bstan la zhe sdang gnod byed pa// bka' gsang ston pas bshad pa yi// drag po'i mngon spyod zab mo'i lung// gshin rje gshed po bdag gis kyang// thugs kyi

sgrom nas bton pa 'di// 'khor lo byad stems brnag pa'i lung// man ngag can gyi de shes bya// las kyi bya ba thun tshags rnams// man ngag don gyis shes par bya// cung zad mi mthun mchod bstod rnams// zla
gsang nag po'i rgyud dag las// gsang ba mdzes thun gzhung ltar bya// de la mchod pa gsungs pa ni// mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che// dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa yin// tshigs bcad bcu
drug tha ma la// 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog/ 'gro la phan pa'i gtso chen gyis// sman par dgongs te bzhes su gsol// tshig gnyis btag la dbul bar bya// bstod pa la sogs byed pa na// de
bzhin rtsa ba mtshan brjod las// 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas a las byung// 'dud sogs kun gyis bstod byas mthar// mtshan gyi sngags brjod bstod chen bya// sngags

mchog mnga' bdag rig sngags rgyal// zhes pa nas/ ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs 'byed pa// srid pa'i dra ba 'joms pa po// zhes bstod pa tshig rkang drug pa dang// drug cu rtsa bzhis bstod pa dbul// yang na 'dud
pa nyi shu nas// mtshan sngags brjod la bstod chung bya// yang na mdzes thun gzhung bzhin bya// bskal pa sbrul nag khyil ces gtad// 'khor lo byad stems gsad thabs 'di// dkon mchog gnod cing bstan pa

'jig/ mngon spyod thugs rjes bsgral ba'i phyir// mi tshig tha snyad tsam du brjod mi bya// chu srin mgrin par rin chen chud pa ltar// khong du sbas te yongs su bsgrags pa min// gshin rje gshed po'i thugs kyi
yang bcud 'di// phyag na rdo rjes rab tu gzung zhing nyon// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ tshon gyi gru gu sngon dmar byad stems kyi skabs te le'u so gcig pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das
gshin rje gshed pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// las kyi bya ba gzhan zin nas// drag po'i 'khor lo mnan pa 'di// lag na rdo rjes rab tu zung// shin tu dgon pa'i gnas nyid du// dur khrod gling nas

ras blangs te// 'khor lo rim pa tshul bzhin du// mA ra ya yi ling+ga nyid// ji bzhin 'dod pa'i dbyibs su bca'// gong ma'i bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dang// 'khor lo thabs can gyi dang chos kyi yang/ snang kyi dam rdzas

de// mchod rten 'og tu gnan par bya// bdag nyid gshed por bsgom byas la// mchod rten de nyid ngo bo yang// ri rab gling bzhi chas par bsgom// ri rab lto na bzhugs pa ste// sgrol ba'i yum dang sbyor ba'i
yum// shar dang nub tu gnas par bsam// byang na sras mchog gnas par bsgom// de bzhin rab tu mnan cing gzir// ri rab bzung bzhir laM ser bzhi// de las gling phran bcu gnyis bsam// ri rab 'og
tu gzas pa po// gshin rje ral pa tshar dgu yis// lcags thag sngon pos bcings pa de// bam ril mnan nas lcags phur la// dpag bsam shing tsam btags pa ste// sgra sgrogs kha nas khrag skyugs gan bu
bcing// mig rtsa rig rig 'o dod 'bod// ci mdzad thong zhig zer zhing mnan par bsam// 'khor lo bri ba'i dus su yang// dmigs pa'i ming dag gzhug pa ni// 'khor lo nyid la mi shong
zhing// mi btub pa rnams gud du bri// de dag bris te gdags par bya// gnas dang thabs ni 'di yin te// ya la sogs pa'i ye ge lnga// gra bzhi hUM phaT bar mtshams bzhi// rtsibs kyi re'u cha bcu gnyis

dang// mtha' bskor ming rus le'u tse brgyad// de dag nyi shu rtsa dgu la// gud du ming gi mjug tu yang// mA ra ya zhes bris pa'i 'khor lo gnyis/ kha sbyar ba yi nang du gzhug/ 'khor lo skud pas sbrel la

bzhag/ ngan sngags bzlas pa'i dus su yang// bzhi pa'i ngan sngags khri phrag 'don// de dag bton pa'i rjes la yang// yi ge bcu pa nus tshad bzlas// de tshe mchod pa 'bul ba dang// de tshe gtor ma gtong ba

dang// ye shes lha la thugs dam bskul// las kyi gshin rje ma mo rnams// rak+ta gsol zhing dgug pa'i pa'i phrin las bya// 'khor lo sbed pa'i dus su yang// gshin rje dag la gtad pa ni// rdzas kyi mchod pa
bshams pa dang// bdag nyid gshed por bsgom pa dang// 'chi bdag dgongs su gsol ba dang// rang gi las kyi ltang brtsi dang// bsgrub bya'i chad pa brtsi ba dang// gshin rje'i rgyal po spyan drangs

nas// dam tshig phyag rgya rab bstan cing// dam tshig snying po rab tu bzlas// de bzhin dam las mi 'da' dang// dam rdzas mchod pas mnyes byed dang// las kyi phyag rgya bca' ba dang// dam tshig bskul te
las kyi gnyer gtad dang// mnas bsgags rnams kyis gtad pa'i las rdzogs te// 'khor lo sba ba'i dus su yang// gshin rje dag la gtad pa ni// drang srong dmod pa'i smon lam gdab par bya// de la

mnan rdzas bsag pa ni// mi khrag ra khrag dug la sogs// pho rog 'ug pa du [pu] shud sgro// srin bya'i snying dang 'ug pa'i mig/ btsong dang la phug ske tshe dang// g.yer ma bra 'o sga dang nas// de la sngags te
gnan pa'o// spyir na gnan pa'i las byas na// gshed pa'i dgongs pas gnan pa dang/ phyag rgya'i stobs kyis gnan pa dang// gtad khram bcu gnyis cho gas gnan pa dang// ya stags gdugs pas gnan pa

dang// de dag rdzas kyis gnan pa'o// drag po'i sngags kyis gnan pa dang// smon lam gdab cing gnan pa dang// drang srong dmod pa'i gnan pa'o// 'di nas lho yi phyogs rol na// dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi

stong pha rol na// thod pa lcags kyi grong khyer na// yi dwags kun gyi sde dpon po// ma mo kun gyi tshogs rje mo// gson gshin gnyis kyi zam kha ba// gson po skos la 'debs pa po// shi ba rnams kyi gshin
bu rje// dge ba can gyi ltang 'dzin la// sdig pa can gyi chad pa mkhan// legs nyes chos bzhin gcod pa yis// chos rgyal gshin rje zhes bya ba// mngon shes rdzu 'phrul mthu ldan pas// 'khor
bcas khyed la gtad par bya// de dag rab tu mnan gyur na// de yi cho ga 'dir ma bshad// lag na rdo rjes rab tu zung// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ 'khor lo mnan pa'i skabs te le'u so gnyis
pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i gshed pos 'di skad ces brjod do// bdag don ma yin gzhan don nam// dkon mchog bla ma'i don ched du// rU tra gdug pa tshar bcad na// sngags kyi dngos
grub thob nas 'grub// dper na dpa' bo skyes bu yis// g.yung ngo bzlog par 'dod pa yis// go dang mtshon la nan tan bskyed// des ni g.yul rnams bzlog par 'gyur// go mtshon mgar la rag las
phyir// dpa' bos mgar la brten par bya// mgar gyis rdo la lcags su bzhu// lcags la go dang mtshon cha brdung// de nas 'thar la nan tan bskyed// til mar ngar yang yid 'thad blud// de nas
brdeg thabs shes par bya// de bzhin rnal 'byor chen pos kyang// thog mar bla ma mnyes bya'i phyir// rab tu gces dang yid 'thad dbul// gnang bar dka' ba'i dbang yang mnos// man ngag gnad nas smyur
la bsgrub// snying po don thabs lhar shes bya// drug 'bum sum 'bum gcig 'bum dang// gzhan yang 'bum gcig shes par bya// de nas mkhas pas phrin las bya// dus dang phyogs ni mkhas pas brtag/ khri

khri bar du spyi rgyug bya// phrin las dag la rnam pa gsum// 'khor lo sbyin bsreg mnan pa'o// dang po 'khor lo'i las byas nas// de nas gnan pa'i las shes bya// tha mar me yi las bya ste// me lha bsnyen pas
las rnams 'grub// dang por bsnyen pa rdzogs nas kyang// 'khor lo bskor ba'i las byas nas// gzhung las 'byung ba'i 'khor lo yi// gnan pa'i las thabs byas nas ni// hom dang bsreg pa'i las bsham

pa// thab khung gru gsum brtsig pa la// rdo rje rgya gram nag po bri// gzas pa'i ling+ga gzhag par bya// de nas hom shing tsher ma can// bam po bsgreng dang gru gsum brtsib// dug chu khrag gis byug par bya// gzhan

yang rak+ta'i ar+g+haM dang// smad phud til dmar 'bru bshos dang// mtshe thun lcags phye zangs phye dang// rdo phye dug chu 'bru nag po// sha chen rus pa gtub pa dang// de dag la sogs mdun du gzhag/ gos nag

gyon zhing thod nag bcing// rak+Sha'i phreng ba se ral kha// dpral bar me long zhing gi stan// rus sbal 'dug stangs lho phyogs blta// lcags sam mi rkang gzar bu thogs// dri chen dri chu gos dum gyis// sa la
dmigs pa'i gzugs byas la// snying gar ming dang rus bcas gzhug/ gzhan yang ming yig mang po dang// mi bsad mtshon gyis ling+ga gtub// dum bu re dang ming byang re// sha chen gtub pa re

sbag la// drag po'i sngags kyis khros la brdeg/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa ni// ting 'dzin rnam gsum tshig bshad dang// bcas pa'i phrin las gzhung bsrang bya// oM swa b+hA wa shud+d+haHsarba d+harma swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/

chos rnams stong pa'i rang bzhin sbyang// de yi ngang las nga rgyal lha// ya mAn+ta ka gsal bsgoms te// zhal drug phyag kyang bcu gnyis te// rgyan dang cha lugs gsal bar bsgom// thab khung e las 'bar ba'i
gzhal yas khang// drag po 'bar ba'i gnas su gsal bar bsgom// yugs sa rdo nag shing nag gtsubs pa'i me// rlung g.yab nag pos g.yab pa'am// drag po sngags kyi rab tu sbar// me yi nang du raM nag ma

tsha me yi lha// rgyan dang cha lugs nag po gsal bar bsgom// ting nge 'dzin gyi 'phro 'dus gnas nas kyang// 'od zer lcags kyus ye shes me lha de// spyan drangs gnyis su med par bzhugs par bsam// me yi
lha nyid sngags 'dis spyan drangs te// oM ag+ne ha bya dzaH ag+ne ka bya dzaH dzaHhUM baM hoH sku mdog nag po ra skyes kham pa zhon/ rwa la 'ja' tshon sna lnga 'khyil// zhing gi ya mgal snga ru

la// zhing gi ma mgal phyi ru la// zhing gi pags pas sga g.yogs bgyis// sbrul nag gis ni gong rmed bgyis// phyag na dril bu bgrang phreng bsnams// dbu la me yi thod bcings shing// me dpung 'bar ba'i klong na bzhugs// shar lho

mtshams nas gnyis su med par bzhugs// de nas yang/ oM pra mo ha/ pra mo ha/ zhes pas me yi mdun rgyab sta zur bzhi/ pra mo ha spyan gsum phyag bzhi pa/ g.yas dang po na chu srin rgyal mtshan bsnams pa/
g.yas bar ma na ye shes kyi me mgal bsnams pa/ g.yon dang po na me dar bsnams pa/ tha ma gnyis gnyis dril bu bsnams par bsgom/ bskul zhing phrin las bcol/ bsreg rdzas dbul/ ag+ne dmar ser
me yi lha/ zhes pas bstod/ dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ 'khor lo hom sbrel gyi skabs te le'u so gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal gshin rje gshed pos 'di skad brjod

do// e ma ho// lag na rdo rje 'dzin pa khyod// dus ngan tha ma byung ba'i tshe// dkon mchog dbu 'phang smod pa'i dus// bstan pa gnyen po 'jig pa la// sngags kyi yang snying 'khrul 'khor bshad// snod dang ldan la

bstan gyur na/ 'dzam gling nyi ma shar ba 'dra// snod min kun la bstan gyur na// dus min bar ni srog zad skems// sngags la bye brag mang bzhugs kyang// rtsa ba'i snying po lngar 'dus te// sku gsung thugs kyi
snying po dang// yon tan phrin las lnga ru 'dus// bzhi ni nye bar bsnyen pa dang// bsgrub dang las la sbyor la 'jug/ rgyun du grangs shing las la sbyor// las la sbyor kar 'bum phrag re'o// grangs

te rtsa gnyis pa ru bshad// tha ma phrin las snying po ni// las la sbyor ba'i sngags kyang gdab// thugs kyi yang thugs nyi ma bzhi// phyi nang gsang ba gsum du gsungs// de la gsum gsum dgu ru bshad// phyi yi

nyi ma bzhi pa la// yi ge 'bru brgyad g.yon du bskor// phyi yi nang ni bzhi snying dril la bskor// phyi yi gsang bar bskor ba ni// bzhi snying dril la g.yas su bskor// nang la gsum du dbye ba ni// phyi yi dus su

bskor ba ni// a kro te ka bcu bdun pa'o// nang gi nang du bskor ba ni// ya ma me da bcu bdun pa// g.yon du bskor te bzlas pa'o// nang gi gsang bar bskor ba ni// ya ma me da k+She la sogs// yig 'bru bcu
bdun g.yas su bskor// gsang ba'i gsum du phye ba las// phyi yi dus su bskor ba ni// bsgrub pa'i drag sngags bcu bdun pa// g.yon du bskor te bgrang ba'o// gsang ba'i nang du bskor ba ni// gsang ba'i

drag sngags bcu bdun pa// g.yas su bdun skor bgrang ba'o// gsang ba'i gsang bar grangs pa ni// rtsa ba dam tshig yang snying ni// las la sbyor ba'i dus su yang// gzhi snying dril la nub mo bzlas/ A+oM a kro te

ka ya mAn+ta ka mu ka ya ma rA dza/ a mu ka sa do me ya a mu ka ya me do ru/ a mu ka Na yo da ya/ a mu ka ya da yo ni/ a mu ka ra ya k+She ya/ a mu ka ya k+She yats+tsha/ a mu ka ni rA ma ya/ a mu ka/ oM hrIHSh+t+r-IHbi kr-i tA

na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ sa ma ya/ hrIHSh+t+r-IHsa ma ya/ rak+sha badzra sa ma ya/ sa ma ya/ oM a d+h+ri ma e sti oM a bI ma ye sti yang 'dug/ oM wA gI shwa ri muM/ rtsa ba nyi ma shar ltar grangs// a kro yin nam// a bya rgod gzan la bcum

ltar grangs// dam tshig yi ge bcu drug la// hrIH Sh+t+r-IHla sogs sngags rnams ni// btson bu lcags su bcug ltar grangs// bsgrub pa'i gzhi rtsa dam tshig sngags// gzhi snying gcig tu dril ba dang// dbyangs kyi yi

ge l-i lAM yang li li'i tsho// skyes bu go mtshon bstar ltar grangs// nyi ma bzhi pa g.yon du nyin bdun bskor// nub dril sngags su a mu ka lcags kyi gzer bu btab ltar grangs// a mu ka yi tsho dgu pa// gser
gyi thog chen brgyab ltar grangs// g.yas su bskor dang ka pa ye// spu gri so 'debs bzhin du grangs// gdags pa so so'i sgo yi sngags// nyin gyi las su drag sngags grangs// nub mo dril sngags ka pa
ye// mtshan rtags sbyar la rab tu bsgrub// de dag don rnams man ngag sbyar// a kro te ka rgyun gyi sngags// de dag bsgrub pa'i dus su yang// mi lus phra men mgo can rab// spun dang bral khol pha ma
dang// mchod rten chen por ston pa dang// me chen rtag tu 'bar ba dang// rgya mtsho dag la mi nub rnams// de dag ma byung bar du grangs// bsgrub pa'i mtshan rtags byung ba dang// sbyor ka nyi ma bzhi

la 'jug/ khug pa'i mtshan rtags byung ba dang// g.yas skor gsad pa'i drag sngags dang// nub dril drag sngags las la 'jug/ rtsa ba'i lha rnams ma grub par// phrin las sngags kyang chud zos pas// lha grub
nas ni las dag bya// khugs nas de dag g.yas bskor bya// de ltar byas nas gdon mi za// gshin rje gshed pos gsungs pa'i don// ma khugs bar du g.yas bskor na// lha rnams dred nas las mi

'grub// khugs nas g.yas skor byed dus su// g.yon bskor byas nas sngags log nas// rnal 'byor 'khor du rkyen du 'gyur// ro langs drag po'i las 'di gang gi sngags 'khrugs na yang 'dug sngags sngas na// sngags

pa rang nyid 'chi bar bshad// sa ma ya dag ma bsrungs na// tshe srog bar chad dag tu 'gyur// dbang du ma 'dus rtseg log tshe// dbyangs kyi yi ge bzlas par bya// ting 'dzin zhen na slar tshur gnod// chos nyid
dag la rgyab kyang gtad// ma khugs pa la khugs drag na// dred nas rab tu 'gro bar 'gyur// ldog 'dra dam tshig khugs chung na// ro khugs chen po bya bar gsungs// gshin rje gshed pos 'di skad

gsungs// sngags bdun 'gyur sngags dag gi tshad ma ni// bdag gi tshad ma dag ni ting nge 'dzin// yeng yeng seng seng byed na ye mi 'grub// myos shing gnyid che 'thibs pa na// sgrib pas phog pas bshags pa

bya// snying 'phyo mi dga' sngags nor dang// 'bru chad ma tshang ba ru bshad// tshig tshig gsal na theb pa yin// dga' zhing gsal na 'grub pa yin// dgra bo'i tshad ma bka' stsal pa// mi go mi gsal bying ba
ni// rgyab brten yod pas myur mi 'grub// bdag pas kho dag zor mtho na// brgyab pas ma mor bskang bzlog bya// g.yag ru byung nas gsad na lo ru 'gor// ting 'dzin gsal zhing dngos byung na// lo phyed

tshun chod 'grub par bshad// ting 'dzin gsal zhing 'tshig byed na// zla ba tshun chod 'chi bar bshad// de ni mi 'gyur ba yi rtags// phyi ma rnams ni yid mi brtan// g.yon gyi dril sngags dam tshig yang snying

las// sngags 'di dril la bya bar bshad// rtsa ba yang snying drug po dang// 'bru dgu bo ni sku bskyed dang// de dag nye bar bsnyen pa'o// srog gi rtsa ba mjug sdud do// yang snying bsgrub dang las bsgrub
pa'o// dbyangs dang dam tshig de kho nyid// las de gang byed mjug la gdags// smyo 'bog lkugs pa lhog pa dang// pho log glang 'thab gzer nad dang/ khrag skyug rims nad mdze shu dang// ltas ngan cho
'phrul thog ser dang// gso gsad dbab bcad gang byed kyang// rtsa ba dam tshig yang snying dang// dbyangs kyi yang snying mjug dag la// so so'i srog gi snying po dang// las gang byed pa'i sngags
dag ni// 'bru re btags pas 'grub par bshad// phyi nas bsnyen pa rdzogs pa na// nyams su lon dang gsang rgyab dang// su yang rung ste the tshom med// bzlas pa las su rung ba dang// brdabs shing sprugs
pas 'grub par bshad// ces pa gshed pos rab tu bshad// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ sngags kyi yang snying 'khrul 'khor gyi skabs te le'u so bzhi pa'o//// de nas gsad pa las kyi yang

snying 'di gsungs so// bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor dri ba yang// 'khor lo bzhi la be con bzhi// 'khor lo brgyad la ral gri brgyad// gong ras rdo rje be con dang// ral gri la sogs dgod par bya// rdo rje dag gi
rtse mo la// mA ra ya yi ming dang rus// gru gsum nang du ling+ga gzhag/ zla gam gsum la rdzas gzhag pa// nag po dag la dug thun gzhag/ dmar po dag la khrag thun gzhag/ ser po dag la nyung thun
gzhag/ 'khor lo de dag kha dog kyang// grir shi'i khrag gis dmar por byug/ med na ra dkar gnya' nag gi khrag gis dmar por byug par bya'o// yang na ra rog glang rog gam/ khyi nag snying dkar khrag gis

bya// gsad pa las kyi sngags 'di bzlas// oM shrI ya mAn+ta ka/ ya ma rA dza sa do me ya/ ya me do ru Na yo da ya/ ya da yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ yak+She yats+tsha ni rA ma ya/ dgra bo'i tsit+ta la mA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM shrI many+dzu ya ma rA dza

dza/ ya mAn+ta ka e ka dza ti dza dza/ tsit+ta khar rbad rbad/ ba shaM du tsit+ta gu ga li rbad rbad/ dgra bo nr-i dza dza/ oM shrI many+dzu ya ma rA dza be tA lI kro d+hI shwa ri/ snying kha rag sa ma ya thum ril rbad/ ya ma rA dza sa do me ya khrag la

do ru me ya/ dgra bo'i klad pa la ha re ho re baM ril rbad/ ya ma rA dza sa do me ya/ ya me do ru k+Sha ya/ snying go chod sha che ge mo glo snying rtsa la mA ra ya rbad/ do ru me ya ces brdeg go/ gsad pa las kyi yang snying ni/ ya

ta me yis gsad do// gshin rje'i bya tsa ye/ sing+ha ye/ hri ta ye/ ma mo'i/ tsit+ta ya/ bya tsa ya/ ha la ye/ yi ge 'bru dgu gsad pa'i ngan sngags 'di// yang snying gsang ba nam mkha'i thog dang 'dra// dpal zla gsang
nag po'i rgyud las/ yang snying gsang ba'i skabs te le'u so lnga pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos 'di skad gsungs so// a A/ i I/ u U/ e ai/ r-i r-I/ l-i l-I/ o au/

aM a/ ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha k+Sha/ sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor man ngag la// phyi nang gsang ba gsum du bshad// de la gsum gsum dgu

ru bshad// phyi yi phyi ltar grangs pa ni// nyi ma dang po dag la yang// ya ma rA dza sa do me ya/ a mu kaM pra ma ya nr-i sha ku ru hUM phaT/ nyi ma gnyis pa dag la yang// ya me do ru Na yo da ya/ a mu kaM rak+ta

tsa ra ya hUM phaT/ nyi ma gsum pa dag la yang// ya da yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ a mu kaM mu+u ra tsa ya hUM phaT/ nyi ma bzhi pa dag la yang/ ya k+She yats+tsha ni rA ma ya/ a mu kaM ma ra ya huM phaT/ de dag las kyi mtha' sdud ni/ oM

many+dzu shrI a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka kA la ru pa nr-i sha ku ru ni hUM phaT/ ces bzlas te/ las kyi mtha' sdud nyi ma bzhi pa'i kha skong ngo// phyi yi nang du grangs pa ni/ ya ma rA dza sa do me ya/ ya me do ru Na yo da ya/ ya da yo ni

ra yak+She ya/ yak+She ya ts+tsha ni rA ma ya/ gzhi snying dril la g.yon du dril/ phyi yi gsang bar grangs pa ni/ ya ma ra ni tsa ya k+She ya/ ya k+She ya ts+tsha ni yo ta ya/ ya da yo ni ru do me ya/ ya me do sa dza rA ma ya/ gzhi snying dril

la g.yas su bskor// nang gi phyi ltar grangs pa ni// rtsa ba mi 'gyur snying po ste// sngon du 'gro ba'i bsnyen pa ni// oM a kro te ka ya mAn+ta la ha na ma tha b+han dza hUM phaT/ nang gi nang du drang ba ni// nye bar bsgrub pa

zhes kyang bya// las la sbyor ba'i snying po khri yang bzlas// ya ma me da k+She ra tsa sa do ru Na yo ni ra ya ts+tsha ni/ nang gi gsang bar drang ba ni// 'phye bo'i 'gros zhes bya ba dang// gsang ba'i phrin las gsad pa la// ya

ma k+She da me rA ni ts+tsha ya ra ni yo Na ru do sa dza/ zhes g.yas skor du grangs so// gsang ba'i phyi ltar grangs pa ni// bsgrub pa'i drag sngags 'bru bdun pa// g.yon du 'bru bdun grangs par bya// nyi ma dang po dag la

yang/ ya ma rA dza sa do me/ ma rA dza sa do me ya/ rA dza sa do me ya ma// dza sa do me ya ma rA// sa do me ya ma rA dza// to me ya ma rA dza sa// me ya ma rA dza sa do// nyi ma dang por khri khri bzlas// nyi ma gnyis pa dag la

yang// ya me do ru Na yo da// me do ru Na yo da ya// do ru Na ya da ya me// ru Na yo da ya me do// Na yo da ya me do ru// yo da ya me do ru Na// da ya me do ru Na yo// nyi ma gnyis par khri khri bzlas// nyi ma gsum pa

dag la yang// ya da yo ni ra ya k+She// da ro ni ya yak+She ya// yo ni ra ya k+She ya da// ni ra yak+She ya da yo// ra ya k+She ya da yo ni// ya k+She ya da yo ni ra// k+She ya da yo ni ra ya// nyi ma gsum par khri khri bzlas// nyi ma bzhi
