pa dag la yang// ya k+She ya ts+tsha ni rA ma// k+She yats+tsha ni rA ma ya// ya ts+tsha ni ra ma ya k+She// ts+tsha ni rA ma ya k+She ya// ni rA ma ya k+She ya ts+tsha// rA ma ya k+She ya ts+tsha ni// ma ya k+She ya ts+tsha ni rA// nyi ma bzhi par khri khri bzlas// g.yon du

mgo gcod de bzhin bskor// dang po nub mor grangs pa ni// ya ma me da k+She hrIHSh+t+r-IHa mu kaM che ge mo pra ma ya rbad ya// nub gnyis pa la grangs pa ni// rA dza sa do hrIHSh+t+r-IHa mu kaM che ge mo rak+ta tsa ra ya rbad ya/ nub

gsum pa la grangs pa ni// ru Na yo ni hrIHSh+t+r-IHa mu kaM che ge mo mur tsa ya rbad ya/ nub bzhi pa la grangs pa ni// rA dza ya ts+tsha ni hrIHSh+t+r-IHa mu kaM che ge mo mA ra ya rbad ya/ gsang ba'i gsang bar grangs pa

ni// gsod pa'i drag sngags bdun pa ste// g.yas su bdun skor grangs par bya// ya ma rA ni ts+tsha ya k+She// ma rA ni ts+tsha ya k+She ya// rA ni ts+tsha ya k+She ya ma// ni ts+tsha ya k+She ya ma rA// ts+tsha ya k+She ya ma rA ni// ya k+She ya ma rA ni

ts+tsha// k+She ya ma rA ni ts+tsha ya// nyi ma gnyis pa man chad la// g.yas su bskor bas steng yang gcod// gsang ba'i gsang bar grangs pa ni// nub ni dang por grangs par bya// ya ma k+She da me hrIHSh+t+r-IHka sa ye dgra bo pra ma

ya rbad ya// nub gnyis pa la grangs pa ni// rA ni ts+tsha ya hrIHSh+t+r-IHka sa ye dgra bo rak+ta tsa ra ya rbad ya// nub gsum pa la grangs pa ni// rA ni yo ni hrIHSh+t+r-IHka sa ye dgra bo mur tsa ya rbad ya/ nub bzhi pa la grangs pa

ni// ru do sa dza hrIHSh+t+r-IHka sa ya/ dgra bo mA ra ya rbad ya/ rtsa ba'i dam tshig yang snying las la sbyor// bzhi snying gcig tu dril ba ni// gsang ba'i gsang bar grangs pa ni// drag po gnam thus zhes kyang bya// dus

dang tshes dang las zad dang// bsod nams zad dang skal pa zad// yi ge zad ces bya ba'o// de ltar byas na su na su// ga na gang la byas kyang rung// ru khugs chen po zhes kyang bya// drag po stag mchongs zhes

kyang bya// bya rog khu 'phrig ces kyang bya// nyi ma bzhi pa'i las la 'jug/ nyi ma dang po dag la yang// tshangs pa'i mgo bcad bskor ba'i phyir// sngags dang be con phyag rgya bca'// nyi ma gnyis pa dag la yang/

kha nas khrag skyugs gzhug pa'i phyir// sngags dang lus dral phyag rgya bca'// nyi ma gsum pa dag la yang// tsit+ta gzer du gzhug pa'i phyir// sngags dang snying gshag phyag rgya bca'// nyi ma bzhi pa dag la

yang// gzugs phung brlag par bya ba'i phyir// mA ra ya nyid gdon mi za// sngags dang 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bca'// rang/ dang po'i yang/ rang drag po'i sngags rgod la// dang po dag la lha bsnyen pa// sku gsung thugs

kyi bsnyen pas bsnyen/ khugs pa'i rtags rnams byung ba dang// gzas pa dgug pa'i las byas te// nyi ma dang po dag la yang// ya mA rA dza sa do me ya/ che ge mo ni A kar+Sha ya hUM dza// nyi ma gnyis pa dag la

yang// ya me do ru Na yo da ya che ge mo A yur+dz+nyA na A kar+Sha ya hUM dza/ nyi ma ga sum pa dag la yang// ya da yo ni ra ya k+She ya che ge mo tri yaM nr-i ma A kar+Sha ya hUM dza// nyi ma bzhi pa dag la yang// yak+She ya ts+tsha ni rA ma ya che

ge mo rU pa skan+d+ha A kar+Sha ya hUM dza// de nas dbye ba'i las bya ste// nyi ma dang po dag la yang// srog lha dag dang dbye bar bya// bya rog 'ug pa'i gung ru la// mA ra ya yi ming rus bskyon// gu gul dud pas bdug bya
zhing// ya ma rA dza sa do me ya de ba shag srog gi lha dang phyes shig/ gnyis pa dag la pho lha dang// gsum pa dag la yul lha dang// bzhi pa dag la dgra lha dang// lha rnams dag la phye zhes

bya'o// phyi nang gsang ba'i sngags kyis kyang// nyung dkar dag la bsngags shing brdeg/ ya mAn+ta ka gsal bsgoms la// phur bu dag gis brdeg par bya/ A+oM nr-i mA ra ya du ya ma snying ya ma khrag tshal pa/ bam ril

dum bu dum bu gshin rje nag po de ba kuM khug dgra bo mA ra ya dza/ oM nr-i ma ra ni hri da ya na ta ki rA tsa be tA lI kro d+hI shwa ri snying mgo chod/ rtsa la zhen khrag la mgo chod/ khrag la kI li kI la ya bam ril rbad/ ya ma rA

dza sa do me dun b+h+yo/ ya me do ru me ya/ ya da yo ni snying la k+She ya me bam ril rbad/ rab tu khros te phur pa brdegs// gang la bya ba thogs med kyis// mthu stobs bdag pos rab tu zung// dpal zla gsang nag
po'i rgyud las/ 'khrul 'khor man ngag gi skabs te le'u so drug pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das mthu stobs kyi bdag po dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces ched du brjod do// nyon cig zung

zhig rdo rje 'dzin pa khyod// thugs kyi snying po ka bzhi gdung brgyad 'dis// ma nor bzlas na ci yang 'grub par nges// ya ma rA dza'i snying po ka ba gcig pa ni// ya ma rA dza sa do me ya/ myos byed 'bar ba'i snying po

ka ba gnyis pa la// ya me do ru Na yo da ya/ Ar+ya ma ru'i snying po ka ba gsum pa la// ya ta yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ ral pa tshar dgu'i snying po ka ba bzhi pa la/ ya k+She yats+tsha ni rA ma ya// de ni 'degs pa'i ka ba bzhi pa
ste/ tshangs pa'i mgo dang mgrin pa dang// lus dang lto ba bzhi nas 'degs// yang na yan lag bzhi nas 'joms// gdung brgyad rlag byed 'joms pa'i las// rtsa chen brgyad dang rnam shes brgyad// de dag
rim gyis 'joms par byed// ya ma rA dza sa do me ya// ya me do ru Na yo da ya/ ya da yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ yak+She ya ts+tsha ni rA ma ya/ zhes pa ka bzhi gdung brgyad do// gdung re la yang ka

chen bzhi// rtsa rlung bzhi dang rtsa chen bzhi// ka bzhi rtsa rlung bzhi yang 'joms// gdung brgyad rtsa chen brgyad kyang 'joms// ya mAn+ta ka ya ma rA dza sa do me ya/ ya me do ru Na yo da ya/ ya da yo ni ra yak+She ya/ yak+She yats+tsha ni rA mo ya/ ya la sogs pa

bcu gnyis ni// ya mAn+ta ka yab yum gnyis// phyogs skyong bcu yi snying po yin// phyi ma lha gzhan snying po ste// yig 'bru sum cu rtsa gnyis ni// 'phrul gyi yig 'bru sum cu gnyis// ya stsogs brgyad pa zhes kyang

grags// tshogs brgyad 'joms pa'i phung sri ste// ye shes lha yi snying po dang// 'jigs byed lha srin kun gyi snying po ste// shin tu gsang bar gshed pos bshad// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ ka bzhi
gdung brgyad kyi skabs te le'u so bdun pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos/ thugs gsang ba 'bru shag grong khyer 'di gsungs so// ya/ ma/ rA/ dza/ sa/ do/ me/ ya/

ya/ me/ do/ ru/ Na/ yo/ da/ ya/ ya/ da/ yo/ ni/ ra/ ya/ k+She/ ya/ ya/ k+She/ ya/ ts+tsha/ ni/ rA/ ma/ ya/ ya/ ma/ rA/ dza/ sa/ do/ me/ ya/ ya/ me/ do/ ru/ Na/ yo/ da/ ya/ ya/ da/ yo/ ni/ ra/ ya/ k+She/

ya/ ya/ k+Sha/ ya/ ts+tsha/ ni/ rA/ ma/ ya/ ya/ ma/ rA/ dza/ sa/ do/ me/ ya/ ya/ me/ do/ ru/ Na/ yo/ da/ ya/ ya/ da/ yo/ ni/ ra/ ya/ k+She/ ya/ ya/ k+She/ ya/ ts+tsha/ ni/ rA/ ma/ ya/ yi ge gshin rje'i 'bru shag

ste// yi ge gshin rje'i 'bru shag yin// rdo rje 'dzin pas rab tu zung// 'jam dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ 'bru shag grong khyer gyi skabs te le'u so brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang 'jigs byed chen po

khrag 'thung gi rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed po des// 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// snyigs ma lnga la brten pa'i dus// nga yi bstan pa 'byung ba yin// zas dang gnas dang gos la sogs// phyin ci log
la spyod pa'i tshe// nga yi bstan pa 'byung bas na// ur mo lta bur thug pa med// drag po gnad la 'bebs pa'i thun// me dang chu phrad lta bu'i 'khor lo'i don// bsdebs pas 'grub par the tshom
med// ya ma lag na rdo rje 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs nyon/ 'gyur med sems kyis brtan par zung// dkon mchog rgyal mtshan lta bur tshugs// zhes gsungs so// me lce phreng ba lta bur bka'

stsal to// oM ni ma ra ni ma ra du/ ya ma snying/ ya ma khrag tshal pa baM ril/ daM pa dum bu hUM phaT/ ya ma rA dza sa do me ya/ babs so sha snying babs/ ya ma rA dza snying la 'khrug thum ril rbad/ ya ma

rA dza sa do me ya/ ya ma rA dza snying do me ya/ ya ma rA dza snying do ru me baM ril rbad/ ma ra snying la khug ro sha snying baM ril rbad/ ya ma rA dza tsa khrag thibs rbad/ ya ma rA dza tsa mug thibs rbad// ya ma

rA dza tsa sub ral rbad/ ya ma rA dza tsa gling du ya rbad/ ya ma rA dza tsa myangs bying ma ya 'ub thul snying mgo chod/ kha la zo tshal pa snying ci ro baM ril rbad/ ya ma rA dza hrIHSh+t+r-IHya mAn+ta kra ta snying khrag baM

ril rbad/ ya ma rA dza glod la tsa ro baM ril rbad/ ya ma rA dza glo rtsa mchin rtsa rul/ rgyu rtsa kha snying rtsa pra ma yA/ oM b+hi na hUM/ sti ra hUM phaT/ hri kri na hUM phaT/ oM ka ka ta ya ha b+han kro man tsa te ta ma hUM

phaT/ oM hrIHSh+t+r-IHpra ma mur tsa rak+ta tsa ra mA ra ya/ ni sha ku ru ni a mU ka rbad ya hUM phaT/ oM pra mur ra ga tsa ra ma ma tsa ta ra ya ni sha ku ru hUM phaT/ a mu ka rbad ya hUM phaT/ oM pra tsa tsa ra murta ma ma

rak+ta ya ni sha ku ru ni a mu ka rbad ya hUM phaT/ oM pra mur tsa ma ta tsa ra tsa ya ni sha ku ru ni a mu ka rbad ya hUM phaT/ oM pra ta ma tsa tsa ma ra ga mur ya ni sha ku ru ni a mu ka rbad ya hUM phaT/

a mu hrIHSh+t+r-IHpra ma ya ni sha ku ru ni a mu ka rbad ya hUM phaT/ oM hrIHSh+t+r-IHa mu ka ma ra tsa ya ni sha ku ru ni a mu ka rbad ya hUM phaT/ oM hrIHSh+t+r-IHa mu ka rak+ta tsa ra ya ni ru sha ku ni a mu rbad ya hUM phaT/ oM

hrIHSh+t+r-IHa mu ka mA ra ya ni sha ku ru sha ku ru ni a mu ka rbad ya hUM phaT/ oM hrIHSh+t+r-IHa mu ka mA ra tsa rak+ta ma ra ya hUM phaT/ rA dza so do me ya/ do ru na yo da ya/ yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ ya ts+tsha ni rA ma ya/ tsa ya

do me ya/ ru Na yo da na/ ni ra ya k+She ya tsa ni rA ma ya/ sa do me ya/ Na yo da ya/ ra ya k+Sha ya/ ni rA ma ya/ ra ma ya do me ya/ ya da ya/ ya k+She ya/ dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ gsang ba thun
sngags kyi le'u ste so dgu pa'o//// de nas 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed po des/ mtshon cha 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po phyag
na rdo rje dang/ yum ro langs thal mdog mas/ thugs ka'i yi ge las re ma ti gsum bton nas spros/ gsum gyi bye brag las/ rak+ta'i rba klong dang/ keng rus kyi ri rab dang/ zhing gi snam bu rgyu
bas/ stong gsum gyi stong gang bar sprul te/ bskor ba lan du ma byas nas mchod pa phul lo// bstan pa yun du gnas pa la dmigs te/ ral pa gsigs rdo gsor nas 'di skad ces gsol
to// e ma ho// 'jigs byed chen po lags/ bstan pa yun du gnas pa dang// rnal 'byor can la phan bya'i phyir// rgod kyi drag sngags bshad du gsol// zhes zhus so// dkon mchog
rgyal mtshan ltar bya'i phyir// dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyi// thugs la dril ba'i rgod kyis sngags// bshad par bya ba'i nyan par byos// a ho// oM ni ma ra ni ma ra du/ rtsa la pra ma nan/ mA

ra ya dza dza/ che ge mo rtsa la khug snying la nan/ glo rtsa la khug glo rtsa la rbad/ thuM ri li li li rbad/ oM ni ma ra ni/ rtsal tsan tra nag po ste/ kun baM ril rbad/ oM ni ma ra ni ma ra du/ rgyu tsa tsa snying rtsa

nan/ khug baM ril rbad/ tsa tsa nan/ tsa la/ khug khrag rtsa rbad/ ha ra phan nan/ thuM ril rbad/ nag po de kun dza thun b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu/ ma tsa pa la trag mo trag sha kro d+hI shwa rI snying la/ snying la dun b+h+yo/
rtsa la phraM nan/ dgra bo mA ra ya dza dza/ 'di ni zhe sdang kun gyi bcud// phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin gsal bsgom zhing// ling+ga tshul dang ldan byas la// nag po'i grogs kyis thebs par gdab// 'di ni
lkugs shing bsad pa'i mchog/ ces gsungs so// 'jigs byed rgyal pos yang gsungs pa// dril ba rgod kyi sngags khrag gzer nag po ni/ mtshan mar bcas pa'i ling+ga gsal byas

la// phyag rgya bstan pa'i sems kyis byos// mtshan ma la gdab/ oM ni ma ra ni ma ra du/ khrag la khug snying rtsa rtogs/ snying khrag tshal pa baM ril rbad/ khrag nyag shag sha snying la khug thuM ril rbad/
khrag thig rag sha baM ril rbad/ khrag mgo myogs/ thuM ril rbad/ khrag mugs shing/ khrag snying la ber haM/ mugs nan/ thuM ril rbad/ oM ni ma ra ni/ khrag sha rol/ khug thuM ril rbad/ khrag ro tsa la

baM ril rbad/ dgra bo mA ra ya dza/ oM ni ma ra/ ni ma ra du/ khrag rtsa baM/ khrag la khug khrag la du ya/ me baM ril rbad/ khrag mgo ldib/ thuM ril rbad/ nag po snying la/ yag sha baM ril rbad/ mchin

rtsa myogs/ rtsa la chum chum/ thum ril rbad/ rtsa rtsa/ nan nan/ rtsa la ma graM bas nan/ baM ril rbad/ nag po snying ya sha baM ril rbad/ nag po de kun snying la kha long kha'i/ nag po kun snying kha

ma kha'i/ nag po sha pa ni/ rtsa baM ril rbad/ nag po ha ra laM ril rbad/ nag po snying mgo chod/ kha la zo snying mgo rtsa la rod pa'i dgra bo snying la dza dza/ dgra bo snying la ha re ho re baM ril rbad/ hu ya
hu ya snying 'du rar glo rtsa baM ril rbad/ yang na smyo zhing lkugs su chugs/ yang na smyos shing 'bogs su gzhug/ yang na rtsa la dgu rgyud chod// yang na don snying thal bar rlog/ yang na mdze dang

'brum bu thong// oM shrI many+dzun kri sna ya ma/ dgra bo'i snying la gur gur baM ril rbad/ har thuM har thuM baM ril rbad/ pra ha ra pra ha ra baM ril rbad rbad/ rmo du rmo du baM ril rbad/ hu+u ra shu hu+u ru sha baM da li

rbad/ trag ka ri ka baM baM ril rbad/ ka rbad/ ha ra tsa ra nan/ ha ra tsa ra nan/ pra hur baM ril rbad/ kra ya ha kra ya ha/ sna du lu sne'u tsur ta tsur ta baM ril rbad/ sme sha sme sha kra shu sme sha ka shu tshur taM

tshur taM/ 'gu+u ra gu baM ril rbad/ tsa du+u ra tsa du+u ra/ sle she baM ril rbad/ oM ya k+She ya hUM phaT/ oM mA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM tsa ma tsa ya hUM phaT/ oM ya ma ra ya hUM phaT/ oM ya ra ya hUM phaT/ oM ya ya ma ra hUM

phaT/ oM ya ra ni tsa k+She ya ra ni ta/ yo na ru me do sa tsa ma hUM phaT/ ya ma me da k+She tsa ni ya hUM phaT/ ya me da k+She ma ru na yo hUM phaT/ ya dak+She ma me ni ra ya hUM phaT/ ya k+She ma me da sa tsa sa do hUM phaT/ oM

ya k+She ma me da ni ra ya hUM phaT/ oM ya k+She ya tsa ni ra tsa ni rA dza sa do me ya hUM phaT/ oM ya me do ru ni ra ya k+She ya hUM phaT/ oM ya ma rA dza sa do ru Na yo da ya hUM phaT/ oM ya da yo ni ra ya tsa ni ra ma ya hUM

phaT/ oM ma ta kro na te ya ka ta ba na many+dzu ta ka hUM phaT/ oM te ma ha ta hUM/ kro tang ka ma tsa ma tsa/ a ka ta na dza dza hUM phaT/ oM te ta la pa hUM phaT/ kA ya bAg ni hUM phaT/ kro ma ka ru hUM

phaT/ srog la de bar snying rtsa rbad/ che ge mo tsa sho sha khug snying rtsa ro tshal pa baM ril rbad/ ya ma rA dza snying la so/ da pa rak+Sha baM ril rbad/ a 'gu sha snying khug mchin rtsa rbad/ kas pa kas rtsa la

shos/ rtsa ro la ya ga yo sa/ ro la rtsa ma baM ril rbad/ khrag la rtsa snying la shos baM ril rbad/ dgra bo mA ra ya baM ril rbad/ ya ma rA dza sa do me ya/ ya ma rA dza snying do ru me ye ya/ ya da yo ni snying la

do ru me ya/ baM ril rbad/ yag sha ya a keM a kaM kaM a kaM/ snying la rtsa ro me baM ril rbad/ ya ma rA dza thun tsa la rod pa khug thuM ril rbad/ snying la rga sha me baM ril rbad/ ya ma rA dza tsakra snying la tsa

tsa/ nan nan/ srogs srogs/ mugs mugs/ dgra bo khrag thuM ril rbad/ oM hrIHSh+t+r-IHya ya mAn+ta ka shri many+dzu a kro many+dzu ye/ be ta li che ge mo ro la tsit+ta snying la rog pa/ rtsa la rog pa la khug/ kro d+hi shwa

rI be ta li khrag khug baM ril rbad/ ya ma rA dza srog rtsa la baM/ e many+dzu snying khug srog la rgal ba de baM ril rbad/ ni mA ra ya 'dod pa mA ra ya/ 'dod pa mA ra ya ta hUM dza dza/ oM shrI many+dzu ya ma rA dza/

be ta li kro d+hI shwa rI snying kha rag sa ma ya thuM ril rbad/ ya ma rA dza sa do me ya/ khrag la sa do me ya/ khrag la sa do ru me ya/ klad pa la ha re ho re baM ril rbad/ oM kI li kI la ya/ khrag thigs baM

ril rbad/ subs thibs rbad/ subs ril rbad/ bi du ya rbad/ ba shaM du rbad/ khrag sha du ya rbad/ khrad kra khrad kra bi ril rbad/ tsit+ta ro la shin+ta/ snying la tsa tsa nan/ gshin rje pho nya snying rag glo

snying la khug dgra bo mA ra ya baM ril rbad/ bdud pra ma ya/ bdud pra ma ya bdun snying mgo chod/ du ru du ru/ ha rti ha rti/ dgra bo'i snying la dza dza/ nag po tsi ti ya dgra snying rtsa la baM ril rbad/ nA ga

kro d+hI shwa rI snying la tsa pa la/ trag trag ma trag shi dgra la thuM b+h+yo b+h+yo/ nag mo de kun kro d+hI shwa rI snying khrag thuM ril b+h+yo/ tra tra rag mo ru lu tsa pa ya/ srog sha kro d+hI shwa rI thuM ril rbad/ oM na mo ni rag sha mo

khrag long kha/ khrag la hur thuM/ pa shig thuM ril rbad/ snying khrag zhos mchin rtsa chod/ rgyu khrig snyogs ya/ snying la me baM ril rbad/ khrag mgo chod/ khrag la shig thuM ril rbad/ mA ra ya dza dza/ 'jigs
byed chen pos yang gsungs pa// kun gyis nus pa dril ba mchog/ 'ba' sarta ka bsnyod pa bzhin/ the tshom med par bzlas par bya// bdag nyid phyag rgya gsal ba la// lag mthil dug gi
'khor lo bri// ling+ga gong gis bshad bzhin shes// bya phur sngon pos gdab par bya// ni ma ra ni ma ra du/ ya ma snying mgo chod/ khra phraM snying la rug pa shag dgra bo mA ra ya dza/ badzra kI

li kI la A dza/ snying la phraM nan sod/ sarba du ru ku baM ril rbad/ badzra kI li kI la ya/ khrag shaM dur rbad/ khrag la so gor rag sham/ baM ril rbad/ tsa la ha ra nan/ khug thuM ril rbad/ khrag shaM

shos thuM ril rbad/ rmugs pa tsa thuM ril rbad/ su ra ge snying la/ khug thuM ril rbad/ gling shi du thuM ril rbad/ byi ma ya ba shi thuM ril rbad/ oM na mi ra ni ma ra du/ ya ma du snying la shig glo baM/ dgra bo
mA ra ya dza dza/ oM na mi ra Ni ma ra du/ khrag mgo chod snying rtsa chod/ snying rtsa sra la nan/ dgra bo mA ra ya thuM ril rbad/ 'jigs byed chen pos gsungs pa'i don// bdag nyid phyag rgyar gsal ba
ni// lag pa g.yas g.yon nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// tsher ma can gyi phur pa la// ling+ga gong du bstan pas shes// ri rgyal rbab bzhin bzlas par bya// oM ni ma ra ni ma ra du/ ya ma du ya ma

snying/ du ma ma snying/ ya ma khrag tshal pa dam pa dum bu/ baM ril kI li ki la ya/ sarba big nan/ dgra bo mA ra ya snying rtsa tshal pa/ su ru su ru/ dgra bo mA ra ya dza/ badzra kI li ki la ya snying la rug

pa shag/ dgra bo mA ra ya baM ril rbad/ oM badzra kI li ki la ya ro la rtsa thuM/ dgra bo mA ra ya thuM ril rbad/ badzra kI li kI la ya snying la mer ya/ rak+sha rak+sha thuM ril rbad/ gshin rje nag po dza dza/ dgra

bo mA ra ya thuM ril rbad/ gshin rje nag po snying la tsa tsa nan nan/ srog rtsa la baM ril rbad/ nag po de kun glo rtsa la nan/ khug rtsa la nan/ khug khug thuM ril mA ra ya dza/ badzra kI li kI la ya/

gshin rje nag po de kun rtsa ro baM ril rbad/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ snying la nag po rak+sha nag po de kun snying la 'bogs 'bogs shig shig chum chum thuM ril li li/ mA ra ya dza nag po rak+Sha 'ub

sha 'ub sha thuM ril li li mA ra ya rbad/ trag mo dmar shaM kun ldan/ dgra snying la pad+ma da ra tri/ nag po re ma ti dza dza/ yed de yed de/ sub sub/ su ru su ru/ kro d+hI shA rI snying la rag srin po rak+Sha

snying la kha lo kha/ nag po kun snying la baM ril rbad/ tra nag po be ta li/ e nan badzra kro d+hI shwa rI/ snying la rod pa rtsa baM ril rbad/ dgra bo mA ra ya dza dza/ a ho// 'jigs byed chen pos 'di skad
gsungs so// nyon cig zung zhig rdo rje 'dzin// ngas gsungs pa la rtse gcig nyon// ma ltar dril ba rgod kyi drag po'i sngags// 'di ni mA ra ya yi smin ma'i mchog/ bdag nyid phyag rgya chen por
gsal ba las// g.yas g.yon nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor shes// nag po gdug pa'i phur pa la// rak+tas byugs la phur pa la// gdab pa gsum du thebs par gdab// oM ni ma ra ni/

ya ma du ya ma snying/ ya ma khrag tshal pa baM ril/ dum bu dum baM ril hUM phaT/ badzra kI li kI la ya/ nag po ti pa tsa ga sha nan/ khug rol baM/ dgra bo mA ra ya dza/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya nag po rtsi

pa snying la thod pa badzra/ shag shag nan/ khug thuM ril rbad/ oM shrI many+dzu tsan+t+ra rag shA ro la khug thuM ril rbad/ nag po de kun snying la khug thuM ril rbad// oM shrI many+dzu nag po de shwa ra baM ril rbad/ oM

many+dzu nag po tra rak+sha ro la baM/ dgra bo mA ra ya dza dza/ nag po de kun snying tsa la tsa pa la dun b+h+yo/ oM shri many+dzu nag po kra sha ha ra/ baM ril rbad/ oM shrI a kro de ba/ Ar+ya ya mAn+ta ka snying la rak+sha/ drag po

rol/ khrag 'thung dgra bo mA ra ya thuM ril rbad/ oM nA ga rak+sha kro d+hI shA rI/ snying la khug thuM ril rbad/ nag po kun tu snying la thuM ril rbad/ ro langs khrag 'thung snying mgo mchod/ rtsa la baM/ dgra bo
mA ra ya thuM ril rbad/ gong du bya ba'i las zin nas// gdug pa ldan pa'i sems kyis bya'o// de ni mi ldog ur mo'i las// zhes gsungs so// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ ngan sngags

rgod kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o//// de nas 'jigs byed chen pos 'da' ba med pa'i dam tshig 'di bka' stsal to// nyon cig zung zhig rdo rje 'dzin// snying po'i don 'di mi spang zhing// rdo rje slob dpon yi
dam lha ltar bkur// sngags dang phyag rgya mi 'da' la sogs dpe brgyad shes// rnal 'byor can la mos pa'i sems// thugs la brnags pas gnod med dbyung mi bya// 'di ni rtsa ba lnga rnams so/
khyad par rim pa bstan pa ni// bdag nyid phyag rgya bstan bya zhing// lam mi gzur zhing phyag mi bya// gtam mi smra bar sdigs mdzub 'phyar// chas brgyad brgyan la bgrod dkar 'gro// de la
sogs te du mar bshad// mi 'da' bsrung bas dam tshig ste// 'di ni mchog gi don du bshad// dpa' bo chen pos bshad pa'i don// 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis 'da' ma byed// ces bka' stsal
to// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las// dam tshig mdor bstan pa'i le'u ste zhe gcig pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// nyon
cig zung zhig rdo rje 'dzin// ngas gsungs pa la sems thud cig/ lnga brgya dus kyi tha ma la// bstan pa 'dzin skyong bsrung dang gsum// bstan pa bshigs pa'i dgra de la// drag po las kyi mthar
bya ba// dus ni rang byung dgra la bya// dus dang khams dang gyur pa dang// rang byung don de bzhi ru 'dod// de la bskul ba rnam bzhi bya// rdzas dang sngags dang ting 'dzin
dang// bskul ba'i don de bzhi ru 'dod// de yi sngon du bsnyen bsgrub bya// bsnyen bsgrub song nas bskul ba ni// 'khor lo dang ni ling+ga dang// nyi ma dang ni gshin rje dang// gsang sngags dang ni
ting 'dzin dag dang drug/ 'khor lo la yang rnam gsum ste// phyi nang gsang ba gsum du 'dus// 'khor lo de dag re re la// bri dang sgra dang las dang ni// rang gi ngo bo dag dang lnga'o// de bzhin

ling+ga dag la gsum// phyi nang gsang ba gsum du 'dus// ling+ga de dag re re la// rgyu dang bca' dang sgra dang las// rang gi ngo bo dag dang lnga'o// de bzhin sngags la rnam gsum ste// phyi nang gsang
ba gsum du 'dus// de bzhin drag sngags re re la// rgyu dang btu dang las sngags dang// bzlas dang nga ro sgra dang las// nyi ma la yang rnam gsum ste// phyi nang gsang ba gsum du 'dus// nyi ma
de dag re re la// rang gi ngo bo rgyu dang gnas// sgra dang las de rnam pa lnga'o// gshin rje la yang rnam gsum ste// phyi nang gsang ba gsum du 'dus// gshin rje de dag re re la// rang gi ngo bo rgyu
dang sgra// gnas dang las te lnga ru bstan// gshin rje de dag gnas pas na// gshin rje'i grong khyer zhes kyang bya// grong khyer de ru sems can kun// khrid dang dgug dang gnas pas na// srid pa
gsum gyi gnas sa yin// ting nge 'dzin la rnam gsum ste// phyi nang gsang ba gsum du 'dus// gsum po de dag re re la// byin brlab bzlas pa ting 'dzin dang// ngo bo rgyu dang las dang
sgra// de dag rnam pa drug tu 'dod// pho dang mo yi mtshan nyid kyang// g.yas dang g.yon gyi bye brag gis// 'gro ba'i chos bzhin gcod par byed// drag po'i ngan sngags phung byed 'di// gshin rje
gshed pos rab tu bsngags// rdo rje 'dzin pas rab tu zung// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ nag po gsal byed sgron ma'i skabs te le'u zhe gnyis pa'o//// gshin rje gshed
kyis gsungs pa'i don// nyon cig zung zhig rdo rje 'dzin// gsang bar brgyud de brnag pa'i lung// don gnyis dag tu shes par bya// bsnyen bsgrub dang ni phrin las so// bsnyen pa la yang rnam
gnyis te// sngon du 'gro ba'i cho ga ste// bsod nams bsag par bstan pa dang// bsnyen pa dngos nyid bstan pa'o// thabs dang dgos pa rnam gnyis kyis// bsod nams bsag pa'i cho gar
'dod// ngo bo dbye ba nges pa'i tshig/ dgos ched rnam pa bzhi yin no// bsnyen pa'i dbye ba bstan pa yin// bsgrub pa la yang bcu gnyis te// gnas dang brtul bzhugs mtshan ma
gzhag/ mchod rdzas gzhag dang dngos grub rten// dam tshig ting 'dzin 'phro 'du dang// grub pa'i rtags dang blang ba'i thabs// bar du gcod pa'i bgegs dang ni// sgrub pa'i dus dang spogs
pa'i thabs// spogs pa chen po'i cho ga ste// drag shul ting 'dzin bcu gnyis kyis// dngos grub blang ba'i cho gar 'dod// phrin las dag la rnam gsum te// 'khor lo bskor dang mnan bsreg
pa'o// dus dang gang zag bskor ba'i gnas// ngo bo dbye ba nges pa'i tshig/ 'khor lo rgyu rkyen mthun pa'i dpe// sgrub byed grogs dang ma grub skyon// grub pa'i thabs dang spogs
pa'i thabs// dbye ba bcu gsum ma yi ngag/ ces gshin rje gshed pos rab tu brjod// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ las kyi mdo byang gi skabs te le'u zhe gsum pa'o//// de
nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// dus tshod mtshon cha rnon po la// rdo rje slob dpon sku dgra sogs// the tshom med par bsgral bas 'grub// phag sbrul
ston dpyid ra ba la// byi ba rta ni ston dpyid 'bring// ston dpyid tha chung glang lug la'o// stag spre'u dbyar dgun ra bar shes// dbyar dgun 'bring po bya yos la'o// khyi 'brug dbyar dgun tha
mar 'grub// de ni lo gshed zla ba'i keg khyad par nyi ma'i gshed gnyis te// dbyar rlung 'jug cing dgun rlung 'byung// de yi dus su gsad pa shis// zhag gi gshed du gyur pa yang// ra ba

bzhi la bcu bzhi shis// 'bring po bzhi yi bco lnga la// tha chung bzhi yi bcu drug go/ tshes bzhi brgyad dang bcu gcig dang// bco lnga bco brgyad nyi shu gnyis// nyi shu lnga dang nyi shu dgu// dus ni
srod dang snga dro dang// 'jing dang nam gung gung chung dang// nyi myur skya rengs shar ba dang// nyin mtshan zhag gi go rim bzhin// de phyir ma gshin 'tshol phyir rgyu// btsal nas gsod pa'i dus
bstan pa// dpyid ra tshes bdun dag la shis// 'bring po bcu bdun dag la shis// tha chung nyi shu bdun la shis// dbyar ra tshes brgyad 'bring po ni// bco brgyad tha chung nyi shu brgyad// ston ra
tshes dgu 'bring po ni// bcu dgu tha chung nyi shu dgu/ dgun zla gsum yang de bzhin te// dus su gsad pa'i las la 'jug/ sa yi khams sa dpyid zla gsum// shing gi dbyar zla ston zla
me// dgun ni lcags khams 'chi ba'i dus// de dus zhag gshed btu bar bya// ra ba bzhi ni rta dar yang la gcod// tha dar chung yang chung dus su 'bring bzhi ste// tha chung khra la brdeg par
bya// dgun gsum skar ma gsum 'char te// skar ma'i gshed kyi dus su ni// sbyor ba thams cad rab na yang/ khrag thun la sogs zor rnams shis// lo zla zhag gi dus bstan nas// dusatshod
rnon po bstan par bya// sems can yid ni gnyid log pas// da dus rgyu zhing 'khyams pa'i tshe// kun kyang rnam rtog las byung bas// sbyor ba'i stobs bskyed bsad par shis// sha ba srod dang

nam phyed na// lug dang gnyan gyi bla yang rgyu// pag pa tho rangs bya nyid ni// nyi ma zer la rgyu bar bshad// ra bla nyi ma nub ka ste// bya bla nyi ma zer la rgyu// g.yag dang glang bla srod la rgyu// rta bla nyi
ma gung la rgyu// de dag dgug cing bsad par shis// thun mong bsgral ba'i thabs su gsungs// dngos po gcig kyang 'gyur ba'i tshe// 'gyur ba'i bla dang sbyar te bya'o/ khams kyi gshed du bstan
pa ni// sgrub pa po dang lo zla dang// dus tshod kyis ni gsod par byed// keg ni gshed po glang dang lug/ lo dgra bya dang sprel nyid de// dgun zla dbyar zla tha chung gnyis// dus tshod nyid phyed nam
phyed yol// ha la sman gyis gsod 'gyur na// bsgrub pa'i sbyor bas smos ci dgos/ khyi 'brug ji yi gshed po ste// phag dang byi ba lo dgra nyid// mi mthun bdun zur the tshom med// zla gshed
ston dpyid tha chung ste// zla ba'i bdun zur rdo rjes gcod// tho rangs srod la gsod par byed// bsam ngan tsam gyis 'grub 'gyur na// sbyor bas bdun rgyud the tshom med// gung la khyi 'brug shing
khams pa// shing dang kha dog 'dra ba ste// gsod pa'i las la the tshom med// stag dang yos bu dar ba dgra// bdun zur gshed du gyur pa ste// tshangs pa'i me bzhin gsod par byed// zla gshed
srog dang mi mthun pa'i// bdun zur gsod de the tshom med// dus tshod nam phyed dus la shis// shang gi khams te gshed chen po/ shang gi gshed dang 'u yi tshig thog ma chad// 'dus pa sa yi khams la
gcod// lo dgra glang lug gnyis kyis te// mi mthun bdun zur shin tu 'joms// dus tshod mtshan ma rang sar shis// de nas mthun 'phrod bshad pa ni// bzang zhing 'grub par bya ba'i
las// bdud rgyal nyi ma bdun po la// drag sngags tshogs kyis cham la dbab// nyi ma gru sogs bre ru 'byor// bi rdzi bya gzhug zla bar 'byor// mig dmar khrum smad la ro sman// gza' lhag
sgrog dang smin drug 'dzom// phur bu rgyal stod rgyal smad mthun// pa sangs byed zhug rta chung nyid// spen pa sa ri sa ga ste// de ltar mthun sbyor dus su ni// ngan pa'i las kyang 'byung
'gyur bas// de phyir bzang po'i las la 'jug/ bdud kyi nyi ma bshad pa ni// nyi ma lag sor bya skyor cha skyed kyang gsum// zla ba rgyal smad bre ru gsod// mig dmar bre dang sgrog gis te// gza'
lhag dbyug pa nyid kyis 'jig/ phur bu mgo ru 'phyor bas 'jig/ pa sangs wa dang lag sor gsum// spen pa bya ma bdud kyi nyi// bzang po'i las kyis gsad 'gyur na// ngan pa'i las kyis
smos ci dgos// mi 'phrod bdun du bshad pa ni// nyi ma khrums smad zla ba dang// sa ga mi 'phrod mig dmar dang// lag tu mi 'phrod gza' lhag dang// gru sogs mi 'phrod phur bu sgrog/ pa wang
sangs dang bre mi 'phrod// spen pa dang ni khrums stod dang// de lta'i mi 'phrod bdun po la// phan gdags las ni gcig mi 'grub// nyi ma dang ni sa ga 'jig/ zla ba dang ni bi rdzi ste// mig
dmar sgrog tu 'jig par bstan// bza' lhag bya'u 'jig pa ste// phur bu la ni be'u rdzi 'jig/ pa wa sangs la bya gzhug 'jig/ spen pa la ni bya ma 'jig/ mi 'phrod bdun dang 'jig pa
bdun// bdud kyi nyi mar gsad pa shis// 'tsho byed yul lhas skyob pa ni// g.yag dkar mi dkar tshul gyis 'geg/ bud med rtug pa bsreg nas kyang// 'chi bdag rnams kyi bla rkun
bzlas// zhang blon bzang po lta bu ni// pho lhas 'geg pas de dus su// glang rog rwa bsreg gong bzhin bya/ khra'am spyang ki lta bus skyob// dgra bla yin te gsur chen btang/ khyi lud bsreg pas
'bros par byed// bud med sha ba lta bu ni// ma lha ma sman 'go ba ste// ra dang rta sbangs til nag bsreg/ ting 'dzin mi gsal bying rmugs na// pho lhas 'geg pa yin par brjod// til nag nyung
nag gu gul ni// sbyar mas bsreg na 'bros par byed// mi 'phrod dbye ba'i thabs bstan pa// bya rog 'ug pa'i gung ru la// bro gar a dang shog shog nr-i// go rim bzhin du glan par bya// yugs
sa mo yi rkang dreg dang// 'bog dang glang rog ra khrag sogs// sme ba'i dud pas dus gsum 'dug/ 'di ni dbye ba'i mchog tu gsungs// nag po gsal byed sgron ma las// bya thabs nyams
len nying khu 'di// rang byung dgra la bya ba'i dus su gsungs// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ bya thabs nyams len nying khu'i skabs te le'u zhe bzhi pa'o//// de nas 'jam dbyangs
khro bos phyogs skyong gshin rje las la skul ba 'di gsungs so// bstan pa bsrung bar zhal bzhes pa'i// yab yum gnyis med thugs kyi sras// steng phyogs gshin rje nag 'joms
ni// nag po g.yas na dgra s+t+wa bsnams// chibs su lkugs pa lug la chibs/ khro mo srin mo mgo 'phyang ma// nag mo chen mo ral pa can// g.yas pa thabs kyi gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung
dmar gtso la stob// yab gcig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di 'bul na// bstan pa 'jig pa'i gshed ma mdzod// bdud po bcu yis khram la thob// ging chen bco
brgyad las la skul/ 'chi bdag 'khor lo'i lag tu gtod// dus la bab po sa ma ya// dam las ma 'da' phrin las mdzod// yab yum gnyis med thugs kyi sras// steng phyogs gshin rje phya
sangs ni// dkar po lag na bum pa thogs// chibs su ban glang dkar po chibs/ khro mo kham rgya mthu mo che// nag mo mgo 'phyangs ral pa can// g.yas pa thabs kyis gtso la 'khyud// g.yon
pa dung dmar gtso la stob// yab gcig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di 'bul na// bstan pa 'jig pa'i gshed ma mdzod// bdud po bcu yis khram la thob// ging chen
bco brgyad las la skul// 'chi bdag 'khor lo'i lag tu gtod// dus la bab po sa ma ya// dam las ma 'da' phrin las mdzod// yab yum gnyis med thugs kyi sras// shar phyogs kong tse
brag gyon ni// dkar po tshe srog bum pa bsnams// chibs su dri za sgeg pa bcibs// brag srin nag mo mgo 'phyangs ma/ khro mo dkar mo ral pa can// g.yas pa thabs kyi gtso la
'khyud// g.yon pa dung khrag gtso la stob// yab gcig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di 'bul na// bstan pa 'jig pa'i gshed ma mdzod// bdud po bcu yis khram
la thob// ging chen bco brgyad las la skul// 'chi bdag 'khor lo'i lag tu gtod// dus la bab po sa ma ya// dam las ma 'da' phrin las mdzod// yab yum gnyis med thugs kyi
sras// shar lho a ba glang mgo can// smug nag tri shul rtse gsum thogs// chibs su 'gugs byed dre'u la chibs// mi bzad bdud mo mgo 'phyangs ma/ khro mo smug nag ral pa can// g.yas
pa thabs kyi gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung khrag gtso la stob// yab gcig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di 'bul na// bstan pa 'jigs pa'i gshed ma mdzod// bdud
po bcu yis khram la thob// ging chen bco brgyad las la skul// 'chi bdag 'khor lo'i lag tu gtod// dus la bab po sa ma ya// dam las ma 'da' phrin las mdzod// yab yum
gnyis med thugs kyi sras// lho phyogs gshin rje ya ba ti// sngo nag gsod byed dgra s+t+wa bsnams// chibs su gshin rje sgeg pa chibs// mtshan mo nag mo mgo 'phyangs ma/ khrau mo dred kyi ab
sham can// g.yas pa thabs kyi gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// yang [(]tshayab[)]gcig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di 'bul na// bstan pa 'jig
pa'i gshed ma mdzod// bdud po bcu yis khram la thob// ging chen bco brgyad las la skul// 'chi bdag 'khor lo'i lag tu gtod// dus la bab po sa ma ya// dam las ma 'da' phrin las
mdzod// yab yum gnyis med thugs kyi sras// lho nub gshin rje mig dmar ni// dmar po gcod byed ral gri bsnams// chibs su smyo byed sha ba chibs// byi lir chen mo mgo 'phyang ma/ khro mo
dmar mo ral pa can// g.yas pa thabs kyi gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung khrag gtso la stob// yab gcig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di 'bul na// bstan pa 'jig
pa'i gshed ma mdzod// bdud po bcu yis khram la thob// ging chen bco brgyad las la skul// 'chi bdag 'khor lo'i lag tu gtod// dus la bab po sa ma ya// dam las ma 'da' phrin las
mdzod// yab yum gnyis med thugs kyi sras// nub phyogs gshin rje rmig pa ni// smug nag dbang sdud zhags pa thogs// chibs su klu brgyad sgeg pa chibs// bdud mo chen mo mgo 'phyangs ma/
khro mo smug nag ral pa can// g.yas pa thabs kyi gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung khrag gtso la stob// yab gcig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di 'bul na// bstan pa
'jig pa'i gshed ma mdzod// bdud po bcu yis khram la thob// ging chen bco brgyad las la skul// 'chi bdag 'khor lo'i lag tu gtod// dus la bab po sa ma ya// dam las ma 'da' phrin
las mdzod// yab yum gnyis med thugs kyi sras// nub byang gshin rje tel pa ni// nag po 'byed pa'i dbyug to bsnams// chibs su rta nag ma he chibs// gza' srin nag mo mgo 'phyangs ma/
khro mo nag mo ral pa can// g.yas pa thabs kyi gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung khrag gtso la stob// yab gcig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di 'bul na// bstan pa
'jig pa'i gshed ma mdzod// bdud po bcu yis khram la thob// ging chen bco brgyad las la skul// 'chi bdag 'khor lo'i lag tu gtod// dus la bab po sa ma ya// dam las ma
'da' phrin las mdzod// yab yum gnyis med thugs kyi sras// byang phyogs gshin rje lha mchog ni// ser po bum pa rgya gram bsnams// chibs su rgyas pa'i rta la chibs// klu srin nag mo mgo
'phyangs ma/ khro mo ser nag ral pa can// g.yas pa thabs kyi gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung khrag gtso la stob// yab gcig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di 'bul
na// bstan pa 'jig pa'i gshed ma mdzod// bdud po bcu yis khram la thob// ging chen bco brgyad las la skul// 'chi bdag 'khor lo'i lag tu gtod// dus la bab po sa ma ya// dam las
ma 'da' phrin las mdzod// yab yum gnyis med thugs kyi sras// byang shar chos kyi rgyal po ni// dmar po thod pa mda' gzhu bsnams// chibs su skrod byed rnga mo chibs// nam gru chen mo mgo
'phyangs ma/ khro mo dmar mo ral pa can// g.yas pa thabs kyi gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung khrag gtso la stob// yab gcig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di longs
la// bstan pa 'jig pa'i gshed ma mdzod// bdud po bcu yis khram la thob// ging chen bco brgyad las la skul// 'chi bdag 'khor lo'i lag tu gtod/ dus las bab po sa ma ya// dam
las ma 'da' phrin las mdzod// yab yum gnyis med thugs kyi sras// 'og phyogs ral pa tshar dgu ni// smug nag lcags kyu ri rab bsnams// chibs su ma he sngo nag chibs// lha mo nag mo
mgo 'phyangs ma/ khro mo smug nag ral pa can// g.yas pa thabs kyi gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// yab gcig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di
longs la// bstan pa 'jig pa'i gshed ma mdzod// bdud po bcu yis khram la thob// ging chen bco brgyad las la skul// 'chi bdag 'khor lo'i lag tu gtod// dus la bab po sa ma
ya// dam las ma 'da' phrin las mdzod// yab yum gnyis med thugs kyi sras// 'og phyogs gshin rje thod dbyug ni// nag po lag na tho ba bsnams// chibs su sa bdag sgeg pa chibs// sa
bdag stong khyab mgo 'phyangs ma/ khro mo nag mo ral pa can// g.yas pa thabs kyi gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa gdung dmar gtso la stob// yab gcig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dam rdzas
gtor ma 'di longs la// bstan pa 'jig pa'i gshed ma mdzod// bdud po bcu yis khram la thob// ging chen bco brgyad las la skul// 'chi bdag 'khor lo'i lag tu
gtod// dus la bab po sa ma ya// dam las ma 'da' phrin las mdzod// ces bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos 'khor rnams las la skul te/ so so'i gshed bskos so// 'jam dpal
zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ phyogs skyong gi gshed bsko ba'i skabs te le'u zhe lnga pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos/ nyin bzhi'i lha'i ging bzhi la phrin
las bcol ba 'di gsungs so// rA dza ha la 'khor lo'i lha// 'khor lo nag po mA ra'i bdud// dug gi mtshon cha sngags kyi them// rdzas kyi sbyor ba thabs kyi ngag/ bsnyen pa bya ba gsang
ba'i thabs// hrIHSh+t+r-IHsbyor ka ma yi ngag/ 'khor lo bskor ba man ngag gter// zla gsang nag po gces pa'i grogs// bar bar spyi rgyud thabs kyis phul// dmar nag khram bdag man
ngag thabs// gshed po bdud kyi man ngag gter// las grub gnan pa rang gi snying// drang srong dmod pa phyogs med grogs// de bzhin spyi rgyud thabs kyi phul// chos kyi rgyal po la sogs
pa// nyin bzhi lha yi ging bzhi bskul// hUM/ nyi ma dang po'i rtsis byed ging// pra ma rA dza srin po ste// bar snang khams la yid kyis rgyu// gsang ba dbang bskur ging gi bdag/ stag zhu stag ral sku
la mnab// phyag na shwo rdel rtsis byed ging// bdag gi ma nyes 'di yis nyes// sho rdel nag po'i rtsis su chug/ srog chod snying phyung smyo 'bog thongs// gtad do ma btang shor ra re// nyi ma gnyis
pa'i rtsis byed ging// ya ma rA dza gshin rje'i ging// zhal bgrad mche gtsigs kha dog nag/ thod sbrul g.yang gzhi sku la gsol// ba sbrul yang/ glang nag po chibs su chibs// phyag na sho rdel rtsis
byed ging// bdag gis ma nyes 'di yis nyes// sho rdel nag po'i rtsis su chug/ srog chod snying phyung smyo 'bog thongs// gtad do ma btang shor ra re// nyi ma gsum pa'i rtsis byed ging// da sha grI
ba bdud kyi ging// nag po sha zan sha zhu can// nag po snying dkar chibs su chibs// mi sha za zhing snying khrag 'thung// dug mda' 'phen zhing mi sha za// rta nag zhon pa 'bum khrir bcas// phyag
na dkar nag rtsis byed ging// bdag gis ma nyes kho yis nyes// sho rdel dkar nag rtsis su chug/ srog gcod snying phyung smyau 'bog thongs// gtad do ma btang shor ra re// nyi ma bzhi pa'i rtsis
byed ging// yak+Sha rA dza gnod byed ging// zhon pa gza' rta nag po zhon// zab glag nag po sku la gsol// bdud zhags nag po dgra la 'debs// dbu la dom zhu nag po
gsol// phyag na dkar nag rtsis byed ging// bdag gi ma nyes kho yis nyes// sho rdel nag po'i rtsis su chug/ srog chod snying phyung smyo 'bog thongs// gtod do ma btang shor ra
re// bdud tri rbad thum ri li li/ ya tri rbad thum ri li li// d+ha sha grI ba rbad thum ri li li// yak+sha rbad thum ri li li// zhes ni rab tu shwa rdel bgrang ngo// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud
las/ nyin bzhi lha'i ging bzhi la phrin las bcol ba'i skabs te le'u zhe drug pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po la 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis
shin tu dgyes pa'i yi rangs nas/ mgrin gcig tu 'dug ste 'di skad ces brjod do// hUM/ gtum chen rab 'bar gshin rje 'jom mdzad lha// nyi ma 'bum las lhag pa'i 'od
ldan khyod// phyag mtshan mang po bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar// rab 'bar gshin rje 'joms la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje'i sku la klu dbang rab brgyan cing// gcan gzan gdug pa'i pags rlon
na bzar gsol// mi mgo thod rlon phreng bas sku la brgyan// brkyang bskum tshul gyis gshin rje zhabs kyis gnon// mi bzad khro bo'i rgyal po gdong drug hUM sgra can// phaT kyis khams gsum
sngangs mdzad zhal drug gdangs// sha za'i mgo bcad dbu yi thod du bcings// spyan bzlog tsam gyis bdud kyi ser chen 'bebs// ljags 'gril tshems kyi rtse nas rdo rje'i theg chen rab
'bebs shing// 'khor gyi ma mo rnams ni 'dar zhing 'dud// de bas lha klu gnon sbyin gzhan lta smos ci dgos// rkan sgra gtogs pas lha chen khyab 'jug kyang// bub 'gyel bcas pas khrag
skyug nyid la 'dud// stong khams mid par byed pa'i zhal gdangasashing/ khro gtum tshom rngams chen po bstan pas kyang// tshangs pa'i 'khor rnams rngul gyi thigs 'dzag cing// nad gtong srin
mo'i tshogs rnams 'dar zhing 'dud// rgyu phreng khrag dang bcas pa'i zhags thogs nas// phyag na tri shUl mi mgo rab bsnams shing// dngos grub mchog gi klad khrag zhal du gsol// khyung dang
'ug pa lta bu'i khra bsnams shing// dam las ldog par dag la gtong bar byed// gnod sbyin mi srun phreng bas sku la brgyan// rdo rje brjid pa'i stangs stabs gar byas pas// dur khrod chen por
mtshan mor rab rgyu ba'i// ro langs mgo bcad so yi chem chem bza'// ngo mthong tsam gyis dma' 'bab zhabs la gtug/ yon tan bye bas brgyan pa'i lha khyod la// blta bas
bzod par dka' yang bdag 'dud na// gdug pa'i sems kyis bdag dang bdag gi 'khor du gtogs pa la// gnod par byed pa'i mi dang mi min 'byung po'i tshogs// zung zhig gnon cig
sgrol mdzod gshin rje gshed// yun gyi lhar yang khyod la gsol 'debs na// ri rab gser gyi ngos la bya gnas pa// bya yi rang bzhin bor nas gser du snang// thams cad khyod kyi skur ni
bdag bsgom pas// bdag gi rang bzhin bor nas khro bor gsal// lha mchog khyod la yi dam sus brten pa// mi yi tha mal rnams kyang mchog tu gyur// de bas 'di dang pha rol gnyis ka
ru// srog gi phyir yang lha khyod mi gtong na// byams pa'i zhal bzang bdag la bstan pa dang// thugs rje'i can gyis bdag la gzigs su gsol// khyod ltar bdag gyur de phyir bstod phyag
'tshal// yun ring gong nas lha khyod bdag bsgrub na/ khyod kyis dngos grub dam pa bdag la stsol// kA la rU pa che ge mo b+ha ga hrIHSh+t+r-IHna hUM phaT/ gang dag gshin rje gshed po yis// de las be
con phyag rgyar gsal// 'di ni phyag rgya'i srog mchog pas// yang dag bstan pa yang dag gsal// phyag rgya bcings par gyur pa 'di/ khro ba'i snying por sngags par byed// mtshon cha ma lus pa yi

gtso// bdud dang dgra bgegs zhi bar byed// na mo b+hud+d+ha d+harma sang g+he b+h+yaH oM sarba ta thA ga to ti byi dzA ya/ ag ne dz+wa la ni hrIHSh+t+r-IHhUM phaT/ ces 'khor rnams kyis rab tu bstod do// dpal zla bzang
nag po'i rgyud las/ gtum chen la bstod pa'i skabs te le'u zhe bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po la 'khor rnams kyis rang rang gi dgyes pa'i bstod pa phul
nas mthu stobs kyi bdag po dpal phyag na rdo rje dang// stong gsum mun par gtong ba rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces gsol to// he he dpa' bo yab gcig
mchog/ 'jigs byed chen po gshin rje gshed// dpa' bo'i 'khor du 'dus 'khor bdud// gshed pos bskos pa'i bka' rnams nyan// bdag cag 'khor gyi bdud po rnams// phyin ci log
rnams 'dul slad du// tshul bzhin bsgrub na ji ltar bsgrub// rdzas dang yo byad gang la brten// las la gtang na ji ltar gtang// log pa'i sbyor ba ji ltar bya// 'jigs byed chen pos bka'
stsal 'dud// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos/ shin tu rngam pa'i sgra 'brug stong ldir ba tsam dus gcig la bsgrags nas/ bdud kyi tshogs thams cad dbang
du bsdus zil gyis mnan nas/ 'di skad ces brjod do// nyon cig zung zhig rdo rje 'dzin// nag po bdud kyi tshogs rnams kun// phyin ci log rnams gdul slad du// bya ba'i las dang bsgrub pa
dang// bsten pa'i thabs dang bskul ba'i thabs// mi mthun sbyor bas gsod 'dod na// ngas bshad pa la sems thud cig/ ces brjod do// de nas bcom ldan gshed chen pos// phrin las
myur du bya ba'i phyir// bdud kyi sgrub thabs 'di gsungs so// thog mar dang ba'i dad pa rab tu gces// bka' yi gnas sam dga' ba'i gnas dag tu// dbang thob bya phyir bla ma mnyes bya
zhing// dkyil 'khor bris nas dam tshig dbang dag nod// dgos pa bsgrub phyir man ngag thob par bya// man ngag thob nas bsnyen bsgrub mtha' ru dbyung// bsnyen pa bya phyir mthun rdzas 'bad
de bsag/ lung gi gnas su+u sa yi dkyil 'khor bya// 'dom gang gru bzhi dug khrag chag chag gdab// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad gru gsum zla gam gsum// gru chad sgo bzhi lcags ri lugs bzhin
bya// thod pa'i phreng ba rdo rje ra ba gur// bskal pa'i me ri smug nag rlung 'tshubs ldang// gru gsum dbus su gshin rje gshed po ste// zla gam gsum la yum gnyis sras dang gsum// seng ldeng
la sogs mchog gi phur pa dgod// yab yum mnga' gsol dbang bskur byin brlab pa'o// lcags phur la sogs mchog gi phur pa bcu/ khram thogs bdud po bcu ru mnga' gsol la// 'khor
lo rtsibs brgyad dag la dgod par bya// dar nag cod pan rim gyis dbang bskur gdags// steng du 'bar ba ya chen te// shar du rol po ral can no// lho ru khram bdag sogs bdud ste// zla
bdud yor po zhags can nub// byang du srog bdud s+t+wa re can// shar lho khram bdag thog po rje// lho nub bar btsan gri bo rje// nub byang se 'dzin sdings pa rje// byang shar ro langs nag po
rje// 'og tu 'bar ba nag po rje// sgo bzhir bka' nyan ging chen bzhi// rtsang bzhi dag la dbang bskur dgod// mthun pa'i rdzas dang mchod rdzas dang// mi sha rta sha'i gtor ma ru// rus pa sna
tshogs brgyan byas la// gshed po yab yum sras la gzhag/ bya nag rta nag lug nag snying/ khyi nag phag pa rog po'i snying// g.yag nag glang dang ra rgod snying// sha dang khrag dang rus pa
dang// mi shas brgyan la zangs bu gang// bdud po bcu la dgod par bya// sha sna khrag sna'i gtor ma la// spyan gzigs dkor chas brgyan pa bzhi// sgo bzhir ging chen bzhi la
gzhag/ sman dang rak+tar sbyar ba yis// snang srid srog la bdud dbang bskur// mi gsur rta gsur rgyun du gtang// rgyal mtshan chen po bzhi yang gzug/ dar nag gur phub khyi nag g.yang gzhi
brdab// lug nag 'ben bca' ra rog dmigs pa'i rten// skyer pa stag pa la sogs dag la yang// mgo mjug ma nor bzhogs la khram shing bya// drag po'i sngags bzlas rim par khram la
gdab// yi dwags gos la 'khor lo bris byas te// dug dang thod pa mkhas pas bri bar bya// gzi brjid 'phags pa 'jam dpal yab yum dang// bka' nyan nyi ma bzhi pa'i lha bsgrub mchod/
khram thogs bdud rnams las la bskul phyir rbad// thod pa mtshan ngan ra rog khrag blugs la// rang srog ming bris thod pa'i nang du'o// dpral bar mthongs bzhag re bar gril byas la/ khram
gyis dkrug cing khram sngags bzlas par bya// oM dgra bo ni tsi dum mug khram thor tha che ge mo mA ra ya gug ling swA hA// zhes bzlas shing khram gyis skabs su dkrug bdug kyang// ting 'dzin rnam
gsum gsal bsgom la// dbang chen 'byung ba rim brtsegs la// b+h+rU?M las 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad mu khyud ldan// gru chad bar khyams mu khyud ldan// shar phyogs
rus pa'i gzhal yas khang// lho phyogs me yi gzhal yas khang// nub phyogs khrag gi gzhal yas khang// byang phyogs dbugs kyi gzhal yas khang// dbus su ya ma chen po ste// gshin rje ma he
bsnol ba'i gdan// hUM las gshed po'i skur gyur te// stang zil mdog 'dra gnag la 'tsher// stag lpags glang chen sbrul nag chun po dang// thod pa la sogs dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan// zhal
drug bcu gnyis phyag dang ldan par bsgoms// g.yas g.yon yum dang mdun du sras mchog ste// rgyan dang cha lugs phyag mtshan gsal bar bsgom// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad steng du nr-i bsam
ste// nr-i las dgra bgegs bsnol ba'i gdan du bsam// de steng ya bcu gdan stengs 'od dang zer 'phro ba// spro bsdus ya las khram thogs bdud po bcu// steng gi bdud po 'bar ba ya chen
ni// g.yu 'brug zhon pa glog gi zhags thogs bsgom// shar gyi bdud po rol po ral pa can// rnga mo zhon nas ral gri thogs pa bskyed// lho phyogs khram bdag srog bdud mche ba can// bdud
sha zhon nas zhags pa thogs pa bskyed// nub tu zla bdud yor po zhags pa can// 'brong bu zhon nas gnam lcags phur thogs bskyed// byang du srog bdud gser gyi s+t+wa re can/
khyung chen zhon nas s+t+wa re thogs pa bskyed// shar lho khram bdag gnam btsan thog po rje// rta la zhon nas gnam lcags 'phen pa bskyed// lho nub khram bdag bar btsan ri bo rje// rlung lha zhon
nas rlung nag g.yab 'debs bskyed// nub byang khram bdag se 'dzin sding ba rje// phag pa rtar zhon khram shing thogs pa bskyed// byang shar khram bdag ro langs nag po rje// chu glang zhon nas s+t+wa
re thogs pa bskyed// 'og phyogs nag po yab rje khrag 'thung ni// stag dmar zhon nas sbrul dmar zhags thogs bskyed// re re'i 'khor na bdud kyang bsam yas te// rang bzhin gnas nas
'khor bcas spyan drangs pas// grub pa'i gnas su de 'dra byonapar bsam// sgo bzhir nyin bzhir lha yi ging bzhi yang// bka' nyan byed pa'i 'gugs byed dza las bskyed// de ltar bskyed pa'i
bdud po de rnams kyis// bstan pa gshig cing sku la bsdau ba rnams// zhags pas bcings shing la las khram la 'debs// la las mtshon 'debs la las thun du 'dzud// gan bub rngul nag
'thib cing khrag tu skyug/ mig rtsa rib rib 'o dod tser tser 'bod// ci mdzad thong thong zer zhing gsod par bsgom// ting nge 'dzin gyis de ltar gsal bskyed la// drag sngags 'di bzlas bdud
rnams myur bar bskul// ru tra pa tra mu khrag tsa ra pa te phor pa dun hab swA hA/ khri'am 'bum na bdud rnams mngon du byon// mon dang btsun pa skad rigs mi mthun pa// ldab ldib smra zhing las la
mngon du byon// gtum chen bstod la bdud rnams las la bskul// hUM/ bskal pa snyigs ma'i lnga brgya la/ khro rgyal gshin rje'i spyan sngar dam bcas pa// mi bzad chen po srog bdag kun 'dul
byed// 'jam dpal gshin rjes dmar gyi ar+g+ha dang// bdud rtsi dmar gyi dam rdzas dam pa 'di/ khram thogs bdud la byin nas dbang bskur bas// bdud 'khor yongs kyis sangs rgyas bstan
pa bsrung// lus kyi dam tshig a ra yaM// ngag gi dam tshig ni ra yaM// dam las ma 'da' phrin las mdzod// steng phyogs bdud kyi gzhal yas nas// 'bar ba ya chen bla med ni// g.yu 'brug

sngon po'i rta la zhon// lag na glog dmar thog zhags thogs// sdang bar byed pa'i dgra la ya// skyes pa dar ma khrid la shog/ skyes bu mi yi snying la ya// bdud kyi khram khram khram la thob// oM snying
khrag tsit+ta rbad// dug mug khram tor ta rbad// che ge mo mA ra ya khug 'di rnams la gug kyang 'dug/ ling swA hA/ zhes brjod cing khram la rim gyis gdab/ rak+ta sbrengs zhing bdud rnams las la
rbad// mun nag 'thibs pa'i gzhal yas nas// nag po yab rje khrag 'thung ni// stag chen dmar po'i rta la zhon// lag na sbrul dmar zhags pa thogs// sdang bar byed pa'i dgra la ya// skyed pa

dar ma khrid la shog/ skye bu mi yi snying la ya// bdud kyi khram khram khram la thob// oM snying khrag tsit+ta rbad// dug mug khram tor ta rbad// che ge mo mA ra ya khug ling swA hA/ shar phyogs rus pa'i
gzhal yas nas// shar bdud rol po ral pa can// phung sri rnga mo glog 'gyu zhon// lag na gnam lcags ral gri bsnams// sdang bar byed pa'i dgra la ya// skyes pa dar ma khrid la shog/ skyes

bu mi yi snying la ya// bdud kyi khram khram khram la thob// oM snying khrag tsit+ta rbad// dug mug khram tor ta rbad// che ge mo ma ra ya khug ling swA hA/ lho phyogs me yi gzhal yas nas/ khram bdag srog
bdud che ba can// bdud sha nag po ru bcu chibs// lag na 'dzin byed zhags pa bsnams// sdang bar byed pa'i dgra la ya// skyes pa dar ma khril la shog/ skyes bu mi yi snying la ya// bdud kyi
khram khram khram la thob// oM snying khrag tsit+ta rbad/ dug mug khram tor ta rbad/ che ge mo mA ra ya khug ling swA hA/ nub phyogs khrag gi gzhal yas nas// zla bdud yor po zhags pa can// 'brang bu
nag po rta ru zhon// lag na gnam lcags phur bu 'debs// sdang bar byed pa'i dgra la ya// skyes pa dar ma khrid la shog/ skyes bu mi yi snying la ya// bdud kyi khram khram khram la thob// oM snying
khrag tsit+ta rbad/ dug mug khram tor ta rbad/ che ge mo mA ra ya khug ling swA hA/ byang phyogs dbugs kyi gzhal yas nas// srog bdud gser gyi s+t+wa re can// chibs su khyung chen dar ma

chibs// lag na gser gyi s+t+wa re bsnams// sdang bar byed pa'i dgra la ya// skyes pa dar ma khrid la shog/ skyes bu mi yi snying la ya// bdud kyi khram khram khram la thob// oM snying khrag tsit+ta rbad/
dug mug khram tor ta rbad/ che ge mo mA ra ya khug ling swA hA/ khram bdag gnam btsan thog po rje// chibs su bdud kyi rta la chibs// sku las gnam lcags thog 'phen pa// sku las 'od zer
'phro ba 'khrug/ ched 'ga' sprul pa'i tshe// 'brug ser chems se chem// glog dmar ljibs se ljib// sdang bar byed pa'i dgra la ya// skyes pa dar ma khrid pa shog/ skyes bu mi yi snying la
ya// bdud kyi khram khram khram la thob// oM snying khrag tsit+ta rbad/ dug mug khram tor ta rbad/ che ge mo mA ra ya khug ling swA hA/ khram bdag bar btsan gri bo rje// chibs su rlung sha'i rta
la bcibs// phyag na rlung nag g.yab kyis 'debs// stong khams ma lus rlung la bskur// ched 'ga' sprul pa'i tshe// grang rdabs rta ru zhon/ skyib ser bun ne bun/ sdang bar byed pa'i dgra la

ya// skyes pa dar ma khrid la shog/ skyes bu mi yi snying la ya// bdud kyi khram khram khram la thob/ khram sngags bzlas shing rak+ta sbreng/ khram bdag se 'dzin sding pa rje// chibs su dur phag rta ru
bcibs// 'khor du bse dregs 'khor dang se reg bse reg 'dra min mang bcas// lag na khram nag khram shing thogs// sdang bar byed pa'i dgra la ya// skyes pa dar ma khrid la shog/ skyes bu mi yi snying

la ya// bdud kyi khram khram khram la thob/ khram sngags bzlas shing rak+ta sbreng/ khram bdag ro langs nag po rje// chu glang nag po'i rta ru zhon// lag na gnam lcags s+t+wa re thogs// sdang bar byed

pa'i dgra la ya// skyes pa dar ma khrid la shog/ skyes bu mi yi snying la ya// bdud kyi khram khram khram la thob// oM snying khrag tsit+ta rbad/ dug mug khram tor ta rbad/ che ge ma mA ra ya khug ling swA hA/
gshin rje nag po'i dus la bab// 'bar ba nag po'i dus la bab// sha za nag po'i dus la bab/ nag po rkya gsum dus la bab// rol po rkya gsum dus la bab// spyang sngon 'bar ba'i dus la
bab// rgya bo mig bzhi'i dus la bab// ces pas rbad cing khram la gdab// rak+ta sbreng shing phrin las bcol// nyung dkar nyung nag dug khrag la// drag sngags 'di yis brdeg par bya// ru tsa pa

tsa thun khrag/ shrI khri ma ma ro thun khrag/ mi sha ro la thun khrag khrag to rA dza thun khrag/ stod ska ku pa thun khrag/ ma ku sa ra thun khrag/ che ge mo mA ra ya thun khrag/ ces ni rab tu khros pas
brdeg/ gtad pa'i las su bya ba yang/ khram dang 'khor lo thod par blug/ chu mig nub tu bstan par gtad/ gtor ma gtang zhing smon lam gdab// bsad pa nyid bzhi'i ging bzhi ste// 'phang ba
dug khrag thun khrag 'phang// bsreg pa khram shing thod pa ste// tsher ma can gyi shing btus la// grog po phug rdug phyin la bsreg/ mnan pa 'khor lo chu mig mgor// nag po klu yi lag tu
gtad// gdab pa rang rang phur pas so// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ stong gsum mun par gtong ba'i bdud phyi ltar bsgrub pa'i skabs te le'u zhe brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang
bcom ldan 'jigs byed chen pos/ stong gsum mun par gtong ba bdud nang ltar bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// dang po dang ba'i dad pa rab tu bskyed// bka' yi gnas sam dga'
ba'i gnas dag tu// sa bdag lha klu zhi bar rab byas te// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la// mthing nag gru gsum zla gam gsum gyis bskor// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad gru chad sgo bzhir
ldan// mthing nag dbus su ya mAn+ta ka dgod// zla gam gsum la yum gnyis sras dang gsum// 'khor lo brgyad la bdud kyi rgyal po brgyad// bar khyams dmar po bdud kyi lcam mo brgyad// sgo
bzhir bdud kyi yang khol bzhi// lho nub mtshams su grir shi'i g.yang gzhi gzug/ nub byang mtshams su spyang ki'i g.yang gzhi gzug/ byang shar mtshams su bya rgod g.yang gzhi gzug/ shar lho
mtshams su lug nag g.yang gzhi gzug/ dbus su khyi nag dar nag zhing gi gur// phyi rim bong rgya nag po dag gis bskor// lha rnams grangs dang mnyam pa'i phur pa dgod// dbus su yab yum
gtor ma gzhag bya ba// bse gab mon thod 'khar gzhong la sogs su// mi sha rta sha'i gtor ma bshams// lho nub mtshams su rje rigs thod pa ru// mi yi snying khrag bsres pa'i gtor ma

gzhag/ nub byang rta snying rta khrag bsres pa gang// shar du sprel gyi snying dang phag khrag bsres la gzhag/ bdag nyid mthing nag ber gon te// srog gi snying po rgyun du drangs// oM sha ra na sha ra tri/

kha ra na sha ru du ma/ stum bu sha tri na// mi ra tar+Na tu ta ra na a pa tsa ra tsa ga tsu ru sha mu+u ra to sha mu ra to sha a ya ba dug pu ru na/ he he ya na dza/ yo ru ma ra na sha du ru/ mA ra ya hUM/ ba ba byi ya hUM/

ya ba ya de la ba ra de la ba ra da/ bdud kyi snying po de rnams dang// lcam dral 'khor bcas dril ba ni// oM hro no ma hi b+h+yo li/ ma khu ri bum/ rum bu nu/ tra tra tra du ru du ru tra dza dza hUM dza/ stong ngam
bye ba sa yar bzlas// stong gsum mun par gtong byed na// mun pa'i dus su dug khrag la// nyi ma gsad pa'i drag sngags bzlas// rang sngags mjug tu mun gtibs brjod// stong gsum bdud
kyi lcam dral gyis// skad cig tsam la g.yo 'gul gtong// las la sbyar te gsod 'dod na// rabs chad nag po'i thod pa ru// dug dang klad khrag sbyar ba yis// gtum khro bstod la bdud rnams
rbad// hUM/ nam mkha' yangs pa'i klong yangs nas// yang rje shan pa dbu gsum phyag drug pa// gnas 'dir mun gtibs dam la shog/ mun pa gtibs pa'i klong dkyil nas// ya bzher nag
po 'brug thog sku// gnas 'dir mun gtibs dam la shog/ shar phyogs rus pa'i zhing khams nas// shar bdud rol po ral pa can// zhes sdang mun gtibs dam la shog/ lho
phyogs me yi zhing khams nas// srog bdud sngon po mche ba can// srog la mun gtibs dam la shog/ nub phyogs khrag gi zhing khams nas// bla bdud yor po zhags pa can// bla la mun gtibs
dam la shog/ byang phyogs rlung gi zhing khams nas// srog bdud ser po s+t+wa gri can// srog la mun gtibs dam la shog/ tshe bdud skyin gyi ral pa can// tshe la bar gcod dam la shog/ srog ta
srod pas khrig pa yang khris pa sems kyi bdud// yid la mun gtibs dam la shog/ dkar mo 'bar ma spyan gcig ma// sngon mo ti ra ma mo 'khol// dmar mo g.yu gtsug klu gnyan 'khol// nag mo
dred mgo ma yams 'khol// ser mo rlung gshog dbang ldan 'khol/ dkar ljang 'ug mgo dri za 'khol// sngo nag sreg byed ya ma 'khol// dmar mo sgeg mo srin mo 'khol// sngo skya

zhags thogs rlung lha 'khol// dgra bo'i rnam shes brgyan la mun nag gtibs// ha na ha na sti ta sti ta/ ru tra ma ma/ sa ma ya hUM/ kha tra dza/ mi tri dza/ sho na tri dza/ yag sha dza/ ma tri dza/ da tri dza/ sha

tri dza/ da tri pra tri dza/ dza byin dza/ kar ma dza/ ha du dza/ li sha dza/ yak+sha dza/ su mi dza/ kho da ra dza/ dza hUM rbud/ rbud kha shed rbud/ pha ni rbud/ po la ku+u na na rbad/ du du rbud/ kha la khu rbud/ shed tsit+ta
gong chod/ kha la tug tig mur rta rbad rbud swA hA/ za za nad kum thum ri li li kha le kha shag thum/ ka nan ha ra rbad chums khug ril/ kug rmam khrag ril srog rtsa rbud ril/ de dag gsad cing
gzir ba dang// gnan zhing 'phang dang bsreg cing gtad// 'khor lo bri bya yi ge dgod// dbye dang dgug dang bstim pa'i las// man ngag bzhin du byas gyur na// the tshom med par brlag par
byed// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ bdud nang ltar bsgrub pa'i skabs te le'u zhe dgu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos bdud gsang bar bsgrub pa'i
tshul gsungs so// thog mar dad par rab tu bskyed// bsod nams tshogs kyi yan lag bsags// nag po brag gi rtsar phyin la// lhor bltas rtsa nas chu 'bab tu// gur nag nang du+u sa blangs
la// stegs bu 'dom gang gru bzhi brtsig/ mi khrag rta khrag khyi khrag dang// rgya sol bsreg la chag chag gdab// dbus su gru gsum mkhyid gang bru// zla gam dmar po thod phreng dkar// gru chad
ljang nag sgo bzhi ser// bdud po ha nu bag sha kha// dar la gzugs bris dbus su dgod// lcags sam mchog gi phur pa la// gshed por byin brlabs dbus su dgod// dpal
dar nag po lce bzhi la// phyogs bzhir bdud bzhi'i gzugs bris dgram// shar du he le khyab pa dgod// lho ru nag po bkrag med dgod// nub tu so 'dar 'khrig pa dgod// se mo rtsa skem ral

pa spyi ching yang byang du dgod// dri za khyung btsun shar du dgod// phag skar nya reng lho ru dgod// ngang zan phang skar rang gza' 'phan skar yang/ nub tu dgod// na bun smug po byang du dgod// bka' 'khor
skyong ba'i gnod sbyin bdud// phyag brnyan bcu gsum khrag gi dong ral can// sprul pa bcu gsum stag dang gzigs chas can// mon bu bcu gsum bdud kyi rta nag can// pho nya bcu gsum stag
seng mthong ga can// phyag brnyan nag mo re ba'i go lcog can// sprul pa mo rnams sol ba'i lan tshar can// mon mo bcu gsum zha ne'i len tshar can// pho nya mo rnams mgron bu'i thod skabs
can// gru chad khyams dang sgo la dgod// de la dam rdzas bsham pa ni// rabs chad mon gyi thod pa ru// bra sran gtor ma cha gcig tu// lug nag spyi dkar bya rog dang// rta nag snying dkar
gsum gyi snying// srog pa rtsa dang ma bral nang// dgra bo du yod ming rus rnams// gro ga shing shun bris la gzhug/ bya rog gsob dang spyang ka'i gsob// brgyad ste shar nub kha bstan gzhag/ chang
phud nang du gser brdar la// dngul skyogs gang yang gzhag par bya// g.yab dar nag pos g.yab tshul bya// lug nag lcags ru gser mig la// re ba'i sgye ni khal du bkal// g.yas su pho
rnams ming rus gzhug/ g.yon du mo rnams ming rus gzhug/ sngo dmar skud pas gong rmed bya// ra la dar lce mthing nag gdab// mig gnyis nang du rin chen brdar// dar dkar yug gis
mig gnyis dgab// dkyil 'khor byang shar gra ru dgod// dur khrod ras la 'khor lo bca'// thod pa dug khrag bsres la dgang// gos nag gyon la thod nag bcings// bdud kyi g.yab dar
lag tu thogs// gtum chen bstod la bdud rnams rbad// drag sngags 'di bzlas mngon du 'gyur// hUM phaT ba hUM le ma sa sha sta ha sta ba ba le rang ba mang sha sa ra ya hUM ma he sa mang ga la ya hUM
phaT/ gsum 'bum bzlas na gang yang 'grub// de bzhin bsgrub na mngon du 'gyur// dpal 'jam dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ bdud gsang ba ltar bsgrub pa'i skabs te le'u lnga bcu
pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das gshed pos 'jig rten gyi khams mer bsreg pa'i btsan phyi ltar bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// brag dmar rtsa'am dur khrod du// sa bdag zhi
byang klu gtor gtang// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru+u bzhi pa// ra dmar khrag gis chag chag gdab// dbus kyi lte ba dmar po la// zla gam dmar po brgyad kyis bskor// lcags ri nag po me
'od 'bar// zla gam re la mA ra ya// ra dmar bse 'gram phyi rten bca'// dbus su bshos bu gru gang gzhag/ ra khrag dag gis dmar por byug/ za 'og dmar po mda' gang gdags// ra
lpags dmar po mda' gang la// zer mo ldam pa'i phod kyis brgyan// dbus kyi zla gam steng du gzhag/ de 'khor zla gam brgyad po la// bshos cha brgyad la mda' dmar brgyad// dar dang ra
lpags dmar po dang// zer mo'i phod kyis brgyan pa brgyad// phyi rim zla gam brgyad la dgod// gser brdar chang phud bya'o dgu// 'bras dang til nag la sogs pas// zla gam dgu la phul

dgu gzhag/ dur khrod ras la 'khor lo ni// rtsibs brgyad ba ru bya bar bshad/ oM la li bra ma ni re rtse thal ba ni/ tri nyi nyi shaM tri mu tri ri tri tri/ de tri haM shaM staMM sarba karma se ba be ba swA hA/ 'di ni
dbang dang drag po'i sngags// dgug dang rbad pa'i sngags 'di brjod// srog la li pra ma ni bam ril dgra bo nr-i dza/ srog rtse thal pa nr-i// bam ri li li dgra bo nr-i dza/ kro d+hI ko ya bam ri li li

dgra bo nr-i dza/ kro d+hI kI la ya sha la baM ri li li dgra bo nr-i dza/ oM tri gaM shaM mA ra ya bam ri li li dgra bo nr-i dza/ mu tri mA ra ya bam ri li li dgra bo nr-i dza/ re tri mA ra ya bam ri li li dgra bo mA ra ya nr-i

dza/ haM shaM staM bu mA ra ya bam ri li li dgra bo nr-i dza/ rang gsang dpon g.yog dgu'i snying po brjod par bya'o// srog la li pra ma ni dam nyams dgra bo'i snying la dza dza dza/ srog la mA ra ya nr-i dam

nyams dgra bo'i srog la dza dza dza/ srog kro d+hI kI la ya mA ra ya dgra bo'i snying la dza dza dza/ srog kro d+hI sho la ya ya mA ra ya dgra bo'i snying la dza dza dza// srog kaM ti kaM shaM mA ra ya dam nyams dgra bo'i

snying la dza dza dza/ srog gi shaM tri mA ra ya dam nyams dgra bo'i snying la dza dza dza/ srog mu tri re'u hri dam nyams dgra bo'i snying la dza dza dza/ dmigs pa'i gzugs la sngags kyis brdeg/ gshin rje
bstod la btsan rnams rbad// hUM/ 'dzam gling 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// me 'od 'bar ba'i zhing khams nas// mi ring dmar po mthu rtsal can// dbu la skra med bskal pa'i me dpung
'bar// 'jig rten khams kun me yis bsreg/ smin ma lcags kyu 'khril ba 'dra// spyan rtsa dmar po dam nyams dgra la bzlog/ sku la le brgan dmar po'i 'jol ber
gsol// g.yas nas btsan gyi rgyu zhags dgra la 'debs// g.yon nas hu lu'i ltas ngan dgra la 'bebs// zhabs la lcags lham yu thung gsol// sbrul nag stong gi chun bskor can// sbrul nag
gzhibs pa'i sku regs bcings// skar chen dmar po'i tshar tshar can// bzhugs ni gling bzhi khyab par bzhugs// nam gyi gung la rgyu tsa na// brag gi wa mo kha nag chibs// nyi ma'i zer la rgyu tsa
na// chibs su ltas ngan gla ba chibs// nyi ma'i gung la rgyu tsa na// chibs su bra bo rting dkar chibs// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di longs la// yab gcig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// 'khor gyi
btsan rnams las la bskul// 'jig rten khams su me yi bskal pa thobs// dgra bo'i rnam shes brgyad po thal bar rlogs// skyes bu chen po dgra la ya// rang gsang mched dgu dgra la
ya// btsan gyi zhags pa da sdogs la// thar ma dgra la da thob cig khrag skyug gzer thabs phur gyis thob// ces phrin las bcol/ tsa ra kham rog rten du bca'// lo dang zla bar brlag par
'gyur ro// be'u rdzi wa dang rta chung dang// lag sor rnams la gong bzhin bskul// chang phud gtor zhing las gnyer gtad// rtags phyin pa dang gtang rag gtang// gsob dang bshos cha dbul
bar bya// gshin rje zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ 'jig rten khams kun mes bsregs pa'i btsan gyi zla gsang phyi ltar bsgrub pa'i skabs te le'u nga gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan
'das 'jigs byed chen pos/ btsan nang ltar bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// gong gsum kha'am brag dmar rtsa// dur khrod nags tshal mthug po ru// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la// dug
dang khrag gis chag chag gdab// dbus su gru gsum mthur du brko// mu su ra yi thod pa ru// rdo sol spra ba ras la sogs// til mar bsres te gzhag par bya// de la zla gam gsum gyis
bskor// phyi rim 'dzam bu'i gling bzhi bris// lcags ri la sogs me 'od bris// dbus su ya ma gshed po ste// zla gam gsum la yum sras dgod// zla gam steng du btsan gyi rgyal// rdo rje reg bya
gser mig dgod// lho ru rdo rje grags mchog dgod// nub tu rdo rje mgyogs byed rtsal// byang du rdo rje shu bo 'bar// yab yum rdzas su bshams pa yang// mi sha rta sha'i gtor ma dang// snying
chen gcig la brten te bsgrub// phyogs bzhir gtor ma bzhi byas la// shu bo mched bzhi'i rdzas su dgod// ra dmar snying dang bya se'i snying// rta 'tshal snying la btsan rnams
brten// bya rgod mda' la le brgan dar// lag tu thogs la rtag tu g.yab// gri bo'i thod par thar ma bca'// rtag tu ra gsur rgyun du gtang/ gser skyems la sogs gser sbyar bas// rtag
tu btsan la mchod pa bya// spyugs pa'i glu blang rnga gling 'bud// rtag tu nyung dkar nyung nag la// sngags bzlas gru gsum thod par gsib// rnam gsum ting 'dzin btsan rnams bskyed// a pi shu

sa ma ya rA dza pe ni a na Na sta tri sha la rbad dz+ha ra gting pa na d+ha ra shu na tsit+ta b+hasmi ku ku dza dza/ khri'am 'bum du bzlas gyur na// sku yang dngos su ston par 'gyur// gzhan yang rta med srab sgra
dang// mi med spyugs pa'idi re 'ong// de bzhin las la sbyor bar bya// gshed po bskul la btsan rnams rbad// 'jig rten me yis bsreg 'dod na// rdo sol rdzas sbyar dam rdzas la// rtsa ba'i
sngags la raM raM sbyar// de yi sngags rnams rab tu bzlas// zla gsang bu la shes bya zhing// gsad pa'i las kyang gong dang 'dra// gtso ru rang gi dam tshig bsrung// ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod lam
bya// yengs na gang yang mi 'grub ste// rtag tu mi dang nye mi bya// thar ma bcas pa'i thod pa de// gong gsum btsan gyi 'du sa'am// brag btsan klu btsan yod sar sba// gang la bya ba 'joms par
'gyur// 'jam dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ 'jig rten gyi khams mes bsreg pa btsan gyi zla gsang nang ltar bsgrub pa'i skabs te le'u nga gnyis pa'o//// de nas
bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos btsan gsang ba ltar bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// dgon pa dur khrod lta bu ru// dkyil 'khor mthing nag gru gsum brtsig/ dbus su rabs chad thod pa
ru/ khrag sogs dug sogs rdo sol dang// dur khrod ras dang til gyi mar// ra dmar snying dang ra khrag blugs// ming dang rus bris thod par gzhug/ bse phor zangs gzhong gtor mas
dgang// drung gzhag srog snying tshad du grangs// oM de ba tri mang gan dza mu sa mu sa mA ra na ya mA ra na ya dgra bo che ge mo'i srog breng breng thum b+h+yo dza dza/ 'di ni rab tu mi bsgyur
yang 'grung sngags// thod pa'i nang du 'bum du bzlas// thod pa nags rdzong 'thug po'am// ri la sbas na ri mes tshig khyad par rgya mtsho lta bu'am// chu mig sbas na chu yang khol// dgra yi gdung
gseb sbas gyur na/ khyim dang khang pa 'jig par 'gyur// de nas sngags de nyid 'o zu'i sdong po la/ lan stong du bzlas nas byin na smyo bar 'gyur ro// d+ha du ra'i lo ma dang sha pra pa
de dang/ ka ka ri la bzlas nas byin na mdzer 'gyur ro// be'u be dang ka ne la bzlas nas byin na/ skrangs 'bur nad kyis 'chi bar bshad/ dza yi 'bras la bzlas nas phyogs su gtor na/ sbrul
chen po khang pa'i nang du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// rdo sol la bzlas nas b+han d+ha'i nang du chang dang sbyar nas rtswa gseb bam shing gseb tu sbas na yul khams 'tshig par 'gyur ro// rdo sol la bzlas
te chang gral du grogs po'i chang la btab na mer reng gis 'gro bar 'gyur ro// bse zho dang btsan dug sbyar la btab nas dgra'i lus sam sha la reg pa'i gos la bskus na lhog pa dkar pos
'chi bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ 'jig rten mes bsreg btsan gyi zla gsang gsang ba ltar bsgrub pa'i skabs te le'u nga gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom
ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos/ chu 'khyags drag tu dbab pa khyab 'jug gza'i drag sngags 'di gsungs te/ gza' phyi ltar bsgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/ thog mar dad pa rab tu bskyed// ri
gsum rtse 'am dur khrod du// dbang thob bya phyir snga ma mnyes bya zhing// dkyil 'khor bris nas dam tshig dbang dag nod// dgos pa bsgrub phyir man ngag thob par bya// man ngag thob nas bsnyen
bsgrub mtha' ru dbyung// bsnyen pa bya zhing mthun rdzas 'bad de bsag khyab 'jug las kyi go rim ni// gzhan dang mthun par cho ga dang// mchod dang gzu+u dpang gsol ba gdab// gtor ma la ,
sogs cho ga bya// dbab gsad las kyi go rim ni// tshes grangs phyogs dang dus tshod dang// sprul pa yan lag 'jug pa'o// go rim bzhin du so sor sbyar// bzhi la nub nas shar du srod// ma
mor sprul te rkang pa g.yas// brgyad la shar lho mtshams nas su// nyi ma dros te nub byang du// dgra lha'i rgyal mo mjug ma sprul// bcu gcig 'jing la byang nas lhor// bdud du sprul te lag pa
gnyis// bco lnga nam phyed lho nub nas// byang shar mtshams su rgyu ba ste// srin por sprul te mgo bo rgyu// bco brgyad nam yol shar nas nub// dmu ru sprul nas dpung mgo g.yon// nyi shu gnyis
la nyi ma myur// nub byang mtshams nas shar lho ru// gshin rjer sprul nas lag pa g.yon// nyi shu lnga la lho nas byang// skya rengs chas te dpung mgo mig/ klu btsan gdon du sprul te rgyu// nyi shu
dgu ste myur chung na// byang shar mtshams nas lho nub tu// gza' bdud chen por sprul te rgyu// de yi dbab gsad sbyor ba ni// phyogs kyi gdon sprul re re la// gsad pa'i sbyor ba so
sor bya// gdon sprul so sor rgyu+u ba ste// ma mor sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan ni// nag mo chen mo ral pa can// 'jig pa'i rgyan cha mang po dang// lag na thod khrag 'thor zhing rgyu// rlung drag thog
dang rdzi kha rgyu// rgyal mo sngo skya ka dar thogs// sngo skya zhon te 'jigs pa'i gzugs// sgra dang ser ba mtshan mo'o// sprul pa bdud ni mdog nag po// lag na gri nag zhags pa thogs// rta nag
zhon te gdon dang bcas// btsan thabs drag po'i nad rnams dang// dus med mtshan ma mang du 'byung// 'jigs pa'i srin po sngo nag la// mig rtsa dmar la sdang mig bgrad// mche ba gtsigs
te za ba'i tshul// mda' gzhu thogs te gdon dang rgyu// rlung nag 'tshubs mar bcas te 'ong// sprul pa dmu ste thog ser 'bebs// dmar po khrag gi thig le can// ba glang zhon te 'jigs pa'i
gzugs// mtshan ma thob dang sprin nag 'khrugs// klu gdon drag por sprul pa ni// sbrul nag chen po 'jigs pa'i gzugs// 'khyil pa'i tshul gyis rgyug cing 'phro// chu drag glog dang chas
pa'o// nag po chen po 'khor lo thogs// gdon gyi gtso bor sprul te 'ong// rgyu ba'i dus dang mtshungs nges na// mtshan ma myur du phung bar 'gyur// de la dbab gsad sbyor ba brgyad// nges par
rgyu ba'i dus su bya// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la// gru bzhi'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dbus su e// phyogs mtshams brgyad la e brgyad bkod// e dgu
nag po'i 'khor lo bskor// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la sprul pa brgyad// bskyed la dbab gsad sbyor ba bri// dbus su gshed po yab yum ste/ khA hir bcas pas gtor ma sbyin// phyogs mtshams
brgyad kyi sprul pa la// so so'i las kyi bya ba brtsam// dgug dang brdeg dang bstab pa'i las// 'grogs pa'i tshul te gdong tshugs med// bsreg dang mchod pa la sogs pa// phyogs mtshams
brgyad nas drangs te dbul// phyogs mtshams brgyad du gsad pa ste// dbus kyi e la bsreg pa'o// sprul pa'i mgo bo rgyu ba'i tshe// brnag pa'i dpral ba'i dbyings su gdab// rkang pa g.yas
g.yon rgyu ba ni// bol gong g.yas g.yon gnyis su gdab// sprul pa yan lag go rim bzhin// gdab pa'i las kyang de bzhin gdab// tsher ma can gyi shing la bsreg/ rgyu ba'i dus su mtshungs
nges na// phung bar 'gyur te gdon mi za// gdon dang phye ma rnam pa gnyis// gdon gyi rdzas la nus pa yod// phye ma gdon gyi bya ba de// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las
gsungs// gza' bdud rgyu ba'i dus nges na// rjes dang dri ma'i 'dag pa la// gos dum dri ma rnying pa dang// gdug pa'i gzugs brnyan bzhi byas te// rnam grangs nad du gsad bya na// gong ma'i
rdzas dang tsha ba gsum// bsres te gzugs brnyan bya bar gsungs// myur du gsad pa'i sbyor ba ni// gong ma'i steng du ha las bya// gong ma bzhi la lcags phye dang/ khrag gi sbyor bas dri nyid
du// til dang ske tshe nyung nag dang/ khrag sna zi ra gu gul dang// gong gi rdzas kyis ma nges gsad// dur khrod ras sam shing shun la// skyang nul byas te smug nag gam// yang na sngo nag dmar por
bya// de la brnag pa'i sbyor ba bya'o// myur du dbab pa'i las bya na// dam sri yul gyi chu sogs bsag/ yugs sa mo'am rabs chad thod// yang na mdze can thod pa ru// mi khrag khyi khrag ra khrag
dang// mngal khrag la sogs dme khrag sogs// ba dkar 'o ma mdzo dang ra'i// 'o ma la sogs sbyar bar bya// sngo sna dug sna gu gul sbyar// gang 'bebs chu mig klu yod sar// bsregs sam

bskol na klu rnams dang// dus tshod gza' yi gdong thug na// chu 'khyags khrag tu 'ong bar nges// ma hA tsan+d+ha rak+sha tri tha ni ma tha ya/ che ge mo la tri b+h+yo/ zhes pa ni sprul pa srin po'i gdon gyis

dbab cing gsad pa'o// nA ga rA dza be ni ni a nan sta/ nA ga rA dza ra sha ting pan d+ha ra k+Shu na/ tsit+ta/ bAsmi ku ru/ klu'i gdon gyis dbab cing gsad pa'o// rmu tri tsa d+ha duM duM buM buM kha la rak+sha thum ri

li li/ kha shag bam raka s+t+wam thum ri li li/ dmu bdud sprul pas dbab cing gsad pa'o// ma ma sa ma ya ma trag sha ma tra 'ga' nas kha ya ku ru te tso pA la ya a/ yu shwa ha ra d+ha ra/ u ma ma da ma

ni sha truM nA sha ya ni dza dzaH ma mo'i gdon gyis dbab gsad pa'o// tri dkar mo tri dul dul snying khrag la ril ril/ chom chom rtsa la thun shig mA ra na dza/ rgyal mo sngo skyas dbab gsad pa'o// ya ma

tsan d+ha d+hi ta dza la tsakra d+ha ra na sha ya dgra bo nr-i mA ra ya sod sod chom chom shig shig gshin rje'i gdon gyi dbab gsad pa'o// ma hA bi d+he ba tra biSh+Nu tsan+d+ha ru ba ni rA hU la dgra bo'i tsit+ta la/ shu na tsa

to kha hi/ he ka li ma hA tsan d+ha mA ra ya nr-i khug khug dza dza/ gza' bdud chen pos dbab gsad pa'o// bdud tri ni ri tra pa na tri ya/ ma tri tri ya b+h+yo/ khaM khaM so baM rbad/ srog rtsa thun che ge mo nr-i nr-i dzaH/
ces bzlas gar dmigs thogs pa med// gtum chen nyid la rab bstod cing// gza' bdud chen po rab tu rbad// hUM ri rab phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad nas// lha srin sde brgyad
bskul re ran// khyab 'jug chen po sku bzhengs shig/ gtum po chen po bskyod tsa na// gza' bdud 'jug cing ki kang 'bebs// de yis ki kang 'bebs byed na// gza' bdud chen po mi srun
pa// khyab 'jug chen po kun tu rgyug/ 'jigs byed rog ti sprul pa'i lus// lus po gcig la mgo bo dgu// mgo lus med par mig gis khengs// ro stod mi la ro smad sbrul// lus ni brjid
pa'i dud ka la// lag na chu srin zhags pa thogs// pha ni srin la ma ni klu// klu srin tshogs pa'i mthu bo che// lho nub mtshams nas sku bzhengs nas// zla ba'i rjes gcod shar du rgyug/ nyi ma'i
rjes gcod nub tu rgyug/ nyin mo rgyu zhing mtshan mo 'joms// bar snang khams nas rgyu tsa na// 'jig rten khams kun sgrol bar mdzad// lo nyes 'khrugs pa yams nad gtong// nyi ma zla ba lto ru
za// rgya mtsho'i gting nas gnas pa'i tshe// klu rnams kun kyang 'khrug cing slong// thog ser sa g.yos ki kang 'bebs// 'jigs byed chen po mi srun pa// ming brgya pa la mtshan stong po// dus
tshod tshes grangs kun gyi bdag/ lha 'dre kun gyi nang dbyen byed// lha srin sde brgyad dmag dpon byed// 'byung ba lnga yi bdud chen po// mtshan ni rnam pa dgu ru grags// steng 'og phyogs
mtshams thams cad nas// kun nas rgyug cing ki kang 'bebs// lho nub mtshams nas bskyod pa'i tshe// srin po rak+sha bi tri pa// ki kang pa ta chen po bya// srin po'i king kang chen po
'bebs// shar lho mtshams nas bskyod pa'i tshe// drang srong chen po rA hu la// drang srong gi ni king kang 'bebs// ki kang bdag nyid can zhes bya// byang shar mtshams nas bskyod pa'i
tshe// 'jigs byed chen po sgra gcan 'dzin// byi na ya ga pho nyar 'gyed// ki kang 'bebs pa'i las la brtson// nub byang mtshams nas bskyod tsa na// du ba mjug ring chen po bya// 'jig rten
khams na mthu bo che// 'jig rten g.yo 'gul byed pa'i bdag/ lho yi phyogs nas bskyod pa'i tshe/ khyab 'jug chen po bya ba ste// dus tshod tshes grangs kun tu rgyug/ sprul pa'i sku ni ki kang
'bebs/ shar gyi phyogs nas bskyod pa'i tshe// dmu bdud chen po ha li ka/ byi nu ra tsa'i ki kang 'bebs// dmu yi ki kang 'bebs par byed// byang gi phyogs nas bskyod pa'i tshe// bdud po rog
ti 'bar ba'i gzugs// bdud kyi ki kang 'bar ba 'bebs// ki kang 'bar ba tsa ra ka/ nub kyi phyogs nas bskyod pa'i tshe// srid pa'i ma mo rnams dang rol// ma mo'i ki kang kun
gyi bdag/ ljang sngon chen po'i ki kang 'bebs// lho nub mtshams nas bskyod tsa na// rog ti bya rog mgo brtsegs te// skar chen 'bar ba'i 'od chen po// sngon du su phrad khyur mid za/ khyod ni
khro chen sprul pa ste// lho nub mtshams nas sku bskyod nas// lha srin sde brgyad dmag dpon byed// nub nas shar du bskyod tsa na// srid pa'i ma mo'i dmag dpon byed// nad ngan ki kang dbab pa'i
dus la babs// shar lho mtshams nas bskyod tsa na// dgra lha'i rgyal po dmag dpon byed// thog dang bu yug ki kang ni// dam sri gdug pa'i snying la 'bebs// byang nas lho ru bskyod tsa
na// bdud dmag kun gyi dmag dpon byed// bdud kyi ki kang hur thum 'bebs// bdud kyi ki kang dgra la ya// byang shar mtshams nas bskyod tsa na// srin po 'bum gyi dmag dpon
byed// srin po'i ki kang dgra la ya// gri thabs sna tshogs ki kang ya// shar nas nub tu bskyod tsa na// dmu bdud yongs kyi dmag dpon byed// dmu rdo 'bebs pa'i las byed cing// gar rbad
dmu yi ki kang gtong// nub byang mtshams nas bskyod tsha na// gshin rje yongs kyi dmag dpon byed// skye 'gro yongs kyi bla tshe sdud// gshin rje'i ki kang dbang med 'bebs// lho nas byang du
bskyod pa'i tshe// klu btsan kun gyi dmag dpon byed// thog dang ser ba'i sna 'dren cing// thog ser mdze nad ki kang 'bebs// nub byang mtshams nas bskyod tsa na// gtib grir gsod pa'i ki
kang 'bebs// mdun du gang byung khyur mid byed// ki kang sna tshogs 'bebs pa'i bdag/ ki kang sna tshogs dgra la ya// zhes brjod cing rak+ta sbreng phrin las bcol// gsad na bla phur gzugs

la brdeg/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ shi kri bi tri kI li kI la ya/ che ge mo mA ra la hUM phaT/ mu lu mu lu/ ku ru ku ru/ thum bu thum bu/ ba ra ta thum ru thum ru pa ra pa shu+u da na ta pa ra pa ta ya/ ru ti ru

ti sha sa yA/ shan ti ku la tri dza/ zhes ni gsad pa'i las sbyor bya// chu 'khyags drag tu 'bebs 'dod na// sngags kyi man ngag zhag gcig bya// oM me kha kha thun kha thun/ raM yaM raM yaM/ na pu ta na Na
kha le ra thun ra thun tu/ zhes pa'i sngags bzlas khro tshul bstan/ mig bzlog kha bgrad mig sprin las/ khrag sprin dmar pos 'khrigs shing 'gril bar bsam// rdzas rnams gtor zhing lus
sprugs pas// ser ba drag tu 'ong bar 'gyur// gnam sa ri brag kun tu yang// 'ba' ri sha yas gdon mi za// 'jam dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ chu 'khyags
ser ba dbab pa khyab 'jug gza' yi drag sngags skabs te le'u nga bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos/ chu 'khyags drag tu dbab pa'i phyir// rog ti
gza' yi nang bsgrub gsungs// dur khrod la sogs dgon pa ru// dkyil 'khor gru gsum sbrag ma bya// gru gsum sbrag ma'i nang rol du// snel gri'i thod pa 'og tu gzhag/ mngal khrag la sogs
khrag sna tshogs// dug dang snga sngo dkar gsum blug/ rabs chad thod pas steng nas dgab// gru gsum nang du gzhag par bya// bsnyen pa bya ba'i thabs dag la// lha bsnyen sum stong byas nas

ni// tshes bzhi bco lnga brgyad dus la// gza' chen nyid kyi snying po bzlas// stong rdzogs thun la nyung gis brab// oM bya sha me ke du ru ma shi ri kha ra dz+wa la a ka ta swA hA/ stong rdzogs thun khrag la
bstim/ oM dza ba ti rA hu ma hA kro d+ha sha ra na hUM phaT/ sngags la stong ngam khri ru bzlas// bzlas pa rdzogs nas nyung gis brab// nyi shu dgu 'am tshes gcig la// bsnyen pa rdzogs nas sa btsang

sba// thun gcig gnas su rten du bca'// mis ma 'phrigs par gsang sngags bzlas/ oM kro d+hI tra lo glo bur skying 'dang phob// trag rak+sha snying kha rag b+h+yo/ khrag ma mu sha ma b+h+yo/ ku li na ma b+h+yo/
