tsan d+ha rak+sha ma b+h+yo/ btsan bdud khrol khrol b+h+yo/ gnam mthongs phye/ lcags sgrog khrol/ mi ring sod/ rkyang rje rkyang mo tsu ru tsu ru hUM phaT/ de nas zor sngags mdzub bstan la// yul gyi phyogs su
bzlas pa bya// ri bo'i rtser song thab zor 'phang// chu skyes zla ba tshes bzhi nas// nyi shu dgu mthar bsnyen rdzogs nas// chu 'khyus zla ba kun tu dbab// de ltar las rnams byas gyur na// chu
'khyags khrag tu 'babs gyur te// skyi 'dang ri rnams nyil bar byed// 'jam dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ chu 'khyags khrag tu dbab pa'i zla gsang nang bsgrub kyi skabs
te le'u nga lnga pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// 'gal ba chom la dbab slad du/ khyab 'jug gza' yi gsang bsgrub gsungs// sgra
gcan chen po nyi zla'i gnyen// drag po chen po rA hu la/ khrag tu dbab pa'i las 'di yin// dur khrod la sogs gnas dag tu// man+Dal chag chag thig gdab bri// dbus su gru gsum brtsegs ma
bri// mu khyud zlum po thod phreng can// sgo bzhi rigs dang mthun par bri// sbrul sngon dag gi shun pa la// rdzas kyi phud blugs mi rus gzhug khyil ba'i tshul gyis ga'ur gzhag/ gru
gsum dbus su bzhag la bsgrub// dkar thab dmar thab sngo thab gsum// gru gsum rgyab ma dag la gzhag/ sha rul khrag rul btsos dang rjen// ra mchin sgrub sman gu gul nag/ la phug til
sgog pha ltar ma lus kyang mos// snel gri'i thod par blugs la gzhag/ dkar gsum klu sman mngar gsum dang// gu gul dkar po 'bras chan rnams// ma ltar mos pas 'khar gzhong
blugs// mthun rdzas bsdus la thod par gzhag/ tsa ra rog po'i rwa la ni// sngags bris steng du ming byang gdags// lha srin sde brgyad mchod rdzas dgram// thun rdzas thod phreng steng du gzhag/ rang

nyid gshin rje gshed po ste// yi dam bcas pa rdzogs pa dang// srog snying 'di ni nus thang brjod// oM bi sha la du ru ma shi kha dz+wa la a ta swA hA/ stong rdzogs thun la mchod pa bya// hUM 'jigs byed
chen po rA hu la// sku mdog dud kha mig gis khengs// gshin rje gshed po'i zhabs drung du// rgyal ba'i bstan bsrung khas blangs pa// dus 'dir 'da' bar ma byed par// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di
longs la// dam nyams srog rtsa gcad pa dang// yul du lo nad ser ba phob// hab pa sha mi ki du ru ma shi ki dz+wa la ti a tsi ti swA hA// dus tshod brgyad la gtor ma sbyin// bsnyen cing bsgrub pa'i
mtshan ma rnams// gzhung mthun nyams su lon pa dang// drag po thun gyi rdzas kyang blang// ga bu'i ['u'i] nang du sngags 'dis brab// oM mu ka ye ka pa ye a pa ye hrIHSh+t+r-IHbi kri na te yul 'di'i
lo thog la/ tsa pa tri rA hu la ma hA kro d+ha ka pa ta/ shar shar ro sha la te hUM phaT/ thig nig gcig med gnyis trag/ brgyad bcad dud phrom gnam mthongs phye/ lcags sgrogs khrol/ mi ring sod/

rkyang rje rkyang mo tsu ru tsu ru hUM phaT/ stong ngam khri thon rdzas kyis brab// de nas lha srin sprul pa brgyad// sngags kyis gang gi mchan du brab// trag rak+mo hril shag rbad// ser 'dril shar rbad// de ni

ma mo'i drag sngags so// oM a sa le ma b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu ma ma trag rak+sha hril hril shar b+h+yo/ dgra bla'i rgyal mo'i drag sngags so// oM pa sha mi ki rA hu la hUM/ shag shar shar hril b+h+yo/ de ni bdud kyi

drag sngags so// oM ser khrag la mu sha gtub swA hA/ de ni srin po'i drag sngags so// oM ram traM thuM shag ril ram shar b+h+yo/ de ni dmu'i drag sngags so// oM ya ma rA dza ra ma hril shar ram ram/ de
ni gshin rje'i drag sngags so// oM nA ga hril se na shag sad dun sa ma ya hril b+h+yo/ de ni klu btsan gyi drag sngags so// ya ma snying ya ma khrag/ rA hu la hril hril shag shag sen sen ya
ya b+h+yo b+h+yo ram ram hril hril/ de ni bgegs kyi drag sngags so// zla gcig dus brgyad phyogs nas brdeg/ ling+ga bsnur zhing thun rdzas brdeg/ gtum chen bstod la gza' mchog rbad// bla phur
ling+ga dag la brdeg/ tshes grangs thems nas grub rtags 'byung// rdzas dang thun zor sngags dang ming// dbus kyi rabs chad thod par blugs// sa gzer yul dbus la sogs su// skya rengs
gzer du btab la gzhag/ de nas thun gyi zor bya ste// dam rdzas maN+Dal gong bzhin bya// dam sri yul gyi chu sogs bsags// lha bsnyen bsgrub sngags phyed du ste// phyed ni man chad sngags 'di

bzlas// oM mu ka ye ka ba ye a pa ye hrIHSh+t+r-IHbi kri na te yul 'di'i lo thog la bdud phrom/ kar phrom/ shU ti phrom/ yug ti smin/ shar shar drag tu phob/ dz+wa la ti rA hu la/ a kro te ka phob/ shar

shar ta phob hUM phaT/ tsa ra mu le/ ag ne rag mo ko ra te swA hA/ rkyang rje rkyang mo tsu ru tsu ru hUM phaT/ ho ho phrom mu+u ra mu+u ra sha ru ru phrom/ gang gi thig nig btags nas kyang// de la sham bu 'di yang
gdags/ ma mo sing ga ye/ ma mo bya tsa ye/ ma mo tsit+ta ye/ ma mo srog tsa ye/ dgra bo'i lo thog snar mo la mA ra ya hUM phaT/ snying po sngags kyi bar bar du// mchod cing gtor ma dbul bar
bya// rab bsgral thabs kyis thugs dam bskang// thon nas gnam gzer ri la bya// dkar thab dmar thab sngo thab gsum// gcig tu dril la bzhi ru bya// dmar ring zor ni phyogs
su 'phangs// gong gi sngags bzlas mdzub ris bya// nyi shu dgu la 'joms par 'gyur// yang na chu skyes rdzogs pa la// khyab 'jug gtor ma rtag tu gtang// ba phur btab la gsad las
bya// bar bar lha lnga dbye bar bya// de ltar byas na rab 'bring gi/ gnam lcags lce dang dmu rdo dang// chu 'khyags khrag tu dbab par bya// de la 'di'i las ni dus gang yang rung bar yang/ khrag
dang gu gul dang lcags zangs kyi phye ma rnams la sngags la yul gang yang rung ba de'i lha rten nam chu mig tu sbas na/ yul de rlung gis khyer te 'gro bar 'gyur ro// yang rdzas de rnams la bzlas
te ri lu byas nas dgra'i khang thog tu bskyur na/ khang pa rdib par 'gyur ro// yang de rnams la brjod nas chu mig kha byang du bltas par sbas nas gang ltar drangs pas/ shwa ser 'ong ngo// srin rdo
dang 'khar ba chags pa la bzlas nas khyab 'jug rgyu ba'i dus su brag kha byang du bltas par sbas na/ thog drag po 'bebs par 'gyur ro// 'bru sna tshogs pa dang/ 'brug gi rus pa
dang chu srin gyi sder mo la bzlas nas 'og tu sbas nas phyogs su gtor na/ ser ba drag tu 'bebs par 'gyur ro// ka ka na se dang/ khyi nag po'i mche ba la sngags nas dgra phyogs su gtor na
skrang nad du 'gyur/ de la sogs te las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// ser ba bzlog pa dang/ shwa bzlog pa yang de dang 'dra ste/ nyung dkar la sngags nas gtor na bzlog par 'gyur/ mang
ga ya ti ma ga ti'i bye ma yang la brjod nas gtor na thog bzlog par 'gyur ro// gshin rje zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ chu 'khyags drag tu dbab pa gza'i drag sngags gsang bsgrub kyi skabs te le'u
nga drug pa'o//// yang de nas 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po khrag 'thung chen po ya mAn+ta ka la ngan sngags kyi bdag mo bzhis phyi nang gsang ba gsum gyi mchod pas mchod de/ bskor ba lan du
mas bskor te/ brkyang phyag tu btsal nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag rnams kyis khas blangs pa'i// g.yal thog nag po'i las 'di dag/ snying po'i mchog tu gyur pa dang// yang zhun
lta bur dril ba'i don// dpa' bo lha rjes bshad du gsol// zhes zhus so// de nas 'jigs byed chen pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin pa dang// mkha' 'gro rak+sha gdong
bzhi nyon// dkon mchog rgyal mtshan ltar byed cing// rnal 'byor can la phan bya'i phyir// 'phrul gyi skying thang 'khor lo dang// drag po sngags kyi rim pa 'di// bshad nas bstan pa yun du
srungs// zhes bka' stsal to// de nas 'khor rnams 'dun par gyur to// oM ma ma rag mo snying sha la b+h+yo/ ma ma rag mo rag mo/ ru ru ro ru tsa pa la/ dgra bo'i snying kha rag ma b+h+yo/ ma ma

rag mo rag mo trag mo trag mo shig shig snying khar b+h+yo/ ma ma rag mo tsa ba mo khra la mu sha ma b+h+yo// rak+sha snying rtsa ru ru tsa ba/ snying kha rag 'gu si nan ma shag mu shag ma ma b+h+yo/ thig nig tsu ru tsu ru phaT/ ha

phrom mu sha ru ru phroM dud phroM kar phroM shu ti phroM/ ya ma snying ma ma khrag rag mo yag mo ru ru tsa pa mo rag mo sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ ya ma snying ya ma khrag rA hu la pa sha mu ge ti du mA ra ya sha na dza la ti a tsi

ti swA hA/ hUM dza dza/ ya ma snying ya ma khra rA hu la hril hril shag shag sen sen sa ma ya b+h+yo/ hril phroM phaT/ ya ma snying ya ma khrag ke ta ke ta drag po phob phob/ rag mo rag mo ma ma oM ke ta ke ta nA ga

ke na tshe lus hril phroM shar b+h+yo/ phrab tse phrab tse dan ta phab phab tse la rag hril b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ma ma ri la sha ta trag ru tsa shu ti phroM tsa mu shu dud phroM sa ma ya a ka ra du ru phroM phaT/ de nas sde

brgyad kyis nye ba'i grogs bya ba bstan pa'i phyir yang gsungs pa/ nA ga sha sha nA ga le dum pa le/ su badzra yak+sha ga te badzra badzra yak+sha phroM/ ya mAn+ta ka phroM ru ti traM b+h+yo/ na ra si ya phroM ru tri traM b+h+yo/ ma hA de

ba phroM ru ti traM b+h+yo/ rak+sha phroM ru ti traM b+h+yo// yak+sha phroM ru ti traM b+h+yo/ badzra sA d+hu a tri sems pa phroM ru ti traM b+h+yo/ trag rak+sha kha mun tra phroM ru ti traM b+h+yo/ su badzra yak+sha ga ti phroM ru ti traM b+h+yo/ 'gu sid nam a tsu sma sha ma

ma rag ma kham khas rak+sha ma phroM phroM phroM/ rak+sha rak+sha tsag shu tsag shu+u dam nyams lo la 'ur 'ur chem chem yaM yaM rbad rbad che ge mo la b+h+yo b+h+yo/ oM trag rag mo ril shag rbad/ sen hril shar shag a sa le

ma b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu ma ma trag shag shad hril shar shar b+h+yo/ pa shang mi ki rA hu la hUM shag shag hril hril b+h+yo/ oM ma sen dam sen khrag la ma sha rubs rubs/ oM raM laM shag hril raM shar shar b+h+yo/ oM

ya ma ra tsa yaM raM hril shar shar raM/ shar shar raM nA ga hril hril sen shag sa tu sa ma ya hril b+h+yo/ oM ya ma snying ya ma rag mo yag mo// trag rak+sha mo khrag la mu sha b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu rngubs rngubs a sa

me phra me sha pa sha me ge dud mA ra ya shi dz+wa la ti ge a tsi ta rA hu la hUM dza dza/ oM 'gud b+hi so lu ru hril yag ma skya phaM tsa ru+u da ri hUM phaT/ oM ya ma trag kha do li shar ma da dug kyugs hril phroM da su+u da ri

hUM phaT/ bir+ya ma ra ga 'da' gaM ga ka li ur pha nud pa ra ta swA hA/ ha baM hril shar thuM hril/ nyog 'dril phroM che ge mo'i lo thog 'ur 'ur chem chem rbad yaM yaM/ phroM phob phob drag ser phob b+h+yo/ hUM yak+sha

de ba ra tsa swA hA/ haM kra shwa na ga gur swA hA/ hUM hUM ma ra tsa hUM/ oM a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka ha na ma tha b+hany+dza hUM/ oM be tA li rak+sha yak+sha man swA hA/ rin chen sngags kyi phreng ba ni// rtsa ba bskyed dang bzlas
pa'i don// bkru dang dkrugs dang brdeg pa yis// gsad gsod dbab bsrung don rnams ni// the tshom med par len par gsungs// zhes bka' stsal to// de nas yang 'jigs byed chen po khrag
'thung gi rgyal pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rdzas dang las rim 'phen pa yi// ting 'dzin rnal 'byor can gyi don du bshad// ces gsungs so// ngam ri srin brag khrag gi mchi ris
can// yang na seng ge mchong pa lta bu'o// yang gsungs pa// 'khor lo'i yi ge'i ga'u+u 'am// bsnyen pa las kyi bca' gzhi nyid// yan lag rdzogs nas 'dod pa'i dkyil du gzhag/ rdzas bstan
pa'i phyir bka' stsal pa/ ting 'dzin stobs su 'gyur ba'i phyir// rten rdzas sku gzugs legs par bsham// snying po sngags dang mtshan ma gzhag/ mthun pa'i rdzas bskyed skor te
gzhag/ rtags dang ldan par bsnyen pa bya// zhes bka' stsal to// mon nam gcan gzan rabs chad thod pa ru// stag dom ba glang nya yi snying// seng ge khra dang bya rog pha wang dang// na byi ma
rnams kun gyi dwangs ma lnga// thod pa'i nang du mthun rdzas bsogs// ces gsungs so// de nas yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'bru sna khrag sna tshogs pa la// gtor ma sman dang chang gis
sbyangs te rgyas par bsham/ zhes gsungs so// ka ro lha bshos zur gsum la// gro ni rgyas pa'i rim par shes// 'bras dmar zla gam ril dmar zlum// zhes gsungs so// stag dang glang dang
seng ge dom// bag phye ru tse la sogs gzugs byas la// rang rang sha khrag rdzogs byas chod// ces gsungs so// gzhan yang g.yal thog chu la dgra yul rdo gsum rdzing// yul lha gtan gyi sa yi
rten byas te// ji ltar 'dod pa'i dbyibs dang kha dog bsgyur// de nas thun gyi thod par gzhug/ st-i phroM byol thog sbyor ba ni// me lce lta bu'i rim pa ste// dbyibs dang kha dog rim pa ni// 'dod
pa'i kha dog ji lta bar// ni raM su yi thal bar bsgyur// nag po'i kha dog rjes su bya// mthun pa'i ga'ur rgya yis gdab// ces gsungs so// de nas yang lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol
to// rim pa las kyi gzhung bsgrub pa// 'jigs byed chen pos bshad du gsol// 'jigs byed chen pos bka' stsal pa// dang po rgyun la gnyis par sbyar// gsum pas dril la bzhi pas yul du
bskyal// sku gsung thugs kyi bsnyen pa ni// rim pa bzhin du ma nor bzlas// so so'i rtags ldan las la sbyar bar bya// rtags gsum ldan pas yul du bskyal bya'o// de la las kyi bya ba

ni// khyab 'jug rgyu ba'i dus su ste// rtag tu rgyu dang dus su rgyu/ khyad par rnam pa gnyis su bstan// dus su rgyu ba rnam pa brgyad// rtag tu rgyu ba'i rim pa ni// tsan+d+ra bcu gnyis mtshan ma ni// yar

la tshes la mar la bri// tshes gcig snga dro byang nas lho// gnyis pa nyi ma nub nas byang nub byang nas shar lho/ gsum la nyin phyed nub nas shar// bzhi la lho nub nas nub byang/ lnga la nyi ma phyed
yol la lho nas byang/ drug la tho rangs lho shar nas nub byang/ bdun la nam phyed shar nas nub/ brgyad la nyi ma smyur la byang shar nas lho nub/ dgu la skya rengs shar nas byang nas lhor/ bcu
la nyi ma phyed nas lho nas byang/ bcu gcig nyi ma nub la nub nas shar du/ bcu gnyis tho rangs lho nub nas byang shar du/ bcu gsum nam gyi 'jing lho nas byang du/ bcu bzhi nam
phyed lho shar nas nub byang du/ bco lnga nyi phyed shar nas nub tu/ mar gyi gcig nas bstan pa ni/ gcig la nyi ma dros nas byang shar nas lho/ gnyis la nyi ma shar nas byang nas lho// gsum la skya
rengs shar nas nub byang nas shar lho/ bzhi la nam phyed nas nub nas shar du/ lnga la nyi ma dros nas lho nub nas byang shar du/ drug la nam phyed nas lho nas byang du/ bdun la nyi myur lho shar
nas nub byang du/ brgyad la tho rangs shar nas nub tu/ dgu la nyi phyed byang shar nas lho nub tu/ bcu la nyi phyed byang nas nub tu rgyu/ bcu gcig nyi nub nub byang nas shar lhor/ bcu gnyis srod

la nub nas shar du rgyu/ bcu gsum nyi phyaid lho nub nub nas byang shar du/ bcu bzhi skya rengs shar nas lho nas byang du rgyu/ bco lnga nam phyed yol nas lho shar nas nub byang du rgyu/ rtag tu rgyu ba'i
rim pa ste// 'di ni phung byed gza' yi las// zhes gsungs so// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ gnam lcags thog 'bebs kyi skabs de le'u nga bdun pa'o//// de nas yang gsang
ba'i bdag po ya ma lag na rdo rjes/ 'jigs byed chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to// lnga brgya dus kyi tha ma la// dus gsum khyed kyi bstan pa la// urmo rgod kyi drag po'i sngags// gsad gso
dbab bcad rgod kyi don// 'jigs byed chen pos bshad du gsol// zhes glengs so// 'jigs byed chen pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig zung zhig rdo rje 'dzin// ngas gsungs pa la sems thud
cig/ dur khrod gsar rnying ro yi gnas/ rgya mtsho'i gling dang brag nag khrag gi mchi ris can// srin mo ral pa bsigs pa 'dra// mkha' 'gro khyab 'jug gnas yin te// sngon du bya ba'i las zin
nas// mthing nag gru gsum dkyil 'khor la// zla gam gsum la lha gsum ste// dbus su 'jigs byed chen po'o// g.yas su sgrol byed g.yon du sbyor ba yum// mdun du ya ma rA dza'o// mdun
du yab yum rten rdzas dgod// sha khrag sna tshogs gtor ma la// rak+ta sna tshogs ban d+har bskyil/ mon nam rabs chad thod pa ru// ra rog snying dang bdud rtsi lnga// sha rus nya rul nya yi snying/

khrag sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa bsham// mthing nag dar gyis kha gcad do// snel gri'i thod pa lcang lo can// gru gsum rtsid mgo rtsa lnga lon pa'i khrag/ lug nag snying dang ne'u le su tra'i snying// bya
nag snying dang dwangs ma kun kyang gzhug/ gzhan yang sha khrag sna tshogs sbyar// zhing lpags kha bcad mchod pa'i rdzas su gzhag/ nag po mon gyi thod pa ru// ra dmar sha khrag dwangs

ma lnga// sna tshogs sha khrag mchod pa bsham// rgya phor dmar po rtsi ldan du// 'o ma sbrang rtsi mngar gsum dang// bdud rtsi lnga dang sman lnga dang// zhun mar bsres la mchod pa'o// gsad pa thun gyi

rdzas rnams ni// lcags phye zangs phye rdo phye dang// nyung nag bsres pa drag po'i thun// ske tshe khrag skam nyung dkar gsod pa'i thun// rtsang dang nyung nag khrag skam drag po'i thun// skur bskyed drag
po'i phur pa ni// skyer ldan mon pa'i phur pa bya// seng lding bal mo'i sku ru bskyed// mchog gi phur pa mon mo'o// rab gnas nus pa ldan pas bya// ling+ga bca' ba'i rim pa ni// dri ma gsum
dang sa gsum la// chu gsum dri ngas spru bar bya// mtshan nyid ldan pa'i gzugs byas la// 'brub khung nang du gan rkyal gzhag/ yugs sa mo'am bam gyi skra bkal la// sngon dmar gsum las
phyin ka bkal// zhing gi rgyus pa'i skud pa gsum// lte ba snying ga ske nas gdags// phur pa gsum la brtod la gzhag/ dmigs pa'i rten du ra rog bca'// ske ru gzas pa'i ming byang
gdags// rtags byung las rnams rdzogs par bya// mnan sa drug tu nges par mnan// ri rab rgya gram steng gnas te// don yod grub pa'i pho brang bca'// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang lag
na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma'o 'jigs byed chen po lags// bstan pa yun du gnas bya'i phyir// drag po'i dpal thog bshad du gsol// zhes gsungs so// de nas bka' stsal pa/
drag po'i las kyi gnad bya na// mon nam rabs chad thod pa ru// mchod pa'i rdzas rnams kun bsdus te// sngags rnams rdzogs par thod par bri// 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor pho brang bca'// thod
pa'i nang du dpal thog gzugs// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bca'// mon mo'i phur pas pho brang bzung// skyer pa'i phur pas yul lha gzir// seng ldeng phur pas bar gzer bya// bsnyen
sngags thun sngags bris la gdags// zor dang me chu 'bebs pa'i dus// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang 'jigs byed kyi rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin pa

khyod// ngas gsungs pa la sems thud cig/ drag po sngags kyi phreng ba ni// me lce lta bur rab tu bstan// bi snum ma su ri co tor// rA hu la tri ga tsi shu+u tshil ma khug ra ga ra ti thang thang hUM/ a kro te
ka hi/ ha sha ru ma ma zang ka la phaT/ rbad dzA dzA/ oM a kro ni pa la ba sha ru si kA la shag su ba ti rbad phaT/ nan bzlog bzlog b+h+yo b+h+yo/ dang sha pa la a kro ru lu rbad/ pu thum ril ta

ta ma grang kring dud phroM rbad rbad/ tsha ba ni rA hu la phob phob/ khro ti kro la sha ra tsa thal ma ni/ hu ru hu ru/ ma ma raM ril ril phob/ ga she rag she lta nA ga phroM/ du+u la na la du+u la na la chem chem phob/ ta

ki tsa ti sa ni phob phob/ bi ki ni/ khu li mA ra ya rbad thuM ril/ ya ba smi ku ba she na rbad gug ril thums rbad bu shag/ su ti na be tshil ma su kri rbad nyongs thums ril rbad// he ba ti sa kang ha ra

ting shed za so na ma las la thun rbad/ hri shag ru trag ra ma ni keM kre ma ma yoM za 'gram ha he yo ki she la dza dza/ 'di ni ye shes rdo rje ste// rdo rje pha lam lta bur rdug pa med// sems dpa' rdo rje khyod
kyis gzung bar bya'o// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ drag po las rgod kyi skabs te le'u nga brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po
gshin rje gshed pos/ 'jig rten khams su thog dbab pa'i phyir lha dbang phyug chen po phyi ltar bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// lhor bltas brag chen seng ge mchongs pa 'dra// yang na a dmar ya yang
lo ma 'dra ba'am// dur khrod la sogs dgon pa'i gnas dag tu// rnal 'byor goms pas yo byad ldan byas te// 'phags pa la sogs mchod cing gtor ma gtang// dra bying gtsang ma mda' gang
gru bzhi la// mtshal lam ldong ros dag gis thig btab ste// le'u tse dgu pa dag gi tshad du bya// dbus su ga pur dag gis chus bkrus la// dar ram ras sam dkar la 'jam pa la// lha chen
dbang phyug dag gi gzugs bris te// smyug ma gtsang ma dag la dgod par bya// steng nas dmar po dar gyi gdugs kyis dgab// de yi mtshams bzhir ljang dgu'i 'phan bzhi gzugs// phyogs
bzhi'i le'u tshe bzhi po dag la yang// lha yi blon po bzhi yi gzugs bris dgod// shar du dri za'i lha nyid dgod par bya// lho ru gshin rje nub tu klu gdon lha// byang du gnod sbyin lha ste bzhi po

dgod// de yi phyi rim me tog sna tshogs bskor// mchod pa lnga dang gtor ma gcig/ nang du rta tshil khrag dang snying yang stsal// snying gi srog rtsar dmigs pa'i ming rus bri// khre'u cu rtse dag la dgra
gzugs bya// snying gar thig le'i dkyil du ming rus gzug/ ske nas sngon dmar skud pas gdags byas te// lag pa g.yas kyi srin lag rtse la dgal// chas gos ljang nag mgo la thod nag
bcing// dur khrod ras sam bram ze'i pags pa la// ldong ros chu rtsas kha dog ser por bsgyur// dug dang khrag gis 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bri// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la gshin rje'i
snying po bri// dbus kyi lte bar lha chen snying po dgod// phyi rim thog gi dbab sngags dag gis bskor// 'khor lo mnga' gsol dbang bskur smon lam gdab// bram ze la sogs mdze can thod
par gzhug/ de yi nang du gser dang lcags zangs dang// dngul dang snying sna khrag sna mang blugs te// le'u tse'i dbus su man 'dzi'i kha la bzhag/ ting 'dzin rnam gsum rim gyis tshul bzhin
bskyed// dbang chen rim brtsegs steng du b+h+rUM gcig bsam// b+h+rUM las 'bar ba'i lha yi gzhal med khang// phyi dang nang med kun tu gsal bar bskyed// dbus su ma he bam ched bsnol ba la// nyi
zla 'khor lo rab tu 'bar ba'i steng// ya las 'jam dpal gshed po 'bar ba'i sku// zhal drug phyag kyang bcu gnyis gsal bar bskyed// de yi 'khor na lha yi tshogs gnas te// ma hA de ba hUM
zhes brjod pa yis// dbus su lha chen ma hA de ba yang// sku mdog nag po spyan gsum mche ba can// rtse gsum 'bar ba khyung gi rgyal mtshan g.yas// zhags pa be con rdo rje g.yon pa na// smin
mtshams glog 'gyu bskal pa'i thog 'bebs bsgom// 'khor gyi lha yang rta zhon thogs 'bebs pa'o// de bzhin ting nge 'dzin gyis gsal bsgom la// gshin rje gshed pos lus bsrung dbang du
bsdu// hUM/ las rnams rim gyis bgrod pa'i yang rtse nas// smon lam dbang gis bstan pa 'phel mdzad cing// ma hA de ba lha chen dbang phyug gtso// bstan pa bshigs pa'i dgra rnams bsgral ba
dang// sangs rgyas bstan bsrung dkon mchog bstod pa'i phyir// 'khor bcas ma lus gshegs su gsol// oM pra ma na rag sha e h+ya hi dzaH hUM baM hoH dga' zhing gus pa'i thal sbyar pus
btsugs nas// lha mchog khyed kyi yon tan rab brjod cing// tsam pa ka dang pad+mas rab gtor nas// deng 'dir bstod de khyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ khyed kyi thugs ni nam mkha'i dkyil 'dra
zhing// 'od zer cha las 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// thogs med mkha' lding ngang pa'i gdan stengs su// brtan par bzhugs nas bdag la dngos grub gsol// 'khor gyi lha chen mi bzad thog
'bebs bzhi// shugs kyi thogs med rta mchog gdan la bzhugs// ma hA de wa pra man tsar zhi sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan// lha yul gtsang ma dag la rab bshams te// bram ze mtshan ldan chags pas
rab tu mchod// 'bras dang ku sha bcas pa'i yon chab dang// ga bur gur gum gla rtsi ce pog sogs// til mar bsung can rab gsal mar me'i mchog/ du ru ka la sogs pa dri yi
chu// lag pan mar dang bcas pa'i bu ram bshos// dung dang bye ru zangs dang kra shel dang// rnga ting rdza rnga mun dza ti mi li// cha lang pi wang tam bu rgyud gcig pa// glu gar rtsed 'jo rol mo dag
la sogs// bde ba'i yo byad thams cad ma lus kun// mchod par 'bul lo thugs rjes bzhes su gsol/ oM sarba pU dza pUSh+pe d+hu?pe A lo ke gan+d+he ba liM pU dza hoH sku mdog nag po spyan gsum che ba
gtsigs// drang srong cha lugs pad+ma'i phreng bas brgyan// zhal bzhi gling bzhi yongs la khyab par gzigs// snyan pa'i dril sgra gsung gi gdangs skad can// dbang phyug chen po khyed la phyag 'tshal
bstod// 'khor gyi lha yi blon po bzhi// rta la zhon nas ral gri bskor// thog ser 'bebs pa'i las la brtson/ khyod la bdag cag bstod phyag 'tshal// sngags 'dis lha rnams rab tu

bsnyen// oM ma hA de wa ti dza ti dza laM pra ma na pra ma na rak+sha kang kang la yang hUM/ de ba rA tsa dza ma hA ni dgra bo che ge mo ni thum thum rbad// shag len se na se na yang/ pa na dzaH dzaHhUM hUM/ de skad bstod
la bsnyen pa bgyi// rang gis ma nyes dpang yang gzug/ nyes byas bris sku'i mdun du bshags// 'o dod 'bod cing g.yab 'dor bya// gshed po bstod la lha rnams bskul// g.yas nas bskor
zhing thugs dam bskul// 'dod khams nyi shu'i yang rtse nas// gzugs khams lha yi dga' tshal nas// pho brang bde ba'i gzhal yas nas// chos kyi rgyal mtshan dbang bskur ba'i// lha chen dbang
phyug chen po ni// sku ni dmar ser 'bar ba la// tshad med dbu bzhi gling bzhi 'joms// g.yas kyi pad+ma skyon dang bral// tha mas bgrang phreng rigs sngags spel// g.yon gyi gun+d+hes dgos 'dod
skong// tha ma blug rlung yang snod dgra bgegs sbyong// ngang pas bsam par yud kyis phyin// pad+ma ser pos brgyan byas nas// ras kyi kha tshar mgul rgyan can// thugs dam drag tu bskul byas
nas// log pa'i dgra bgegs 'joms pa'i tshe// sku ni sngo nag chen po la// zhal gyi mche ba gdangs pa yis// dgra bo bdun rgyud rtsad nas gcod// smin mtshams glog 'gyu thog chen
'bebs// thal mo brdab pas thog chen 'bebs// mdzub mo bskul bas gling bzhi 'khrugs// ljags brkyang srid pa g.yo bar mdzad// dkon mchog gsum gyi sku dgra 'di// thog chen 'bar
bas lnga phung shig/ tshe srog chod la bdun rgyud chod// 'khor gyi blon bzhi las la bskul/ bar snang thog chen 'brul du chug/ dbang po rnam lnga kha long kha// bu smad 'khor g.yog nor
phyugs la// gser thog lcags thog tsa la la// 'khor lo'i bro brdung 'u ru ru// zangs thog 'khar thog rams se ram// me 'od glog dmar khyugs se khyug/ 'khor rnams shugs chen rta zhon
cing// ral gri me 'od klad la bskor// ki kang gshed bzhi'i las la 'gyed// ral gri bskor ba'i 'od 'phros pas// thog chen sna tshogs skar ltar 'khrugs// nyams pa'i dgra la thog mda'
yA// skad cig tsam la phung bar gyis// zhes rta snying bstab cing rak+ta sbreng// rtags su 'brug dang ser ba dang// glog dang thog dang shwa bud 'ong// grub pa'i rtags byung thog gta' gzhug/ mkhar
rmang lha rten chu mig gam// mchod rten lha khang 'gram 'og tu// lhag par dgra yi gro ga 'am// nyal ba'i sngas sam stan 'og tu// 'khor lo bcas pa'i thod pa sba// drag sngags 'di bzlas thod
par gsib// oM sa ma dur bu rak+sha pra ma Na/ ma hA de wa dgra yi yul khams su/ ro kha du kha la hUM phra ba swA hA/ zhes pa ni thod pa'i nang du bzlas/ gtor ma gtong zhing smon lam gdab// bris
sku dag la rten bcas la// dra phying man+Dal dag la dril// rtag tu lha rnams mchod gyur na// yid la ci bsam 'grub par 'gyur// gshin rje zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ 'jig rten du thog
dbab pa lha'i zla gsang skabs te le'u nga dgu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po gshin rje gshed pos 'gal byed cham la dbab pa'i slad du/ thog 'bebs lha yi
nang bsgrub gsungs// srid par ma srid mgar gyis ma brdungs mtshon// ye srid byang chub sems kyi dpal ngar can// rlung gis ma blud gshags pa'i ngar// ye blud chen po'i mtshon dbal ngar
can des// 'byung ba gzhan gyis mi brdzi mi tshugs shing// nyid kyis gang la thogs chag med par 'joms// de nyid bsgrub phyir dur khrod la sogs su// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi
la// dbus su gru gsum e brtsigs te// 'khor lo bzhi dang rol mtsho bdun// gser ri'i dbus su ya mAn+ta ka ste// steng du lha chen dbang phyug yab yum dgod par bya// 'khor lo bzhi la lha yi

blon po bzhi/ khrag zhag mar khu chang dang sprang rtsi 'o ma dang// rgya mtsho'i chu la sogs pa'i mtsho bdun no// lha chen lnga la phur pa lnga dgod de// dngul gyi phur la sor brgyad shar du dgod// dri za lha
yi blon por mnga' yang gsol// gser gyi phur pa lho yi rtsibs la dgod// gshin rje lha yi blon por mnga' yang gsol// zangs kyi phur pa nub kyi rtsibs la dgod// klu dbang lha
yi blon por mnga' yang gsol// lcags kyi phur pa byang gi rtsibs la dgod// gnod sbyin lha yi blon por mnga' yang gsol// 'khar ba'i phur pa dbus kyi e la dgod// dbang phyug chen po ma hA
de bar mnga' yang gsol// gro ga shing shun ras sam dar dkar la// lha rnams rang rang rtsa ba'i snying po dang// dbab pa'i sngags dang dmigs pa'i yul ming bri// sngon dmar skud pas phur pa'i
mgul du gdags// rabs chad nag po'i thod pa kha sbyar la// thod pa'i phyi nang med par khrag gis byug/ steng gi thod pa yab tu mnga' yang gsol// 'og gi thod pa yum du mnga' yang
gsol// thod pa steng mar yab kyi sku yang bri// thod pa 'og mar yum gyi sku yang bri// thod pa'i rtsibs rim dmigs pa'i ming rus bri// dpral bar rus bri kha ru ming yang bri// snying gar nr-i bri
'doms su bla dag bri// de yi tha mar ltau sbyar dza yis bskor// gro ga shing shun zhing gi pags pa la// dgra bo'i gzugs bris dbang phyug yum la glan// 'khar ba'i phur pa thod pa'i nang du
gzhag/ gro ga shog shog shing gi lo ma la// lha chen tshogs bdag dbang phyug chen po khyod/ khyod kyi btsun mo mA ra ya 'dis sbyar// 'khor gyi lha rnams myur du bskul mdzod la// 'di la drag
po'i thog chen phob ces bri// phur pa de yi mgul du gdags par bya'o// thod pa'i nang du dme khrag skam po dang// gser phye zangs phye lcags phye 'khar phye dang// dngul dang thog lcags thog grir
shi ba yi// snying dang rus pa sha yang stsal// thod pa kha sbyar mi yi rgyu mas bcings// sgyed gsum kha la gru gsum steng du gzhag/ chu skyes me tog sna tshogs dang// rin chen sna lnga sman rnams
dang// 'dod pa'i longs spyod zas rnams dang// rgun chang sbrang dang 'bras chang dang// 'bru chang dang ni a su sha/ de dag mchod pa'i rdzas su dgram// sna tshogs snying dang khrag tu sbyar// bu ram
'bras kyi gtor ma bzhi// lha yi blon po bzhi la dgod// ling+ga ji ltar 'dod pa'i dbyibs// gzugs ming byas pa mdun du gzhag/ sngags kyis brab cing gsang las bya// ting 'dzin gzhal yas
gdan dang bcas pa bskyed// ya mAn+ta ka gsal bar bsgom// gdan du yi dwags gding bar bya// dbang phyug chen po gsal bsgoms te// 'khor gyi lha bzhis bskor bar bsam// oM ma hA de ba
kA la hUM/ zhes brjod dbang phyug chen po yang// nag po chen po mche ba rab tu gtsigs// phyag mtshan rtse gsum khyung gi rgyal mtshan g.yas// zhags pas 'dren tshun be con rdeg tshul
g.yon// chibs su 'brug rta sngon po chibs// gser gyi ral gri 'bar ba klad la bskor// gnam lcags 'bar ba'i shang lang glo la btags// de 'dra rab tu gsal bsgom bya// shar phyogs lha
yi phyag na dngul gyi gzhu bdungs shing// dngul gyi mda' ltong dngul gyi 'khor lo bskor// 'brug rta zhon nas ki kang 'phral la 'jug/ dngul gyi thog 'bebs ser ba'i skyin 'dang gtong// lho
nas gser gyi thog chen gong bzhin 'bebs// nub nas zangs thog byang nas lcags thog 'bebs// de 'dra gang la bsgoms la yengs par mi bya'o// hUM/ rnam snang mdzad nyid mi g.yo gtsug tor
brtan// byang chub chen po mchog gi phyag rgya ni// bdud 'dul chen po'i sku ru sprul pa'i rgya// byang shar mtshams nas shin tu sku bde bstan// me lce bar snang sprin gtibs dkyil 'khor nas// sku
stod sngo nag mi bzad 'bar ba'i 'od phung can// shin tu khro brjid dbang phyug gtum bag che// thugs rjes sprin ltar gtibs shing nam mkha' gang bar khyab// gzir gnon stabs kyis dregs pa
gzir zhing gnon// bdud po nag po spyan gsum mche ba can// bstan pa 'jig pa'i srog la spyan 'dren na// dbang phyug lha chen 'khor bcas gshegs su gsol// dbang phyug chen po gnas
nas spyod tsam na// rtse gsum 'bar ba khyung gi rgyal mtshan phyar te gshegs// zhags pas 'dren cing be con snying la brdeg/ nag po spyan gsum sdang mig bzlog pa'i bdud// dbu skra 'bar ba
phrog gzer ral pa can// sku lus mon pa spyan gsum ser ba 'dril// rno dbal mche ba zla tshes gyen du 'khyil// spyan mig bzlog pas skyi 'dang rma 'dang 'bebs// shangs nas rlung ni 'thor
'bud bu yug 'khrugs// mdung dang gri rkang sku yi rten du bcas// spyan mig mi mthun las kyi zla ba 'dril ba ltar// 'od zer me ltar 'bar zhing gshegs su gsol// e h+ye ma hA kA la tri dza kA

ru ni ka dr-i sh+ya ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dzaH hUM baM hoH hUM/ lha chen dbang phyug 'khor ba'i g.yul bzlog nga// sprul pa'i rlabs chen lha yi dmag dpung sdud// dbang phyug legs ldan nag po'i 'khor gyis
bskor// dbang phyug lha chen sku la phyag 'tshal lo// dbang phyug bsod nams gzi byin 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo// ston pas lung bstan 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo// dbang phyug nyi zla'i 'od
ltar zhal gsal zhing// ma rig sgrib pa ma lus sel mdzad pa'i// 'khor bcas lha yi tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// me tog phreng la sogs pa dang// rin chen dbyig dang sgog btsong
dang// la phug la sogs kun dang ni// 'bras bu yid bzhin sna tshogs zas// phyogs bcu chu skyes dang ni longs spyod rgyan// ris su ma chad mchod pa'i longs spyod dbul// dkyil 'khor mdzes

pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan// zhal zas bdud rtsi dza gad sman gyis mchod// e h+ye hi ma hA kA ru ni ba ti ma hA rak+sha du pa kha kha khA hi/ pra tI ts+tsha/ ma hA be tA lI kha kha khA hi/ hUM/ dbang phyug chen po 'khor
bcas la// mchod sprin la sogs sna tshogs dang// rdzas dang yo byad dpag mi lang// bla med dad pas mchod 'bul bstod// bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar ba'i 'od// gdug pa ril mid mdzad
pa'i khro gnyer can// dug gsum rtsad gcod mche ba gtsigs pa po// ye shes spyan gsum nyi zla'i ga'u la// ston pa'i bka' brgyud bla med lung bstan dpal// dam tshig chos kyi 'khor lo rnam
snang mdzad// bla re cod pan brjid pas bcings pa na// nges par ston pa bcu yi bdag pos 'phags// rtag tu dur khrod 'bar ba'i gnas na bzhugs// dur khrod gnas na ma mo'i tshogs kyis
bskor// nad gtong shrI'i tshogs rnams kun mchod nas// bstan pa bshigs pa'i mdangs 'phrog thal ba'i rdul du rlog/ stobs chen glang po'i pags pa gos su gyon// lha klu gnyan gyi grong
khyer thams cad du// lha chen bdud dpung che btsan gsum pa nas// log 'dren dgra bgegs gzir gdul gnon pa'o// dpa' bo chen po stag gi pags pas mtshan// 'khor du lha yi blon po
bzhi yis bskor// phyogs rnams phyogs cha kun tu rnam grangs la// smon lam khyad par mang po'i mthus sbyangs la// sgyu ma lta bur rnam par thar pas rol// phan mdzad dmag dpon khyod la
yang// sdug bsngal tsha bas gdungs pa'i sems can la// drag po'i thog chen lu gu rgyud du 'bebs// lha chen dbang phyug khyod la bdag bdud skyabs su mchi// sngags 'dis lha rnams srog kyang

bzung// oM ma hA de ba kA la ka sti dza re sde ri i na hrI se ba na dza nA ga ru ru te pe ka na phu pe he serbe da de bu se na de ba te na mA ra ya/ khri tsho re zhing bskul bskyed bstod// 'od dang sgra dang dri zhim
dang// 'brug dang glog dang thog dang shwa// de rnams 'grub pa'i rtags su ste// dbang du bsdu zhing phrin las bcol// thog []tshathugs[]rdzathog bdag bskul zhing rbad// gnam lcags thog chen
'bebs pa'i lha// chibs su 'brug rta sngon po chibs// rol du khyung dang seng ge khrid/ kha rlangs sprin dang na bun gtibs// shangs nas bu yug khu 'phang 'dril// lcags kyi ser
chen ljibs se ljib// shel gyi khu 'phang ri li li// gser thog lcags thog chems se chem// gnam lcags ral gri klad la bskor// gser gyi shang lang glog chen 'khyug/ 'khor gyi lha chen thog
'bebs te// shar phyogs dri za'i zhing khams nas// dri za lha yi blon po yang// dngul gyi gzhu bdungs mda' ltong sta// lag na dngul gyi thog chen 'bebs// dngul gyi thog chen 'u ru ru// ki kang
pho mo khral la 'dzud// thog gser skyi 'dang glo bur 'bebs// de bzhin phyogs kyi blon bzhi bskul// thog gi dbab sngags thod par bstim// 'ur chom rbad nal ram shar shar b+h+yo dza rak+sha tsit+ta mA

ra ya snying ling rbud/ tsit+ta bam ril kha rag tshal pa baM/ rak+sha yak+sha tsit+ta rbad su dza/ 'ur chom rbad nal/ ram shad shad/ rag sha nag po srog la chums chums bob bob nal shig mA ra ya/ de ni
lcags thog dbab pa'o// 'ur chom rbad nal raM raM shad shad de ba srog la chum chum/ rbad rbad 'ur rbad nal shig mA ra ya/ de ni gser thog dbab pa'o// 'ur 'ur chom chom shig shig mA ra ya
ril ril kha la rbad pu dza/ ma hA rA dza kha la rak+sha tsig tsig tsig tsig hril hril bob ya/ de ni zangs thod dbab pa'o// de bzhin thod pa kha sbyar te// dmigs pa'i yul gyi dbus su sba// lcags
phur mkhar gyi rmang du sba// zangs phur yul lha'i rten sar sba// de bzhin sbas nas bab gyur na// sbas pa'i rten sar dus su 'bebs// de la the tshom bag mi bya// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud
las/ thog dbab pa'i lha'i zla gsang gi skabs te le'u drug cu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos bstan pa gnyen po bsrung ba'i phyir/ thog dbab lha'i gsang
bsgrub gsungs pa/ rma bya dag gi rgyal mtshan la// dmigs pa'i ming rus 'og tu gzhug/ smyug rgod rtsang sor bzhi gzhog la// ling+ga dag gi ke ru gdags// phying dkar gtsang ma gru bzhi
gcig/ stegs bu'i steng du bting nas kyang// nas sngon phul gang shar du spung// nub tu til nag phul gang spung// dkyil du rgyal mtshan gzug par bya// nyin mo sngags bzlas nas kyis
brab// nub mo sngags bzlas til gyis brab// sngags rdzogs ri gsum rtser song la// e brkos ming rus nang du gzhug/ rtsang dang mnyam pa'i khung brkos la// dgra la rtse bstan res
mos gzhug/ dbang phyug chen por las bcol la// 'o dod bos te gsad cing gnan// myur du thog chen 'bebs 'dod na// rnam par smin pas shi ba'i mgor// ha la pha la ta ka
dang// de bzhin sna tshogs nyung dkar nag/ zhing chen pags pa mtshan ngan la// yul gyi ming dang brnag pa'i ming// de bzhin bris te der bcug la// spyan drang bzhugs mchod bstim par

bya// drag sngags 'di dag rab tu bzlas// ma hA tsan+Da rak+sha be sha a na ya phob/ ha ra tsan+Da ma hA tsan+Da yak+sha bak+sha phob/ rak+sha ma hA yak+sha b+h+yo/ shar shel ha la ha la dan d+ha pra tse phob/ pra tse pra tse ha ri ha

ri dza tu ti b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ rA ga rak+ta tsin+Da ma hA shag ti nan/ d+ha ra tsan+Da Da pa tsa pa tsa ha la ha la da ra da ra phaT/ rak+ta tsan ti ma hA yak+sha hi b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ badzra tsi ra badzra d+he wa ha na ha na b+h+yo/ gang 'dod gnas
kyi yul lha'i rten// bdun 'bum bzlas bya khru gang gnan// dus min thog chen 'bebs par nges// dung dang a ru dang ni li ga dur rnams la sngags te dgra phyogs su gtor na mdzer 'gyur
ro// bag zan la sems can gyi gzugs ci 'dod pa byas la khrag gis byug nas khang pa'i thog tu gzhag na/ sems can de nyid mang por byas nas khang pa'am zhing gseb tu skad ngan 'dod cing

'ong ngo// sman 'bri ta sa 'dzin dang/ g+hi wang la sngags nas rdza mar blugs na grum grum bu dang grul bum 'dra min mang bu dang srin bur 'gyur ro// phru bar glu+u gsan tshod ma bra mar 'gyur ro// tshon rtsi lnga la
sngags nas khyim du bzhag na byi bas khyim dang zhing ldum ra la za mi nus so// mu tig la sngags nas mid na bud med la bu mang po 'ong bar 'gyur ro// smyag shad la sngags nas dbang phyug chen po
la mchod nas phyugs 'gab nyung ba'i sker btags na 'gab 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rma bya'i rgyal mtshan la sngags nas rtag tu lus la bcangs na mdze 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// dpal zla gsang nag
po'i rgyud las/ 'jig rten khams su thog dbab pa lha'i zla gsang skabs te le'u re gcig pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// bstan
pa gnyen po bsrung ba dang// 'gal ba cham la dbab pa'i phyir// nad ngan bdag mo ma mo'i zla gsang gsungs// dur khrod la sogs dgon pa'i gnas nyid du// sa bdag mnyes bya ma nyes
mkhyen pa gsol// phung ba'i shul nas sa blangs dkyil 'khor brtsigs// mngal khrag rims khrag la sogs chag chag gdab// dug gis dpal bskyed sman gyis dri yang dbyung// dbus su gru
gsum brtsegs ma gting du bru// zla gam dmar po 'khor lo rtsib bzhir ldan// mu khyud zlum po thod pa'i phreng bas bskor// gru chad bar khyams sgo bzhi rigs dang sbyar// gru gsum
rtse drug dpal gyi zhal drug bri// dbus su 'jam dpal yab yum sras bcas dgod// 'khor lo bzhi la phung byed ma bzhi dgod// zla gam gsum la nag mo phung gsum dgod// gru chad bzhi la
srin mo gdong mo bzhi/ rtsibs mchan bzhi la shan pa ma bzhi dgod// bar khyams dag la sa bdag mo bzhi dgod// lcags ri nag po dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad dgod// de ltar lha re phur pa'i
snying po re// dbus su thod pa nag po'i nang dag tu// dgra bo'i ming rus gzugs dang bcas pa gzhug/ 'jam dpal yab yum sras kyi gdan du bting// gru gsum rtse mor rabs chad thod pa
gsum// gcig tu mi rta ra dang khyi yi khrag/ rims khrag la sogs brgya rtsa brgyad du sbyar// btsan dug la sogs brgya rtsa brgyad du sbyar// thod pa gcig tu yungs kar nyung nag dang// ske tshe lan

tshwa thal chen khrag skam sbyar// thod pa gcig tu zangs phye lcags phye dang// rdo phye la sogs mang du sbyar la gzhag/ dug khrag thod pa bal tshon sna lngas bcad// gri mor shi ba'i pags pa'i steng du
yang// ra khrag dug sbyar gru bzhi thig kyang gdab// gong bzhi 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi'i pho brang bcas// gong bzhin bkod lhar rang rang snying po dgod// mthong ngo sor bzhi'i rtsang gi rtse la
brgyang// dkyil 'khor dbus su gur du phub la gzhag/ gtor ma sha chen yod pa bse gab gang// ya mAn+ta ka gshin rje nyid la dbul// g.yas su snel gri mo yi thod pa dum bu lnga pa ru// sgrol
ba'i bdag mo e ka tsa ti la// shes rab mtshal dang snel gri'i snying la brten// g.yon du sbyor bdag nag mo re ti la// yugs mo'i thod par mi dbang sha khrag dang// sman dang snying dang khrag tu

sbyar la gzhag/ zla gam gsum la nag mo phung gsum la// skyes pa dar ma grir shi'i b+han+da ru// glang nag snying dang pad+ma rak+ta dang// sbrul nag snying dang 'ug pa'i mig 'bras dang// phag rog snying
dang bud med klad khrag gzhag/ 'khor lo bzhi la phung byed ma bzhi la// gzhong pa gru gsum nang du yang/ khrag sna gsum dang stag seng glang// sa bdag rgyal po'i snying bzhi gzhag/ rtsibs mchan
bzhi ru shan pa ma bzhi la// mdze mo'i thod pa'i nang dag tu// snying dang khrag gi gtor ma gzhag/ gru chad gdong mo bzhi yi dam rdzas su// yugs sa mo yi ldan phor du// stag dom ban glang gri snying
dang// rang rang khrag tu sbyar la gzhag/ bar khyams bse mo bzhi la yang// ba man rwa'am dung phor du// mar khu sbrang rtsi 'o ma dang/ khrag sna mang po sbyar te gzhag/ de ni bsgrub pa'i
dam rdzas so// de nas dkyil 'khor byang shar du// sman phud rak+tas sbrus pa la// mchod rten mtho gang gru bzhi pa// dur sol nag pos bskus la gzhag/ de bzhin las kun zin pa dang// dug
khrag ming rus bcas pa rnams// mchod rten bum pa'i nang du stsal// lha phyag bya zhing sngags kyang bzlas// mchod rten ma mo brnag pa gsum// chu mig nya lcibs can du sba// ma nyes dpang gzug
mkhyen par gsol// gtor ma btang ba'i dus tshod ni// nang par [na sa] skya rengs shar ba dang// dgong gi dmar thag chad pa la// ma mo'i gtor ma rim par gtang// de bzhin nyid dang
kun tu snang// snang la rang bzhin med pa yi// chu zla'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du bsgom// de bzhin rgyu yi ting nge 'dzin// mthing nag hUM gcig gsal bar bsgom// spro bsdus bde gshegs thugs
dam bskul// 'gro ba'i don byas slar 'dus pas// gser gyi rdo rje rtse lngar gyur// ya mAn+ta ka badzra ma hA kro d+ha zhes brjod pas/ gtum chen ya mAn+ta kar gyur// dbu drug phyag kyang bcu gnyis
pa// rgyan dang cha lugs gsal bar bsgom// g.yas su k+Sha las sgrol bdag mo// e ka dza ti gsal bar bsgom// g.yon du ma las sbyor bdag mo// nag mo re ma ti ru bsgom// yab yum sbyor
ba'i byang sems las// lhag par yi ge ma gsum 'phros// stong gsum mas khyab 'gro don byas// slar 'dus zla gam gsum la babs// yig 'bru gsum gyis dbang bskur te// nag mo phung
gsum gsal bar bsgom// 'khor lo bzhi la phung byed bzhi// rtsibs mchan bzhi la shan pa bzhi// gru chad bzhi la gdong mo bzhi// bar khyams bzhi la bse mo bzhi// lcags ri la yang dbang
phyug ma// sku mdog cha lugs gsal bar bsgom// de bzhin bsgoms pa'i ma rnams la// spyan drangs phyag 'tshal bzhugs mchod dbul// dgyes bstod bcol bskul phrin las bcol// tha ma

las gyi sbyor bas gsad// oM a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka kA la rU pa hUM phaT/ oM sa ma ya shrI many+dzu ya mAn+ta ka ya ma rA dza ma ma e ka tsa ti dza dza/ trag rak+sha kha mun tra mu ru mu ru hUM b+h+yoH rag mo te ke tsa tsha kha

la b+h+yo ru lu ru lu ma ti b+h+yoH/ ru ru ro ru tsa pa la a shug me dza dza/ du ni dun ting du la ya dza dza/ du ru dza la ha na dza dza/ du ma ra he de dza dza/ rus snying khrag kha la rak+sha rbad thuM ri li li/ nr-i sha ku ru rak+ta

kha ram ni/ ku ni ku ru ku ru kham raM rbad thuM ri li li/ snying la rak+sha ni sha sti sta rbad na thuM ri li li/ trag rak+sha mu tra snying kha rag ma b+h+yoH oM ru ru ro ru tsa pa la a shug me b+h+yo/ ma rak+mo rak+mo

snying rtsa la b+h+yo/ rag mo rag mo dgra snying kha rag b+h+yo/ rag mo tsan mo b+h+yo/ khrag la mu sha ma b+h+yo/ ku ma d+ha ri b+h+yo/ k+Shu la d+ha ri b+h+yo/ tsa mun d+ha ri b+h+yo/ kaM ka d+ha ri b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/

b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ de rnams srog gi snying po ste// nyung dkar nyung nag ske tshe dang// rdo phye lcags phyi'i rdzas rnams kyis// stong stong bzlas shing thun la bstim// de
bzhin grub pa'i rtags rnams 'ong// me dang sgra dang du ba dang// rdzas dang 'od dang skad 'don dang// rmi lam rtags dang nyams su ston// gang tshe rtags kyi drod tshad gzung// gang nye dag la

gtor ma gtang/ las dang rbad sngags srog bzhin sbyar/ ya mAn+ta ka ya ma rA dza ma ma e ka tsa ti nr-i dza b+h+yo/ ru ru ro ru tsa pa la a shug me b+h+yo// du ni dun ting du la ya b+h+yo/ ma ru trag rak+sha ma ma b+h+yo/

ma ma ru ru rag mo b+h+yo/ snying kha rak+sha ti sta ma b+h+yo/ rag mo ma mo khong gi snying la ya b+h+yo/ rag mo tsa ba/ khrag la mu sha snying tsa ro ru tsa pa la ma b+h+yo/ snying shig dmar mo dun b+h+yo/ snying tsa la dmar mo dun

b+h+yo/ snying khrag la dmar mo dun b+h+yo/ tsit+ta phyung dmar mo dun b+h+yo/ de ni ma mo'i rbad sngags te// rang rang grub pa'i rtags dang sbyar// de nas gsad pa'i las bya na// rang rang grub pa'i rtags dang
sbyar// ma mos gsod pa'i thun sngags dang// rang rang rims nad dbab pa'i thabs// gshin rje gshed pos dbang bsdus la// e ka tsa tis rgyu gzer dbab// gong gi rdzas blangs sngags 'dis

brdeg/ trag rak+sha kha mun tra ma ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ rag mo te ku+u ma tsa tsa kha la ma ti b+h+yoH/ ru lu ru lu ma ti b+h+yo/ rak+sha thun b+h+yo dza dza/ shi ri thun/ mang sa thun/ d+ha ru la thun/ bi ma ru tse dgra bo la thun

b+h+yo/ phaT phaT/ ru ru bi ma ru tse kha tham ma mo nag mo rtsa la yaM/ srog la thun snying la thibs/ gong gi drag po'i rdzas blangs la// e ka dza tis mdze nad gtong// trag rak+sha kha 'dar kha 'dar so chum
so chum/ nA ga rA dza mag mug sdom/ baM ri li li/ baM ri li li/ dgra bo mA ra ya dza dza/ de bzhin drag po'i rdzas blangs la// re ma ti yis nad ngan dbab// myog myog shig shig tsit+ta bam shig shig
tsit+ta bam/ myog mug ti ri rgyob/ tsit+ta bam phyung/ chod cig thums shig long long thum long/ yer yer/ mer mer sod/ ru ru shi tri kri ma ru sod sod/ srog thum mug sod/ ma ra du rbad ya sod/
kha rug sha sha ma sod/ srog thuM nr-i ni rbad sod/ nr-i ni ya tsa thum sod/ gang grub rtags dang sbyar te gsad// de nas thun dang 'khor lo de// mchod rten bum par stsal bar bya// chu mig
nang gnan dpang yang gzug/ yab yum 'og gi gzugs ming la// rang rang phur pa'i sngags kyis gsad// dkyil 'khor 'brub khung nang du gnan// snying la rten bca' gtor ma
gtang// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ nad ngan dbab pa ma mo'i zla gsang skabs te le'u re gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos 'gal ba cham la dbab
slad du// ma mo stong gi las mkhan ma// nag mo mi pham srid gsum mgon// dpal ldan nag mo re ma ti// nad kyi bdag mo'i zla gsang gsungs// dang por mchod dang sdig bshags
sogs// rim pa ji bzhin stong mthar bsgom// 'byung ba rim lnga'i gzhal yas bskyed// sems kyi rang bzhin gshed po ste// snying las 'phros te spyan drangs te// sbyangs spar rtogs pas gtor ma
brlab// srog gi snying po dbul bar bya// rak+ta'i rgya mtsho de yis brlab// bar du skul tshig gang rung bskul// de nas bsgrub par bya ba ni// dkyil 'khor mthing nag gru gsum la// zla gam
dmar po gsum gyis bskor// gru chad bar khyams sgo bzhir ldan// shin tu drag po'i snod nang du// tsit+ta dang ni rak+ta dang// btsan dug rnams ni blug par bya// nal bu'i sha dang shes rab
mtshal// nal bu'i b+han+da'i nang du blugs// nal bu'i snying la rtag tu bod// bya nag lug nag rten du bca'// nal bu'i gsob la gos la yang rma bya'i mdongs// dar nag 'phur lce btags te
bzung// gtor ma spyan gzigs ldan pas bskang// 'bod pa rbad pa gsad pa'i sngags// nyung dkar nyung nag rdzas rnams la// bdun 'bum grangs ni tshang gyur na// rims nad sna tshogs char

bzhin 'bebs// lha mo srog gi yang tig 'di// snying nas 'dren pa'i mchog yin no// ma ma trag rak+sha snying kha rag tsit+ta srog dung dung dza dza hUM phaT/ ma mo rbad pa'i dgu tig 'di// snying nas 'dren

pa'i mchog yin no// ma raka mo thum ril snying rtsa 'dus/ srog phrig phrig sham sham khyer b+h+yo/ snying khrag rtsa srog breng breng rbad rbad/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la hUM phaT/ ma srog tug tug khrag la snying rbud/ ma

srog thun snying la ma b+h+yo/ mA ra ya ni phaT/ kha thum ni dza dza/ ma mo gsad tig nag mo 'di// rims nad khrag skyugs nad kyis gsod// ma mo rang gi snying khrag gis thum rbad/ thang mu le thang mu le

che ge mo'i tsit+ta la rbad rbad/ tsa thang tsa thang tsa ti tsa ti yang che ge mo'i tsit+ta la rbad rbad/ muM sni muM sni che ge mo'i tsit+ta la rbad nan nan/ rag mo ni rag mo ni kha long tsit+ta rbad/ dug sni dug sni kha

lang tsit+ta rbad/ kyi kha lo kyi kha lo tsit+ta rbad rbad/ swa sti swa sti tsit+ta rbad rbad/ nr-i sti nr-i sti tsit+ta mug mug thuM thuM sub sub ti sta rbad rbad/ kha 'dar yed yed thum thum rbad rbad se kha lo mu kha lo rbad rbad
swA hA// bdag nyid gshin rje gshed por rab bsgom ste/ bdag nyid gshed po'i thugs las ma 'phros te// yi ge mthing nag ma yis stong gsum gang// phar 'phros bde gshegs rnams
kyi thugs dam bskul// slar 'dus sems dpa'i ma la thim par byas// de 'phros man+Dal ma la lhan gyis 'bab// yig 'bru gsum gyis dbang bskur byin rlabs nas// ma las lha mo nyid kyis
skur gyur te// sku mdog nag mo shin tu gtum pa la// shin tu sgeg pa zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa// ral gri b+han+da dmar 'khyil g.yas rim bzhin/ shak+ti tri shUl mgul nas dar dpyangs
g.yon// ral gcig sbreng ba'i lan bu g.yon du 'khyil// skra sked sbrul la thod pa'i phreng thod can// rna ltag me tog dar nag cod pan 'phur// snyan g.yas sbrul gyi gdengs ka yi// mgul nas
sil snyan 'khrol ba la// snyan cha g.yon pa seng ge 'phyo// thod pa skam rlon do shal byas// bong bu gwa pa'i chib la zhon// gzhan yang che ba'i rgyan dang gdug pa'i rgyan// stong gis brgyan pa gsal
bar bsgom// ting 'dzin sems dpa'i sku las 'od zer ni// lcags kyu 'bar ba'i 'od zer phar 'phros te// bdag nyid chen mo'i srog nas rab bskul te// srid pa'i ma mos stong gsum khengs
par byas// gshin rje'i tshogs kyang de bzhin te// srog la rngam pa kun gyis bskor bar bsam// de lta bu ni yang nas yang du ste// de ltar thib thib yod snyam cho 'phrul 'byung// de lta bu yi bar du
bsgom par bya// yengs par gyur na cis kyang mi 'grub bo// gtso mo la sogs srid pa'i ma mo yis// gang la bya ba'i snying nas rab bzung ste// skra grol mig rtsa rig rig 'o dod tse re re// gan
bub rdul zhing kha nas khrag skyugs 'byung// ci mdzad 'on tang zer zhing dbugs dang bral la khad// thun khung nang du rab tu 'jug par bsam// de ltar bsgom la gshed pos dbang du
bsdu// mnyes pa'i tshul gyis bstod pa 'di skad dbul// dpal ldan nag mo mi pham srid gsum mgon// bdag don rnam thar gsum la thugs gzhol yang// snying rje'i dbang gis rjes la thob
pa yi// shes rab sna tshogs dag gis 'gro don mdzad// lha mo sku mdog nag mo char sprin mdog/ mtshan mo nag mo shin tu gtum pa'i sku// shin tu sgaig cing keng rus lus 'chang
ma// zhal gcig phyag bzhi zhabs gnyis rab tu brjid// ral pa gcig sbreng lan bu g.yon du 'khyil// skra sked sbrul la thod pa'i phreng thod can// rna ltag me tog dar nag cod pan 'phur/ khrag
gi chang gis ra ro spyan gsum dmar// mi ro rengs pa khar bcug mche ba bzhi// rnam par gtsigs nas shin tu khrag la dgyes// snyan g.yas sbrul gyi mgul nas dril gsil zhing// gdug pa
btul nas tshangs pa'i sgra sgrogs ma// snyan cha g.yon pa seng ge ral pa dmar// dpa' mo seng ge sgra sgrogs ma// phyag bzhi g.yas kyi dang po ral gri bsnams// 'og ma thod pa b+han+da dmar bskyil
'dzin// g.yon gyi dang po mtshon cha shak+ti bsnams// 'og ma tri shul mgul na dar nag 'phyangs// shag ti ral gri mtshon chas bcad pa yi// lha ma yin la sogs pa'i thod pas do shal
byas// glang po che yi stod g.yogs gos su mdzes// smad ni ban [ba] glang ko bas dkris pa la// phyed ni re lde sngon po'i sham bu can// klu yi dbang po bzhi yis sked bcings can// zhabs
gnyis lcags sgrog dag gis mdzes par brgyan/ khrag zhags thig le mang pos tshom bur bris// bong gwa zhon nas mtshan mo dur khrod rgyu// bong bu'i rmig pa glog gi shugs 'chang ma/ khams gsum
skad cig tsam gyis 'khor bar byed// skad ni dung dang 'brug gi sgra sgrogs shing// ma mo mkha' 'gro sha za dbang du sdud// lho phyogs gshin rje'i pho brang rtag tu gnas// dam pa'i sa nas gzugs
sku gnyis gzigs ma// ting 'dzin dbang thob gzugs khams gnas su byon// tshangs pa'i rgyal po sogs kyis phyag byas ma// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ya thar byon pa'i tshe// dbang phyug chen

po'i sku la dgyes 'khril ba// sum cu rtsa gsum tshar bzhi byon pa'i tshe// lha rnams dbugs phyung brgya byin phyag byas ma// lha ma yin rnams phung bar byed pa'i tshe// lha min rgyal po kun gyis phyag

byas ma// sku mdog ri rab che dang 'gran pa'i tshe// lte ba'i thad ka'i phyogs nas nyi zla 'char// rgyal chen phyogs skyong lha yis phyag byas ma// rgya mtsho'i gting nas me 'bar mtsho skem ma// sa 'og
dbang po kun gyis phyag byas ma// lha mo khyod kyi cho 'phrul skur bstan pas// bdud dang gshin rje'i rgyal po 'dar zhing lud// ma mo mkha' 'gro sha za sngangs shing brgyal// tsit+ta rin chen gur phub
gzhal yas na// nyi zla brtsegs pa'i dkyil 'khor ga bur 'bar// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten drug gi bcud bsdus nas// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dag la thim mdzad ma/ dug gi rlangs
pas nag po'i phyogs rnams kyi// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad ni khong nas bslangs// de phyir nad kyi bdag mo dam la 'du// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten bdud rtsi'i bcud bsdus nas// zla ba'i dkyil
'khor dag la thim mdzad ma// bdud rtsi bslangs pas dkar po'i phyogs rnams kyi// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad ni rtsad nas gcod// de phyir bdud rtsi sman gyi rgyal mo dam la 'du// gang zhig khyod
la dad na ma bas byams// de phyir ma gcig nad 'joms sman gyi gtso// lha mo khyod la rtag tu bdag gis bstod// rgyal ba shAkya thub pa'i spyan snga ru// dus 'dir bdag gis dam bcas ji srid
du// dkar po'i phyogs kyi nad dang sdug bsngal sogs// zhi bar byed cing tshe dang longs spyod sdud// nag po'i tshogs ni dgug cing dbang du sdud// smyo 'bog lkugs pa'i las 'di myur du
bgyi// bstan pa bsrung phyir myur du grub par bgyi// 'di las 'das na rgyal ba'i bka' bslus pas// dus gsum rgyal ba'i rdo rjes mgo dang snying 'gems shog/ de skad rgyal ba'i spyan sngar dam
bcas pa'i// dam bcas bzhin du phrin las myur du gyis// rnal 'byor bdag dang bdag gi 'khor rnams la// khyed kyi zhal nas bdud rtsi'i char phob la// nad sogs sdug bsngal tshogs ni zhi
bar mdzod// tshe dang bsod nams longs spyod 'phel bar mdzod// zang zing longs spyod 'bru yi phung po dang// rin chen rkang 'gros phyugs rnams 'phel bar mdzod// bla ma smod cing dkon
mchog dbu 'phang smod// bdag la dge ba'i bar chad byed pa'i dgra// khyod kyis khong nas dug gi rlung bus la// 'du ba rnam bzhi'i nad ni 'du ru chug/ bag bzhi sa la lhung nas rdebs su
chug/ don snying rnam lnga khong nas khrag skyugs chug/ las ngan 'khor tshogs cho nges brdung du chug/ mkha' lding rgyal po'i tshogs kyis ltas ngan phob// dam bcas bzhin du phrin las myur du grub
par mdzod// ces bstod cing phrin las bcol gyur na// gang 'dod rims nad phyogs su 'bebs// ma mos srog bsdus te gsad par bya'o// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ yams nad
kyi bdag mo ma mo'i zla gsang gi skabs te le'u re gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos 'di skad gsungs so// 'gal ba cham la 'bebs 'dod pas// nad ngan
sna tshogs dbab pa la// ma mo gsang bsgrub zla gsang gsungs// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud dag la// thabs kyi sbyor ba mang yod kyang// bsdu na rnam pa bzhi ru 'dus// bla med bsgrub
mthu rang byung ste// 'jig rten bsgrub pa don gyi mthu// rten 'brel sgyu ma'i sbyor ba bzhin// rdzas kyi nus pa dag las 'byung// gdon dang rdzas su bcas pa las// rnam grangs ma nges khyad par
mang// rnam pa gnyis ni gsal bya ste// rdzas dang gdon du bcas pas bstan// myur du gsad pa'i sbyor ba ni// gang yang 'di las yod ma yin// ma mo nag smug dkar mo dang// dmar mo
tshogs kyi nang dag nas// rims nad gtang ba mang yod kyang// kun gyi phyag brnyan re ma ti// 'di dag bsgrub ste las sbyar na// rims nad gang 'dod stong gsum 'gengs// 'di yi las ni
'di ltar bya// rgyu gzer dag gis shi ba'i khrag/ btsan dug thar nu bsres nas kyang// bse zho dag dang mar du sbyar// sngags 'dis btab te ltor yang gtang// ru ru shi tri kri ma du sod srog thum
mug sod/ ma rag ru rbad ya sod/ ni ya ni ya tsa thun sod/ sha rbud snying phyung/ snying rgyud srog chod/ srog thun dbugs longs/ ma ma thum thum sod sod/ ces 'bum 'bum bzlas te ltor gtang
na/ rgyu gzer khrag tu bshal te 'chi/ de nas yang bse zho dang btsan dug la sngags 'di bzlas/ ru ru ti rbad ya/ ba ya du du rbad ya/ chum chum ni ma tsa rbad ya/ shag pa du du ya chems chems rbad
ya/ rbad su shag rbad ya/ rag thum mugs rbad ya/ ru ru ra pa ni dum ma ti rbad ya/ zhes 'bum bzlas te lus la reg pa'i gos la bskus na lhog pa dkar pos 'chi bar 'gyur ro// de nas yang

bse zho dang btsan dug dang byang ba tsha tshong dang mdze khrag dang mdze pho'i shu ba kun sbyar la mar dang dri ma bsres/ da du+u ma sha khug du sha ma ma bam gol du/ du tri ma ma snying phyung/ sa ma ya ma ma srog

ched/ du shag du ya ma ma ti ru ma ti ya/ sha sha ma ma rbad su ya ya/ nr-i nr-i b+h+yo b+h+yo sod sod/ ma ru ya ma ru ya tshal pa rbad yed yed sha thum sha thum rbad/ tsa dur ma ma du rbad/ sha thum ya ya b+h+yo/ sha sha

tsa thuM ma ya b+h+yo/ zhes khri'am 'bum du bzlas/ sha la reg pa'i gos la bskus na mdze dang phol 'bras kyis 'chi bar 'gyur ro// mdze khrag chang dang sbyar nas ltor btang na snying la babs te rus mdze dang
mdze nad 'thor bas 'chi bar 'gyur ro// de nas yang dug rdzas dang rims khrag sna tshogs sbyar nas gong gi sngags rnams drag tu bzlas te/ yul khams kyi lha rten nam/ chu mig klu
btsan yod nges pa'i sa'am/ brag klu btsan yod pa'i sar gtor na rims nad sna tshogs na bun bzhin gtibs nas 'ong ba dang/ thog mer 'ong ba dang/ ser ba drag tu 'bebs
par 'gyur ro// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ nad ngan sna tshogs gtang ba'i skabs te le'u re bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos 'gal ba cham la
dbab pa'i phyir/ smyo 'bog ging gi zla gsang gsungs// dbang dang dam tshig ldan pa yis// bla ma mnyes pa'i rim gro bya// lta ba yangs shing spyod lam goms// slob dpon mnyes
pa'i thugs gzung nas// man ngag thugs la phur te bsgrub// ri gsum rtse'am brag dkar ram// lha khang dur khrod spe'u dang// yang na brag phug shar bltas su// rtsa na brag yod rtsi shing
skyes// shar du kha bltas zur gsum 'dra// rgyab ri mchad pa seng ge spungs// de ru gnas btsal sa chog bya// sa bdag lha klu zhi ba'i phyir// gser skyems gtang la bden pa bdar// 'di skad
brjod la bsgo bar bya// bdag ming 'di zhes rnal 'byor pas// phyogs 'dir sgrol ba'i ging chen po// srog bdag dkar po snying 'byin zhes// rnal 'byor rnams kyi dgra bla che// rig 'dzin srog
shing 'di bsgrub pas// deng 'dir sa bdag lha klu rnams// gnas gzhan dag tu 'pho bar gyis// sa gzhi 'di yang bkra shis mdzod// ma nyes dpang gzug yus ka gsol// de nas stegs bu
brtsig pa yang// dra phying ras sam dar bting la// nas 'bras 'bru yi gcal yang dgram// ga bur dzA ti pha la dang// rgya spos la sogs dri spos dgram// yol ba bla re 'phan gdugs
bres// srog bdag dkar po snying 'byin ni// ras la bris sam lugs sku gcig/ shar nas nub tu gzigs pa gzhag/ 'bras la sogs pa'i bshos cha la// lha bshos ri rab tshul 'dra bya// de
yi phyogs bzhir mar khus byug/ dbus su smyug ma tshigs gsum la// bya rgod ldem phod za 'og dang// bse dang gser dang byi ru dang// pags blud dkar pos brgyan pa gzug/ gzhan yang sha dang

nya sha dang// thud phrum la sogs spyan gzigs kyis// de yi mtha' ma bskor te dgram// spos dang me tog mar me dang// rnga gling pi wang dung la sogs// sku gzugs de yi mtha' mar gzhag/ tsan+dan dkar po'i

chu la sogs// dur phor 'khar phor bkang ba gnyis// sku gzugs de yi mtha' mar dgram// nyung dkar nyung nag ske tshe yang// drag po sngags kyi mtshon du gzhag/ gzhan yang sgo nga sna tshogs dang/ khur ba'i rnam
grangs mang po dang// sgog pa sman dang dri spos rnams// bris sku de yi mtha' mar dgram// gshin rje gshed po'i skur bsgom la// snying po brgya rtsa brgyad du gdon// oM a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka ha na

ma tha b+hany+dza hUM phaT/ oM kA la rU pa hUM phaT/ oM hrIHSh+t+r-IHbi kr-i ta na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ bdag la byin brlab lus bsrung bya// de nas dbang du gyur pa dang// rgyal po btsun pa'i las bya'o// spyan drang phyag 'tshal

bzhugs su gsol// phyag chab gsol dang gdan skyems drangs// mchod pa 'bul zhing bstod pa bgyi// 'dzab bzlas dam tshig drag tu bsre// rgyal po'i srog snying 'di skad brjod// oM shrI many+dzu ya mA rA dza ma

ma e ka dza ti nr-i dza dza/ tri tsa pa la a shug me swA hA/ zhes ni khri 'bum grangs bsnyen bya// rdzas kyis mchod cing rtag tu bzlas// grub nas sngags 'dis rab tu rbad// ha li hu li bam ril nr-i dza li

pra ma ni/ ri rtse thal ba ni/ kro ti ko la ya/ kro ti ko la sha sha ma tri sha mu tri/ mu ri ni re tri/ tra ram tri/ haM shag haM shag ru/ che ge mo tsit+ta la dza/ de bzhin rgyal po drag tu rbad// gal te las byed ma

btub na// rgyal po shi sa 'di yis bstan// ma ra na pra ma ra tsa tsi ta pa le a li sa ma ya aM gu sha dza dza/ phyag rgya bzhi yis gzugs bcings te// sngags ni brgya rtsa brgyad du brjod// rgyal po rang
la dbang med par// rngul nag khrag tu 'dzag cing 'ong// de bzhin gsad pa'i las thabs kyang// smyo 'bog shi ba'i ldan pher du// de nyid rang gi snying khrag dang// dug sna gsum dang mi khrag
dang// brnag pa'i ming rus bris te gzhug/ dur khrod ro ras rnying pa la// gsod pa'i 'khor lo bca' bar gsungs// dang po nyi ma bzhi pa'i sngags// de yi phyi rim rgyal po'i drag sngags

bri// yang rim klu yi drag sngags bri// thod pa dril la rgya gram bcing// nyin bzhi lha yi ging bzhi bskul// skabs su ging chen bco brgyad bskul// nyi ma bzhi pa'i las kyang bya// oM ma hA rA dza thun

b+h+yo b+h+yo/ dgra bo'i srog la thibs/ mug ma ra na thun/ dgra bo'i snying shag tshal pa dum/ dgra bo'i bkrag la san/ rlag dza ru thibs chug dgra bo'i khrag la 'jib/ b+h+yi ba b+h+yi ba dun dza/ mAM sa la dza/ snying ta
snying ta la dun/ khrag ta khrag la thun b+h+yo thun b+h+yo mug nyung dkar nyung nag ske tshe la// drag tu sngags la brdeg par bya// dkar po gcig gis thugs dam bskang// rtags kyang 'di bzhin
ston par nges// nyi zla 'char dang lder so dang// 'bag tu rmis na tha mar bshad// bcad po zhang blon dge bshes sam// dmag dpon rmis na 'bring du bshad// rgyal po nyid mthong nyams su
ston// de ltar byung na rab tu bshad// bskang bshags bya zhing dngos grub blangs// dam tshig bsre zhing phrin las bcol// de nas 'khor lo thod par bca'// shar du kha bltas chu
mig ngor// rgyal rigs sbyor ba byas gyur na// smyo 'bog mdze dang lhog pas 'chi// thun du 'phangs na mdze rigs 'ong// mkhar rmang mnan na gnam lcags 'bab// dpal zla gsang nag po'i
rgyud las/ rgyal po phyir ltar sgrub pa smyo 'bog gi skabs te le'u re lnga pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos rgyal po nang du bsgrubs te smyo 'bog gtong ba 'di
gsungs so// thog mar bla ma mnyes byas shing// sgrib pa sbyong zhing dam tshig bsrung// mtshan ldan dgon pa'i gnas nyid du// blta ba rgya bskyed 'jam dpal bsnyen// bla ma mnyes pa'i rim gro
bya// dkyil 'khor brtsig dang chag chag gdab// de nas dkyil 'khor bri ba ni// thig bzhi btab la le'u tshe dgu// dbus kyi le'u tshe dkar po la// shar ser lho sngo nub dmar byang ni
ljang// mtshams bzhi smug nag sgo dang bcas// dbus su gru gsum re re bri// de nas tsan+dan dkar po'am// rgya shug dkar po'i phur pa dgu// srog bdag dgu ru mnga' gsol la// dar dkar
srog snying bris te gdags// 'di skad brjod la dgod par bya'o// hUM/ dbus phyogs shel ri shel gyi khang pa nas/ khams gsum srog la mnga' mdzad pa// srog bdag nag po ral pa
can// bstan pa srung phyir gshegs su gsol// bsam pa bsgrub phyir gshegs nas kyang// pho brang dbus kyi le'u tshe la// dgra bgegs bsnol ba'i gdan stengs su// dgyes shing brtan par
bzhugs su gsol// ging ka ra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan// zhes dbus su dgod do// rgyal rigs srog la mnga' mdzad pa// srog bdag rgyal po khu le shod// dkyil 'khor shar gyi le'u tshe la// dgyes
shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// bram ze'i srog la mnga' mdzad pa// rgyal po chen po ag ge yang// lho phyogs dkyil 'khor le'u tshe la// dgyes shing brtan par par bzhugs su
gsol// rjes rigs srog la mnga' mdzad pa'i// rgyal po chen po ug ge yang// de bzhin nub kyi phyogs su dgod// dmangs rigs srog la mnga' mdzad pa// rgyal po chen po bram ze
yang// de bzhin byang gi phyogs su dgod// bud med srog la mnga' mdzad pa// rgyal po chen po shang ze yang// dkyil 'khor shar lho'i ling tser dgod// byis pa'i srog la mnga' mdzad
pa'i// rgyal po chen po da khod kyang// dkyil 'khor lho nub ling tsher dgod// mi nag srog la mnga' mdzad pa// rgyal po chen po ni khod kyang// nub byang dkyil 'khor le'u tsher
dgod// byol song srog la mnga' mdzad pa// rgyal po chen po nyi zla yang// byang shar dkyil 'khor ling tsher dgod// de nas mchog gi phur pa bzhi// nyin bzhi'i ging bzhir mnga' gsol
la// ris mthun dar gyi con pan gdags// phrin las bcol phyir sgo bzhir gdab// dar skud gsum dril mtha' ma bskor// bla rgyan logs rgyan ci mang dgram// dar dkar gur phub za 'og
gdan yang bting// de nas dbus kyi srog bdag la// gsang phye bre gang lha bshos la// ri rab tshul 'dra zhig byas la// dbus su smyug ma tshigs dgu la// mtshal gyi mkhar thabs nya mig
bri// rtse la bya rgod rgyal mtshan dang// dar dkar gdugs gcig steng nas dgab// dngul gyi g.yer kha g.yag rnga phon// lpags bu dkar po'i blud bu gdags// tha ma'i tshigs la ming rus
gdags// gzhan yang smyug ma tshigs gsum brgyad// mtshal dang ldong ros sgo sprad la// mkhar thabs bris la rtse kha sprad// lce la dar lce re yang gdags// bar bar ra dkar blud bu dang// dung
dang zangs dang rin po che// byu ru mgron bu+u sa gser gdags// tha ma'i tshigs la ming rus gdags// lcang ma mtho re ba bzhi la// mtshal lam rams kyis g.yung drung bris// thod re ral
lpags grog dkar la yang ming rus bri// de bzhin btags la sgo bzhir gzhag/ gzhan yang thud dang nya sha dang// bu ram gtor ma 'bras chan dang// za 'og dar dang pags dkar dang// rin chen
rtsal la phyogs bzhir gzhag/ gcig ni dbus su gzhag par bya// nya phyis dung phor 'khar gzhong du// gser dang chang phud sbyar ba lnga// phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga ru gzhag/ gcig tu mtshe dang
nyung nag dang// chang phud gangs chu chu mig chu// de gsum gcig tu bsres la gzhag/ drag sngags rgyun du bzlas pa'i phyir// bdag nyid shar bltas sngon du gzhag/ gzhan yang spos dang me tog
dang// mar me dri chab rnga gling dang// mchod pa'i yo byad phyogs bzhir dgram// ra lug dkar po gang yod pa// ra dang ze ba dmar por byug/ ske ru dar dkar khug ma ru// mtshe nyung klu sman sna
tshogs dang// dgra yi ming byang bcug la gdags// nub tu dar 'phan dkar po la// 'phan lce ser po btags pa gcig/ rgyal po'i gzugs bris mdungs la gdags// rtse la snying gcig
bkal la gzug/ gshin rje gshed por mnga' gsol la// sngags bzlas bstod pa mang du bya// ber gyon thod bcing rnga yang brdung// snyan gsan dbab dang spyan drang dang// phyag
'tshal bzhugs dang mchod pa 'bul// bstod pa dbul zhing smon lam gdab// thugs dam bskang zhing phrin las bcol// srog snying 'di ni rtag tu grangs// oM tri stu ti bya 'gyur ra ka la mA rA mA

rA ya swA hA/ de ni srog bdag rang gi snying po'o// 'di ni 'khor srog bdag gi snying po'o// oM khu le ma hA be raM swA hA/ oM ag ge ru rta swA hA/ oM ug ge sha ma le swA hA/ oM drang zi rta ba swA hA/ oM shang ze

shang ka ra swA hA/ oM da khod bi pi ya ra swA hA/ oM ni khod ba ra hi te swA hA/ oM sUr+Ya tsan+d+ra ma ta khu le swA hA/ de rnams srog gi snying po'o// mi tshig g.yal dang spring pa spang// skya rengs shar nas
'khor rnams bskul// grub pa'i rtags rnams ston par nges// rab 'bring tha ma gsum du 'ong// rab la sku ni dngos su ston// 'bring la 'od dang sgra ru ston/ tha ma chad// de la dbang bskur dam bsre

bya// rbad sngags grangs shing phrin las bcol// A+oM ma hA pra ma na rak+sha rak+ta tsa ra mun tra ma hA shi de tso ka tsa la bing bing dgra bo mA ra ya hab hab/ de ni rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams las
la rbad pa'o// de nas rta dkar po'i thod pa'i nang brnag pa'i ming rus bcug la/ rta thod za 'og dag gis gril// dam sri smyo ru gzhug pa'i phyir/ khrag skam mgu gul sbyar de dang// mtshe nyung go

ro tsa na la// smyo 'bog gtang ba'i sngags 'di bzlas// oM mA ma ma rang ga thun b+h+yo/ ma hA rA dza thun b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ma hA ba b+ha b+ha ma hA de ba ma hA rU tra b+h+yo b+h+yo/ oM tro ta ya tro ta ya/ tra ta ya tra ta ya/ k+Shu lha k+Shu

lha ging ka ra ging ka ra/ ging dz+wa la ging dz+wA la yak+sha gr-i ba/ yak+sha gr-i ba/ d+ha sha grI wa d+ha sha grI wa/ pu tra dkar po b+h+yo b+h+yo/ de ni srog bdag 'khor gyi smyo 'bog tu bsngags so// de nas brnag pa'i ming
rus la// rang rang rtsa ba'i sngags brjod cing// phur pa rnams kyis rim pas gdab// gtso bo'i phur pa snying la gdab/ khu le shod kyi gsang bar gdab// rgyal po ag ge lag pa g.yas// rgyal
po ug ge dpung par gdab// rgyal po drang ze'i lag pa g.yon// shang ze'i rkang pa g.yas su gdab// da khod dpung mgo g.yas su gdab// ni khod dpung mgo g.yon la gdab// nyi zlas rkang pa
g.yon la gdab// gsad pa nyi ma bzhi pa ste// nyin bzhi lha yi ging bzhi bya// de nas rta yi thod pa ru// ling+ga'i thod shul mthun rdzas stsal// lha khang rnams la btags gyur na// smyo 'bog khrag
skyugs mA ra ya// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ smyo 'bog gi zla gsang las rgyal po nang ltar bsgrub pa'i skabs te le'u re drug pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das
gshin rje gshed pos rgyal po gsang bar bsgrub pa'i thabs thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa 'di gsungs so// rnal 'byor yon tan ldan pa des// bla ma mnyes pa rab byas te// mgo ni rma bya
bzhin du dgug/ dam tshig chen po srog bzhin bsrung// gzhan don ma yin rang don du// dur khrod sa phug dgon par 'gro// phyi bshags sdig sbyangs bsod nams bsags// ma nyes dpang
gzug glud gtor gtang// dkyil 'khor brtsig la chag chag gdab// thig gdab dkyil 'khor cho ga bya// dkyil 'khor mthing nag gru gsum bri// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi thod phreng bcas// gru
chad sgo bzhi ldan pa la// dur khrod rgyan dang ldan pa la// gru gsum me 'od 'bar ba bri// sgo bzhir gru gsum re re bri// de nas mchog gi phur pa dgu// srog bdag dgu yi sngags bris
la// dbus su dkar po snying 'byin dgod// rgyan dang cha lugs gsal bar bskyed// shar phyogs rtsibs la khu le dgod// lho yi rtsibs la ag ge dgod// nub kyi rtsibs la ug ge
dgod// byang gi rtsibs la drang ze dgod// shang ze shar la da khod lho// ni khod nub la nyi zla byang// de ltar sgo bzhir dgod par bya// 'khar gzhong dung phor bse gab tu// snying sna tshogs kyi
gtor ma bsham// lug dkar snying srog ma bral ba// srog rtsa'i nang du ming rus gzhug/ snying rtse gyen du bstan la gzhag/ dar dkar tshil gyis kha bcad la// dbus su srog bdag nyid la
gzhag/ shar du khrag sna'i gtor ma gzhag/ lho ru sha sna'i gtor ma gzhag/ nub tu rus pa'i gtor ma gzhag/ byang du mkhal ma'i gtor ma gzhag/ de nas sgo bzhi'i gtor ma yang// shar sgor
mchin pa sna tshogs gzhag/ lho sgor sha chen 'bru sna gzhag/ nub sgor mcher pa sna tshogs gzhag/ byang sgor tshil bu sna tshogs gzhag/ gtor ma de dag nang du yang// bshos bu mkhyid re btsugs
la gzhag/ de la smyug rgod re la yang// phod dkar pags bu dkar po dang// ming byang re yang btags la gzhag/ phyogs ma nor bar gzhag pa yang// man 'jil steng du gzhag par bya// shar
du lug dkar lho ru ra// nub tu bya dkar byang du khyi// bag zan gzugs byas dkar por bsgyur// sems can dngos su yod na rab// med na gang rung gcig gi sker// mi rus bris te gdags
par bya// dkyil 'khor lho nub 'brub khung du// dam sri'i gzugs dang ming rus gzhug/ sha khrag sna tshogs gtor ma la// tshil chen zhal khebs yod pa la// rak+ta'i gsang nan chas
pa cig/ dkyil 'khor byang shar mtshams su gzhag/ ting 'dzin rnam gsum gsal bar bsgom// gzhal yas gdan bcas spyan drang bskyed// bdag nyid gshed por gsal bsgom la// rgyal po
'khor bcas gsal bar bsgom// spyan drang bzhugs mchod tshul bzhin bya// rtag tu snying po 'di yang bzlas// oM 'bar sha ma hA rA dza swA hA/ oM khu le ma hA be ra ma swA hA/ oM ag ge ru rta

swA hA// oM ug ge ma le swA hA/ oM drang ze ba b+hA swA hA/ oM shang ze shang ka ra ma swA hA/ oM da khod pi pi pa ra swA hA/ oM ni khod pa ra hi te swA hA/ oM sUr+ya tsan+d+ra ma hA khu le swA hA/ de ni rtsa ba'i drag sngags
te// grub rtags sku yang dngos su ston// me dang 'od dang sgra yang ston// sprel dang byi la seng ge 'bag/ dge bshes btsad po lta bu dang// dmag dpon lta bur ston par nges// rgyal po drag tu
sngags 'dis rbad// oM ma hA dA ma rak+sha rak+ta tsa ra mu tra ma hA ni te tso ka tsa la bing bing dgra bo mA ra ya hab hab// 'khor bcas las la gtang ba'o// lha dang dbye ba drag po'i sngags 'dis
dbral// ma hA sa ma ya rak+sha ma hA rA dza thun thun phrol phrol/ de nas bsgrub pa thon nas kyang// gsad pa'i phur pas gdab pa ni// dbus nas phyung la 'di skad do// hUM/ khro bdag chen po snying
'byin gyis// dpa' bo chen por dbang bskur bas// dgra snying dkar nag mtshams su gdab// btab nas myur du brlag gyur cig/ kI li kI la ya tsit+ta mugs// dkar po snying 'byin lhan
lhan// hUM/ khro bdag chen po khu le shog/ gsod pa'i phur par byin brlabs te// phrag khyim g.yas dang g.yon du gdab// btab pas khrag skam myur du gsod// badzra mu ti tsa sha rak+ta rngubs
lhan// hUM/ khro bdag srog bdag ag ge yang// 'gugs pa'i bdag por mnga' gsol nas// nu ma g.yas dang g.yon du gdab// btab pas mkhris pa k+Sha yas sod// tsi li tsi li ma sa
ma thibs thibs/ hUM/ khro bdag sgrol ging ug ge yang// rno ba'i dpal du byin brlabs nas// spyi bo'i gtsug tu btab pas kyang// klad gzer mgo dang 'dar bus sod// mas bu ta tshal pa
tshal pa ka ru hUM hUM/ hUM/ khro bdag shan pa drang ze yang// 'debs pa'i dpal du byin brlabs nas// mkhal khung gnyis su gdab par bya// btab pas chu 'gag ske nad sod// bi ma la bi khu ya bi
ma nad shad phaT dza// hUM khro bdag srog gcod shang ze yang// zur gsum rtse mor byin brlabs te// mchin pa pho gdung rtsa la gdab// btab pas mchin nad khrag gis sod// ma sa
la khu ma ta ra la tshang bu re ra dgra bo mA ra ya dza/ hUM/ khro bdag gsod dga' da khod kyang// thogs med 'debs par dbang bskur nas// sha mtshan rme bu'i dkyil du gdab// btab pas sbos
nas grum bus sod// kha la ru tse kha ma la sha phu phaT dza/ hUM/ dgra bla'i rgyal po ni khod kyang// rtse gsum ngar can rab 'byin bskyed// mcher pa'i dbus su btab nas kyang// mcher nad lkugs
nad smyo 'bog thong// me kha kha ru tsi pag sha ru tra me mu ru mu ru phaT dza/ hUM/ gsang ba'i sog bdag nyi zla yang// phur pa'i lha ru dbang bskur nas// rkang ba'i mthil du gdab par bya// zha grum

sgur nad 'theng grum gtong// 'ba' lu bag te rag sha kha khrag rngubs rngubs// phur sngags btab nas thun sngags brab// oM mA ma mA ra ya thun b+h+yo/ ma ra ra tsa thun b+h+yo b+h+yo ma hA ba ba ma hA de ba ma hA

rU tra b+h+yo b+h+yo/ thun gyis brgyab ste brlag par 'gyur// ling+ga gtubs la gtor mar rtsal// ri gsum rtse la yas stags bskyal// rgyal po bsrung ba'i sngags ni/ oM kha du she sha sha pra la ma ma rU tra/
khra kha khra kha/ srog bdag 'khor dang bcas las nor sgrub pa'i sngags la/ oM dzam be le she ba la go mes sruM sruM truM truM swA hA/ rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pas byes su gar 'gro yang dgra bgegs mi

'byung ba ni/ oM nas ne nas ne haM shi ka ra ka ra ma ra ma ra ru lu ru lu phaT phaT b+h+yo b+h+yo/ rgyal pos gal te bdag gam gzhan la 'tshe bar gyur na/ de bzlog pa'i sngags la/ bu ma hA rA dza ba shan
zhil zhil shAn ting swA hA// ma hA rA dza shAn ting swA hA/ rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pas rigs brgyud 'phrog pa dang/ rabs bcad pa'i sngags la/ oM ma hA ka la gangs dre mo bdud rnams rngam rngam

swA hA/ rgyal pos ye 'drog sum brgya drug cu dang thob shor gtong ba'i sngags la/ oM ma ya ra ma/ yaM be ra srog rtsa la kha sa kha sa me ru me ru swA hA/ rgyal pos ser ba 'bebs pa'i sngags la/ oM pra

ta pre sha thor b+h+yo/ nal chem chem b+h+yo/ hUr tsa la b+h+yo/ kha shar tra be shar shar/ nal chem chem b+h+yo/ rgyal po ltas ngan 'bebs pa'i sngags la/ oM shar ging ram shag rgyug rgyug ram rgyug srog la rgyug

sha sha dgra bo'i snying la sha/ 'bru til ram khyer sod srog/ rgyal pos ya cha stab bsnol gtong ba'i sngags la/ oM ma hA pra ga shing kha me ru kha la a tsi ma sha dgra bo phrol phrol shig b+h+yo/ zhes sngags
kyi don bstan las rnams 'grub// gang la bya yang thogs pa med// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ rgyal po gsang bar bsgrub pa'i smyo 'bog gi skabs te le'u re bdun
pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos/ 'gal ba cham la dbab slad du// gnod sbyin gdug pa'i zla gsang gsungs pa// dad pa gsum ldan rnal 'byor pas// dam
tshig rang gi srog bzhin bsrung// bla ma mnyes pa'i rim gro bya// dur khrod nags tshal dgon par 'gro// phyi bshags 'bum la sogs pa 'don// bsod nams tshogs kyi yan lag bsag/ ma
nyes dpang gzug glud gtor gtang// gnod sbyin 'di nyid bsgrub par bya// lcang lo can gyi pho brang na// las grub rigs kyi zhing khams nas// gnod sbyin bye ba sa ya gnas// de dag nang na
dregs pa'i sku// mthu stobs ldan pa'i gang bzang bsgrub// dkyil 'khor dbus kyi khri brtsegs la// steng du gnod sbyin sku gzugs gzhag/ tsan+dan rigs las 'bur du brkos// chu zheng gab pa
gel gel po// sku mdog sngon po gzi ldan pa// dbu skra lcang lo rin chen brgyan// ut+pal sngon po'i phreng bas mdzes// g.yas na shing tog dmar po bsnams// g.yon na mi lpags rgyal mtshan
bsnams// gzas pa'i gzugs byas snying gar gzhug/ de yi dbus su dong gru gsum// rtse mo byang du bltas pa la// nang du khrag dang sol bas byug/ til gyi phye la dgra yi gzugs// mi khrag bla
dwags bris la gzhug/ zhabs mas gril la tshon skud bcing// gru gsum brus pa'i nang du gzhug/ mtha' ma rtsang gis bskor te gzhag/ gzugs kyi ske nas sngo dmar gdags// sna gcig sku yi
zhabs la gdags// sngags pa'i mdun du dam rdzas dgram// la phug rus phye ske tshe la// de bzhin gtor ma byas te gzhag/ nyung nag lan tshwa dug tu sbyar// gzugs la brab cing ngan sngags
bzlas// ma nyes dpang gzug 'o dod 'bod// de bzhin rims pas las rnams bya// dur khrod ras la 'khor lo ni// dug khrag sbyar bas bri bar bya// rim pa bzhin du drag sngags dgod// spyan
drang bzhugs mchod bstod pa bya// phrin las bcol zhing gnad nas bskul// lha dang phral zhing rdzas kyis bdug/ drag sngags bzlas shing 'khor lo gzhug/ gsad pa las kyi sbyor la
'jug/ gnan bsreg 'phang ba gsum la gtad// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ srog bcod spu gri gnod sbyin gyi zla gsang las/ gang ba bzang po phyi ltar bsgrub pa'i skabs te le'u re
brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos gang ba bzang po nang du bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// dkyil 'khor mthing nag gru gsum la// zla gam
gsum gyis bskor ba bri// dmar smug me ri ra bas bskor// dbus su gshed po yab yum ste// mdun du gang ba bzang po dgod// mtshan ldan thod pa dum gsum du// la phug rus pa'i phye ma
dang// snying sna khrag sna sbyar la gzhag/ dbus kyi gru gsum mthur du bskor// nang du rabs chad thod pa gzhug/ nyung nag nyung dkar lan tshwa dang// dug dang sme khrag sbyar bas dgang// dmigs
pa'i ming rus ji gzhin byas// thod pa'i nang du gzhug par bya// dur khrod grong khyer bcom nas kyang// mtshan ma'i ras blangs skyang nul bya// ldong ros chu rtsa ser pos byug/ dug khrag sbyar nas
'khor lo bri// de bzhi yi ge dgod byas la// thun gyi thod pa kha yang gcad// de nas rim pas las rnams bya// hUM/ gsang ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// grub pa'i gnod sbyin chen po spyan
'dren na// bye ba sa ya'i 'khor dang rab chas te// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung phyir gshegs su gsol// e h+ye hi rak+sha ba sna ba si sa ma ya ho ha// gser ltar rab tu brtan pa'i ri ngos la// rma
bya rab gnas gser du snang ba ltar// bdag gis khyod bsgrub khyod kyi rang bzhin 'grub// grub pa'i dbang po khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// brtan pa bzhugs shig gnod sbyin mchog/ rin chen
gcal bkram sa gzhi la// baiDUr+ya dang man shel dang// khri chen dpangs la brtan par bzhugs// sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan s+t+waM/ gser dang bcas pa'i skyems phud ma nyams pa// dung chen snod du sbyar
nas mchod pa 'bul// dar gyi lhab lhub glu gar rol mo bcas// bsam pa dag pas sbyar nas mchod pa dbul// dril bu sgra snyan spos dang dri// mar me bshos dang gtor ma khrag/ mos pas

'bul lo bzhes su gsol// oM ra ra so ba ba'u pU tsa kra ma pU tsa ho ha/ de nas gsang sngags rab bzlas la/ oM ba hU ri rta dza/ ma g+ha la bag sha dza/ ra tra ma ru ru dza/ snying la shar shar ru dza/ srog
la breng breng thuM dza/ gnod sbyin sku dang 'od dang sgra// sa g.yos thog dang char chen 'ong// gong gi rdzas kyi rab tu brdeg/ thugs dam bskul te phrin las bcol// dus drug sngags 'di gzugs la
brdeg/ oM dza laM ma hA dza lam/ rak+sha bak+sha/ sti pu stud de sa li bag sha swA hA// 'di ni sngags kyi rgyal po ste// thams cad grub pa'i sngags zhes brjod// 'khor lo bcas kyi dam rdzas te// byang
bltas chu mig ngogs sbas na/ khrag skyugs 'chi bar the tshom med// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ srog gcod spu gri gnod sbyin gyi zla gsang gang ba bzang po nang ltar bsgrub
pa'i skabs te le'u re dgu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos gang ba bzang po gsang bar bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// dam tshig dbang sgo thub pa'i bus// bla ma
mnyes phyir yid 'thad dbul// mi don ma yin rang don du// bsgrub pa gong bzhin tshul bshams te// de rting man ngag 'di bzhin bya// a ka ru dang du ru ka/ lug mig kar+sha pa na le// sngags ni
'di dag rab tu brjod// oM dz+wa la ma hA dz+wa la/ yag sha bag sha so su sdud de ba lam/ bag sha swA hA/ 'di ni sngags kyi rgyal po ste// sngon du bsnyen pa sum 'bum bya// lus bsrung sbyor ba 'di
bzhin bya// dpung pa dag la btags gyur na// nad rnams thams cad byang bar 'gyur// de nas gsad pa'i sbyor ba ni// kar ni ka dang ba lu dang// 'u su rdo dreg sha ka ra// ngang pa'i sgro la bskus
nas kyang// gzugs la dus drug mchod byas te// phyag byas bzlas pa byas gyur na// longs spyod dpag med thob par 'gyur/ khrag dang nyung rgod rta mchin dang// ba lang dag la bzlas byin
