'thab rim gyis sbyar// g.yon nas bskor bas ma non na// g.yas skor ru khug ar la[(]tsha gtad/[)]gtang// des ni rang dbang med par 'grub// 'khor lo mu su thod par gzhug/ lhun stug ri bo'i 'og tu
gtad// thar sa med pa'i brnag par 'gyur// 'phags pa 'jam dpal dri ma med pa gsang ba'i rgyud las/ phrin las gzir zhing mnan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje
'chang// drag po'i las 'di bya ba yang// nyes pa che na nye bar 'grub// nyes pa chung na las ring ste// rang gis nyes na rang la ldog/ rigs dang lo grangs yang dag mthun// de la byas kyang skyon

'byung ngo// 'dod pa'i sems kyis gsod par 'dod// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub dag/ rmi lam du yang mi 'byung ngo// rtsa ba'i sdom pa mi gnas shing// bsnyen pa tshad du ma bskyal bar// tshig tsam lung
la brten pa yis// don mi 'grub par ngas bshad do// 'phags pa 'jam dpal dri ma med pa gsang ba'i rgyud las/ mi 'grub pa'i skyon bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o//// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje

'chang// dkon mchog bla ma'i don ched du// drag po'i las 'di bya ba yang// lus kyi nyes pa gsal ba'i phyir// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyang bklag/ nyin mtshan phyed pa'i dge ba bya// mchod sbyin bya zhing

nyes pa bshags// ngag gi nyes pa bsal ba'i phyir// yi ge brgya pa'i bshags chen 'don// yi ge re la brgya yis bshags// yid kyi nyes pa bsal bya'i phyir// rang gi skyon dag bsal byas la// snga ma bshags

la phyi ma bsdam// mi rtog me yis bsreg bya'i phyir// chos nyid blo la ma yengs gzhag/ ri dwags khri snyan lta bu'i sems// snying rje'i sems dang ma bral zhing// byams pa la sogs ma bral na// rang sems rnam
par dag 'gyur te// yid bzhin nor bu lta bur 'gyur// dngos grub ster bar rang sems shes// ji ltar nor bu rin po che// ga'u'i nang du bcug byas nas// shin tu gces par ma byas na// dgos pa'i don

mchog mi ster te// nor bu dag la 'tshe ba mang// de bzhin rang sems rin po che// ga'u lta bu'i phung po la// nyon mongs lnga por gyur pa'i dgra// rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pa'i nad// phan za gon dang kha

bzas kyis// ga'u lta bu'i phung po mchod// ji ltar pha rol skyel ba'i gru// gas chag can gyis phyin mi 'gyur// gru de bcos legs byas gyur na// ji ltar pha rol phyin pa ltar// de bzhin phung po gru lta bu// bcos

legs bya phyir mkhas kyang mnyam// nyal dang ldang dang 'chag pa dang// phan pa'i zas bsten gnod pa spangs// gnyid dang rtsol mkhas sbyar te bsten// ji ltar gab tshe nang stsal ba'i// rin chen lta bu phyag gi
gnas// de bzhin nad med phung po dang// rang sems dag pa'i rin po che// dus gsum bde gshegs phyag 'tshal gnas// ji ltar nor bu rin po che// dri ma yod pa'i rang bzhin can// dgos pa'i don rnams

mi 'byung ste// ras la sogs pas phyis gyur cing// dri ma dag par byas gyur na// dgos pa'i don rnams ster ba ltar// de bzhin rang sems rin po che// lus ngag yid kyi dri ma can// rang skyon brtag la bor
bar bya// lus kyi nyon mongs dag la 'bad// de ltar rang sems dag pa la// dus gsum bde gshegs mngon phyogs shing// de bzhin chos skyong mgon po dang// rnal 'byor ma tshogs mkha' 'gro
dang// 'jig rten las kyi mthu chen rnams// ring po'i gnas nas stong grogs byed/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal dri ma med pa gsang ba'i rgyud las/ bsgrub pa'i las dang/ yon tan bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu

gnyis pa'o//// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang// snying rje byang chub sems bral ba// dam tshig nyams pa'i rang bzhin la// de dag rnams kyis srog phrogs nas// tshe yi dus byas ngan song skye// de ltar rang

sems ma khrel ba'o// ma nyams snying rje ldan pa yis// rnal 'byor chen po de yis kyang// bla med 'bras bu 'thob 'dod na// rang gi nyon mongs gzhom pa'i phyir// bzlas pa'i phyag rgya che chung gis// bsnyen

bsgrub mthar dbyung bstan pa bsrung// nyon mongs zhi nas byang chub thob// de yi phyir ni phyag brda ni// se gol sgra las byung ba na// de bzhin se gol sgra dag ni// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med sgra// dus
gsum bde gshegs gsan par mdzad// rnga dang sil snyan brdeb brdung sprad// 'bud pa'i sgra sogs dpag tu med// thal mo se gol sgra dag pa// 'bum gyi char yang mi 'gro'o// phrin las drag po'i dus su
ni// phyag brda chung ba thal mo'i sgra// thabs dang shes rab 'khor lo ste// drag tu bskor zhing lan bdun gdab// 'jig rten mi ma yin pa'i brda// gang dmigs lus sems rgyud kyang bsreg/ sel gol sgra ni
'di brdabs pas// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// thal mo 'jigs pas thams cad dngangs// yi dwags bod pa'i sgra ru shes// 'phags pa 'jam dpal dri ma med pa gsang ba'i rgyud las/ phyag brda che
chung gi le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o//// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang// ro langs drag po'i 'khor lo yis// lha rnams gnad la dbab pa dang// gang dmigs myur du bsgral ba ni// dgon pa chen po'i sa
phyogs su// dpa' bo chen pos bgrod nas kyang// bdag gam 'on te gsum dag gis// 'byung por gtor ma byin nas kyang// phyi nang gsang ba'i mtshams kyang bcad// 'jigs pa spong ba'i sems kyis
su// ral gri dag ni thogs nas kyang// grogs ni gsum dang lhan cig tu// gshin rje'i phyogs nas rdzas dag btsal// 'jigs pa med pa'i sems kyis su// rma med pa yi rdzas btsal la// bgegs mthar byed

pa'i snying po gdags// tshig dag smra bar mi bya la// phyir yang blta bar yong mi bya// de dag byas na bar chad 'byung// de nas rdzas mchog dam pa de// spos lnga bdud rtsis khrus byas la// ro langs gnyen po'i
gdon dang dbral// de nas dpa' bo chen po yis// rdzas mchog gdan la 'dug nas ni// bkra shis bcas gtur byas nas ni// zhal dag g.yas g.yon dbus dag kyang// dkar dmar nag

po'i rdzas kyis bsnun// drag po lha yi nga rgyal gyis// mi skyo'i bar du gsang sngags bzla// de nas rdzas mchog dam pa de// gru gsum pags pa'i steng du gzhag/ mgo ni gshin rje'i phyogs su ste// rkang pa yak+sha'i

phyogs su shes// de nas dpa' bo chen po yis// drag po'i sngags kyi 'khor lo yang// yi dwags gos la yang dag bri/ khru dang ldan pa'i ras mchog la/ khrag sna dug sna tshogs pas bsnun// rim bzhi ldan pa'i
zlum po la// rim gcig thig bzhi ling tshe dgu// rim gnyis dag la bcu gnyis te// rim gsum bcu drug dag tu shes// rim bzhi bcu drug dag tu bya// rim pa dang po'i 'khor lo la// yi ge 'khor lo bri ba

yang// dbus la ya bri de bzhin phyogs// ya ma me da k+She yig mchog/ drag po'i sngags kyi 'khor lo bri// mtshams kyi sa stod 'khor lo la// hUM gnyis bar du bsgrub bya'i ming// rim pa gnyis pa'i 'khor lo

la// rA dza sa do gsang ba'i sngags// ru na so ni zhes pa dang// ra yats+tsha na gsang sngags bri// rim pa gsum pa'i 'khor lo la// gsang sngags hrIHSh+t+r-IH'i yi ge dang// rU tra'i ming yig spel te bri// rim pa bzhi pa'i
bcu drug la// gsung yig dbyangs kyi yi ge bri// g.yon skor legs zin de nas kyang// g.yas skor tshul las bzlog ste bri// ya dang ya bsnyams de bzhin du// ya gnyis ya ru bsnol nas bzung// sprad pas ya

ru shes par bya// yi ge gzhan yang de bzhin du// log na sngags kyi 'khor lo ldog/ de bas nan tan bskyed de bya// nyi shu drug la legs zin nas// dril te rdzas mchog lto ru sba// byad thag bzhi gdags zin
par bzung// nyi shu gsang sngags bdun nas bzlas// nub mo gcig tu dril ba'am// yang na hrIHSh+t+rIH'i sngags su shes// dkyil 'khor chen po bskor bya zhing// g.yang gzhi 'og mgo zlog la gon// drag po'i
sngags bzlas man+Dal bskor// de nas rdzas la gnas pa'i lha// ldang ngam g.yo'am 'on te smra// ro lang dam tshig mu dra bstan// lag pa thal sbyar sor mo bsnol// mdzub gnyis dag gis srin lag

gnyis// 'khyud de bkug la mtheb gnyis bsnol// ro langs phyag rgya'i gsang sngags bzlas// na mo bud+d+ha d+harma sang g+hai b+h+yaH oM sarba ta thA ga ta kro d+ha bi dza ya/ ag ni ra dz+wa la ti dza hA pre ta shi ya hUM phaT/ bzlas pa
phyag rgya bskor zhing bzlas// mi 'jigs sems kyis gtor ma sbyin// dngos grub gang 'dod zhu gsol gdab// gal te de ltar ma gyur na// dur khrod me yis rdzas mchog bsro// thor te bcings bstan bslangs
te gzhag/ ro langs gsang sngags bzlas par bya// ya me do sa dza rA ma ya da yo na ru do me ya/ yak+She ya ra ni yo da ya me/ ya mA ra ni ts+tsha ya k+she ya/ a mu kaM rak+ta tsa ra ya/ a mu

kaM rak+ta tsa ra ya/ a mu kaM mA ra ya/ ro langs 'khor lo'i gsang sngags ni// skyes bu sems ni mi dpa' bas// gal te ro langs sngags bzlas na// grogs dang bcas nas 'chi bar 'gyur// de las gzhan du bya ba min// de bas
dpa' bo chen po des// ro langs 'khor lo'i gsang sngags 'di// bzlog ste bskor ba de bzhin du// byas nas rdzas la rtag chen 'byung// smra ba'am 'gul lam g.yo ba 'byung// mchog la sogs pa'i dngos grub

blang// gal te rdzas la rtags med kyang// bsad dang gso ba phra mo rnams// 'grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za// de nas rdzas kyi 'khor lo ni// mtshan ngan thod par dril te gzhag/ lho phyogs dur khrod rnying

pa'am// mi ro gnas pa'i khung du sba// de nas rdzas mchog dam pa de// lha yi lha dag gshegs su gsol// gang yin rU trar bsam byas la// mtshon sna lnga yi char pa dbab// drag po'i sngags kyis bsgral bar

bya// nang khrol glo snying mkhal mar bcas// gshin rje'i lha tshogs rnams la dbul// dbang po rnam lnga'i me tog kyang// de bzhin du ni shes par bya// zhing chen mgo bo thod pa yang// ma tshogs yongs kyi rjes su
gzhag/ ma thod dag gi kha ru yang// ya ma dam sri bcug la mnan// 'khor lo lcags kyu la sogs pa// dbang po rnams la gtor mar sbyin// rdzas mchog lhag ma dag la yang// ling+ga ming yig bsres te

dbul// me nyid lha ru bsam bya zhing// lcags phye zangs phye rdo phye dang// mtshe dang 'bru nag nyung nag mar// dug rdzas ko ba'i dum bu dbul// hrIHSh+t+r-IHdrag po'i las sngags bzlas// oM hrIHSh+t+r-IHwi kri tA na na hUM hUM che

ge mo mA ra ya phaT phaT/ de nas drag po'i thal ba dang// thab khung sbas te gnan pa bya// ro langs drag po'i 'khor lo 'di// skyes bu'i sems ni mi dpa' bas// rang don phra mo'i don ched du// bskor na rang la
ldog 'gyur bas// de bas nan tan bskyed de gsang// 'phags pa 'jam dpal dri ma med pa gsang ba'i rgyud las/ ro langs 'khor lo'i le'u ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o//// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje
'chang// gsang sngags rnal 'byor nang 'thab na// bsad pa'i 'khor lo bskor bar gsungs// mu stegs bram ze'i pags pa la// 'khor lo rim bzhi lto sbyar bri// thig bzhi btab pas le tshe dgu// ya ma ye da

k+She lnga dgod// de yi phyi rim bcu gnyis la// ra dza sa do ru Na yo// ni ra ya ts+tsha bcu gnyis dgod// de yi phyi rim bcu drug la// hrIHSh+t+r-IHming dang spel la dgod// de yi phyi rim bcu drug la// rdo rje 'greng bu bcu drug
bri// mu stegs thod pa'i ga'ur bcug/ zhing gi rgyus pas gsum sgril bcings// bdag nyid gshed por gnas pa yis// ro langs 'khrugs pa'i nad dpal dang// 'khrug byed dmar po'i shi

sngags bzlas// ya ma rA dza snying ro shag na/ sa do me ya kro d+hi shwa rI/ ya me do ru/ tsi ta ro la shAn ting/ Na yo da ya sa ma ya dza dza/ ya da yo ni ro tsa mug ra ya k+She ya/ sa ma ya dza dza/ ya k+She ya ts+tsha/ snying khrag chod/ ni

ra ma ya/ srog srog mA ra ya phaT/ snying rtsa dgra bo mA ra ya/ nyin mtshan med par gcig tu dril// ga'u dag la 'od 'phro ba'i// mtshan ma dngos su byung ba na// gdug pa sme brtsegs sa ru gnan// des kyang myur du
ma grub na// g.yas skor mtha' la dgug sngags bzlas// nyi shu rtsa gcig smra bcad la// mchod rdzogs gtor ma rgyun mi gcad// des ni log lta mA ra ya'o// 'phags pa 'jam dpal dri ma med pa gsang ba'i

rgyud las/ sngags pa bsad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu lnga pa'o//// de ltar bcom ldan 'das dpal gshin rje'i gshed pos bstan pa rgyud kyi don le'ur phye nas/ rgyas par bka' stsal pa las/ zhu ba po rdo rje 'chang
chen po la sogs pa'i/ 'khor de dag thams cad tshims te/ rjes su yi rangs nas mngon par bstod de/ rang rang gnas su dengs nas mi snang bar gyur to// 'phags pa 'jam dpal dri ma med pa gsang ba'i

rgyud las/ rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u ste nyi shu drug pa'o//// 'jam dpal dri ma med pa gsang ba'i rgyud rdzogs soha//// bar 'dir 'jam dpal gshin rje gsang ba de kho na nyid kha thun gyi rgyud dam 'jam dpal gsang rgyud phyi mar

grags pa 'dzud//// rgya gar skad du/ shri ya ma kr-iSh+Na ag+ni bA yu ka ra ka byasta tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal gshin rje nag pau me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po/ tshe bdag nag
po 'phags pa 'jam dpal khro bo 'jigs pa can la phyag 'tshal lo// thams cad gsum ldan bde ba gcig/ zungs thub mtshan ma kun spangs pa'i// yon tan ma lus kun ldan pa'i// rdo rje 'chang la phyag 'tshal
lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'og min gyi gnas na/ dur khrod chen po lcang lo can gyi pho brang na/ yum chen mo dang gnyis su med pa'i b+ha ga la/ de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bcud nas byin gyis brlabs te bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das btsun mo gsang ba'i yum chen mo dang gnyis su med par gyur te/ ngang la snyoms par zhugs so// de

nas nyid las ma g.yos pa'i 'khor sprul pa'i sku yis/ mi g.yo ba las bslang ba'i phyir gsol ba btab bo// ye nas ma skyes chos sku dag pa la// mi skye rnam dag ngang las ma g.yos kyang// rdzogs pa'i tshul du
longs spyod skur bzhengs pa// mnyam pa'i ngang las 'gro ba'i don mdzod cig/ ces bskul bas gsang ba'i rtsa g.yos te/ byang chub kyi sems rin po che'i 'od dang mnyam pa chen po'i sgra byung nas/
'jig rten gyi khams rab tu g.yos par 'gyur te/ 'khor thams cad rab tu brgyal lo// de nas gshin rje'i rgyal po sprul pa yis// 'khor rnams brgyal ba de las bslang ba'i phyir// bcom ldan 'das la
gsol ba btab pa/ cho 'phrul 'jigs par bstan pa ngo mtshar che// sangs rgyas sgyu 'phrul bsam dpag med// 'jig rten khams 'dir 'ur 'ur chem chem g.yos// 'khor rnams 'khyams nas lus kyang sa la
brdeg/ dbugs dang ma bral dran pa'i dbang po nyams// 'khor rnams srog dang ldan par mdzod// ces gsol ba btab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor rnams brgyal ba las bslang ba'i phyir/
dbugs dbyung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa zhugs so// skad cig ma de nyid la/ 'khor rnams brgyal ba las langs te/ lha ma srin phyogs bcu nas lhags pa de dag thams cad kyis// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje

'chang la rang rang gi srog gi snying po mdongs gsol du phul lo// kye ho bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal/ khros pas sems can dran pa nyams// rdzu 'phrul rmad du byung ba ngo mtshar che// rang rang srog gi snying po
rnams// bstan pa bsrung phyir mdongs gsol dbul// srog gi snying po 'di bzhes la// dkyil 'khor chen po bsrung bar gyis// zhes zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen por gyur te/ zhi khro dang/

gshin rje dang/ ma mo dang/ bdud pho mo dang// srin po pho mo dang/ rgyal po dang/ gying pho mo dang/ btsan dang srog bdag dang/ sa bdag dang/ klu dang/ gnyan dang/ lha ma srin sde brgyad kyi srog gi snying po

dam tshig gcig tu dril nas bsdus so// de yang ji ltar bsdus zhe na/ la las ni bsnyen bsgrub bzhi ru phye nas phul/ la las ni yan lag rnam pa gsum du phye nas phul/ la las ni rgyun gyi drag sngags su phul
lo// la las ni sgrub pa'i drag sngags su phul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis srog dang las thams cad gcig tu dril nas/ dbang du bsdu ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// nye 'khor na gnas
pa'i srog chags kun/ nus pa gsum ste srog dbang bsdus// dregs pa'i tshul du las ngo longs// dpa' bo bkrag mdangs dbang du sgyur// zhes gsungs pas// sangs rgyas thams cad 'khor de nyid du lhags
te/ srog gi snying po thams cad nus pa dpag tu med pa'i mthur byin gyis brlabs te gsungs so// 'khor thams cad sbyor ba sna tshogs mthu dang bcas par byin gyis brlabs te dbang du bsdus so// de yang ji
ltar bsdus she na/ yi ge gnyis ni dbang du dril// srid pa'i khyams khang du dbang du bsdus so// de nas 'khor gyi gtso bo ya ma rA tsas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'khor thams cad gdan dang bcas
pa'i dkyil 'khor du dgod par bshad du gsol// zhes zhus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rang bzhin 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor bshad de/ dur khrod chen po dben pa yi// gdug pa can dang ldan pa
ru// las bsgrub pa yi dkyil 'khor 'byung// chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang du// rang bzhin gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor brtag/ phyi nang snod bcud dag pa ru// lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor brtag/ de yi yon
tan bsam mi khyab// yum gyi b+ha ga yangs pa ru// gsang ba'i drod kyi dkyil 'khor brtag/ lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di lta ste/ gru bzhi rin chen rgyu dang ldan// thod pa'i keng rus brtsigs par

bcas// sgo bzhi dur khrod khyams dang 'gram// rta babs bzhi dang twa ra Na// lhun po bzhi dang ldan pa'i gnas// nor bu rin chen keng rus kyi// ka ba brgyad dang de bzhin gdung// tshangs pa'i dral phyam zhing rus

bcas// thod pa rgyu ma zhing chung gis// bla 'og thams cad spras pa'o// stag gzigs seng ge ma he glang// chu srin gnam lcags sgo la mdzes// 'don yon lha mo dur khrod rgyan// yid 'ong mchod pas gang bar

spras// rin chen pha gu thod pa zhing// dra ba dra phyed dril bu dang// zhing gi rgyan gyis mdzes pa'o// rdo rje'i me 'od khrag mtsho'i gling// dbus na gru gsum rtsibs bzhi la// phyi rim rtsibs bcu sgo rtsibs
bzhi// gshin rje ma he nyi zla'i gdan// phyi nang 'khor yug dpag bsam yas// de la gnas pa'i rim pa ni// gshed bdag gtso bo yab yum gnas// gru gsum dbus na dregs pa'i tshul// rtsibs bzhir

gshed po yab yum bcas// rtsibs bcur phyogs skyong rtsibs mchan bdud// gru chad ro langs ce spyang gnas// khyams la sha za pho mo'i tshogs// sgo bzhir sgo ma de bzhin gnas// phyi khyams 'khor yug sde brgyad
dregs// 'bum phrag g.yog dang yang g.yog bcas// drug khri drug stong 'khod pa yi// rang sngags srog gis 'brel pa'o// dkyil 'khor bdag po gnas pa ni// 'khor du bdag po 'dus pa yis 'khor gyi ya ma
rA tsa la sogs pa thams cad mgu bar gyur te// bcom ldan 'das la ngag mthun par gsol to// mnyam pa'i ngang las dregs pa'i skur sprul nas// gdug pa can rnams ma lus dbang du bsdus// bstan pa

gnas phyir 'khor du sprul nas 'gyed// 'khor la brtse phyir dbugs dbyung ngo mtshar che// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yum chen mo'i gsang ba'i b+ha ga las bzhengs nas/ dbugs dbyung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
bzhugs te/ 'khor rnams la gzigs nas dbugs phyung ngo// 'khor rnams thams cad rengs pa dang brgyal ba sangs te/ yang bcom ldan 'das la ngag mthun par gsol ba btab pa/ kye ho rdo

rje 'dzin pa khro bo'i rgyal// rnam dag gnyis med chos sku'i mkha'// cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'jigs pa'i sku// thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don mdzod cig/ zhes zhus pas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// skye 'gag dang
bcas pa'i don 'di bshad do// skye 'gro ma lus chos sku bde ba'i ngang// ye shes thams cad bde ba'i ngang la rdzogs// 'khor ba'i skyon bral bsam yas dpag med sku// 'dul ba'i dbang gis sna tshogs las
su bstan// zhes gsungs pas 'khor rnams mgu bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la ngo mtshar brjod do// 'gro ba las kyis rmongs pa la// gdug pa sku yi rim pa bstan// bstan pa gnyis med mnyam sbyar
bas// gdug pa thams cad bsgral ba ngo mtshar che// de nas nyid kyi sku gshin rje'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho chos kun byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin las// 'phags

pa'i rgyal po rdo rje 'chang rgyal po// 'gro ba'i don du gshin rje gshed// sku gsung thugs kyi phrin las mchog bsdus pa// mi dge mtshams med smin pa kun sgrol ba'i// las kyi rgyal po sbyor ba'i sman pa

mchog/ mchod chen gdug pa snod tshul dregs pa yi// yan lag bcu gnyis bzhi dang g.yang bzhi[(]tsha gzhi[)]dang/ gzer thun drag po'i bsam pa rgyas par mdzod// ces zhus pa gsan nas// snying po byang chub
sems 'dus nas// byin brlabs ldan pas gsang bcud bstan// 'jig rten khams na 'dus pa yis// 'gro ba ma lus dregs pas myos// bstan pa rin chen rgyal lam gcig/ lus kyi sbyor ba brgya phrag

brgyad// yan lag nyis brgya stong bcu drug/ rtsa ba'i lo grangs bdun cu bzhi// bsgrub pa dngos gzhi lnga dang gcig/ bgrod pa'i rim pa drug dang ldan// yan lag lnga dang bcas pa bzhi// rten gyi sbyor ba las bcu
gnyis// 'dren pa'i gsang lam bcu gnyis ldan// sgo dgu gsang bcud A kA'i mchog/ drag po'i sbyor ba bzhi dang brgyad// dbang gi rim pa lnga dang bcas// phyi nang gsang ba'i gsang chen dril// rang

bzhin sprul dang sprul byed las// ye shes ya ma pany+tsa tri// las mchog thabs mchod gnyis dang rtsa// dkar nag las kyi brgya dang bcu// gshin rje ma mo mkha' 'gro ging// bdud dang srin po sha za klu// smyo byed

rgyal po dkor srung gza'// sa bdag sde brgyad srog gcod gnyan// srog gcod chu srin mu stegs sri// log 'dren 'byung po dur khrod bdag khyung khra dur bya bya rgod 'ug khwa rgod ce spyang stag dom wa/ khyi sbrul bung
ba sdig de spyang// 'jig rten dregs pa srog dbang 'phrog/ thams cad dregs shing las la myos// 'khor dang yang 'khor bcas pa yi// gshin rje gshed kyi dge 'dun kun// rgyud 'dir bstan

pa kun 'byung bas// sbyor ba du ma'i bca' gzhi bshad// bcom ldan gshin rje gshed po nyid// lho phyogs gshin rje'i gnas dur khrod chen po na 'khor khro bo dang khro mo dang/ 'bangs la sogs pa rnams kyis/
gtso bo la 'dud pa'i tshul du bzhugs so// de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos/ lag na rdo rje la gsungs nas/ 'khor thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu gsol pa/ 'khor ba'i nyes
skyon thams cad gcod pa'i phyir// 'dul ba'i dbang gis sna tshogs bstan du gsol// zhes zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po nyid dgyes pa chen por gyur te/ 'khor rnams dbang du bsdus nas
gnas so// 'jig rten zil gyis gnon pa'i me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ khro bo'i gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po des/ 'khor rnams

dbang du bsdu bar mdzad de/ ma 'ongs pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i don ched du/ lha gnyan tshe bdag nag po 'jig rten dbang sdud zil gyis gnon pa'i don 'di bka' stsal to// de la tshe bdag gi rang bzhin ni/ snang

zhing srid pas bsdus pa kun// tshe bdag nag po'i ngo bo ste// de la rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i tshe bdag dang/ bdag dbang stobs kyi tshe bdag dang// gnyen po stobs kyi tshe bdag dang// 'jig rten las kyi
tshe bdag go/ de la rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i tshe bdag la/ rnam pa gsum du shes par bya// don rnams lhun grub bstan pa dang// kun rdzob lhun grub bstan pa dang// dbyer med lhun grub bstan

pa'o// don dam la yang rnam pa gnyis// rnam grangs dang ni ma yin pa// kun rdzob la yang rnam pa gnyis// log pa dang ni yang dag go/ bdag dbang stobs kyi tshe bdag ni// rtsa ba bskyed dang spyan drangs
dang// bzhugs gsol phyag dang phyag rgya dang// mchod dang bstod dang bzlas pa dang// skul ba'i don gyi lus bsrung ngo// gnyen po stobs kyi tshe bdag ni// gnyen po 'dul ba'i thugs rje can// 'jam dpal

ya mAn+ta ka ste// tshe bdag las la 'dzud mkhan no// 'jig rten las kyi tshe bdag ni// gsang sngags bka' go log pa ni// rgyu rkyen 'dzom pa'i drag shul spyod// ces gsungs pas 'khor rnams rab tu rtogs shing
ngo mtshor[(]tsha mtshar[)]bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'khor gyi gtso bo 'joms[(]tsha 'jam[)]pa'i rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yon tan thams cad rgyas par mdzod// ces gsol to// de
nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor rnam la gzigs nas/ yon tan kun 'byung mnga' dang bcas// don dang rim gnyis grangs dang tshad// yan lag rgyas 'byung rgyas pa'i gzhi// zhes gsungs
so// de nas yang 'khor thams cad kyi gtso bo 'joms[(]tsha 'jam[)]pa'i rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ 'khor lo zhes bgyi ji ltar lags// rgyud ces bgyi ba ji ltar lags// tshe srog bdag po ji

ltar lags// mgo dgus gang gi don dang ldan// phyag zhabs brgya dang brgyad rnams kyis// yon tan las rnams gang ltar spyod// 'khor lo zhes bya mtshon pa gang// sbyor ba'i rim pa du dang ldan// gzer thun
'khor los las ci 'grub// las kyi mtha' ru gang gis sdud// ces gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yon tan thams cad rgyas par bshad do// rgyud ces bya ba gsum yin te// sku dang gsung

dang thugs kyi rgyud// ngo bo 'brel pa kun gyi gzhi// yon tan phrin las rim pa ni// phyi nang gsang ba kun dang ldan// de mtshon 'brel pas rgyud ces bya// tshe bdag nag po zhes gsungs pa// snang srid bde 'gro

snying po las// srog gi dbang po tshe bkrag kun// 'bru gnyis dag la sdud cing 'char// gang brtsams las kun thogs med 'grub// de phyir tshe srog bdag por gsungs// mgo dgu yon tan 'di lta ste// mgo dgu theg pa
dgu mtshon nas// gab pa dgu yi don dang ldan// bcwa brgyad phyag gi yon tan las// zhing bcu'i srog dang dwangs ma brgyad// bsdus nas dbang po srog zungs 'bral// sa rnams lhun gyis grub nas
bgrod// zhabs rnams brkyang bskum brjid pa ni// srog zungs brgyad dang tshogs brgyad 'gegs// 'jig rten brgyad spangs sa brgyad gnon// zhal dgus sgrol zhing za ba ni// dug lnga brkam chags skye rgyud
bzhi// bcom nas ye shes lnga 'char ba// sku gsung thugs dang ye shes sems// dbyer med don ldan bsam dpag dka'// stod na ye shes me 'bar zhing// sha za bya yi tshogs lding ba// 'dod chags chos sku'i

ngang du sgrol// sku smad khrag dang dug chu 'bab// gcan gzan tshogs rnams rol pa ni// gti mug longs spyod rdzogs skur sgrol// sked las 'phrul dang rin po che// nyi zla gza' skar 'od dang 'bar// 'gying

bag rngam zhing tshogs pa dang// bstan pa'i phyag ni dur khrod 'bar// dur khrod rgyan dang ldan pa ni// sprul pa byang chub tshogs sprul sku// drag po sngags kyis tshar bcad nas// dpe med pa yis bgrod pa'o// las

dang sbyor ba kun spyad nas// phyag rgya chen po bstan zhing brjod// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo ni// mi shigs rdo rje'i skur gsal ba'i// 'khor lo zhes su bstan pa yang// rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa ste// rten 'brel srid
pa'i 'khor lo dang// gnas pa bsam gtan 'khor lo dang// mtshon pa gzugs brnyan 'khor lo dang// gcod pa sngags kyi 'khor lo dang// mnan pa thod pa'i 'khor lo dang// gcod pa 'khor
lo rnam gsum ste// tshad can tshad med 'pho ba'o// de don gzhi yis rgyas par bshad// bsrung dang gzir dang gsad pa dang// lo thog 'joms pa stobs dpag med// dril gtor kha sbyor rgyan gyis
mtshungs// g.yas skor steng nas gcod pa ni// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo me dang 'dra// g.yon skor 'og nas gcod pa ni// chu yi 'khor lo rlung dang 'dra// rkyen gyi stobs kyis lte bar 'gyur// lte ba'i stobs
kyis thams cad gcod// gcod pas 'khor lo zhes gsungs pa'o// gzir gsum mtha' ru zor gsum brdeg/ rang bzhin btsan thabs drag pos gzir// las dang sbyor ba'i tsit+ta gzir/ rten gsum gzugs

dang 'khor lo ming// 'khor ni rnam par bzlog dang bkru// skya rengs srod dang gung la zor// dgu thog rnam lnga'i lcab chen thun// las kyi rim pa skabs dang sbyar// drag po kun gyi gzhi ru gsungs// bcom ldan

'das chos thams cad lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i snying po can rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rang bzhin de 'og min chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i dbyings dag pa'i klong/ sems nyid kyi gnas rang byung ma bsgribs pa'i gzhal

yas khang na/ 'khor rang gi de nyid mkhyen pa dang/ dus gsum gcig pa'i sangs rgyas dang/ sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ nyid kyi ngo bo sprul pa'i lam la gnas pa'i rig 'dzin rnams nye

bar gnas pa'i 'khor gshin rje gshed kyi dge 'dun du+u ma rnams dang/ khrag skyugs ma mo'i tshogs dang// 'thoms pa bdud kyi tshogs dang/ phung byed mngag pa'i tshogs dang/ 'byed pa mi mnga' thugs rje chen
po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'khor rnams la yongs su 'dun par gyur nas/ gsol ba btab pa/ lhun grub brdal ba'i pho brang nas// bde chen mnyam pa'i ngang nyid
las// rdo rje 'chang ba rdzogs pa'i sku// sprul pas 'gro ba'i don mdzod cig/ ces gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor rnams yongs su 'dun par gzigs nas/ chos nyid mi g.yo ba nyid las
bzhengs te/ dbang du sdud pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad g.yos par gyur te/ 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur ro// chem chem rab tu chem chem mo// 'khor thams cad
yongs su brgyal bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor rnams la gzigs nas/ nyid kyi rang bzhin 'di bstan to// e ma ho// chos sku byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin las// rgyu rkyen med pa'i rang
byung sems// thams cad 'byung ba'i snying po las// thams cad thugs rje'i shugs kyis sgrol// zhes gsungs so// de nas 'khor rnams rang gi rang bzhin mthong nas sems yongs su grol bar

gyur te bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho rdo rje snying po khyod// snang stong gnyis su med pa'i skus// sna tshogs sbyor ba rdzogs pa'i bdag/ yin par bdag cag yongs mi

rtog/ rgyu rkyen med par 'byung mi 'tshal// zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje bsnyems pas gsor nas/ 'jig rten 'di rab tu g.yos te/ 'khor thams cad skrag nas rang rang gi srog gi snying
po mdongs gsol du phul lo// bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje des/ srog gi snying po thams cad skye ba med pa'i dbyings nam mkha' drag po'i khongs su bsdus te las thams cad sgra'i dang po'i dang po la
bsdus nas gcig tu dril lo// de nas nyid kyi rang bzhin las ma g.yos pa'i 'khor 'jam dpal gzhon nu des/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ kun gyi rang bzhin yid las byung// sems nyid rdo rje
'dzin pa khyod// mi rtog rang bzhin ting 'dzin las// lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor dang// phyag rgya chen po rdzogs par mdzod// ces gsol ba btab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bde bar mnyam
pa'i ngang las bzhengs te/ sangs rgyas thams cad bskur bar dgongs nas/ phyag rgya'i rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// rang bzhin chos sku mnyam nyid las// lhun gyis grub pa'i

pho brang brtag/ ye shes chen po'i gzhal yas khang// kun 'byung mi 'gyur brtan par gnas// gru bzhi sgo bzhi rin po che// rta babs twa ra rgyan rnams dang// klu brgyad lha brgyad tshangs pa bzhi// rus sbal glang

chen stag gzigs 'brug/ zhing dang zhing chung phod pa sbrul// gnam lcags khro chu chu srin thogs// rgyu ma gling bu keng rus rgyan// e yi pho brang thod mkhar bzhi// lcags mkhar bcu gnyis bcu drug ldan/ khyams

dang gru chad sgo bzhir bcas// rang bzhin lhun gyis grub par gnas// de la gnas pa'i phyag rgya'i sku// rgya chen po yi pho brang du// klu 'bum gnyan khri sa bdag stong// lto 'phye phyogs skyong bzhi dang brgyad
bcas// ma he brgyad dang nyi zla'i gdan// nag po dug chen 'khyil ba'i sku// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// klu gnyan sa bdag zhing chung
sbrul// 'khor lo ral gri rdo rje g.yas// be con gtun shing sdigs mdzub g.yon// glang chen zhing lpags stag lpags sbrul// dbu la rin chen gzhal yas nas// rigs lnga klu brgyad thod pas mdzes// bdud

srin mu stegs rgyal po btsan// mgo dang tsit+tas do shal brgyan// rin po che dang nor bus mdzes// snyan cha mgur chu phyag zhabs sbrul// bdud mo mthing nag thod sbrul brgyan// tsit+ta b+han+d+ha 'khyud dang

stobs// thugs dkar gso byed smug nag gtsor// rigs bzhi rgyan dang thod pas mdzes// 'khor lo tsit+ta g.yas g.yon bsnams// zhing dang sbrul dang lhu dum 'phrul// ya ma'i thugs kar badzra ni// ljang nag rdo
rje snying phreng bsnams// klu brgya'i gdan la gnyan khri gsol// rin chen dbu rgyan rigs bzhis mdzes// gdug pa 'joms mdzad dregs pa'i sku// dregs pa'i thugs kar rus spal gnas// sme ba thig le khrag

dang dug/ mtshon cha'i spu la sder mo lcags// tsit+ta 'od kyi gsang mdzod na// lha srin mi yi snying po 'chang// dbu la bya khyung gdug pa 'dul// spu dang gshog pa mtshon cha me// mchu dang sder mo gnam lcags

'bar// nyi zla khro chu'i spyan dang tshems// gdug pa za zhing zhe sdang sbrul// phrag sor khyung mo smug nag gnyis// spu dang gshog pa mtshon cha me// mchu dang sder mo gnam lcags 'bar// nyi zla khro chu'i spyan dang

tshems// gdug pa za zhing zhe sdang sbrul// nu khar seng ge brjid pa'i tshul// mtshon cha'i spu la sder mo dbal// 'phrul gyi gshog pa khro chu'i so// dgra bgegs za zhing lhu dum 'bral// sogs khar stag chen rngom
brjid gtu?m// mche ba rtsang phur sder mo lcags// glo snying nang khrol snying khrag 'thung// sta zur zhe sdang gdug pa'i gzugs// dug sbrul me 'bar dug khrag 'dzag/ dug lnga brkam chags bsreg cing

'joms// gang dmigs rtsa dang klad khrag 'dren// dug sbrul rlangs pa dgra la 'phro// mgur dang zhabs kyi long bu'i bar// ye shes sems dpa' tshon gang ba// me rlung las kyi 'khor lo 'phro// nyi zla'i gdan la

phyi nang bsrung// ye shes 'khor lo nyi ma'i 'od// thams cad nang khrol gling snying za// phyag rgya chen po brtan par brjid// dbus na brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs// thugs kyi sprul pa mngon phyung ba// mon pa dug
chen dregs pa'i lus// dbu dgu phyag dgus tsit+ta bsnams// phyag dgus bla dang don snying 'bral// drod dang dbang po'i dwangs ma 'chang// bdud bzhi pho nya las la bskul// sha za khrag 'thung rus pa
'cha'// dbugs 'phrog bkrag mdangs tshe srog gcod// yum dang bcas pa thod mkhar bzhir// lhun grub dwangs ma ye shes bzhi// phung po la sogs bdud bzhi 'joms// gnyis 'bras lhun gyi grub par
gnas// lcags mkhar phyogs bzhi'i gzhal yas na// srog gshed phyi yi gshed po bzhi// dug mda' lcags gzer gnag la 'tsher// khyab pa spyi bcings so bdar gnag/ pho brang phyogs bzhir lhun gyis
grub// lcags mkhar brgyad kyi khyams khang na// las kyi sprul pa gshed po bzhi// yum dang bcas te tshogs brgyad 'joms// sgo med bcu drug lcags mkhar na// ki kang sha za dregs pa'i

tshogs// u pi pu ka 'dul ba 'gyel// mngags pa gzhan tshogs lhun gyis grub// dregs pa'i las dang sbyor ba'i grangs// bzhi dang bcu drug bcu gnyis brgyad// de bzhin lnga dang bcu drug brgyad// snying po don

la bcu gnyis gsum yang bco lnga pa'o// de yi snying po mchog bsdus lnga// dbang dang rim pa brtul zhugs lnga// de srog dam tshig gnyis dang gsum// chos nyid mi g.yo bsam gtan lnga// rdzas dang 'dod pa bskul
ba'i rkyen// srog dang las te e ka la// bsdus nas rang dbang gtso la phul// byin rlabs dar bcas thig ler bstim// sangs rgyas kun bdag de bzhin gshegs// rdzogs pa'i tshul du lhun gyis grub// me
rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ khro bo lhun gyis grub pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ brtul zhugs bgrod pa'i dbang 'di gsungs so// slob ma gzhan dbang thob

pa la// bgrod pa mthar phyin rdzogs pa yi// ngo bo sems kyi chos nyid la// rnam grangs gnyis dang rdzas kyi dbang// rig pa brtul zhugs rang dbang rdzogs// dper na rgyal po'i phru gu la// rgyal thabs ma bskur
sa mi 'thob// dbang thob rgyal srid mnga' brnyes tshul// bdag dbang mtshon pa'i rim pa ni// sems nyid dben pa'i bde gnas su// rang nyams brtan pa'i mtshams bcad la// ma d+hal chen po bya ba

brtsams// sngon du 'gro ba'i las rdzogs nas// dur khrod dpa' bo'i rgyu blangs la// thugs kyi sprul pa mkha' khyab spro// gdugs rgyal dri yis khrus byas la// ma d+hal dbus su brgyan par bzhag/ bsam gtan
bum pas rten sbyangs la// lus la gshin rje'i dkyil 'khor brtags// tsit+ta 'od kyi pho brang du// tshe srog bdag po'i dkyil 'khor la// brtan pa rnyed phyir tshogs gtor ma// bya ba'i rim pa'i bsgrub pa
brtsams// brtul zhugs rim pa'i rten du gzhag/ mtshan ldan bkra shis gzungs ma 'dam// rgyal rigs rje rigs sngags skyes ma// mkha' khyab rdo rje'i mdangs ma reg/ lus dang yan lag dbang po
'jam// skya rengs phra 'jam tshigs mig zlum// dpral ba'i dbyibs che smin dkyus ring// mig phra dkyil gnag ut+pal mdog/ shes rab spyod pa'i rnal 'byor ldan// lus la lha yi dkyil 'khor brtag/ tsit+tar

rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brtag/ b+ha ga gsang ba'i pho brang du// lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor brtag/ bde ba chen po'i rten du gzung// rdo rje gsang ba'i chu rgyun gyis// dkyil 'khor lnga dang slob ma
bkru// gsang ba lhun gyis grub pa yi// dkyil 'khor lha la gsol ba gdab// byin rlabs brtul zhugs 'jug pa brtsam// yol bas bar gcad me tog ldan// sdig pa bshags pa sdom pa
'bog/ dam tshig bsgrags nas me tog dor// dkyil 'khor lha yi rnam pa bstan// lce la bdud rtsi'i lung bstan gzhag/ bu de brgyan cing phyag rgya bsgom// tshogs la rol la sta gon gzhag/ rdzas dang dkyil

'khor byin gyis brlab// slob ma gzhug phyir gsol ba gdab// lhun grub rang bzhin gnas pa'i pho brang na// ye shes rgya mtsho lhun gyis grub pa'i lha// ma lus mnyam pa'i rgyal po dgongs su gsol// slob ma
mtshan ldan yum gyi dkyil 'khor du// brtul zhugs drag po stobs kyis gzhug tu gsol// bde chen mnyam pa gsang ba'i pho brang du// rig pa brtul zhugs stobs kyis gzhug tu gsol// slob mas me
tog thogs la brda phyag btsal la/ gsol ba gdab bo// ston pa'i sgron ma bcom ldan 'das// lha dang slob dpon dgongs su gsol// dregs pa stobs kyi tshul bstan pa// 'gyur med bde chen pho brang

na// dregs pa'i lha tshogs dgongs su gsol// b+ha ga gsang ba'i pho brang nas// mnyam pa'i rgyal po dgongs su gsol// dam tshig dka' thub sdom pa'i mchog/ rig pa'i rgyal po bdag la stsol// gsang ba'i ye
shes bdag la stsol// ye shes rim pa bdag la stsol// me tog rin chen dbyig bsdus la// bde chen phyi yi 'jug pa brtsam// phung po lha yi dkyil 'khor bstan// bam chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// 'jug

pa nang gi lha ngo bstan// gzungs ma lus kyi dkyil 'khor du// gsang ba phyi yi lha ngo bstan// tsit+ta nang gi lha ngo bstan// b+ha ga gsang ba'i pho brang du// gdong g.yogs dang ldan spro ba bskyed// bkra shis mtshan

ldan gsang ba'i pho brang du// gnyis med sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// byang chub sems nyid mi 'gyur bde ba'i mchog/ pho brang lhun gyis grub par bzhugs pa dang// sme ba lnga dang bdud rtsir sbyor ba'i

sems// bkra shis mtshan ldan bde ba'i brtul zhugs sbyin// mi 'gyur brtan pa'i sku dang ye shes bgrod// de nas gsang ba'i gzungs ma spro ba bskyed par bya'o// ho bde chen gsang ba'i pho brang du// thabs

chen gsang ba bde phab nas// dbu ma rtsa brgyud sa bon bsreg/ b+ha ga'i gnas su chos bskur bskyil// rtsa lam 'od 'phros longs spyod sku// mnyam par gnas pa byang chub sku// spros bral kun khyab sprul pa'i
sku// brtan pa thob pa rdo rje'i sku// yab yum mnyes pas mnyes par bya// de nas gsang ba'i sbyor ba'i brdas// ye shes nyi zla'i thig le yi// bde bas gang bar byas pa la// sbyor ba dag pa'i byin rlabs
las// rtsa rgyud bde phab thig le bskyil// byang chub sems dang sme ba bsres// bkra shis mtshan ldan bum par bskyil// brtul zhugs rab 'byams dbang bskur bya// ho rig pa'i stobs ldan sbyor
ba'i gnas// 'khrul pa'i bag chag sprin lta bu// ye shes rol pa'i sgron ma gsal// mnyam pa'i stobs kyi brtul zhugs longs// e ka ya ma pra tI ts+tsha ho// me tog dor la mgo la gdags// mtshan ldan bkra
shis pho brang dang// drag po stobs kyi lha ngo bstan// bkra shis bum pa'i dbang bskur bya// ho ye shes lhun grub bum pa yis// brtul zhugs dag pa'i dbang bskur bas// 'khor ba rnam dag chos skur

gsal// rang byung ye shes dbang thob shog/ e ka ya ma g+hu h+ya b+ha ga bo d+hi tsit+ta ho// 'bras bu khrag 'thung ye shes lngar// rdzogs pa'i phyag rgya lhun grub pa'o// de nas dur khrod rgyan gyi dbang sbyin pa ni/ glang chen

stag sham zhing lpags sbrul// thod pa snying phreng keng rus brgyan// me ri dur khrod dbang bskur bas// dregs pa'i stobs dang ldan par shog/ e ka ya ma hasti ma hA nA ga ka pA la tsit+ta dz+wa la ni ri ho// de nas phyag

mtshan spyin pa ni// ho 'khor ba 'dral byed 'khor lo dang// nyon mongs gcod pa'i ral gri dang// chos nyid mtshon pa'i rdo rje yis// sku gsum mnyam pa'i dbang thob shog/ e ka ya ma tsakra khaD+ga badzra ho// be
con dug lnga ye shes lnga ru sgrol// gtun shing gdug pa gnas su 'joms// sdigs mdzub dug gsum sku gsung ngang du rdzogs// rig pa stobs kyi sgo gsum dbang thob shog/ e ka ya ma b+hi ha hu tu sa ra pa

ho// mnyam pa'i brtul zhugs sbyin pa ni// ho rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyar nas// pad+ma rak+ta byang chub sems// bam chen sme ba don dang sbyar// brtul zhugs rol pa'i dbang bskur bas// mi zad rgyan gyi dbang thob

shog/ e ka ya ma g+hu h+ya rak+ta bod+d+hi tsit+ta hoH mAM sa rak+ta tsit+ta pU dza ta keng ni ri ti hoH/ dpa' gtum sngags kyis byin bskyed pa'i// bam chen ro la mnyam par rol// rdo rje brjid pa'i dbang thob nas// bde chen

mnyam nyid thob par shog/ e ka ya ma a d+hi pa ta sid+d+hi hoH longs spyod dag pa'i dbang bskur ba// 'chi med rang byung ra sA yan// bkra shis mtshan ldan lhag pa'i rdzas// 'phel 'grib med pa'i dbang bskur

bas// rigs lnga ye shes lnga yi dbang thob shog/ e ka ya ma sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta// gnya' na shud+d+ha hoH/ bkra shis dngos grub ga bu ['u] ru// mi 'gyur brtan pa'i tshe bskyil nas// rang rtags tshe yi dbang bskur

bas// 'chi med brtan pa'i dbang thob shog/ e ka ya ma A yur+dz+nyA na sid+d+hi ho// snod kyi 'jig rten gtor gzhong du// bcud kyi 'jig rten gtor mar gsal// 'byung ba rnam lnga gtor ma'i rgyu// lhun grub kun
'byung gtor ma'i rgyan// 'dzin chags med pa'i stobs kyis rol// e ka ya ma ma hA ba lin+ta pU dza ho// dam tshig bsgrag la mna' chu blud par bya'o// snod med brtul zhugs zhan pa la// spel zhing

bsgrags na rdo rje khro bo dang// gtum po gnod sbyin rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// lus dral mgo gshag tsit+ta khrag tu 'thung// e ka ya ma kA ya wA ka tsit+ta rak+ta khA hi ho/ khyod kyi rdo rje 'chang chen nga yin pas// bka' yi

zur yang bcag par bya ba min// bsgo ba byos la dam tshig srog ltar srungs// gal te 'das na rdo rje dmyal bar ltung// e ka ya ma du ma du na rak+ta ho yang rag len da na ho// 'di ni rdo rje dmyal ba'i chu// tshul 'di

bsrung na dngos grub thob// nyams na tsit+ta gshags te 'pho// rdo rje'i chu 'di khyod kyis longs// badzra kro d+ha i daM ho// 'dod pa lnga yi tshogs la rol// rgyud gsum lhug pa'i man ngag bstan// rdo rje 'dzin gyi
gral thob yin// brtul zhugs gsang ba'i bgrod pa gsum// thob na mi ldog sa la gnas// brtul zhugs gsang ba'i dbang du bshad// me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ brtul zhugs dbang gi le'u ste
gsum pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dam tshig gzungs kyi don 'di gsungs so// dka' thub dam tshig sdom pa'i don// chos rnams ma lus kun gyi gzhi// sngags 'chang dbang bgrod dam
pa'i srog/ ngo bo chos sku byang chub sems// 'khor 'das lhun grub ngang du rdzogs// des mtshon dam tshig srog ltar bsrung// rnam grangs rnam pa gnyis su bshad// thun mong rtsa ba yan lag gnyis// sku

gsung thugs dang byang chub sems// yan lag mi spang dang du blang// bsgrub dang spyad dang shes pa ste// bcu gnyis lnga ru 'dus par bshad/ khyad par bsrung dang dka' thub gnyis// bsrung ba nyi shu rtsa gcig
dgos// rdo rje rmang gi ri mi bshig/ mngon byung brtul zhugs dogs med spyad// gcan gzan rgyal po gsad mi bya// za ma tog tu dug mi blug/ rin chen lha bran bsreg mi bya// gangs kyi zhun chu btung ba
min// bdud rtsi snod ngan nang mi blug/ mi shis smod du mdangs mi dbab// snod ngan seng ge'i zho mi blug/ yid bzhin nor bu bsreg pa min// bya khyung gshog pa bcag mi bya// gnam lcags ur mo nang mi

'thab// stag gzig rol pa'i sha mi za// rdo rjes gtams pa'i brag mi bshig/ rdo rje'i ra ba'i rmang mi 'dral// mun pa sel ba'i sgron mi gsad// rdo rje chu bo'i rka mi gcag/ rgyal po phyag rgya'i rtags mi dbyi// rdo
rje rdzong gi mkhar mi bshig/ rin chen rgyal mtshan rtse mi dbrog/ lhag pa'i dam tshig bsrung bar bshad// dka' thub sngags kyi sgo mo yin// gsang ba'i lam min gzhan mi bzur// drag sngags thun mtshams
gtam mi bya// 'jig rten dman la phyag mi btsal/ khro bo'i chos dgu tshul dgu dang// brdeg 'phen 'dzin mchong rgyug gnon gdeng// sdem gdung b+ha gar ro mi khri// gshe bzhad gdong gtsigs
rngam 'dril 'dzum// gar dgu stabs dgu brtags te bzlas// mtshan ldan gzungs ma rab tu bsten// re dogs som nyi med par gzhom// tsha gsum rul gsum myang bar spyad// 'khor lo gzir bsreg gnan
dang zor// lus kyi dbang po gzhan mi bstan// shes rab ma yi zur mi bcag khyad par dka' thub bsrung bar bshad// 'das na nad mang tshe thung 'pho// drag sngags don la ma nyes 'byung// dus min tshe zad
dmyal bar lhung// bsrungs na yon tan rin chen gter// byin rlabs kun 'byung bden pa gnyis// ngag btsan bkur gnas dge bcu 'phel// skye med bde chen mnyam par gnas// sngags kyi go mtshon yun du
bde// bskang na bgrod pa gsum bskur la// lta spyod ma nor yengs med bzlas// sbyor ba'i rgyal po lam las bgrod// yang dag bde ba'i don gsal 'gyur// 'bras bu bgrod thob lhun gyis grub// gnyis
med bde chen mnyam par gnas// snang stong ngo bo rang grol bas// bsrung ba yod par ngas ma bshad// me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las dka' thub dam tshig gi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas

bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal po bde ba chen po des rgyud kyi don 'di rgyas par bshad do// rang bzhin ma bsgribs ye shes sku// 'gag med bde chen khyab gsal[(]tsha sku[)]stu// lhun grub spros bral phyag

rgya'i sku// brda khyab thig le nyag gcig sku// ma 'gags kun 'byung spang blang med// sna tshogs rol pa bya rtsol bral// nam mkha' yongs la mdung bskor bas// sangs rgyas mdzad par kho thag gcad// gnas

par rang rgyud drug dang ldan// sum cu gnyis rtsib bde chen gnas// 'bru bzhi yan lag 'phro dang 'debs// 'bru drug yang bcu drug longs spyod gsal 'bar ba// brgyad dbus bzhi ldan chos 'khor lo// lam nyid
kyang las gnyis don ldan 'bras bur smin// bcu drug bzhi ldan sprul pa'i gnas// bzhi rtsibs gsang ba rdzong la gnas// drug rtsibs 'khor lo mdo gsum 'dzin// bdud dang rang gshed mnyam pa'i don// lta

ba'i rgyal po rang gsal yin// spyod pa las kyi 'khor los mtshon// lnga brgyad phral bas sum cu brgyad// de dag rang rgyud gnas pa yin// gnas pa'i 'khor lo thod par bca'// thod par snying po'i bcud sdud

byed// las dang srog dang bla sdud la/ khyams khang gshed kyi gsang mdzod yin// rim pa mngon du bgrod byas nas// dpa' bo'am gri mo lang tsho la// sbyong ba gsum dang lha bkod la// sngags kyi drod ldan brtul
zhugs blangs// rgyal rigs rje rigs sngags 'chang la// bcu gnyis bcu drug bar la brtag/ gong bzhin brtags la brtul zhugs blang// rkyen gsum rang rgyud drug bkod la// sbyang sreg dbab
bskyil thig ler gsal// sme ba don dang mnyam sbyar la// brtul zhugs rnam gsum longs spyod ldan// skye ba med pa'i dbyings su grol// spyi dang khyad par yan lag gsum// bsrung dang ma bsrungs bde dang

sdug/ bde chen na rag dong sprug gi/ las kyi rim pa 'di lta ste// rtsa ba kun 'byung 'khor lo ni// gsang chen mchog tu dril ba yang// yang gsang sbyor ba'i drug gnyis bzhi// brda don gol dang smin pa'i

las// ha la nag po sbrul 'dzin lhar// sbyor ba bcu bdun dag dang ldan// don gnyis mngon du spyad pa yis// bla chen sprul pa yang sprul tshogs// rtags med kun 'byung drug dang ldan// 'bras bu 'joms pa'i
las gzhi yin// chu dril zor 'phang du bas gzir// chu rgod gnams thog chen po 'bebs// dmar len sngags kyi mthu bsdus nas// las kyi 'khrul 'khor mtshon char 'bebs// snying po kun gyi mthu dril

nas// 'bru brgyad dmod pa'i las dang sbyar// rigs kyang rims sogs las dbang gnod pa'i gdon// sngags kyi brdeg pa drug dang ldan// ltar 'jug phyir 'byung zhe sdang gzhi// kun 'byung rtagasas med khong nas

'byung// gang rung mtshon cha kha sbyar bya// brjod pa skabs dang sbyar la spyad// mgo la rjes gcod bsreg pa brdeg/ kun 'joms sbyor ba'i rgyal po yin/ gru bzhi cha mnyam rus spal ltor// ye shes lnga yi thig
grangs la// mgo dang mjug mar thig rkang gdab// de bzhin lto gnyis thig rkang drangs// thig bzhi rgya gram legs par gdang// lte bar 'khor lo bcu gnyis bca'// thig skor rim pa gsum gsum
bskor// dbus su gru gsum rgya gram ldan// byang khog stod kyi 'khor lo gnyis// rtsibs bcur bla chen sprul pa'i sngags// g.yas pa'i rtsibs mchan bcu zhi la// yang sprul 'joms pa'i spu gri gnas// g.yon
pa'i rtsibs mchan bcu bzhi la// chags sdang 'joms pa'i spru gri gnas// de bzhin bskyed pa'i 'khrul mig bzhir// bcu gnyis rtsibs 'gyur rtags med dang// kun 'byung sngags kyi gcod pa dgod// de yi

gsad pa mchog tu sbyar// g.yas g.yon bco lnga'i bab lnga'i tshogs bdun yang rtsibs bdun la// srung ba'i rtags med kun 'byung dgod// lte ba smad kyi 'khor lo bzhir// \u0f82rtsibs bdun rtsibs dgu de bzhin
bcu// bcu gcig rtsibs dang ldan pa la// mi 'khor 'khor 'jug don pa la// brdeg pa drag sngags mtshan re gnas// yan lag lo tog 'joms pa bzhi// kun la rgya gram rtsa ba'i sngags// lag g.yas bcu
drug spogs dang gzir// lag g.yon rtsibs dgu gzir ba'i sngags// rkang g.yas rtsibs dgu thabs kyi sngags// rkang g.yon bco brgyad dus la 'joms// chu rgod 'khyags pa ri ltar
'bebs// 'og la rjes gcod 'khor lo bsreg/ rgya gram bcu gnyis rtsibs la gdab// rtsa ba brgyad dang bcu gnyis bsreg/ gdug pa'i sngags dang rdzas bsreg ldan// bla chen bzhi dang chags sdang bzhi// mi

mthun 'khor lo kha sbyar bsngags// sprul dang yang sprul kha sbyar brdeg/ kun 'byung rtags med de bzhin brdeg/ rus spal lto bar gsad la sbyar// chu srin gzir ba'i 'khor lo sbyar// zor dang du ba kha sbyar

la// dbab dang bsrung ba rus sbal yang// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las kun 'byung rtsa ba'i sngags 'di bton to// srog la hril shag tsit+ta rbad tsit+ta breng shag dzaH srog

la thun rmugs rbad tsit+ta breng shag dzaH dgra bo'i srog la dun shag/ tsit+ta breng breng hur thuM dza/ sog la thun gzir shag rbad/ tsit+ta breng shag dzaH/ srog la yaM yaM rbad/ nr-i tsit+ta breng shag dzaH srog la mA ra ya rbad/ nr-i

tsit+ta hur breng dzaH tsit+ta gzir nan/ srog la myogs rtsa la rbad/ yaM yaM hur tsit+ta khaM shag rtsa la myags rbad/ hab tang hab tang ro myags dzaH kring kring hi nan/ yal yal tsit+ta rbad/ ha la ha la tsa ma ri khaM shag rbad/

ha la ha la/ yaM yaM/ tsit+ta breng breng dun dun dzaH de ba dza dun sa nA ga snying gzer thun phrom phrom hril hril shar shar phob/ nA ga dza yaM snying gzir shar phrom phob/ dzaHyi phro+oM shar hril khaM shar hril phob/ nA ga u nan

dza/ yaM phob ma hi hri ta yang ta ya phob/ ra mi tsit+ta khaM shag srog la hur/ yaM khaM shag raM thuM tsit+ta rbad raM/ nges pa'i don dang ldan pa'i gdeng// nyams rtags phyi ste spyod yul min// de yis las thig rdzogs par
bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gab pa thugs kyi las 'di bshad do// dmar len sngags kyi dmed pa las// dgu gsum gang rung thang ba bya// 'khor lo'i rim pa bzhin du bskor// dbus kyi
'khor yug pho brang du// bde ba'i rgyal po nam mkha'i 'bru// phyi rim bar 'khyams 'khor lo brgyad// mu khyud rim pa gsum du bskor// kun gyi dbus nyid rgya gram ldan// phral nas rtsa ba'i 'bru
brgyad dgod// gnyis pa sa khams drug gnyis rtsibs// mnan la stobs kyi 'bru yis dgang// me khams de bzhin bsreg pas dgang// chu khams de bzhin lo tog 'joms// rlung khams bcu gnyis bsad la
shis// 'debs dang drod mtshams thams cad gzir// g.yengs dang drod mtshams 'bras bu srun// drod dang chu mtshams rnam shes 'phrog/ g.yengs dang 'degs mtshams gdug pa gzir// kun kyang rus sbal
kha sbyar la// lnga na las rdzogs gdug par gtad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las drag sngags 'di bton no// a myags ya rngubs mug shag ka dun/ dgra bo'i

srog la mA ra ya rbad nr-i hur thuM dzaH/ dgra bo'i srog la thun gzir sbur nan s+t+waM b+ha ya nan/ dgra bo'i srog la raM thuM tsit+ta rbad/ kha raM dz+wa la raM/ nA ga u nan/ snying gzer phrom shag kham hril phob ya/ sarba u nan thum

ril sbur nan sha truM 'drid nan phyung rbad/ sarba sha truM s+t+waM b+ha ya na sha ya nan rbad rbad/ tsit+ta breng breng rtsa la dun dun/ srog hur thuM dzaH sa na ga ha la ha la ya ma ya ma/ snying gzer sbur nan/ phral la las kyi skabs su

bca'// dman la las kyi sbyor ba bshad// gzhan yang yan lag gang gsungs pa// rno myur phag mo'i lto bar bca'// ye shes thig le'i ngang la 'char// 'phen dang slong ba'i dbus kyi lte// mtshon cha mu khyud lnga

dang ldan// dbus su gru gsum rgya gram phyed// bcu gnyis rtsibs bsnol bar khyams zlum// dbus su gru gsum rnam par brtag/ gnyis pa rgya gram rtsa ba'i sngags// bcu gnyis phyi nang gsang ba'i 'bru// bar

khyams lto sbyor sgrub pa'i sngags/ kha sbyor byas la dong rtsar brnag/ sngags kyi yan lag spogs pa yin// gdug pa'i klu la gtad par bya// dgra bo'i srog la hur thuM rbad/ tsit+ta breng shag dza/ dza shag breng tsit+ta thuM

hur dgra bo'i srog rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la thums// tsit+ta hur breng dza shag rbad/ brnag pa rno myur stobs dpag med// yan lag rno dbal mtshon cha yin// gzhan yang phung byed sdig pa'i las// las kyi rim pa

sngar bzhin las/ khyad par lha srin dkrug pa'i las// sdig pa chen po'i lto ba ru/ mu khyud rim pa lnga dang ldan// rgya gram bcu gnyis rtsibs dang khyams// lha srin lho dkrug las kyi mchog/ rtsa ba'i sngags dang spu

gri dgod/ kha sbyar dug chu tsha bar ldan// sngags bzlas sdig pa'i klu la gtad// gsang sngags sbyor ba dril la brdeg/ ya rngubs e shag dun myags ka mug dgra bo'i srog la shag breng dzaHtsit+ta hur thuM rbad/ sbyor
ba gang brtsam mtha' ru bsngags// spogs pa drag po'i las su bshad// 'bru bzhi las kyis rim pa ni// dur khrod dben pa'i bde gnas su// rang sems dben pa'i mtshams bcad la// dur khrod rgyu la thang pa

bya// mu khyud bzhi dang ldan par bskor// lte bar gru gsum ma ra nr-i// gnyis pa rdo rje rgya gram la// ye shes sprul pa las bdag yum// gsang ba'i snying po 'bru bzhi dgod// gsum pa 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad

la// mtshan mo gcod pa'i spu gri dgod// phyi yi rtsibs bcu rtse mo na// nyin mo gcod pa'i 'bru bcu dgod// mtshon cha bsnol ba'i bar du ming// srid pa'i rus sbal lto bar bca'// sngags bzlas dag klu yang la
gnod pa mnan// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las/ drag sngags dril ba 'di bton to// e dun ka yaM dgra bo'i srog la breng breng rbad/ nr-i srog la dun dun rbad/ khaM shag rtsa

la rbad/ srog la myogs rbad/ khyer phyung mug ti/ ling shag ling dzaH nyin mtshan gsum du sbyor ba brtsams// 'bru bzhi rtsa bzhi gcod par bshad// gzhan yang lo tog 'joms pa la// lta zor gzir gsum dril
la dbab// gcan gzan dar ma'i thod pa la// gdug pa gsum gyi khrag gis bsku/ khrag gsum dug sna sngo nar bcas// sbyor ba sbal pa'i lto bar bca'// yul dbus gdug pa'i rten la gzhug/ bcom lnga dgu
gsum bzhi ru brtsam// mdung gang dmar thag sa sros dbab// lha srin 'byung ba dkrug la dbab// e yang ka dun srog gzir trig nan// raM shar yaM phob// baM raM khrag b+h+yo// spogs pa med pa'i las su

bshad// gzhan yang thog rgod drag po'i las// nye bar gnam thog dril 'bebs pa// 'ug sgong sbrul shun ming bcas dang// gser sogs rgod snying mda' dang dar// me long gri thod rbod thod spos sman yang spos dang
sman// sum dril drag po gcig brdebs pas// zhu 'phen tshad 'phen gnad la dbab// 'bum phrag sngags bzlas rgya bar bstim// gong gi dus tshod nye bar 'phang// gnam thog chen po las kyi mchog/ ka yaM e

dun phram shar sid krol dral chems yaM raM khas b+h+yo/ mA ra ya rbad bde ba'i rgyal po sbyor ba'i mchog/ rig pa'i klong nas 'phen zhing 'joms// gzhan yang ltas ngan dbab pa'i las// bya dang gcan gzan thod

chen la// ltas ngan khrag gis kha mig bya// brnag pa'i mkhar dang ming rus bri// bdun khri bdun stong skor rer thun// tshes dang za ma skar ma ni// nag po sme ba gcig la gtad// them 'og 'gram bres lam du

sba// dgra bo sarba yengs dum ling/ hab phob nan/ drag sngags las kyi rgyal po mngag/ gzhan yang srung ba'i las gsungs pa// dur khrod ras sam shog bu la// sbyor ba lnga dang tsha ba dug/ las kyi 'khor lo mu
khyud bzhi// dbus su gru gsum zla gam gsum// phyi rim rgya gram ra bzhir ldan// yang logs mu khyud zlum po chu// mtha' ma rtsibs chen bcu gnyis ldan// srid pa'i khyams khang lto bar bca'// gnas shing

dgod pa 'di lta ste// gru gsum gang 'dod snying po ming// zla gam gsum la stong yang ldongs pa'i ming// rgya gram rtsa ba'i 'bru bzhi dgod// myu khyud rbod gtong gdug pa'i mi// bcu gnyis rtsibs la spu gri sbyar/ kha
sbyar dar dang sngon dmar bsdam// dur ma gru gsum ling+ga gnag/ phyag rgya zil gnon gsal byas la// zhag lnga bskul cing mchog phur gdab// nad pa bdugs la phying pas dgab// thon nas ka rten gnyan sar

mnan// gnod pa kun gyi sbyor ba gcod// drag sngags sbyor ba las tshogs brgyad// sarba tsit+ta ro myags kha thaM/ 'drid phyung shag rbad/ srog la breng breng shag dun dun e raM hur thuM dzaHdzaH sa nA ga

snying gzer sbur nan kham shag rtsa la rbad/ sa nA ga dzaH sa nA ga thums/ sa nA ga rbad/ sa nA ga tsit+ta ro myag kha thaM/ 'drid phyung shag rbad srog la hur thum rbad// khaM dz+wa la raM/ sarba sha truM nan/ 'drid yang

bzlog/ sbur nan/ 'drid rbad/ e ka yaM shag 'drid phyung khaM shag trid sbur nan/ sarba sha truM na sha ya staM b+ha ya na sha ya nan phaT/ las rnams rgyas pa'i rim pa ni// che ba dril ba'i las tshogs 'di// thun mong spyod

pa'i las su bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis phag mo khong yan gyi sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// 'khor lo kha sbyor byas la ni// thod pa'i nang du ling+ga dang bcas la gzhug thod pa dong gru gsum du rtsang

gis bskor ba'i nang du gzhug dong gi kha dar mthing nag gis bcad/ zhag gsum du gsal ba rnam pa gsum du bsgom la/ e myags ya rngubs mug shag ka dun dgra bo'i tsit+ta breng shag dzaHsrog la hur thuM rbad/

ces nus tshad bzlas/ bskul ba gsum yang du btang/ de thon nas/ mnan sngags khri bzlas la thod pa bca' ba ni/ e myags ya rdubs mug shag ka dun dgra bo'i srog s+t+waM b+ha ya nan de nas nyi ma dmar thag

chad nas/ sa sros kyi bar du gnan pa bya/ klu gzir ba'i sngags e myags ya rngubs mug shag ka dun/ sa nA ga snying gzer rbud nan/ zhes nus tshad byas la/ chu mig gi phyogs gnyis su lcags phur dang seng

ldeng gi phur bu gdab bo// de nas yang nya stong byung tsa na/ khrag skam thod pa gang gi nang du/ ling+ga dang ming bcug la/ gsang sngags nyin zhag gsum du bzlas la bskul ba bya'o// tshes gcig gam bcu drug gi skya

rengs shar tsam na/ ling+ga gtubs la dug khrag gi chus sbyangs la/ zor du 'phang ba'i sngags ni/ e myags ya rngubs mug shag ka dun dgra bo'i srog la thun rmugs b+h+yo/ sngags 'di brgya 'am stong du bzlas la zor

du 'phang// ser ba bzlog pa'i sngags la/ e myags ya rngubs mug shag ka dun sarba sha truM s+t+waM b+ha ya nan/ hUM phaT/ gdong tshugs su bzlog go/ nad pa'i sngas su gdon gzir ba'i sngags/ e myags ya rngubs
mug shag ka dun snying gzir/ rbud nan ha la ha la tsa ma ri kham shag rbad/ me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las// thun mong gis las bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das
kyis khyad par gyi las 'di gsungs so// brda don thabs kyis grol ba'i las// ba dang 'o ma zho dang mar// zhun mar snum gyi snying po bcud// snying po la sogs bzhi gnyis ldan// yengs med brtan pa bgrod
pa'i thabs// dmar len sngags kyi snying phyung yin// gong mthun rgyu la 'khor lo bca'// dpa' brtul drag po'i stobs kyis spyad// gdug byed phag mo'i lto ba ru// srid pa khyams khang srog sdud

bca'/ khyams khang lto na brnag pa'i gzugs// spyi gtsug snying gar mtshon cha bca'// mu khyud bzhi'i dbus ming rus bri// phyi rim rgya gram rtsa ba'i sngags// yang logs bcu gnyis spu gri'i mtshon// mu khyud ming

rus lto sbyar bsad// rus sbal lto na mtshon cha'i rtsibs// rtse mo nang bstan spu gri bzlog/ phag mo lug la mnan pa'i sngags// 'bru bzhi srog dang a mu ka/ bskyod pa'i yan lag dbugs la zhon// don gnyis
bsdus pa'i sbyor ba bya/ kha sbyor dur mar brnag pa'i gzugs// rgyu rkyen drug byas tsog bur gzhag/ snying gar mchog phur ya ma gdab// bsgom bskul drag sngags bsnol mar brdeg/ rab kyis bskang thon
bsnol mar gcod// 'bring gis bcu par de bzhin bsnol// dman pas brgya brgya bsnol mar gcod// dug lnga sku lnga ye shes lnga// gsang lam sgo dgu rtsa lam 'jug/ bde ba'i ye shes rang la gsal// 'pho ba
gsum gyi brda dang sbyar// dmar nag rtogs pa'i khrag dkyil nas// bsdu ba'i yi ge gsum gyis 'phrog/ tsa na'i 'bras bu rten la thim// thod pa'i snying po bcud bsdus bya// klu la bcud par 'gran zlar

gtad// gzhan du bcud dang spu grir sbyar// yi ge byin can steng du btab// phyag rgya chos sku sprul bsam yas// thob cing bgrod pa sngags kyi stobs// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las

mchog gi drag sngags 'di bton to// srog la rtsa khrag snying thuM ril nan/ raM shag rbad nr-i srog hur thuM dzaH gzhan yang gab gsang gnag pa'i las// rgyal blon stobs can yul bsrungs la// rten gyi gzugs

brnyan rgya shog la// phag mo sdig pa'i lto ba ru// mu khyud rim pa bzhi bzhir bskor// dbus su ling+ga lus la bca'// nr-i dang rgya gram rtsibs bcu drug/ rtsa ba spu gri ming rus khams// bcas la ling+ga'i rten drug

brnag/ nyin zhag phrugs gcig gsum du brnag/ mtshon cha'i brdeg thabs snga ma bzhin// rngam tshig lus bskyod lu mar gtad// drag sngags sbyor ba 'di lta ste// dgra bo'i srog la hur long rbad// nr-i rtsa
khrag thibs hur thum dzaH/ ming dang gzugs kyis rims dal 'bebs// rgyal ba'i ye shes rnal mar bshad// gzhan yang mdze rims dbab pa'i las// sbal ba'i lto bar brnag pa'i gzugs// snying gar nr-i dza

la mA ra ya rbad/ bkod la mdze can khrag gis bsku// dkar nag gdug pa lto sbyar la// sdig pa phag mo'i lto ba ru// mu khyud bzhi bzhi rgya gram rtsibs// gong bzhin bkod la kha sbyor bca'// klu nag sdig pa'i
snying la gtad// drag sngags 'bum tsho dgu+u ru sbyar// de yis mdze rims yams su 'bebs// thod pa mdze can dmar chod la// spos chen bdud rtsi gu gul bsang// drag sngags sbyor ba gnyis su

brdeg/ e ka tsa dun khrag yaM rngubs shing// srog la baM ril raM shag rbad/ tsit+ta breng hur thuM dzaH dz+wa la 'bar ba'i las su bshad/ gzhan yang lo tog 'joms pa'i las// nye bar spogs me gcig tu dril// sde
brgyad kun gyi mthu bsdus nas// thod pa gsum la ming gzugs yul// sbyor ba bcug la gta' mar gzhug/ phur pa khrag dang mon thod du// sngags bstim 'bum rdzogs dbab pa brtsam// dug khrag bya phag
gsur chen brun// du bas gzugs gzir lcags phur gdab// rang nyid phyag rgya zil gnon bsgom// drag sngags sbyor ba dril la brdeg/ e ka ya rngubs shag mug dun myags/ phrom phrom shar shar hri la nA ga

snying gzer rbad/ yaM thun ya/ shag hril b+h+yo// khyad par gdug pa'i rten la gzir// lha btsan bsten la the brang gzir// 'jig rten lo tog 'joms par bshad// me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ khyad
par gyi le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brnag pa mngon du phyung ba'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// gsang ba'i gsang bcud gab pas gsang// rang la rang gi gsang gin gab// gab

sbas thugs kyi brnag pa 'di// sbyor ba'i rim pa lnga dang ldan// tsha ba'i rgyal po rtsa ba gsum// bse bya'i sha dang bse bya'i khrag/ ma bsrungs zhe sdang lus las sdud// bdun khri'i mtha' ru yul la bskrad// nam

mkha' bar snang sa la gsum// mal lam ya them ma them la// bsku zhing sbas pas sbyor ba sdud// sbyor ba lo ma dus la smin// bgreng dang rkang bzhi'i lus la bsku// sbyor ba'i zla ba dus na smin// g+hu h+ya tsit+ta

brnag pa'i mchog/ de bzhin gnyen po stobs dpag med// ga bur skyer chu kha ru tsha// zil pa shugs drangs rdo rje'i chu// nyung rgod khan+Da drug 'dres la// sngags kyi rgyal po khri gsum bstim// lus la bskus te

'thungs pas 'joms// sbyor ba de bzhin drag po'i don// 'di yang gsang ba'i sbyor ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las/ sngags 'di bton to// hur ya tsa ma ri ha la thum

tsit+ta khas mA ra ya rbad e raM baM raM laM ha la tsa ma ri phyung hur thuM dz+wa la raM/ brnag pa'i rgyal po bka' bor bden// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lo tog gzhom pa'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// las kyi rim pa
gsum yin te// rnal ma bzlog dang stobs dkrug gsum// dang po sa gsum sngo sna gsum// tsha ba gsum dang ha la yis// gzugs brnyan sor tshad bzhi sngags kyis// mon thod nang du brun gsum bstim/ khri tsho
brgyad du dril la dbab// dmigs pa'i yul dang bsrung ba brnag/ des ma phebs na sbyor ba bzlog/ dmigs pa'i yul nas gzugs blangs la// tsha ba'i rgyal po de bzhin gsum// bskus la
gzugs brnyan bar du gzhug/ brun gsum 'bru gsum mon thod bstim// dug shing rdzas brgyad du+u bas bdug/ dmigs pa'i yul dang rten la bstim// des ma phebs na sbyor ba gzhan// dug dang mnol khrag
sbal pa gnyis// bag zan bsres pa'i sor bzhi'i tshad// gnyis sbyar bar du gson ma gzhug/ lcags phur khri bzhi dril zhing gzir// mtha' ru yul dbus chu mig dkrug/ rdzas rgod brgyad kyi dud pas

bdug/ gsal ba khyad par zil gnon rtags// chu rgod 'khyags pa ri ltar gtibs// dam pa'i sbyor ba drag sngags brdeg/ phrom shar nA ga hur/ yaM hril b+h+yo b+h+yo hril yaM/ hur nan shar phrom thun phob nA ga snying

gzir hril yaM/ phu hur thums dzaH shar b+h+yo phob drag tu phob/ lo tog gzhom pa'i sbyor ba bshad// de nas yang lha srog kun gyis mthu dril drag por bshad/ de nas snod dang ldan pa dkon pas/ rgyal cig dang

phrad na sbyor ba bsgyur ba brtsam// le lo the tshom byed na rang yang phung// 'khor dang longs spyod brlag/ drag po me rlung dug dang mtshon cha yin// skyon dang las kyi brnag pa gsang rgyas gdab// me rlung skyi 'dang
'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ man ngag drag po rtsa ba'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snying po nye bar dril ba'i las 'di gsungs so// 'jig rten dregs pa'i mthu bsdus

nas// nag po bde ba'i 'bru la dril// rno dbal mtshon cha'i rgyal por bca'// sngags kyi lus la spu gri gdags// rang gnad phyag rgya 'jig cing 'pho// sngags pa bon po rigs ngan la// rang bdud phyag rgya rang
bdud 'bebs// de yi sbyor ba rgyas pa ni// chos sku bde ba'i ngang nyid las// bde ba'i ye shes rang shar ba// bde ba'i thig le mnyam par rdzogs// gnas pa'i 'khor lo bde bas 'degs// bde ba chen pos
'khrul pa 'joms// dge bcu ma yengs mtshan brjod pa// bdud dang gshed ma rgyud las sdang// gzugs brnyan 'khor lo ma yin te// gang yin snying gi 'khor lo la// dwangs ma bzhi la gsang gshed bzhi// rtsa

phran brgyad la phyi nang gshed// mdud pa bzhi la mtshon cha'i dbal// rtsa phran yang logs 'chi bdag bdud// rtsa sgo gzhan tshogs b+h+yo rbad nan// 'dus pa gsum la yab yum e// dkar nag chags pa rten gzhi

'bru// bskul bas rang rgyud gshed du ldang// ma yi khong nas rnam shes 'phrog/ 'bru gsum lcags sder 'dzings pa'i tshul// rtsa dang srog bcad lus srog dbye// tsit+ta'i dkyil nas 'bru gcig sdud// de yis rang
gshed rang la 'bebs// de bzhin lus kyi 'khor lo la// phung po lnga la srog bdud gshed// gsang ba'i bdud bzhi rang las ldang// rnam shes tshogs brgyad phyi nang sdud// yul brgyad de bzhin

gshed mo brgyad// bzlas pa'i rkyen gyis rgyud las ldang// skye mched bcu gnyis 'chi bdag bdud/ khams bco brgyad la sgrol ging bdud// yan lag bzhi la bla rkun bzhi// so dang skra dang sgal tshigs sha za'i
tshogs// bzlas shing bskul bas rang bdud dbab// gshed rgyud phyi yi bdud du dbab// b+h+yo bzhi gnad kyis gang bsgrub pa'i// mkha' 'gro gzhan tshogs gzan la 'bebs// phyi rgyud drag po'i 'khor lo

bshad// de bzhin gzugs brnyan 'khor lo yang// zhe sdang sdig pa'i lto ba dang// phrag dog bse yi sbal pa la// lte bar sngags pa'i gzugs bris la// snying gar mu khyud bzhi ru bskor// rgya gram bzhi dang

rtsibs bcu drug/ mtshon cha phyi nang rtse sprad la// ming rus snying po rten la brdeg/ gshin rje'i la sogs gang 'grub pa'i// rnam shes 'bru re dbus su phob// mchod rten nag po'i 'og tu mnan// las 'di g+hu h+ya

a ti rgya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las/ rang gshed dbab pa'i drag sngags 'di bton no// srog la thuM ril rbad/ rtsa khrag tsit+ta phyung/ nr-i srog la hur thuM dzaH bod pa dang po a

mu ka/ rnam shes 'bru re dbus su dgod// bdud dang gshed po rang las ldang// hong phan srog 'dzin las su bshad// me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ rang gshed rang la dbab pa'i le'u ste brgyad
pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi srin mo lcags thag mgo dgu ma'i las 'di gsungs so// rgyal ba'i bka' las 'das pa dang// mtshams med lnga la spyod pa dang// dgon pa'i gnas su phra ma
dang// dam chos dge bcu smod pa dang// bden pa'i don bor log lta spyod// de tshe sngags kyi dmod pa bor// rten gsum sngags kyi 'khor lo bca'// lus srog gnam thog 'bras bu 'joms// rgya shog dur

khrod ro ras la// phag mo'i sdig pa lto ba ru// thig bzhi brnag pa'i snying gar bskor// gru gsum rgya gram rtse mo dgu// de bzhin nang du rtse bstan dgu// rgya gram es grangs rtsa ba brgyad// mtshon cha'i rtse la spu gri'i

so// phyi nang mtshon cha bsnol mar dgod// dbus dang mtshams su brnag pa'i ming/ kha sbyor tshon skud dong rtsar brnag/ rang nyid che ba'i nga rgyal bskyed// mdun du lcags thag mgo dgu ma// dbu dgu steng ma bya

yi dbu// dur bya khra dang bzhad kyi dbu// nang khrol glo snying za zhing rngam// bar gyi dbu gsum dud 'gro'i dbu// dom dang dred dang chu srin dbu// rtsa gcad khrag dang nang khrol za// rtsa ba'i dbu gsum khro mo
ste// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing la// mche ba zang yag mi ro za// spyan nas khrag 'dzag dug rlang shangs// sku stod zhing lpags thod pa sbrul// sku smad re lde'i dril bu khrag/ g.yas dgu

mngon bsgral snying sbram 'dzin// g.yon pa dgu la thod zor bskyod// stag dang spyang ki ba glang mon// dred mo snel ma khyi nag phag/ 'thom nag g.yas pa dug khrag zor// zhabs brgyad dregs pa'i snying gar
brdzis// 'gro ba bsgral phyir gar stabs 'gying// skra dang ba spu me ru 'bar// de ba bka' bsgo bskul zhing mngag/ dgu bskor thun gyis brnag pa yi// las grub mtha' ru gzir la mnan// brag dmar srin

mo'i sgrom du gtad// dus bzhir las kyi kha gso bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las// rno myur gyi spu gri'i drag sngags 'di bton no// e baM raM khraM shig tsit+ta rngubs/ dgra bo'i srog
la thun rmugs/ ling shag rbad/ stobs chen thams cad nye bar 'joms// rno myur las kyi brnag par bshad// gzhan yang lo tog gzhom pa'i las// dme thod nang du me long bsar// gser dngul zangs

lcags rdo nag bzhag/ ras bal nal bu khyi nag snying// steng du gling bzhi rtsibs brgyad dgab// de steng srin mo mgo dgu'i sku// mthing nag dar gyis bkab la bzlas/ khrag sna gsum dang dug bsres la// ling+ga
ming byang yag rur gzhug/ smug ma tshigs gsum smin pa la// ltas ngan sgro yis bsgron la gzhag/ zhag lnga'i bar du drag sngags bzlas// gser mde'u zhu zhing 'phen chad na// mda' bcas blugs la dgra la

brdeg/ srin mo drag tu bskul la 'phang// drag sngags sbyor ba bstud la bstim// e baM raM khraM shig tsit+ta rngubs// hur tog khrom sha ra dzaHlaM raM sma sha hril hur khaM/ sho yengs phrom shar sing khrol b+h+yo/ gnam thog
chen po dbab pa'i lam// nye bar gyur pa'i las su bshad// gu lang nang du dmod pa bor// gzhan yang srin mo g.yel ba na// grog mkhar rgya tshi las dmar la// bong bu'i bdud rtsis legs sbrus la// srin mo
mgo dgu'i gzugs byas la// snying gar gru gsum snying po gzhug/ drag sngags bzlog la stobs kyis gzir// srin mo bos la khrag gis bran// phur pas bsdigs la dam la bsdu// srin mo bka' non zhabs

'og gzhug/ gzir ba'i sngags 'di khri ru brab// phur pa dril la be con brdungs// e ka ya ma ma baM raM khrom shig tsit+ta rngubs/ ya ma rag sha hur thum dzaH dun dun trig nan/ de yis ma mo dbang du 'dus// rang
dbang med par las la mngag/ sngags dang bdud rtsis srin mo gso// ling+ga ming rus brnag pa gzhug/ zhag gsum thun brab ro khang mnan// 'byung ba dkrugs la las rnams bsgo// drag sngags brgya bar thun
du brab// lus srog tsit+ta'i sgo phye nas// lha dang rang sngags bdud du 'bebs// sha lpags mgo sha phral nas bshig/ rtsa dang srog zung bcad nas skems// tshe dang dwangs snyigs phye nas

sdud// brnag pa las kyi mtha' ru phyin// drag sngags sbyor ba bskur la brdeg/ e khram baM rngubs baM ta tsi ta khram dgra bo'i srog la mA ra ya rbad/ hur thuM dzaH kun gyi mtha' ru 'di sbyar na// brnag pa lus srog
'byed pa yin// me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ srin mo zhal gyi dmod pa drag po'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis srung ba thams cad kyi mchog tu dril ba 'di gsungs

so// thabs ldan bde ba'i snying po mchog/ byin rlabs kun 'dus drag po brda'// lhun gyis grub pa'i ngang nyid las// zil gnon phyag rgya'i sngags kyi bdag/ snying po srog dang brda mi sbyar// tsit+ta'i dkyil nas

'bru gcig 'phrog/ dug rlang zhen pa'i stobs dang dbyung// las dang sbyor ba nus pa bcad// spyi dang sgos srog rang gnad 'phrog/ rten gyi mtshon cha gnas su dbab// phag mo sdig pa'i lto ba ru// mu khyud sum

bskor rgya gram e// nyi shu gnyis rtsibs gdug par ldan// gru gsum gang gnod gzugs dang ming// rgya gram de bzhin rtsa ba'i sngags// mtshams la gsang mdzod re'u mig/ nyi shu gnyis la spu gri'i so// lto sbyor
dug khrag phag thod brnag/ zhag gsum sngags bzlas bsregs la mnan// gang gnon ming dang snying po brdeg/ gzir dang dug dbyung srog 'phrog gcad// spyi srog sgos srog 'bru gsum 'phrog/ 'bru gsum
mtha' ru sbyor ba gcod// 'di min las sogs yug pa brkyang// 'di de bde dang smin pa'i las// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las srung ba'i mchog gi drag sngags 'di bton to// e

myags ya rngubs mug shag ka dun snying gzir sbur nan ha la ha la tsa ma ri phyung/ e hur thuM dzaH/ khaM shag rbad/ shrI badzra kro ta A+oM/ ya ma ya/ badzra kI la ya/ ma ma ru ru lu ma/ tir ti ka du/ dun ting me/ de ba a/

rak+sha ra/ rag+mo ma/ ru tra nr-i/ ya ka k+Sha k+Sha/ yag mo k+Sha/ rA tsa tsa/ mun mun pa/ badzra sA d+hu tri/ haM shaM tri/ sa nA ga phu/ sngags kyi sbyor ba gnyis su brdeg/ rtsa ba spu gri rno dbal mtshan// bgrod ba'i phyag rgya stobs
med na// rang gcod 'ching ba'i las su 'gyur// stobs ldan bgrod pa'i gdeng ldan na// rno myur sbyor ba kun 'joms yin// rtsa ba bcu gnyis dmar len mtshon/ las kyi mchong chen rang ldan shis// mtha'
ru bdug bran bum pas sbyang// phyi nang nad bkrus ye shes chus// phyag rgyan cig pas nus pa bskyed// drag po'i rang bzhin btsan thabs gzir// 'chi med dus kyi sbyor ba 'joms// 'di ni srung ba kun gyi
mchog/ rgyal ba'i thig le 'dus par bshad// me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las// bsrung ba khyad par gyi le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas yang 'jigs byed chen po des// tshe bdag spyi ltar

bsgrub pa pho mo spag pa'i don gsungs pa// e ka ya ma he ka g+h+ri ma ya/ ma rag mo/ rak+Sha k+She ma b+h+yo/ a mu kaM/ nan 'drir rbad/ ya ma tsit+ta baM// A+oM shri badzra kro ta A+oM/ badzra dun ting kI la ya ta/ 'di man dpe sdur sa ma

rnyed pas dpyad dgos/ pra ta dun+ti b+hi la ni/ A de ba su ni/ a ra tsa ha ti/ ra tsa mu tra ga tsa/ rag tsan+ti/ dza/ a tri sA d+hu/ tsa tri ra tsa rA tsa nA ga kha rak+She ma tri/ ru tri ru/ ro nr-i ro/ mug se se rak+t+ri/ rag rngubs rag rngubs/

dud tri tri man tri kha ran ru tri rag ro lin ro shad hUM sti sta/ sta/ haM shaM hri/ sa nA ga nA ga phu phaT/ b+h+yo/ dza dza hUM hUM ri rbad nan swA hA/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ trig nan zhes gsungs so// me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/

phyi ltar gyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas 'jigs byed chen po des phyi'i nang ltar bsgrub pa thams cad bshig pa 'di gsungs so// A+o~M e ka ya ma g+h+ri ma ya ma/ de dag sang kar dza la raM sarba sha du

da nan/ gzir thuM b+h+yo/ phaT/ A+oM badzra ki la ya/ ya ma tsi nan/ badzra kri khril/ tsan+d+ha ma hA ro sha na/ rak+ta mu rag rngubs rag kha rag ru tri/ 'bel ni/ dzo ni/ a ti sa ru ro ni/ nA ga sha truM/ ra ra tsa ha sti// zhes

gsungs so// 'jig rten zil gyis gnon pa/ me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ phyi'i nang ltar gyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas 'jigs byed chen po des/ tshe bdag nang ltar gyi bsgrub ba po

rkyang gi sngon gsungs pa/ e me ka ye he dun rak+sha dun dun nan/ he da na ma na/ i tri/ 'bil khung rtsa bso/ ya badzra/ kA/ 'bil/ nr-i/ hri/ A+oM hUM/ srog staMm+b+ha ya nan/ srog mA ra ya nan/ nA ga sha truM/ yul 'dir

shar shar/ drag tu phrom phrom/ tri tsa du yan/ da phob phob/ phrom/ A+oM e ka ya ma ma he du rak+sha dun dun nan/ he ru ka zhes bya ba/ s+t+waM b+ha ya nan/ dun dun rak+sha dun e ya ma/ ka e oM sarba sha truM/ s+t+wam+b+ha ya nan

'drid 'drid rbad/ ya ma sa ma ya/ srog dun dun 'drid nan/ A+oM ya ma he sang sarba duSh+NaM sha nr-i sha truM staM b+ha ya rbad/ ya ma he dun pra be sha bas sa ma ya dza zhes gsungs so// me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las// nang

ltar bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas yang 'jigs byed chen po des tshe bdag gsang ba ltar bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// e ka ya dun ri sa ra ka nr-i ma dun dza ma ra tsa ma tri e ra dza tsa ra ya

ma tril sa na du mun mun tri ma ma du srog dan ra tsa tsa du ma ma ma k+She na mo zhes gsungs so// me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ tshe bdag gsang ba ltar bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de

nas yang 'jigs byed chen po des/ snying srog 'phrog cing gzir ba'i las 'di gsungs so// A+oM e ka ya ma he ka ya ma/ g+h+ri ma ya ma/ he dun sad ka ra ya dza/ raM sarba sha truM nan gzir thun b+h+yo phaT/

he dun sa nA ga sha truM dz+wa la raM sad ka ra ya/ che ge mo A ra ya nr-i thun gzer thun b+h+yo/ che ge mo la thun b+h+yo/ sarba sha truM sad ka ra ya/ dza raM ka dun/ gzer mA ra ya rbad/ nA ga he b+h+yo/ i nan sad ka ra ya ma sarba sha

truM thun gzir/ dz+wa la raM raM/ ha sa nA ga nA ga thun gzir rbad ya/ he ga nA ga dgra de pa tsa// ma ge du pe na/ ga pus pa sarba sha truM thun/ gzir rbad ya/ su ka re ta dza'u ban+d+ha si ra ti/ sarba sha truM dz+wa la raM/ thun gzir

rbad ya/ e ka yak+sha ya ma me ta sarba sha truM dz+wa la raM thun gzir rbad ya/ e ka he dun sad ka ra ya ma rag ru tri sarba sha truM thun gzir rbad ya sib/ he du na ra tsa ra tsa tri sha sarba sha truM dz+wa la raM thun gzir rbad ya sad/

A+oM ma ka ya ma/ he ka ya ma/ g+h+ri ma ya ma/ e tri sa ka ra ya/ he dun dz+wa la raM/ sarba sha truM/ thun zor rbad ya/ bzlog byed/ 'di rnams gab sbas gsang ba rgyas gdab pa'o// oM e ka la ma he dun/ rak+sha/ he dun hUM/

ra hUM/ ya ma tsi shaM/ sarba sha truM s+t+wam+b+ha ya/ nan 'drid rbad/ srog breng breng/ nan/ trig nan/ nr-i sha ku ru A \u0f84kar+Shaya hUM dzaH srog mA ra ya hUM rbad/ srog s+t+wam+b+ha ya nan/ tri tsa du ya/ ya ma dun dun/ srog gzir nan/ ma

ma rak+sha ma hA snying gzer thun nan/ nA ga snying gzer srog la nan/ tri du ra tsa she na srog la gzir nan/ the tshom zos na mi 'grub bo// sngags pa rnams mis thos na nus mthu med/ sngags rnams me yis bskul
bar bya zhes gsungs so// me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ snying khrag dbrog cing gzer ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ las thams cad rjes gcod du sbyin

bsreg 'di gsungs so// man+Dal phung sa dug chu yis// tshad dang ldan par brtsig par bya// dug dang tsha ba khrag gis byug/ phung sa grog mkhar ro bsregs sa// sme ba dang bcas thab khung bca'// rgyas pa'i steng

du zhi ba'i thabs// de steng dbang ste kha khyer ro// dang po mda' gang mdzub kyis dman// de steng e yi pho brang la// gru gang kha khyer gsum du bya// thod pa me ri rtsang dang bcas// zla gam rgya gram rtsibs bcu

drug/ mtshon cha sngon po re khA dmar// tha ma me 'od thod pa bcu// phur pa bcu dang ldan par bya// ling+ga'i snying gar 'khru gang shing// yam shing lcang ma se ba skyer// ro bsregs shing dang gdug rtsub drag/ 'o ma sbrang

dang bu ram 'bras// gur gum gla rtsi gi wang mtshal// sha chen rta sbrul nya sbal sha/ nyung dkar til nag gri bo'i khrag/ bya phag khy-i yang spyang tshil sngo sna tsha// dug gi ril bu brgya ming sbyar// bdag lus hom khung bum pa
la// lhun gyis grub pa'i sku gsal bya// thab khung mdun du me lha ser// me dar gun phreng g.yas dang g.yon// bka' non mngag na las byed pa'o// bla rkun rgyud blang thun gzir gdab// mtshon

brdeg stabs la me lhar 'bul// lan grangs brgya'am nyi shu gcig/ nyin dang mtshan du gang la brtsam// rdzas rgod bdug la phying pas dgab/ khrus dang lha ru nye bar sbyar// rtsang phur bskor la chags pa
dbral// kun gyi mtha' ru thal 'jim 'phang// gang brtsams pa 'di mtha' ru gdags// rnam bzhi'i las de lhun gyis grub// lta spyod dman pa 'ching bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku

gsung thugs rdo rje las/ sngags 'di bton no// swa sti shAn+ti/ wa shang hri ya/ puSh+tiM pa ra/ mA ra ya phaT/ las 'di bya ba kun dang ldan// bsreg pa'i las te snying po'i mchog/ me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud
las/ brnag pa rjes gcod kyi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas yang 'khor gyi nang nas rdo rje snying po stan las langs nas// bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ rgyal ba kun gyi rang bzhin gnas/ gsang

sngags ngo bo de nyid lags// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// dregs pa mthu rtsal ldan pa kun// srog snying dbul zhing las la gnyer// bka' bzhin nye ba ji ltar lags// lhun grub zil gnon phyag rgya
yis// gnyen po gang zhig 'dul ba lags// drag pos 'dul ba gang lags pa// 'khor la rgyas par bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dri ba rnam pa gsum gyi don rgyas par

bshad do// bskal pa rdzogs ldan bya ba la// lha yi srid mtsho gu ru na// bgrod pa ma thob sngags pa gcig/ dge bcu ma spyad che bar bsnyems// lta spyod 'brel med sgra phyir 'breng// 'khor ba'i spyod pa rab
tu spyad// 'jig rten dregs pa sha khrag rten// rtag pa'i khro bo yod par bsgom// sngags tshig phra mo stobs dang ldan// lus sems yan lag rags la rngam// bdud dang srin po gdug pa'i tshogs// 'khor du
bzung nas srog gcod byed// rnam bzhi'i 'khor la gsod cing gtub// mtshon cha me rlung lag char thogs// myur du gsod cing sha khrag za// bdud mo srin mo gnod sbyin mo// 'khor du bsdus nas chags
pa spyod// chags sdang me rlung rang rgyud bsreg/ de yis bstan pa bshig cing 'khrug/ gsang sngags bka' bsgo log pa des// dus ma yin par tshe zad nas// na rag rdo rje dmyal bar ltung// sdug bsngal rab

myong tsha grang spyod// tshad las brgal te bde ba bral// dmyal ba phal las sdug bsngal ba// rab tu che zhing tshe tshad ring// mi yi lo gcig lha yi zhag/ lha yi lo gcig dmyal ba'i zhag/ de 'dra'i lo tshigs til
khal brgya// lo re dag na til re 'byin// brgya zad mthar [(]tsha mtha'[)]ru mnar med 'pho// tsha grang gnas su bcu drug gnas// skye ba nyi shu gcig tu rdzogs// phyi nang yi dwags gnas su
sdug/ skye bar gnas na dur khrod gnas// thon nas rdzu 'phrul lus su blangs// gram ri lcags mkhar nang na gnas// lus chen yan lag sngon bas rags// rngam tshig rang 'khor rnam la mngag/ de 'dra'i rnam
smin mang bsags pa'i// rU tra nag po'i lus su skye// de yis 'jigs byed phung byed ni// sngags kyi spyod pas gol bar bshad// rgyal ba kun gyi thugs brgyud de// byin rlabs mthu rtsal stobs 'gran

nas// nag po gol ba 'dul ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs bskyed// stong pa'i rang bzhin de steng bkye// stod pas nag po'i sde ma stongs// sangs rgyas rdul snyed slar 'khor nas// nag po ma thul

mthu rtsal ldan// de ma thul to stobs chen gsum// ya ma badzra ha ya'i sku// rang rang lag cha 'khor sprul nas// sngags tshig drag po rngam bzlas nas// nag po 'dul phyir me rlung sprul// nad dang mtshon cha'i char

pa phab// rU tra ma thul rngams pas rol// sde gsum sprul pa slar bskyar bas// nag po rngams pa'i nga ro bsgrag/ ru tra ma tra ma ra tra// sangs rgyas stong phrag thugs brgyud nas/ khro bo sme ba brtsegs pa

mngags// rdo rje srin po'i 'khor rnams sprul// sngags sgra drag pos rU tra bsdigs// che ba'i grags pa stobs 'gran nas// rdo rje gzhon nu brlag pa khad// sangs rgyas sku yi sprul pa bskyed// sku che bdud mo
