mkha' lding bcas// e ka ya ma he ka ya ma g+h+ri ma ya ma/ ma raka mo rak+sha k+She ma b+h+yo// ru tra ka ling 'drid phyung rbad// brjod pas nag po'i sde ma choms// slar 'dus ye shes thugs las sprul// rngam pa'i nga ros nag

po btul/ be ka ya ma 'gas ma 'dza' ni ra ya ru tra sarba sha truM s+t+waM b+ha ya nan/ 'drid rbad/ brjod pas nag po'i sde ma thul// chos sku skye med stong bdag med// zil gnon thugs las mgo dgu sprul// dbu dgu

phyag zhabs bcu gnyis ldan// rngam pa'i drag sngags dmod pa btul/ e ka he dun/ ya ma rak+sha dza/ mu tri rtsa shu raM tri ru tra sarba du raM u nan/ 'drid phyung/ raM shag rbad/ brjod pas nag po'i sde ma thul// sangs

rgyas spyi yi sku ru sprul/ nag po cha mthun brjid la rngams// zil gnod phyag rgya chen po yis// sngags sgra rngams pas spa bkong nas// rU tra nag po bsgyel te gzir// e myags ya rngubs baM raM khaM shig ru tra snying

gzir hur thuM dzaH rU tra nag po zhal du gsol// zil gnon lto ru sgrib pa sbyangs// ye shes rig pa'i me yis sbyangs// rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis snam nas phyung// rU tra nag po brgyal sangs nas// sangs rgyas rdzu
'phrul ngo mtshar che// bdag cag sangs rgyas 'khor bgyid pas// srog dang ma bral 'khor du zhog/ 'khor gyi las skal gang la bsgo// sangs rgyas bka' 'khor bsrung la skyobs// bstan pa
bshigs na dregs pas gsol// rU tra 'dul phyir rgyud 'di bshad// me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ rU tra btul ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung rgyal

pos klu nyan sa bdag gsum 'joms pa des/ mdze rims drag po gdug pa'i nad kyis zin pa la/ snying gzer nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i 'khrul 'khor 'di gsungs so// phrin las kun gyi rtsa ba ni// drag po'i las kyi

mtha' sdud du// snying gzir nyi shu rtsa gcig gis// gab pa thugs kyi 'khrul 'khor bca'// bsnyen pa shog bu gru bzhi la// cha gnyis dur khrod sme bas byug/ rus sbal lto bar thig skor bzhi// bskor la dbus su

gru gsum la// zla gam sbrul gyi ra bas gtams// de yi phyi rim 'khrul mig bzhi// thod 'khor rdo rje ka ba me// phyi rim 'khrul mig gnam lcags brgyad// rlung ri rgya gram dbus na mdzes// yang logs rtsa sbubs
nyi shu gcig/ gdug pa sreg byed ye shes me// 'od kyi gang bur gnas pa 'phro// de la gnas nyid dgod pa ni// gru gsum dbus na sa nA ga/ gang gnod ming dang rus sbal dngos// zla gam gsum la gnod
sbyin ming// lcags mkhar brgyad dang thod mkhar bzhi// rtsa ba'i yig 'bru bcu gnyis dgod// rtsa sbubs nyi shu rtsa gcig la// snying gzer nyi shu rtsa gcig dgod// drag sngags 'khrul 'khor me dbal

dgod// 'khor lo mtshon chen me dbal sngags// drag po'i sngags rgod gdug pa'i mtshon// thog chen dril phreng drag po'i stobs// nam mkha' rin chen rgya mtsho yis// mtshon cha kha sbyar dug chu ngar// sngon dmar

dang bcas phag mo'i ltor// dug khrag bskus la thod par gzhug/ mi rkang sgyed pu lcags khris brdeg/ gsal gsum dang ldan sum stong bskul// nya stong mar gyi ngo la sbyar// tha chung bzhi pa rab tu gtad// zhag
gsum shin tu gnod par bca'// de nyid dong bru thod par mnan// mi ldog gyad dang dregs pa bsgom// thod 'khor steng du gdug pa'i rtsang// nyi shu gcig dbus mchog phur bstan// gang gnod gzugs blangs

snying gar brdeg/ rgyun du drag sngags brgya brgyas bsrung// a sha b+hi li sbyor tshul can// snying po dang dad shugs kyis drangs// dug la rngam chags rtsa ba gcod// ha la nag po'i zhen chags bral// phyag na rdo rje

mthu dang bral// gdug pa gzhan lta smos ci dgos// sngags kyi rgyal po kun 'joms 'di// drag la 'dril zhing sgra spangs la// sgra ni gtum zhing lci bar bzlas// drag po gtum chen dregs pa'o// de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugs las// gdug pa thams cad gzhom pa'i phyir snying gzer nyi shu rtsa gcig gi spu gri bton to// sa nA ga snying gzer dza/ sa nA ga snying gzer phyung/ sa nA ga snying gzer

tsit+ta rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer thun rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer dun rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer raM thun rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer breng la rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer myogs rbad/ sa nA ga gzer thun ril rbad/ sa nA ga

snying gzer nan tri rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer breng shag rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer khas rbad/ sa nA ga sting gzer thibs rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer rtsa la rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer u nan rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer
e nan rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer srog la dun dun shag rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer tsit+ta ru thum rbad/ rigs bzhi rgyud la zhen pa dang/ ba so khang 'khor gdug pa kun// brkam chags dbang gi dug 'byin
'joms// gdug pa thams cad 'joms pa yi// yang gsang 'phrul gyi snying po bshad// drag po'i ngan sngags 'khrul 'khor 'di// dpal gyi phyag rgyas gdab pa dang// rang gi nyams kyi stobs dang ni// brtul

zhugs drag po btsan thabs dang// sbyor ba'i rkyen dang du ma dang// drag sngags kyi 'od zer spro ba dang/ rang gnas kyi srog 'phrog pa dang/ gdug pa'i dbal bsad pa dang/ thabs kyi rol pas ye shes 'od spro
ba dang/ de dag snying gzer sbyor bar bshad/ me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ snying gzer nyi shu rtsa gcig gi le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdug pa 'dul ba'i

phyir/ snying gzer dgu pa'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// snying po 'phrul gyi man ngag bcud// gsang chen rtsa ba dril ba'i las// drag po mngon phyung sbyor ba'i mchog/ snying gzer gdug pa thams cad 'joms// shi

'phrad sngags kyi 'khor lo yis// bdag skyob gzhan bsrung gdug pa 'joms// ma mo bdud mo rgyal po btsan// klu gnyan sa bdag the'u brang gri// ma lus 'joms byed sgos kyi sngags// b+hi li'i grong 'dus khong

dregs can// 'bar ba nag po ya ma'i klong// yang gsang mchog gi sbyor ba bshad// de yi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// dur khrod zhing ras ro ras la// mu khyud lnga ldan rus sbal ltor// dug khrag snag tsha sbyar bas
bri// dbus su gru gsum zla gam ldan// phyi rol 'khrul mig thod mkhar bzhi// de 'og lcags mkhar 'khrul mig brgyad// yang logs gnas pa'i rtsa sbubs dgu// phyi rim rtsibs chen bcu drug 'obs// srid
pa'i rus sbal lto ba ru// drag po las kyi 'khrul 'khor bca'// de la dgod cing gnas pa ni// dbus na gdug pa'i snying po ming// zla gam ma mo rgyal po btsan// the'u rang gshin 'gong gnod pa'i
ming// 'khrul mig bzhi la gnas pa ni// dregs pa stobs kyi 'bru bzhi dgod// phyi rim lcags mkhar brgyad po la// dregs pa stobs kyi 'bru brgyad dgod// yang logs drag po rtsa sbubs

dgur// snying gzer dgu la sde tshan re// snying pa gsum bsdus rdzogs par dgod// phyi rim mtshon cha srung ba'i 'obs// mtshon cha'i khang pa bcu drug la// shi 'phrad dgu btul snying po bri// gnyis bcas dug

khrag tsha ba bsku/ kha sbyor sngon dmar thig nag 'dril// 'khrul 'khor mtshon cha me dbal sngags// bzlog cing 'byin pa shugs kyi mchog/ gcod cing 'bigs pas spu gri'i mtshon// bsreg cing g.yeng bas me chu

rlung// sdud cing 'chang bas skye ba'i mkhar// gzir cing mnan pa thod gzer po// rtsa bar bcas pa'i mtshon lo ma// rtsa ba gcig la yan lag stong// bdag skyob gzhan srung go mtshon mchog/ las dang sbyor ba

gcod pa'i mtshon// 'bar ba nag po zhe sdang mchog/ sngags kyi rgyal po dug lngar bcas// 'bar ba dug gi dum bur bsdus// bdud gang yak+sha ya ma'i klong// de yi pho brang thod ba'i gnas// dur ma'i bye ru rus
sbal gzugs// mchod rten rin chen mtshon cha'i sbubs// tshangs pa'i bu ga rgya gram e// 'khrul 'khor bcas te re bas gril// hom khung bcug la stong stong bzlas// gsal bar khyad par stobs kyi

lha// rdzas gsum gdan gsum lta ba bzhi// 'dus pa gsum dang yin pa bzhi// dbang bcas bgrod pa'i go cha mchog/ rigs la rgyun du stong stong bzlas// nya stong sbyor ba drag po brtsam// thun mong bsrung ba

sbyor ba brgya// drag po thog chen snying gzer mchog/ gser gyi dgu thog gnam lcags te// ri rgyal rbab chen spu gri'i dbal// yang gsang mchog gi sbyor ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gsung thugs las

snying gzer dgu pa 'di bton to// sa nA ga trag snying gzer rbad/ sa nA ga tsa tri snying gzer rbad/ sa nA ga du me snying gzer rbad/ sa nA ga k+She tri snying gzer rbad/ sa nA ga dug phyung snying gzer rbad/ sa nA ga kham

shag snying gzer rbad/ sa nA ga srog tig srog tig rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer thum ril rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer sbur nan rbad/ sa nA ga u nan kham shag gzer thum tsit+ta breng shag snying gzer sbur nan/ drag po

me dbal gcod pa'i mtshon// gdug pa tsit+ta'i ti ra la// rab spyod sbyor ba'i rgyal por bshad// rgyud kyi snying po mchog gi sbyor ba// me rlung bzhi'i stobs bsdus pa 'di/ las gang yang stobs med na/ srid pa

stobs kyi 'khrul 'khor bca'/ sngags stong tsho re dang brgya ru stong bsdebs na/ las kun gyi srung ba'i 'ching ba'o// sprul pa gyad gnon lhar gsal bar bya'o// me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ snying

gzer dgu pa'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// 'di man snga thog gcig nas mchan dkyus su song ba lta bu zhig gi yig rgyun 'byams pa yin 'dug/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis phrin las kun gyi rtsa ba yi
gsang chen gcig tu dril bar 'di gsungs so// drag po mngon 'byung bsgrub pa'i bcud// klu gnyan sa bdag gdug pa yis// mdze rims drag po'i yams dar na// snying gzer bdun gyi 'khor lo

bca'// sbyor ba sna tshogs rdzas kyis byug/ srid pa'i rus sbal lto bar bri// drag po'i rdzas su snying po bsdu// mthing nag dar dang thod par bcug/ bsgom bskul drang gzhug rtsang bcas sngags// dmod pa'i thun
dbab hom shing bsreg/ zor thun mtha' ru gnan gzir bya// rang gi phyag rgya bris sku dgram// de las byin rlabs nus mthu 'byung// rang yang phyag rgya gsal bar bsgom// gnas pa 'khor lo'i rtsa sbubs
na// dwangs ma bcu gnyis snying gzer ni// phyi nang rtsa yi sbubs na gnas// snying gzer dbus na snying po gsum// lte ba gru gsum rnal ma'i ming// zla gam gsum la gdug pa'i ming// de yis klu gnyan sa
bdag 'joms// zhes 'byung bas/ klu gnyan sa bdag gis cher zin na/ dregs pa stobs kyi 'khor lo gnas pa las/ gzhi drag po ru bsgyur ba 'phrul ba ni/ shog bu mdzub gang gru bzhi pa gnyis la/ thig skor

gsum du bya ba ni/ 'bras bu gru gsum du bya ba ni/ 'bras bu nag po'i gnas bya/ phyi rim 'khrul mig bcu gnyis su bya/ mtha' mar rtsa ba'i dbyings kyi 'dab ma bdun byas la/ srid pa'i rus sbal gyi lto bar bri/

yi ge bkod pa ni/ dbus su gru gsum nang mar gnod pa'i ming bris/ zla gam gsum la ma mo rgyal po mdzo 'dre bri/ 'khrul mig bcu gnyis la rtsa ba'i drag sngags yig 'bru bcu gnyis pa dgod/ de'i phyi rim rtsa

sbubs lta bu'i 'khrul mig bcu gnyis la/ sa nA ga'i mtha' mar snying gzer gyi sngags tshan re bskor la dgod/ dug chu dang tsha ba gsum dang/ mnol khrag bskus la/ 'khrul 'khor sbyar la sngon dmar gyi kha

btsem/ 'khrul 'khor thod par gzhug thod pa dar mthing nag gis gril la/ dong gru gsum rtsang dang bcas pa'i nang du skyer tsher gyi stan la gzhag/ de'i steng du sbyor ba'i sbal pa la/ gong gi chus byugs la/

gan rgyal du gzhag sbal pa'i snying gar drag po'i hom shing gzug nya dang stong la me spar rdzas bsreg thod pa dang gdan bdug phying pas dgab/ drag sngags bzlas/ tshe bdag bsgom/ bskul ba bya/ bstab pa

byas la/ khrus nas dbyung/ lnga'am bdun du sbyor ba brtsam// nyin dang mtshan du theng re bsreg/ sa nA ga snying gzer sbur nan rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer 'drid phyung rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer so la myogs rbad/ sa
nA ga snying gzer du raM rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer ya ma bzlog rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer ta la rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer sarba u nan gzer phyung rbad/ thal 'jim gnod par zor du brdeg/ thod pa
gnod pa'i sa ru gnan par bya// che gnon na nya dang stong dag tu sbyor ba'o// lus bsrung ba la ni sngags bzlas shing lha gsal bas chog go// gzhan bsrung bar 'dod na bdug cing rtag tu khrus nas gdon
no// thod pa gnon na rgya yis gzir la gnan par bya'o// gzir ba stong dang sbyor bar bya'o// rten 'pho bar 'dod na/ du bas bsdigs la thal rlangs kyi brab bo// bshad pa'i rgyud las 'jam dpal blo yis

byas// nyes can gso ba'i phyir na snying gzer bdun pa bca'// me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ snying gzer bdun pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// de nas drags pa mngon phyung sbyor ba'i rgyal po

las/ gru gsum gyi sbyor ba dang/ byad grol bsreg cing snying gzir gdug pa'i las// rgyud kyi snying po spogs pa med pa 'di// rang sems dben pa'i gdug pa'i sa phyogs su// bkra mi shis pa'i sa la man+Dal bya/

khrag dang dug chu tsha bas chag chag gdab// dbus su gru gsum khru gang nag por bya// zla gam gsum gyi mtha' ma zlum por bskor// de yi phyi rim 'khrul mig bcu gnyis la// lcags mkhar bar na rdo rje rkyang

pas gtams// de yi phyi rim rtsibs mtshan nyi shur bya// gcod pa'i mtshon rtsa rtse mo phyi ru bstan// de yi phyi rim thod pa'i phreng bas bskor/ mtha' ma me ri raM dang ldan// de bzhin zhing ras rgyu la'ang// bar snang

gcod pa'i 'khor lo bri// gru gsum kha khyer mdzub gang mtshon chas bskor// dbus su gdug pa'i gzugs brnyan sna tshogs gzhag/ gang gnod ming dang snying po dug chus sbyor// zla gam gsum la ma mo rgyal po
btsan// 'khrul mig drag po dmod pa'i sngags kyis gdab// rtsibs la bsreg cing gzir ba'i spu gri dgod// gzugs brnyan snying gar hom shing zur gsum gzug/ zhag lnga thun brab drag sngags rngam par
bzlas// de nas zhag gsum bsreg cing gzugs ming bstab// me dbang bsad nas sbyor ba'i rdzas rnams bsreg/ gang dmigs bdug cing phying pa gtsang ma dgab// nyin dang mtshan mo lan grangs bdun bdun

bdug/ dam pa dkrug la lha yi sku ru bskyed/ khrag sna thun rdzas rdzas rgod rnams// thod pa re ru blugs la man+Dal gru bzhir dgram// drag sngags srod la mis ma thos par bzla// drag sngags sbyor ba'i rgyal po
ni// brnag pa thon nas nam mkha'i 'khor lo dang// thal ba ming gzugs mchod rten gnod sar mnan// lhag ma rjes shul gar gnod zor thun brdeg/ gdug pa gsum spang me yi 'khor yin pas// drag po'i
las 'di gzhan la bstan pa med// sa nA ga ru raM/ u nan gzir phyung nan/ sa nA ga sbur nan raM/ snying gzer srog myags raM/ gdug pa'i nad dang sbyor ba'i gdug rtsub kun// las kyi rgyal pos

bsreg cing 'joms par byed// b+ha ma ha bzhi ya raM yaM spu ha/ ha la nag po bsreg pa'i mchog tu bshad// mdze yams nag po me bzhin mched na brtsam// snang snang mi spyad thugs kyi dkyil na bzhag/ yab yum
gsum dang bcas pa drag tu bskul// bskor ba bya zhing thun gyi rdzas rnams brab// me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ kha gso las kyi bsreg pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gcig pa'o//// bcom ldan 'das
kyis sbyor ba thams cad 'joms pa 'di gsungs so// drag po mngon phyung sbyor ba'i mchog/ gsang chen rtsa bar dril ba'i las// brnag pa stobs kyi las bshig pa// dregs pa stobs kyi lha bzhi yi// 'khrul

'khor drag po me rlung gi/ snying po me dbal stobs kyis 'joms// dmod pa'i mtshon cha 'di lta ste// dur khrod zhing ras shog gu la// mu khyud rim pa bzhi dang ldan// rlung ris ras kyi 'khor lo la// dbus su gru
gsum zla gam gsum// phyi rim lcags mkhar 'khrul mig bzhi// mtshams bzhi rdo rje ka bar ldan// phyi rim lcags mkhar 'khrul mig brgyad// zhing gi ka ba mtshams brgyad 'degs// yang logs mtshon cha

rtsibs bcu gnyis// las kyi me ri 'bar ba'i tshul// mtshon cha'i khang pa de dag la// gnas shing dgod pa'i yi ge ni// dbus na brnag pa'i snying po ming// zla gam de bzhin rdzogs par bri// lcags mkhar bzhi

yi khang pa ru// srog dang las sdud dgye dang 'dud// 'bru bzhi'i sbyor ba kun gyi mchog khang 'khyud lcags mkhar brgyad po la// gshin rje ma mo'i snying po gnyis// mkha' lding dregs pa'i snying po gnyis// sreg

byed ma dang sdud byed gnyis// rus sbal ya ma'i snying po gnyis// lcags mkhar bang rim re la dgod// mtshon cha'i khang pa bcu gnyis la// dug lnga'i sbyor ba bshig pa yi// drag po'i mtshon cha spu gri dgod// me

lha'i snying po sbor ba dgod// 'khrul 'khor mtshon cha me dbal sngags// sbyor ba'i rgyal po kun 'joms 'di// me rlung las kyi mtshon chas gcod// rdzas rnams kun la kha sbyar gril// dur ma bcug pa re bas

gtum// rtsa bcas gru gsum skyer pa'i stan// zhi lpags steng na hom shing gzug/ lha bsgom sngags dang thun gyis brab// du ba'i rdzas la bdug cing brab// drag tu bskul zhing yul la rbad// bdun nam lnga ru nya

stong brtsam// sbyor ba thon nas 'khrul 'khor dril// tshes grangs gcig dang bcu drug la// sogs pa bde ba'i gnan pa bya// zhi khro phur pa gshin rje rnams// 'khor lo rus sbal thod chen gzhug/ dkyil 'khor
chen po'i 'og tu mnan// mkha' lding dregs pa klu rgyal rnams// 'khrul 'khor tshe bdag lto bar gzhug/ 'brong chen thod par ro khung mnan// ma mo bdud mo srin mo rnams// 'khrul 'khor
nyan thos thod par gzhug/ bka' rten byin chen 'og tu mnan// bdud dang mu stegs mgon po rnams// 'khrul 'khor g.yag ru g.yas par gzhug/ ro khang sgo drung 'og tu mnan// rgyal po dge bsnyen dkor
srung rnams// spyang ki dar ma'i thod par gzhug/ skye tsang la mkha'i bzhi mdor mnan// btsan dang srog bdag dregs pa rnams// sha ru spyang thod gong gsum mnan// klu bdud dam bdud phug bdag
rnams// bon po'i thod par lha khang mnan// the'u rang chags 'gong shin rngog rnams// glang rur bcug la lam mdor mnan// sa bdag klu gnyan mdze 'dre rnams// 'khor lo phag mo'i lto bar gzhug/ phag thod
bka' rten 'og tu mnan// bon po rigs gnyis 'dzin pa rnams/ khyi thod bcug la khyi tshang mnan// sri can chung thod them 'og mnan// ting 'dzin sbyor ba bdag dbang bsdud// sa gzhi sbyor ba mnan
pa'o// bar snang ming bcas mchod rten mnan// nam mkha' bsam gtan mchog gi las// 'khrul 'khor me rlung kun 'joms mtshon// me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ drag po gshin rje'i las mngon

du phyung ba'i le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o//// bcom ldan 'das tshe bdag nag po thams cad 'joms pa des/ drag po mngon phyung sbyor ba'i man ngag 'di// srung ba kun gyi mchog tu dril// phyag rgya chen po'i

bsam gtan gyis// rnal 'byor srung ba'i cho ga mchog/ rno dbal stobs dpag med pa'o// de yi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// dri chen bdud rtsi dri dang chu// rdzas dang bcas te stegs bu la// lha bsgom sngags bzlas rtag

tu bkru// yan lag bum pas bsrung ba mchog/ zil gnon phyag rgya'i skur gsal bya// rdzogs pa'i lto bar srog bsdus la// drag sngags brgya brgya rgyun du bzla// bsam gtan rtsa ba'i srung ba mchog/ dbus la
nam mkha'i 'khor lo'i sngags// rtsibs bzhir dregs pa'i snying po e// thugs kar rigs pa'i 'khor lo'i sngags// rtsibs bzhi dbus na 'bru lnga'i mchog/ lte bar 'byung ba'i 'khor gyi sngags// rtsibs bzhir

he dun ya dang a// gsal bas stong gsum dbang du sdud// 'khor lo rgyun gyi srung ba'i mchog/ drag po sngags kyi dmod pa ni// snying po ngang dang shugs kyis drangs// rngam tshig drag la gtum pa'o// sa nA ga tsit+ta
ro myags kha thaM srog la gzir mnan sbur nan 'drid phyung hri shag rbad/ bzlas pas mi 'chor thams cad 'joms// gsal bas bdag bsrung brtan pa'i mchog/ 'di bzlas pa la dus rnam pa gnyis te/ za ma
rgyun du stong bzlas pa ni/ 'jam por bsrung ba'o// zhag lnga'am bdun du khri khri bzlas pa'i dus ni/ nam mkha' las thog ser dang lce 'bab pa'i dus dang/ sa g.yos dang rims rlangs dang thabs

'ong ba'i dus dang/ rbod gtong gi dam 'khrugs pa dang shi kha phye ba dang/ mdze rims me bzhin mched pa dang/ dus ma yin pa'i sgra dang/ chu dang mtshon dar ba'i dus bzlas pa ni/ drag la rtsub pa'i srung

ba'o// se phur kha 'thab shugs dang 'brel// zor du pho nya slar la bzlog/ 'khor lo mnan pa lto bar 'brel// 'khyams shing slar log gsang lam gyis// sngags kyi dug mda' khong nas 'phen// srung ba'i rgyal

po lus srog 'byed kyang spel ba min/ me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ sngags dang dug mda' khong nas dbyung ba'i le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ drag po sngags kyi

gdug pa dug mda' khong nas dbyung ba ni/ zhal gyi dmod pa sngags dang ngan sngags rtsub mo'i nus pa zhugs pa ste/ de'i 'khrul 'khor drag po bca' ba ni// thod pa bkra mi shis pa'am/ yang na thod pa dur

ma'i spyi bor mu khyud bzhi ru bskor la// dbus su gru gsum la gnod byed kyi ming khrag gis bri/ de'i phyi rim la gnod byed kyi ming khrag gis bris// de'i phyi rim sbrul gyi chun po bri/ mtha' ma me ri nang du bstan

pa bris la/ dong gru gsum gyi nang du gzhug thod pa gling bzhi pa gcig gi nang du mu khyud bzhi ru bskor la/ dbus su dregs pa lnga'i snying po bri/ de'i phyi rim rtsibs bzhir byas la/ drag po stobs kyi klu bzhir

dgod/ de'i phyir rim rtsibs brgyad la/ rtsa ba'i drag sngags 'bru brgyad/ tha ma rtsibs bcu ru byas la/ dug mda' dbyung ba'i spu gri dgod/ thod pa 'og mar khrag sna lnga blugs la/ thod pa gnyis kha sbyar steng ma

la/ thun khung btod la thun dbab pa ni/ rdo phye dang lcags phye dang zangs phye dang/ lcags phur dang/ seng ldeng gi phur pa rnams la/ sngags bzlas la/ gang dmigs pa'i lus bdag gi 'og tu mnan la phur pa

dang thun rdzas brab kyin thod par bstim mo// sngags kyang drag la bar ma chad par bzla/ thod pa'i 'khrul 'khor zhing gi me la bdug/ man tra g+hu h+ya sarba dum nan/ 'drid phyung/ khri tsho bcu'i las rdzogs nas/ zor
bya ba ni/ gang dmigs pa'i bu ga rnams las khrag bton la/ thod pa 'og ma khyi nag po dom po dang/ rta nag po dang/ ra rog po dang/ rabs chad nag po dang/ dpa' bo gri ru bsad pa'i khrag de rnams blugs
la dug gi chus sbyangs te/ nam gyi gung la gar gnod pa'i sa ru 'phang ngo// lan bdun nam dgu ru byas nas/ mthar thod pa'i steng 'og ma nor bar dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'og tu gnan pa byas na/ sngags kyi
dug mda' dang/ ma mo'i dug byad dang/ klu gnyan sa bdag gi dug nad rtsa la zhugs pa kun khong nas 'byin par 'gyur nus so// dug mda' khong nas dbyung ba'i drag sngags/ drag po thod pa'i

'khor lo mngon du phyung ba'o// gzhan bsrung ba dang thun mong du spyod na/ g.yag ru g.yas pa rtse mo ma bcad par sngags la zor 'phang ngo// me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ drag po thod pa mngon du phyung

ba'i le'u ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o//// dregs pa lnga'i zhal gyi dmod pa/ man ngag kun gyi rtsa ba/ bsgrub pa kun gyi snying bcud du phyung ba/ drag sngags thams cad kyi nying khu phrin las thams cad kyi mchog bsdus

pa'o// ngan sngags thams cad kyi rgyal po// bdud kyi khong lto nye bar dril ba/ drag po btsan thabs kyi sngags rgod/ srog dmar len drag sngags/ bsad pa kun gyi mchog bsdus pa'o// rnal 'byor ba drang gsum

dang ldan pa'i brtul zhugs rab 'byams kyi dbang thob pa/ thugs kyi man ngag zhal gyi yig chung thob par byas la/ las gang yang btsan thabs su nye bar brtsam par bya'o// de yang lung las/ dur khrod dben
pa'i bde gnas su// rang sems dben pa'i mtshams bcad la// dpa' brtul dmod pa'i drag sngags bzlas// dur khrag rgyu la tsakra bca'// mu khyud bzhi dang ldan par bskor// lte bar gru gsum mA ra

nr-i// gnyis pa rgya gram e dun ka ya dgod// gsum pa rdo rje'i rwa brgyad la// srog la breng breng srog la gsum// dun dun bzhi la srog la rbad dang lnga/ kham shag drug la rtsa la rbad dang bdun// srog la zhes pa

brgyad du dgod// yang logs chu yi mu khyud la// gang bsgrub bsad sngags lto sdeb dgod// tha ma'i rgya gram rtsibs bcu la// myogs dang rbad dang khyer dang phyung// mugs dang ting dang ling dang bshag/ long dang

rbad rnams re rer dgod// srid pa'i rus sbal lto bar bca'// kha sbyar tshar rdzas kyi yang gyi sbal par gzhug/ de nas tshon skud phag mo'i ltor// gnyan nam mchod rten nag po la// nyin dang mtshan res gang brtsam
'grub// phyag rgya zil gnon bsam gtan bsgom// rang yang rang la gab par bshad// me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ phyag rgya bsam gtan gyi le'u ste nyer lnga pa'o//// de nas yang/ e dun ka

yaM dgra bo'i srog la breng breng srog la dun dun/ srog la rbad/ khaM shag rtsa rbad/ srog la myogs rbad/ khyer phyung/ mugs ting ling shag long rbad/ a pa da ra yaM rbad/ rag ti khas rbad// zhes gsungs pas/ 'di

ni kun gyi mchog bsdus pa sa yin pas snang snang mi brtsam/ nag po yi ni dkar po'i bdam// tha chung bzhi la dus tshod bdam// rgyun gyi khong lto yin pas kun la mi 'phyar// brtul zhugs rab kyi spyad la gzhan
du+u ma spel// drag sngags tshad dang ldan par chu bo'i rka mi gcad// sems kyi drod la brtag cing rmi lam rtags la min// dmar len khri bzlas phyag rgya yang gsal gdab// som nyi le lo mi bya
tshogs dang gtor ma min// the tshom g.yeng ba med la dam rdzas brten mi dgos// dge ba rgyun ma gcad par skul tshig g.yeng ba med// 'khor lo thod par bcas pa rgya yis gzir ba yin// sa sros klu gzir

phyogs su rngam pas bgrod// dmigs pa phyin nas mgo gzhug dril zhing gzir// ral gri phyag mtshan lto bzhi bshags la bskor// thod stan dang bcas gru dong sbas la bcag/ 'byung ba bzhi dang ri rab pho brang

bskyed// rgya gram steng du las kyi rgyal pos gnan// brgya bzlas rang gi phyag rgya bsam gtan bsgom/ kha gso mtha' ru 'phya ma ha yis 'phang// rang lus rdo rje'i go gon gzhan gyi mtshon cha kha snyil// phyag rgya

brtan pa'i dbang thob rkyen gyis shigs mi srid// mtshon cha'i rgyal po dmar len gzhan gyi lus srog 'bral// srid pa gdug pa'i ltor chud 'chor zhing 'gyur mi srid// drag po srog gcod yin pas sprul pa bla
ma'i khyab// rdzu 'phrul stobs las skyes pa'i gdams ngag drag po gab// me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ mtshon cha'i rgyal po dmar len gzhan gyi lus srog 'bral ba'i le'i ste nyer drug
pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ drag sngags kyi de kho na nyid/ srog dmar len gyi sbyor ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal tshe bdag nag po'i snying po don gyi man ngag las khyad par dmar len drag

po ni/ bdag don thabs kyis grol ba'i las// ba dang 'o ma zho dang mar// zhun mar snum gyi snying po'i tshul// snying po sbyor ba bsad dang gso// bsad gso khyad par sbyor ba dag/ g.yeng med bstan dang grol

dbang gces// stobs dang sbyor ba'i snying phyung 'di// gong mthun rgyu la tsakra bca'// rdzas dang thang pa'i sbyor ba min// dpa' brtul drag po'i stobs kyis spyad// gdug byed phag mo'i lto ba ru// srid pa'i khyams

khang srog sdud bca'/ khyams khang lte bar brnag pa'i gzugs// ming gzugs snying gar mtshon cha bri// phyi rim rgya gram rtsa ba'i sngags// yang logs bcu gnyis spu gri dgod// rus sbal lto ba'i phyogs mtshams

la// rtsibs chen bcu gnyis rtse mo na// bsad pa drag po'i spu gri ldan// phag mo'i lto na rtsibs bcu gnyis// rtse mo nang bstan spu gri dgod// 'khrul mig khyams khang ming rus gang// don gnyis bsdus la sbyor ba
bskul/ kha sbyor thod pa dong rtsa bcal// rgyu rkyen drug gi rten bcas la// thod par bcug la mthing nag dgab// bsgom bskul drag sngags bsnol mar bskul// rab kyi rkang thon bsnol mar gcod// blo
'bring tha mas brgya brgya bsnol// rang sngags phag mo'i spu gri brdegs// dbugs kyi rtar bskyon yul la 'phang// gsang lam sgo dgu rtsa la 'jug/ rang bdud gshed ma rang las ldang// 'od kyis
dug lnga gnas su 'joms// lus srog dwangs snyigs 'byed cing sdud// sku lnga dz+nyA na pany+tsar smin// 'gyur med rtags stobs dpag tu med// snyigs ma'i yi ge rten la dbab// rig pa bde ba'i klong la

'pho// dmar len bskyed pa'i khong nas srog/ tsit+ta dkar nag zhun thabs tshul// brnag pa'i rten ni zhu zhing khol// tsa na'i 'bras bus len cing sdud// sdud pa'i yi ge gsum dang ldan// ya yis 'phul sbyor ra
yis bsreg/ thod par snying po bcud bsdus byas// thon gzir phur pas gdab/ yi ge byin cing rten du brtag/ steng 'og tshangs pa'i rtsa la brtag/ rten can klu gzir gdug pa gtad// klu las bcud spangs

'grin zlar gtad// gzhan du lha yi snying po bcud// 'gyur med brtan pa stobs dpag med// ha la khang zhes dus la mtho// sprul sku phyag rgya sku bsam yas// thob cing bgrod pa sngags kyi stobs// drag sngags

sbyor na/ e myags ya rngubs mugs shag ka dun dgra bo hur thuM dza/ rtsa khrag snying thuM ril rak+sha rbad/ tsit+ta breng shag dza/ srog la hur thuM rbad/ mchod sbyor ba'i stobs zhan nas// stobs chen drag po nang rgyas

na// drag sngags yon tan gnyis su bskyed// mi gcod 'gyangs na dkrugs nas spogs// e myags ya rngubs sbubs ya dun shag srog thuM raM dza la/ hur rtsa khrag dmar snying thuM rbad thuM/ snying po man ngag kun

gcod 'di// dkar dmar 'phrad na tsit+ta chong// b+hu ti b+ha ni ma nor yin// ta thA ga yi glang po rta yi mchog/ ka ma ra tsa ma ra na/ ha la ka la tsa ma ri// ru tra tir ti mA ra ya// nr-i kar ma byed b+ha sa ra// g+hu ha sa ba'i

mchog bsdus 'di// rang gi snying la so phag thaM// me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ khyad par dmar len gyi sbyor ba'i le'u ste nyer bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khog par

shig pa'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// byin chen bde ba'i gsang gnas su// gsang ba mchog gi sbyor ba brtsam// b+hi la khong 'dus khong dregs can// ha la nag po ya ma'i klong// be ga ta yi 'jig rten na// ya ma

rak+sha'i bde klong du// sgyu ma'i snying po'i gnas sbyangs la// thugs kyi bde ba gnyis med spro// de yi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// 'dul khrims nyams pa'i gos blangs la// rdo lcags zangs phye dug chus bsku// cha gnyis
byas la thig gdab brtsam// zil gnon phyag rgya dpang gzug bsam// drag sngags dmod pa stod du sbyar// tha chung bzhi yi mar ngo la// nyi shu drug nas 'khrul 'khor bca'// dbus nas thig skor bzhi ru
bskor// dbus su gru gsum bde gnas su// sku yi gzugs brnyan bris la ming// zla gam gsum las srung ba'i lha// phyi rim bcu gnyis gsang ba'i sngags// yang logs 'khor yug 'bod rbad

sngags// nr-i dang phyi nang gong ma bzhin// mtha' ma'i 'khrul mig bcu drug la// gsod cing gnon pa'i spu gri dgod// srid pa'i rus sbal lto na gnas// dug dang khrag gis ngar blud la// rje'am yul srung thod

par gzhug/ rtsang bcas dong du mthing nag dgab// dmigs med ngang las ye shes kyi// rol pa phyag rgya chen por 'phro// drag tu bskul kyin shugs kyis 'phang// mkha' khyab rdo rje'i sbyor bas te// dmod pa'i
lus la spu gri gdags// ming rus mi sbyar khyams la bcad// rgya mdud brtsegs pa'i lto ru gnan// yang na dkyil 'khor chen pa yi// 'og tu bka' yi byin bsdus la// rin po che yi lto ru gnan// bshags dang
dge ba rgyud mi gcad// 'byung ba lnga yi dwangs bsdus la// rin po che yi rgyas par bstan// rgyu yi snyigs ma'i srog bsdus la// dbus kyi 'bub gnas gzugs la bstim// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung// nam

mkha'i dbyings kyi khongs su gzhug/ dmigs pa dag pa'i tshad ma gdon// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las ye shes sngags kyi spu gri bton to// g+hu ru nr-i srog myogs thuM ril rbad/

srog staM b+ha ya nan// bgrod pa med pa'i phyag rgyar bstan// seng ge khog bshig gi sbyor ba bshad// me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ seng ge khog bshig sbyor ba'i le'u ste nyer brgyad pa'o//// de
nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis drag sngags gnam lcags kyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// rang sems dben pa'i gnas mchog tu// dam tshig mchog gi mtshams bcad la// zhing ras lpags shun khru gang la// sbyor
ba'i rgyal po gsum sbyar la// mchog dang ldan par rgya bcad la// zhing gi srad bus thig gdab brtsam// dbus nas thig skor lnga ru drang// dbus su sor cha gcig gis 'phags// gsum pa sor gcig gnyis
la phyed// dbus su gru gsum drag po'i gnas// de yi phyi rim gsum pa la// phyogs bzhir thig rkang gsum du drang// thig gdab rgya gram 'khrul mig bcu drug gcod// mtshams bzhir gsang mdzod drag po'i

gnas// yang logs rtsa ba'i 'khor lo la// 'khrul mig nyi shu rtsa lnga'i mchog/ phyi rim 'khrul mig bzhi bcu gnyis// lcags mkhar 'khrul mig brgyad cu drug/ gsang mdzod mtshams bzhi dbus dang lnga// srid
pa'i rus sbal lto na gnas// de na gnas pa'i rim pa ni// dbus dang mtshams bzhir dmigs bya'i ming// dri ma dang bcas tshe srog sdud// phyogs bzhi'i 'khrul mig bcu drug la// thun dang gsod pa'i spu gri
rnams// yang logs 'khrul mig bcu drug la// rtsa ba'i drag sngags 'bru bcu gnyis// mchog gi spu gri 'bru brgyad gnas// bzhi pa 'khrul mig bzhi bcu la// gab pa'i bcu gcod dang bcas// de

bzhin rgyan gyi bcu gsum la// gcod cing gnon pa'i spu gri ldan// lnga pa tha ma'i bzhi bcu la// thun bzhi sngags kyi sbyor ba gnas// gang byed sngags dang sbyar la bzlas// gang chu myos pa sbyor bskul bsdug kha
sbyar rgya chen sngon dmar la// sngags pa rtsa lnga'i thod pa ru// dus sbal rgya gram ming rus sngags// rtsa byabs lha bsgom dmod pa bzlas// thod pa zil gnon ye shes bsam// 'khor lo rbad pa phag mor

gzhug/ sbyor bas dril la thig le la// ru bzhi rdo rje rgya gram gyi// tshul dang sbyar la gnan pa bya// dgra bo'i srog la thuM mugs ti b+h+yo/ dun mugs srog la shaM thun ril ya rbad/ me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud
las/ drag sngags gnam lcags sbyor ba'i le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rdo rje dme 'thab kyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// yid mthun bde ba'i dben gnas su// dur khrod
gnas nas dpa' bo yis// zhing sogs ras dang rgyu blangs la// sbyor ba gsum dang ldan par bya// de la gcod pa'i 'khor lo bri// dbus nas thig skor lnga ru bskor// dbus su gru gsum zla gam gsum// phyi
rim 'khrul mig lcags mkhar bzhi// mtshams su zhing gi ka ba can// yang logs 'khrul mig lcags mkhar brgyad// mtshams la de bzhin ka ba sbrul// bzhi ba 'khor yug srung ba'i gnas// mtha' ma'i 'khrul
mig nyi shu la// gsod cing gnod pa'i spu gri gnas// dbus dang zla gam bsgrub bya'i gnas// bcu gnyis rtsa ba'i drag sngags gnas// 'khor yug gnas su bsnyen pa'i sngags// bar du rbad sngags bsad
sngags mtha'// phyi ru mgo bstan brgya brgyas bskul// bsnyen pa khri yis bos la gzir// sngags ni me dbal 'khor lo mtshon// 'khor lo me dbal mtshon chen gyis// zhing bcu sdig can bsreg cing
'joms// 'khrul mig rtsa ba nyi shu gnyis// gsang mdzod mun khang gnam lcags 'bar// rus sbal lto na mtshon cha me// 'od kyi gong bus 'khrug cing gsod// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis sku
gsung thugs las drag po spu gri 'di bton to// nr-i srog la dun rmugs/ sa ma ya myogs mA ra ya rbad/ nr-i srog gzir staM b+ha ya nan/ sngags kyi 'od dang 'bar ba'i dbal// gdug pa rang gshed rang la
dbab// mtshon cha ngar blud me dbal dug/ khri bzhi'i sbyor bas dril las 'phang// thon nas rtsang byas thod par gnan// zil gnon phyag rgyas gzir zhing dbab// 'khor lo sngon dmar dang bcas dril// sbal
pa phag mo thod pa dang// re bas mkhar nag stag gi mdzum// gtad pa'i sbyor ba snga ma bzhin// rtsa ba gcig la yan lag 'byung// dam tshig mna' chu gzir gsum mthar// drag po'i las la yang
yang brtsams// dme 'thab drag po'i sbyor ba bshad// me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ rdo rje dme 'thab sbyor ba'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis stag mo kha 'thab kyi

sbyor ba 'di bshad do// shog bu gru bzhi mdzub gang la// sme ba lnga yis thod pa bya// ni rang su yi thal ba yis// mtha' ma brgyad dang rkyang bcas la// thig skud zlum po bzhi ru bskor// dbus su gru gsum ming

dang rus// zla gam gsum la lha yang dgod// 'khrul mig bcu gnyis rtsa ba'i sngags// mu khyud stong thun rbad bsad sngags// bsnyen pa nang dang 'bod rbad phyir// mtha' ma rtsibs mchan bcu gnyis la// gcod

cing gnon pa'i spu gri dgod// myos pa stobs dang bral ba yi// drag po stobs kyi 'khrul 'khor yin// rtsa bar bcas pa'i mtshon cha lo ma me// don ldan sngags pas sngags pa 'joms// rabs chad nag po'i thod
par gzhug/ rtsang bcas dong du drag sngags bskul// thod pa tshas bcas stong gis gzir// mun pa'i gling du gnan par bya// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gsung thugs las sbyor ba drag po'i spu gri'i

sngags 'di bton to// dgra bo'i srog la mA ra ya rbad// dgra bo'i srog s+t+waM b+ha ya nan// mtshon cha'i rgyal po 'khor lo can// gcod pa skam pa spu gri'i tshul// gzir ba stobs ldan bsam pa dka'// ma lus kun
'joms thabs kyi mchog/ me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ stag mo kha 'thab kyi sbyor ba'i le'u ste so gcig pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan gyi pho nya bskul mgyogs slar la
bzlog pa 'di bshad do// sems nyid dben pa'i bde gnas su// rig med gzhan gyi sbyor ba sham// pho nya gzir zhing slar la bzlog/ drag sngags nus pas gzhan dbang sdud// mu stegs can ni lus srog

dbral// de yi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// dred mo ral pa gsig pa yis// zhabs mas tsakra'i rgyu byas la// sa dkar cong zi rus pa yis/ kha dog phyung la 'khor lo bri// dbus nas thig skor lnga ru bskor// dbus su gru

gsum nag po la// dmigs pa'i gzugs ni spyi'u tshugs gzhag/ zla gam ming rus de ba bri// mu khyud sbrul gyi ra bas bskor// 'khrul 'khor bcu gnyis rtsa ba'i sngags// phyi rim rdo rje rgya gram la// srog la thun

mugs b+h+yo// 'og phyogs/ srog la kham shag b+h+yo/ srog la breng shag b+h+yo/ srog la yaM shag b+h+yo// nra thums mA ra ya rbad/ srog la breng shag b+h+yo/ srog la yaM b+h+yo/ nr-i thums mA ra ya rbad/ g.yon gyi/ rang sngags ming
bcas bskor ba bri// phyi rim rtsibs mchan bcu drug tu// gsod cing gnon pa'i spu gri dgod// sbyor ba thams cad snga ma bzhin// dag dig glan glen thod pa ru// sbyor ba dril la bdag dbang
bsdu// sngags pa'i 'og tu gnan par bya// pho nya bzlog pa'i sbyor ba bshad// me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ pho nya bzlog pa'i le'u ste so gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das

kyis seng ge mche sbyor gyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// dam bsres dam sngags gcig pa na// seng ge mche sbyar gcer bu dred// ldan par khrag gi sbal pa bri// dme khrag dug rkyen bslang nas bskul// thod pa gzig

gi thig ler gnan// sngags po nag po spyi yi spun// spyi gtsug snying gar bse sbal bri// gnag pa dug rgod rdza yi khrag/ thod pa mun pa'i gling du gnan// bon po'i rigs gnyis 'dzin pa la// dme phur sdig pa

klad par sbal// snying la phag rgod gsad pa sbrul// bcug la nad ngan nang khrag bsku// thod pa srin mo'i sgrom du gnon// me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ seng ge che sbyar gyi le'u ste so gsum
pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ ma mo snying hur thuM gyi man ngag 'di gsungs so// 'di la mon gyi thod par ming rus bcug la lcags phur nas tsam gcig gdab/ stag gi thod par

sngags sum khri bzlas la/ mnan na dring 'phang ngo// shin rtsa tsa tu bdug thuM rbad/ mugs rtsar ling ma hA rag mo rak+sha rbad tsit+ta ma la ya/ dza dun rbad ya/ zhes gsungs so// rgya tshil go ta ra ma btang/ dong gru

gsum gyi nang du bong bu'i pho mtshan bcug la gyen du bstan la gzhag de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis phur pa mda' 'phen gyi sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// dang po la dkyil 'khor gru gsum chag gang ba zhig bya/

nang du rabs chad thod pa ru/ rdzas kyis byugs la/ phur pa nag po khru gang ba la/ stod du mi khrag smad du khyi khrag byug lha rnams rdzogs par byin gyis rlobs/ ling+ga'i nang du gzhug drag sngags bdun 'bum tshad

du gdab// rab kyis phur pa mda' ru 'phen// 'bring gis bla rtags nyams su myong// tha mas dgra bgegs thal bar rlog/ A+oM badzra kI li kA la ya ta sta da dza ka hUM phaT/ sarba tra ya ma ti dza dza e tri hur ki li/ da

sha rbad/ bdun 'bum bye ba bzlas te 'phang zhes gsungs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ltas ngan dang cho 'phrul dbab pa'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// sram dang byi ba'i thod pa ru// byi la zer mo srin
bya'i khrag/ spu dang sha sbyar zhabs mas gril// de bzhin gar 'bebs ming dang sngags/ khrag gis bris la thod par gzhug khri bdun bzlas la zhing ras gril// sa sris dmigs pa'i 'gram la gzhug/ zla ba
bdun nas ltas ngan 'bab// sems kyi dkyil du gzhag/ sbrul dang sbal pa'i gsob bshus la// dgra yi sa chu gdug pa'i sa// dug chus sprus la de nyid gzugs// gang dmigs byas la sngags
kyis gril// gsob de brgyangs la che bas bsku// drag sngags tshad ldan lam la gzhug/ gdug pa gzugs kyi cho 'phrul 'byung// thod par dur ma gnyis btsal la// dme mnol gri khrag kha mig btod// dug

dang sme ba lud ngan bsku// gang dmigs ming dang phob la gzhug/ mkhar gyi bres dang 'gram 'og sba// thod pa 'thab dang rgyug pa 'byung/ khra dang 'ug pa srin bya'i snying// sha khrag dang bcas bag zan dug/ dgra

bo'i khang par tsha bar sbyar// mnol khrag bskus la bya gzugs bya// gang dmigs ming rus sngags kyis gril/ khri brgyad bzlas la zhabs mas gtums// mkhar gyi rtse dang sked la bca'// bya de skad 'byin sder
mchus 'dzings// ltas ngan sdig pa'i than skad 'byin// ltas ngan srod kyi smag la 'bab// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las drag sngags 'di bton to// e ka he dun myags/

rngubs shag/ mug tri ling rbad/ sbur raM laM sbur/ nA ga rA dza ta la/ ka pa ta h+ya ha la ha la/ ka ling has thob/ me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ ltas ngan dbab pa'i le'u ste so bzhi pa'o// de nas bcom

ldan 'das kyis/ drag sngags kyi de kho na nyid rang gshed rang la dbab pa 'di la/ spyi don rnam pa bzhi ste/ de nyid rnam pa gsum gyi don dang/ sku gsum gyi don dang ldan par bya ba dang/ yi ge gnas lugs
shes par bya ba dang/ bzla lugs shes par bya ba dang bzhi'o// dang po sku gsum gyi don ni/ chos nyid rang bzhin med pa'i bsgom pa dang gcig/ de'i byin rlabs las ya mAn+ta kar bsgom pa dang gnyis/

de'i thugs kyi sprul pa phyag na rdo rje bsgom pa dang gsum mo// de rnam pa gsum ni/ dregs pa phyir gzir ba dang/ gang gnod pa dang rtags ston pa gcig gang gnod pa phyir gzir bas/ gang gnod byed cig sgo
yis de nas rtags su 'ong ba'o// yi ge gnas lugs gsum/ bdag la gnas pa dang/ don gang la gnas pa'o// bdag gi tsit+ta'i dkyil na e dang badzra gnas dang/ rtsa bzhi la/ chos nyid kyi rtsa/ yon tan la

rtsa/ ye shes la du/ rang rgyud la stan/ de ltar gnas dang sa bdag gi stobs dang go cha 'byed pa dang/ sngags gzhan phan par byed pa'o// dgra dang bgegs rgyud la gnas pa ni/ yan lag bzhi la trig gnas/

mgo la nan gnas/ ske la hur gnas/ snying ga na rang gi 'bru+u re gnas/ de 'dzin cing 'phrog par byed pa hur thuM dza yis bskor nas gnas/ rtsa bzhi'i sbubs na/ mA ra ya rbad/ bya ba go rim du gnas/ rang gi rtsa
mdud la 'di yi ge gnas so// dgra'i rtsa mdud bzhi la/ rbad bzhi gnas pa la/ srog ces bos la bcad pa'o// bzla lugs ni dgra bgegs gnyis la bzhi bzhir shes par bya ste/ dang la dregs

pa can spyir dril la gzir ba dang gcig sgos gzir ba yang bzhi'o// de yang dang la gang gnod pa'i yi ge gnad kyis gzir te/ gcig gis 'gre ste/ tirti ka trig nan/ zhes dang la gzer ba dang/ du hur thuM dza

yis snying gi dkyil na du gnas pa 'phrog e bsdus nas ling+ga la bstim pa dang/ mA ra ya tse ra gis las sbyor ba gcod pa'o// de gdon ma choms na/ spu gri gsum dang bsdeb pa ni/ ma ma ru lu trig nan/ ma

hur thuM dza/ mA ra ya rbad/ ces pa'o// des kyang ma choms na/ stobs dang chas te gtor la bzlas pa ni/ badzra sarba dur na tsa tri trig nan zhes gzir/ badzra sarba duSh+tan tsa hur thuM dza yis rnam par shes pa'i yi ge 'bru

gcig 'phrog la/ e'i 'od la 'dus te/ ling+ga la bstim/ badzra sarba duSh+tan tsa tri mA ra ya rbad/ ces pa'o// de dang nges par ma choms na/ badzra duSh+tan tirti ka trig nan/ tsit+ta hur thuM dza mA ra ya rbad/ ces dril la

brdeg pa'o// de yis gnod byed kun la sbyar bzlas na/ gang yang gsungs pa'o// mthar khyi spyang gi thod pa'am/ glang g.yag gi rwa ru bcug la ka rten dang lam rgya gram la gnan pa bya/ dam du gnod la zor du

bcug la gtad/ gdug pa gsum gnad bsreg la zor du 'phang ngo// dgra la byed na bzlas lugs bzhi ni/ badzra sarba duSh+tan che ge mo trig nan/ zhes lha dang bcas pa gzir la/ myogs shing zlum par bya/ badzra

sarba duSh+tan nr-i hur thuM dza/ zhes snying dkar nag gi mtshams nas nr-i 'phrog pa/ e la bsdus te bdag la thim pa'o// gong dang 'dren shul la ling+ga bsdus la thod par bcug la gzir ba ni/ badzra sarba duSh+tan/ dgra bo

srog tig ces brjod pa'o// mnan pa'i man ngag gsungs te/ ling+ga mnan pa dang/ 'khor lo bris la ya mAn+ta ka dang phyag na rdo rje'i lto bar bcas la/ ming rus dang khams dang/ snying po bris la/ dug khu dang/

khrag sna dang/ tsha ba gsum bsdus la/ sngon dmar dang/ chu dar dang/ rgya skyegs dang/ re bas mtshams byas la gnan pa bya'o// de yang thod pa byed pa na// sngags pa phye ba'i thod par mnan/ rigs ngan khyi
yi thod par mnan// bud med sre mong thod par mnan// de dag ma brnyed na mon pa'i thod par mnan pa yis/ de yang rgyud las/ bsreg na khru gang hom la bsreg/ 'phen na thod khrag zor du 'phang// gnod na
mon thod dbye bas mnan// zhes pa'o// me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ spyi don thun mong gi le'u ste so lnga pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis don gyi man ngag drag po'i sngags rgod
'di gsungs so// gdug pa gsum gyi mdze nad dar ba la// dmar len snying po gab pa gsang ba'i las// zhun mar snying po bcud lnga gso ba'i mchog/ dbye ba'i gnas su rang mtshan mtshams
bcad la// gdengs gsum ldan la gsal ba gsum bsgoms la// dmod pa drag po sngags kyi spu gri bzlas// rang bzhin btsan thabs drag po gsum du bcad// rang bzhin lha gsal stong stong zla bar
bzlas// btsan thabs rdzas rgod du bas bdug la dgram// drag po gnon pa'i sa chu dug khrag bsre// bag zan dang sbyar gdug pa'i gzugs brnyan bya// rgya shog gzugs la nA ga sa bris la// sngags dang ming

spel gzugs kyi mtha' ma bskor// drag sngags dmod pa rngam tshig ldan par bzlas// e myags ya rngubs mug shag ka dun sa nA ga pur hur thuM dzaH sa nA ga tsit+ta rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer rbud nan rbad/ mnol

khrag thun brdeg mtha' ru ka rten gnan// phag thod yugs sa mo yi dor rtar gril// 'di med bsrung ba thams cad rang 'chi 'gyur// rgyud rgyal bshad pa'i snying po bla ma dam pas ston// me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs

pa'i rgyud las/ don gyi man ngag drag po sngags rgod kyi le'u ste so drug pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis srin mo lcags thag gi sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// lnga brgya dus kyi tha ma la// rgyal ba'i
bka' las 'das pa dang// mtshams med lnga la spyod pa dang// dgon pa'i gnas su phra ma dang// dam chos dge 'dun smod pa dang// bden pa'i don bor log lta spyod// de tshe sngags kyi dmod pa bca'// dur
khrod shin tu dben pa ru// mchog gsum tshang ba'i gnad bcas la// sde gsum sngags kyi dmod pa bca'// de yang rnam pa gnyis yin te// lus srog dbye dang lo tog gzhom// dang po sbyor ba 'di lta ste/ rgya

shog dur khrod ro ras la/ sme ba lnga yi thod pa bya// ni rang su yis mdog bton la// thig skor rim pa bzhi ru bskor// dbus su gru gsum rnag pa'i gzugs// rus khams ming dang snying po bri// zla gam dbang

sdud srung ba'i lha// phyi rim rgya gram 'phen pa'i sngags// rtsa ba dril ba'i 'bru brgyad bkod// yang logs bcu gnyis 'khor lo'i rtsibs// bla ded srog 'gugs drag po dgod// tha ma rtsibs mchan brgyad gnyis

la// lus srog 'byed dang nad bsreg dgod// mtshon cha'i rtse mor sngags mgo nang// bar du 'khor yug lto sbyor ming// bkod la phag mo'i lto bar bca'// gri khrag nad khrag dug chus bsku/ kha sbyor tshon gyis

rgya gram bsdam// spyang ki dar ma'i thod par gzhug/ ling+ga dug dang mkhar pa sa// mkha' sgongs dag la tsog pur bya// bzhi bcas thod chen nang du brnag/ gru gsum maN+Dal lho nub tu// chag gang mthur mtha'
brkos la gzhug/ dme khrag nal khrag ra rog khrag/ yugs sa pho mo gri bo'ikhrag/ thod chen ling+ga de bzhin mnan gnag/ lcags phye zangs phye rdo phye dang// nyung dkar thal chen dug ngar bcas// thod
tshal nang du mtshon cha bsham// sngags pas gsal gsum zil gnon bsgom// mdun na zhing bsnol nyi ma la// sprul pa'i ma mo srog gcod ma// mgo dgu phyag kyang bco brgyad la// k+Sha dang rag mo thugs kar

bstan// dbu dgu steng ma bya yi dbu// dur bya khra dang bzhad kyi dbu// nang khrol glo snying za zhing rngam// bar gyi dbu gsum dud 'gro'i dbu// dom dang dred dang chu srin dbu// rtsa dang khrag dang nang khrol za// rtsa
ba'i dbu gsum khro mo ste// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing la// mche ba zang yag mi ro za// spyan nas khrag 'dzag dug rlangs shangs// sku stod zhing lpags thod pa sbrul// sku smad re lde dril bu

khrag/ phyag g.yas dgu na gnas pa ni// mngon du bsgral ba'i snying sbram 'dzin// g.yon pa dgu na thod zor bskyod// stag dang seng ge ban glang mon// gre mo mnol dang khyi nag phag/ 'thom nag g.yas la dug
khrag zor// zhabs brgyad dregs pa'i snying gar brdzis// 'gro ba 'dul phyir gar stabs 'gyings// skra dang ba spu me ru 'bar// de la bka' bsgo bskul zhing mngag/ 'khor lo thod par thun phab la// dang

pos thun de rab gnas brlag/ brgya tsho gnyis kyis dbang du sdud// gsum pas thun gyi rdzas la bstim// bzhi pas mtshon gyi char brlab pa// lnga pas rlangs 'phro ldeg cing 'chol// drug pas bla dang tshe srog
sdud// bdun pas dkar nag mtshams su bstim// brgyad pas srog gi me mar bsad// dgu pas dwangs snyigs rgyud las dbye// dgu bskor thun gyis brnag pa yi// las grub mtha' ru gnan gzir bya// brag
dmar srin mo'i sgrom du mnan// mnan pa'i steng du dmigs bya la// bsad pa'i thun zor yang yang brdeg/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las// drag sngags gab pa 'di bton

to// e baM raM khaM/ shig tsit+ta rngubs/ rtsa la breng dzaH e baM raM khaM shig tsit+ta rngubs/ dgra bo'i srog la thun rmugs ling shag rbad/ e baM raM khaM shig tsit+ta rngubs// dgra bo'i srog la breng breng/ yaM yaM thun ri li li b+h+yo/

tsit+ta gzer thuM s+t+waM b+ha ya nan/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis srin mo las la bskul ba 'di gsungs so// tshe bdag thugs kyi yang sprul mo// srin mo gsod par byed ma b+h+yo// chos sku gnyis su med pa
las// 'jam dpal tshe bdag nag po'i sku// thugs kyi sprul pa mgo dgu ma// yang sprul bdud dang sha za'i tshogs// ma lus 'joms pa'i mthu mo che/ khrag dang dug gi mtsho dkyil nas// dug rlangs mun nag
gtibs pa na// srin mo kha 'dar mgo dgu ma// bdud dang mu stegs bran du 'khol// srid pa'i ma mo las la bskul// dom dang khyi mo bla la 'gyed// drag tu bskul ba mchis tsam na// stong gsum

sha la rol cing gsol// nga yi sha skal gang na yod// stong gsum zos kyang nga ma 'grangs// stong gsum khrag la mos shing 'thung// nga yi khrag skal gang na yod// stong gsum khrag gis nga ma 'grangs// dgra bo'i

sha dang khrag la rol// drag tu bskul ba mchis tsam na// ri rab rtse nas snyil kyin 'ong// rgya mtsho'i gting nas rlab kyin 'ong// dgra bo'i sha la rol la shog/ dgra bo'i khrag gis myos la shog/ drag tu bskul ba

ma mchis na// rang sha rang gi za zhing 'ong// rang khrag rang gis 'thung gin 'ong// rang sha zos kyang nga ma 'grangs// rang khrag 'thungs kyang nga ma ngoms// dgra bo'i sha dang khrag la rol// drag tu bskul ba mchis

tsam na// gnam sa ri lung ldeg cing 'ong// rgya mtsho zor du 'phen kyin 'ong// dam nyams dgra la zor du rgyob// drag tu bskul ba mchis tsam na// lus can ma lus bran du 'khol// dam las 'das pa'i tsit+ta

'byin// dgra bo'i khong nas tsit+ta phyung// drag tu bskul ba mchis tsam na// snang srid b+h+yo bzlog me yis bsreg/ dgra bo'i lus srog bag chags bsreg/ drag tu bskul ba mchis tsam na// lus can bla la rgyug cing

'ong// sprul pa'i khyi mo nag mo dgu// dgra la rbod la bla dang phrol// drag tu bskul ba mchis tsam na// stong gsum nad kyi dra bar 'chang// dam nyams dgra la rims dal phob// drag tu bskul ba mchis tsam

na// snang srid lus srog dwangs snyigs 'byed// tshe bkrag bsdus la rtsa rgyud chod// srin mo lcags thag mgo dgu ma// spyan nas khrag 'dzag zu lu lu// shangs nas dug rlangs bun ne bun// snyan nas 'brug sgra di

ri ri// zhal gyis rngam sgras stong gsum phung// g.yas pa dgu na snying sgram dgu// thogs nas dgra bo'i tsit+ta 'byin// g.yon pa dgu na thod pa dgu// dgra la khrag mda' 'dur zor 'phen/ dgra bo'i khong du dug

mda' rgyob// klad pa gshogs la klad khrag chom// lus srog phrol la tsit+ta gtub/ khrag mda' dug thun phur zor rgyob// sngags pa'i sku dgra sgrol la shog/ byas la pho nya bla ded kyi sngags bzlas la/ dgra la rbad
do// 'khor lo thun brdeg las kyi mchog/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis srin mo gzir te/ nye bar las la mngag pa 'di gsungs so// grog mkhar rgya tshil sa dmar la// bong bu'i bdud rtsis legs
sbrus la// srin mo'i lder so gong bzhin byas// snying gar gru gsum dong brus la// snying po gnyis dang 'bru bdun gzhug/ drag sngags bzlas la stobs kyis gzir// srin mo bos la khrag gis bran// phur pas
bsdigs la dbang du bsdu// srin mo bka' nod zhabs 'og 'dud// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las/ gzir dang spogs pa'i drag sngags 'di bton to// e ka ya

ma baM raM rag mo yaM hur thuM dzaH dun dun trig nan// baM baM rngubs raM te shag tsit+ta dgra bo'i srog la hur thuM dza/ mA ra ya rbad/ snying ga'i snying po sngags bton la// ling+ga ming rus brnag pa gzhug/ zhag gsum thun
brab ro khang mnan// 'byung ba dkrug pas las rnams 'grub// rag mo dkar mo'i dkon mo yang spogs par bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'bras bu gzhom pa'i sbyar ba 'di gsungs so// dme thod
nang du me long bsag/ gser dngul zangs lcags rdo nag gzhag/ ra dmar nal bu khyi nag snying// steng du gling bzhi rtsibs brgyad dgab// de steng srin mo'i sku bzhag la// mthing nag dar gyis dgab la

bzhag/ khrag sna gsum dang dug bsres la// ling+ga ming byang g.yag rur gzhug/ smyug ma tshigs gsum smin pa la// ltas ngan sgro bzhi'i bsgron la bzhag/ zhag lnga'i bar du drag sngags bzlas// gser de zhu zhing

'phel chad na// mda' bcas lcags kyang blugs la dgra la brdeg/ srin mo drag tu bskul la 'phang// drag sngags sbyor ba gnyis su bya// baM raM khaM shig tsit+ta rngubs/ 'ur tog phrom shar dz+wa la raMsme sha hril/ hur

khams sha yeng/ phrom shar sring/ khrom b+h+yo/ ma byung spogs na sngags 'di brdeg/ khaM tsit+ta baM shag rngubs raM phrom hrIl tog shar dz+wa la hur thuM raM sma sha b+h+yo/ srin mo las 'di rgyas par bshad/ me rlung skyi 'dang '
khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ lo thog mtha' sdud kyi le'u ste so bdun pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis las kun gyi mtha' sdud du gshin rje bye ba dgu khri'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// dur khrod
gdug pa'i dben gnas su// rang sems dben pa'i mtshams bcad la// rten rdzas dam rdzas gri bo'i snying// thod pa ri mo bde ldan dar// drag po'i hom khung gru gsum la// brnag pa'i rten gzugs rgyu rten

drug/ ba yi lci ba sa dmar la// 'gar ti'i spri'i mkhar sgong la// ling+ga sor brgyad dbang po dod// nad khrag tsha ba dug chu bsku// ri sho dang ni gro ga la// de yi ming dang rus bris la// snying gar rlan dang sngon

dmar bsdam// thod par bcug la dong du gzhug/ zhing ras a mi 'bar gang yang ro ras zhabs ma la// sme ba lnga yis thod pa bya// gcod pa'i 'khor lo cha gnyis bri// dbus nas thig skor bzhi ru bskor// dbus su
gru gsum zla gam gsum// phyi rim 'khrul mig rgya gram ldan// yang logs rtsibs mchan bcu gnyis bca'// tha ma gdug pa'i ra bas bskor// srid pa'i rus sbal lto bar bca'// de la gnas pa'i rim pa
ni// dbus su brnag pa'i snying po gzugs// bla gam gsum la srung ba'i lha// rgya gram rtsa ba'i drag sngags lus// yang logs rtsibs la spu gri rbad// gdug pa'i gseb tu mnan pa'i
sngags// mtshams dang mu ran ming rus khams// bkod la tsha ba dug chus bsku// thod pa'i steng du 'khor lo bca'// drag sngags dmod pa zhag dgur bzlas// rang yang zil gnon sku ru gsal// bye ba dgu

khri'i mdun du bskyed// zhing bsnol rU tra'i gdan stengs na// chu glang sngon po sbrul ris can// thod par nor bus brgyan pa la// nyi zla dang bcas gdan la gnas// sku mdog sngo nag gtum khro brjid// sku stod
glang chen stag sham zhing// sbrul dang thod pa rin po ches// dbu dang lhu tshigs phyag zhabs brgyan// zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// g.yas pa gsum
na ral gri dang// be can lcags kyi ri rab bsnams// g.yon pa gsum na lcags kyu dang// zhags pa rdo rje rgya gram bsnams// zhal nas sbrul dang mi ro 'brul// stod nas me 'bar 'dab chags lding// smad
nas khrag 'dzag gcan gzan rol// thugs dkar nyi ma ya dang sngags// dregs pa'i tshul du las la brtson// rbad cing drag sngags gtum par bzlas// mtha' ru thod pa zhabs 'og gzhug/ lcags phur gshin

rje'i skur bsgoms la// gzir sngags khri yis snying gar gdab// pho nyas bkug la rten la bstim// 'khor lo ling+ga thod par bca'// rdzas kyi ling+ga phag par gril// dar dang re bas thod pa bsdam// gnyan sar
'dug pa'i klu la gtad// dpang gzug 'o dod cho nges gdab// 'byung ba pho brang don yod bsam// mnan sngags brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bcag/ las kyi kha gso thun dang sbyar// drag sngags bstud la lci bar

bzlas// bla dwags byung na drag sngags brdeg/ bla chen bzhi la rnal ma brdeg/ sprul pa brgyad po dbus nas bzlog/ yang sprul bcu gnyis mtha' nas zlog/ chags sdang lnga la 'byung ba dkrug/ gzir dang mnan
la kha gso zor// drag sngags spu gri bdun du sbyar// de yis ma lus 'joms shing 'pho// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las drag sngags 'di bton to// e ka ya ma hur

yaM thibs// dgra bo srog la baM ril thun dzaH yaM myags mA ra ya rbad dza dza/ dun ril baM laM srog la myags mA ra ya rbad/ mA ra ya myags/ tsa dza tsha yang dun ril baM srog la rbad/ srog dun baM myags/ rtsa la dun rbad

mA ra ya dza/ srog la sbur nan/ snying gzer rbad/ srog stam+b+ha ya nan/ srog la thun b+h+yo/ breng shag rbad/ sbyor ba 'di yis ma lus kun// 'joms shing dwangs snyigs 'byed par shes// de nas yang bcom ldan
'das kyis las sna tshogs la bskul ba 'di gsungs so// hUM/ bskal pa brgyad khri bzhi stong 'das pa'i pha rol na// 'byung ba rten gzhi rngam pa'i 'og shed na// rgya mtsho chen po'i gting rum
na// mun khang lcags mkhar sgo med na// ru tra dregs pa'i gdan steng na// gshin rje bye ba dgu khri bzhugs// sku mdog mthing nag rngam pa la// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon
dmar dbus mthing zhal// phyag drug phyag mtshan 'bar ba ni// g.yas kyi dang po ral gri 'bar// dgra bo'i srog rtsa gcod cing rol// g.yas kyi bar ba zhing dbyugs bsnam/ khams gsum ma lus rdul du
rlog/ tha ma lcags kyi ri rab bsnams// dgra bgegs las ngan gcod cing gzer// g.yon gyi dang po be con gyis// dgra bo las ngan mgo lus 'joms// bar ba lcags kyus dgra snying 'byin// tha ma zhags

pas dgra bo 'gugs// dgra bo las ngan sdig can rnams/ khyams khang gnas su khrid la shog/ sku la lcags kyi tshem tshem gsol// zhing dang thod pa sbrul gyis brgyan// sku smad stag lpags zhing chung brgyan// stod

nas nga rgyal me chen 'bar// smad nas 'dod chags khrag chen 'brug/ sked nas zhe sdang sbrul gyis brgyan// zhal nas dug gi rlangs pa 'don// shangs nas phrag dog 'tshubs mar 'khyil// snyan nas stong gsum
'brug sgra sgrogs// thugs las sprul pa phyogs bcur 'gyed// pho nya bye bas dgra bo 'gugs// yang sprul dgu khris srog rtsa gcod// las kyi mtha' sdud khyod yin gyis// dgra bo dam nyams sdig can
rnams// lag tu gtad do shor ra re// 'di ni bka' gcog dam 'dral yin// 'di la sangs rgyas mi gnas so// 'di la dam tshig mi gnas kyis// 'di la snying rje'i gnas med kyis// rgya mtsho chen po'i gting

du sbos// lcags kyi ri rab 'og tu non// bye ba dgu khri dgu la b+h+yo// lcags mkhar btson rar dgra bo chug/ dgra bo pho rgyud mo rgyud chod// bcol ba'i las rnams 'grub par mdzod// bye ba dgu khri sbyor ba
bshad// me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ las kyi mtha' sdud kyi le'u ste so brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyis snying gzer nag po bsad pa'i las kyi rim pa bzhi ru gsungs
pa/ kun gyi bcud phyung pa ni/ gnas rang bzhin gyis dben la nyams dga' ba'i sa ru/ sems ngang gis dben pa'i mtshams bcad la/ man+Dal khru gang ba'i dbus su// dong gru gsum rtse mo lhor bstan pa gcig

brtsig de'i nang du thod pa gling mangs sam/ ling+ga rten dug dang sa dmar la byas pa gnyis kyi snying gar ming rus gro ga la bris pa gdags/ steng du dar nag pos dgab/ ka pA la gling mang ba'i nang du/ lug nag
po'i snying dang bya nag po'i snying dam rdzas su bzhag zhag bdun gyi bar du gsal bar byas la/ bdud kyi rgyal po yab yum dang/ bdud mi zan ma bcun ma dang nyi ma'i gung la bskul/ pho nya bdun

phrag bdun stong tho rangs bskul/ bla rkun bdun dang rgyas pa sde bzhi thun bzhir rbad/ nyung dkar dang nyung nag rdo phye dang khrag skam gyi thun brdeg lcags phur bcu bzhi la sngags bcu bzlas la ling+ga la thun

brdeg/ rtsang bdun tshan bdun la yang sngags bcu bcu bzlas la brdeg ling+ga la snying gzer gyi sngags brgyab pas/ bdud kyi pho nya dang/ sprul par bcas pas dgra bo lha srung dang phral nas/ shes rgyud kyi sgo phye

ste/ snying dkar nag gi mtshams su mtshon cha'i char phab/ nad kyi sprin gtibs/ las kyi me sbar nas/ rang rgyud kyi rtsa dang phung po las/ rtsa dang srog zungs bcad/ khrag dang bag chags bskam/ sha khrag dang rkang

rus la rol cing gtor nas/ bla dang yi ge nr-i rang dbang med par phrogs nas/ ling+ga la sdud pa'o// drag sngags 'di nyin mtshan pho mo ma nor bar dag la 'dril zhing rngam par bzlas so// go ro shan dgra bo snying

gzer yaM thun rbad/ rtsa ro pa na dgra bo snying raM thun rbad/ mu kha du+u na/ dgra bo snying gzer myogs rbad/ dza la po tra na/ dgra bo snying gzer thuM ril rbad/ du na b+hu ti nan/ dgra bo snying la gzer khas rbad/ rak+ta su kha

na/ thun rbad/ dgra bo snying gzer tsit+ta rbad/ wa ga sha ling na dgra bo snying gzer nr-i hur thuM dza// ma ma dgra bo tsit+ta gzer yaM thun rbad/ ma ma rtsa thang dgra bo tsit+ta gzer raM thun rbad/ ma ma srog rtsa dgra bo tsit+ta

gzer myogs rbad/ ma ma dza la tsit+ta gzer thuM ril rbad/ ma ma srog la dgra bo tsit+ta gzer khas rbad/ ma ma rtsa thang dgra bo tsit+ta gzer myogs rbad ma ma dgra bo tsit+ta hur thuM dzaH/ drag sngags 'od zer rno la myur ba

yis/ shes rgyud rtsa las dwangs snyigs 'byed par 'gyur ro// las de thon pa dang ling+ga las phur pa dang rtsang de bton la/ thod pa dang ling+ga phag pa'i lto bar gril la/ re ba dang mkhar nag gis bcings te/ drag
sngags pho mos gril la/ rbad phyung la nan btags te/ dang la khri bzlas la/ de nas rgya yis bcag dbang chen gyis bsnan/ bdud kyi pho brang gdab/ ma nyes pa'i dpang gzug snying gzer bsad pa'i kha
gso'o// de yang dmar len spu gri'i rgyud las// bdud dang pho nya sprul pa'i tshogs// ma lus rdzogs pa'i las byas nas/ rtags med brnag pa ma khugs na// sbyor ba'i rgyal po dmar len bsngags// sems
dben gnas su rang mtshams bcad// man+Dal phur pa hom khung rtsang// ling+ga ming byas sngon dmar gnag/ phag gi thod par sbubs ma gzhug/ rang nyid mi g.yo chos sku dang// phyag rgya chen po zil gnon
g.yas// bdud dang pho nya sprul pa mngag/ drag sngags pho mos nyin mtshan brdeg/ brnag pa lha dang dpang gzug phral// tsit+ta'i gsang sgor mtshon cha nad// phab na rang las bdud gshed

slong// dwangs snyigs drag sngags phye dang bla srog sdud// sha khrag phung po rol cing za// yi ge gnad kyi skabs dang sbyar// 'pho ba gsum ni rbad b+h+yo nan// drag sngags me rlung las kyi mtshon// rang dbang med par

srog gcod 'phrog/ phu+u la ling+ga rtsang bcas brdeg/ thod pa gzir zhing thod chas gzhug/ phag pa sngon dmar re bas gril// mnan pa klu dang btsan la gtad// la sogs skabs kyis gong dang sbyor/ kha gso byed

pa b+h+yo yis 'phang// gsang ba snying gzer sbyor ba bya// nyin mtshan gung dang tho rangs srod// dus bzhir rtag tu drag tu bskul// mtshon cha sbyor ba'i rgyal por gsungs// zhes bya'o// me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i
rgyud las/ bdud kyi snying gzer nag po'i le'u ste so dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don gyi man ngag drag po sngags rgod la/ gsad gso dbab gcad ltas ngan thog gser las// kun

'dus rnam rtog chen po rang la 'byung zhing 'char// de yi sbyor ba drag po lnga dang ldan// lnga yi mchog tu snying po don gyi las// de las 'bru bzhi 'bru brgyad rtsa ba'i sngags// 'bru bzhi gsad gso las 'di srung ba'i

mchog/ dwangs ma bzhi yi rtsa las ye shes bzhi shar ba/ dug lnga las dang sbyor ba gdug pa kun 'joms yin// de yi sbyor ba rgyas pa 'di lta ste// dur khrod ras sam shog gu gru bzhi la// sbyor ba lnga dang tsha ba dug

chus sbyang// las kyi 'khor lo mu khyud bzhi ru bskor// dbus su gru gsum zla gam gsum dang ldan// de yi phyi rim rgya gram rwa bzhir bya// yang logs mu khyud zlum po chu yi ris// tha mar rtsibs chen bcu gnyis rtse

mo nang du bstan/ srid pa'i khyams khang phag mo'i lto bar bca'// de la gnas shing dgod pa'i rim pa ni// gru gsum gnod byed snying po ming rnams bri// zla gam gsum la stong pa'i ming rnams bri// rgya gram rwa
bzhir rtsa ba'i 'bru bzhi dgod// chu ri mu khyud rbod gtong gdug pa'i ming// bcu gnyis rtsibs la gcod cing gzir ba'i sngags// bkod la kha sbyor dar dang sngon dmar bltam// thod pa dur mar bcug la gru

gsum rtsang bcas rnams// phyag rgya zil gnon gsal byas zhag lnga drag tu gzir// ling+ga'i snying gar mchog gi phur pa gdab// drag tu bskul kyin nad pa du bas bdug/ phying pas bkab la nyung dkar brab la
bskul// las de thon nas bka' rten 'og tu gnan// klu dang sa bdag lha yi gdon// gshin rje ma mo zhi khro phur pa khyung// dregs pa nyid dang bon po'i rigs gnyis 'dzin// bdud dang mu stegs btsan dang

rgyal po dmu// the'u brang phung bdag rig 'dzin gshin rngog sri can kun// rang rang ming dang snying po sbyor ba gcod// drag sngags sbyor ba la sogs brgyad dang gsungs// e dun ka yaM/ sarba tsit+ta ro

myags/ kha thaM 'drid phyung shag rbad/ srog la breng breng shag dun dun e dam hur thuM dzaHdzaHsa nA ga snying gzer rbud nan khaM shag dz+wa la rbad/ sa nA ga dza/ sa nA ga thuM/ sa nA ga rbad/ sa nA ga tsit+ta ro thuM rbad/ khaM dz+wa la

raM/ sarba sha truM nan 'drid yaM bzlog sbur nan/ e ka ya ma shig 'drid phyung khaM shag trig nan/ sbur nan/ sarba sha truM na sha stam+b+ha ya phaT rbad/ 'di bzlas pa'i dus ni rbod gtong nang 'gran pa dang/ shi kha bye ba dang
dmod pa zug pa dang/ mdze rims drag po me bzhin mched pa dang/ rims nad 'khrugs pa dang/ ser ba dbab pa dang/ keg bzlog pa'i dus su bzla'o// 'di gar song song bzlas na gdon 'khrug nas god

dang glo bur 'ong ngo// me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ drag po sngags rgod kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis srog dmar len gyi sbyor ba kun 'byung rtsa ba'i 'khor

lo 'di bshad do// gsang chen mchog tu dril ba yi// drag po mngon du phyung ba'i bcud// yang gsang sbyor ba lnga gnyis gcig/ bde ba smin par byed pa'i sngags// ha la nag po'i tsi ma ri// dug sbrul nag po
'dzin pa ltar// sbyor ba bcu gcig dag dang ldan// don gnyis mngon du sbyor ba'i sa// bla chen bzhi dang sprul pa brgyad// yang sprul bcu gnyis chags sdang 'brel// gang byung bsad pa'i sngags bzhi

bsdeb// rtags med kun 'byung don gnyis sbyar// dmar len sngags kyi snying phyung nas// las kyi 'khor lo mtshon cha bskor// snying po kun gyi mthu dril nas// mod la sngags kyi lus dang ming// gsang chen

gsang ba'i rgyal por bshad// rigs dang rtsol ba las kyi don// lta 'jug gnod zhen phyir 'byung lnga// gang rung drag sngags mtshon char brdeg/ rtsa ba'i mtshon cha skabs dang sbyar// rtag tu 'byung ba gcig tu
dril/ brgyal bas thig le mthu grol sngags// kun 'joms pa yi rgyal por bshad// rtsa ba'i 'khrul 'khor rgyal po ni// gru bzhir cha mnyam rus sbal ltor// ye shes lnga yi thig drangs la// de bzhin lho
gnyis thig drangs la// thig bzhi rgya gram legs btab ste// mu khyud rim pa gsum du bskor// dbus su gru gsum pho brang der// byang khog dbus kyi 'khrul mig gnyis// g.yas pa mtshon cha rtsibs bcu
la// gcig pa'i ral gri bcu dang ldan// g.yon pa rgya gram bcu dang ldan// drag sngags thun gzir 'bru+u bcu'i gnas// rgya gram de bzhin yaM yaM rngubs// 'bru bcu'i steng 'og bsnol mas gcod// g.yas su
rtsibs chen bcu bzhi la// gzir dang tsit+ta sbrul gnas pa// g.yon gyi rtsibs chen bcu gcig la/ yaM breng dun dun dzaH srog 'phrog dgod/ srid pa'i khyams khang stong na gnas// de bzhin srid pa'i
'khrul mig bzhi// 'khrul mig ra la mu khyud gsum// rtsibs chen bcu gnyis de bzhin bcu// cwo lnga rtsibs dang rtsibs bdun la// bla chen sprul pa yang sprul dang// chags sdang 'joms pa'i drag sngags
te// mtshon cha'i rgyal po re la gnas// rus spal khog smad lto ba'i rdzing// rin po che yi 'khrul mig bzhir// rtsibs bdun rtsibs dgu de bzhin bcu// gnon 'khor 'jug dang gzhug pa la// sdeb pa'i drag

sngags mtshon re gnas// kun gyi lte ba bcu gnyis la// rtsa ba'i yi ge 'bru re gnas// kun gyi mtha' ru bsreg dang ldan// snying po brda ming rus khams sbyar// las skabs sbyor ba rig pas gzung// gang 'grub
'khrul 'khor lto la bca'/ kha sbyar nang na nyi ma'i mchog/ dril ba'i mtshon cha sngags bzlas na// sbyor ba mchog ni spyod yul rab// sngags kyi ngar blud me la bdug/ bla bgegs gang byung sngags re
gdags// kun 'byung rtags med bsnol mar brdeg/ dmar len sbyor ba'i rgyal por bshad// me rlung sa chu bla chen rtags// rta g.yag ba glang ra lugs gshin// nya sram sprul pa yin par 'dod// sha ba gtsod

dang gna' ba bong// wa spyang ri bong byi la dang// phu nu pha tshan zhang drung dang// pha khu la sogs yang sprul rtags/ khyi phag bya sbrul zhe sdang rtags// me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ gsang chen mchog sbyor
ba'i le'u ste zhe gcig pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang chen sbyor ba dril ba'i las// drag po mngon phyung sbyor ba'i mchog/ snying gzer gdug pa thams cad 'joms/ shi 'phrad sngags

kyi 'khor lo yis// bdag skyob gzhan srung gdug pa 'joms// ma mo bdud pho rgyal po btsan// gru[(]tsha glu[)]gnyan sa bdag the brang gri// ma lus 'joms pa sgos kyi sngags// b+hi li'i khong 'dud khong dregs

can// 'bar ba nag po ya ma glang// yang gsang mchog gi sbyor ba bshad// de yi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// dur khrod zhing lpags ro ras la// mu khyud lnga ldan rus sbal ltor// dug khrag snag tsha sbyar la bri// dbus su
gru gsum zla gam ldan// phyi rim 'khrul mig thod mkhar bzhi// de 'og lcags mkhar bang rim brgyad// yang logs drag po rtsa sbubs dgu// phyi rim mtshon cha bcu drug 'obs// srid pa'i rus sbal lto ba r

u// drag po sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor bca'// de la dgod cing gnas pa ni// dbus na gdug pa'i snying po ming// zla gam ma mo rgyal po btsan// the brang gshin rngog snying po ming// 'khrul mig bzhi la gnas pa
ni// dregs pa stobs kyi 'bru bzhi dgod// phyi rim lags mkhar brgyad po la// dregs pa stobs kyi 'bru brgyad dgod// yang logs drag po rtsa sbubs dgur// srog mdangs 'chang ba'i gsang

mdzod la// snying gzer dgu pa sde tshan re// snying po gsum bsdus rdzogs par dgod// phyi rim mtshon cha srung ba'i 'obs// srid pa'i khang pa bcu drug la// shi phrad dgu btul snying po dgod// gnyis bcas dug

khrag tsha ba bskus/ kha sbyor sngon dmar mthing nag dril// 'khrul 'khor mtshon cha me dbal sngags// bzlog cing 'byin pa shugs kyi mchog/ gcod cing 'bigs pa'i spu gri mtshon// bsreg cing g.yengs pas me

chu rlung// sdud cing 'chang bas sbyor ba'i mkha'// gzir cing gnon pa'i thog ser sa// rtsa bar bcas pa'i mtshon lo ma// rtsa ba gcig la yan lag stong// bdag skyob gzhan bsrung go mtshon stobs// las dang
sbyor ba gcod pa'i mtshon// 'bar ba nag po zhe sdang mchog/ sngags kyi rgyal por dug ngar bcas// 'bar ba dug gi dum bur bsdus// gdug nag ya ma rag sha'i klong// de yi pho brang thod pa'i gnas// dur
ma'i phu ru rus sbal gzug/ mchod rten rin po che yi sbubs// tshangs pa'i bu ga rgya gram e// 'khrul 'khor dang bcas re bas gril// hom shing bcug nas stong stong bzlas// gsal bar khyab pa stobs kyis

blta// rdzas gsum brdab gsum lta ba bzhi// 'dus pa gsum dang yin pa bzhi// dbang bgrod pa yi go mtshon mchog/ rigs la rgyun du stong stong bzlas// nya stong sbyor ba btud kyin brtsam// drag po thog chen
gzer mchog bstan// gser gyi dgu thog gnam lcags gzer// ri rgyal rbab che spu gri'i dbal// yang gsang mchog gi gsang sngags 'di// e ka ya ma/ dun dza rag sha rngubs dun/ sa nA ga ma trag shig

gzer thuM rbad/ sa nA ga du me snying gzer ra thun rbad/ sa nA ga du me snying gzer dug phyung rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer khaM shag rbad/ sarba u+u na na lam shig gzer thuM tsit+ta breng shaM hring dza/ sbur nan/ rgyud kyi snying po

sbyor ba me rlung gi stobs bsdus pa 'di/ rang dang bu las gzhan la mi bstan no// las gang yang don med na/ srid pa stobs kyi 'khor lo bcas la/ snying gzer dgu dang shi phrad kyi sngags stong tsho re dang sbyar la

lto rjes la sbyor ba drag tu byas na gang yang 'grub bo// drag sngags brgya brgya rgyun du bzlas so// rkyen gang gis kyang mi tshugs so// me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ shi 'phrad bsrung ba'i le'u ste zhe gnyis
pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rig sngags sbyor ba gdug pa sreg pa'i las spogs pa med par sbyin pa 'di lta ste/ dben pa chen po gnyan sa ru// gang gnod sa la ma dal bya// dbus su gru
gsum mthing nag la/ kha khyer gsum dang ldan pa brtsig/ phyi nang chag gang dbus mdzub gang// rtsibs la kha khyer sor gcig bya// mu khyud nang du zla gam gsum// phyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs bcu

gnyis// bzhi pa mu khyud zlum po la// b+han+d+ha skam rlon bcu gnyis dgod// lnga pa me ri'i phreng bas bskor// de la dgod pa'i rim pa ni// dbus su gru gsum mthing nag la// sa chu me rlung sbyor ba'i sbal pa

la// hom shing khru gang gru gsum brtsig kha khyer gsum dang zla gam la// gdug pa gsum gyi gzugs brnyan gzhag/ rtsibs la rtsa ba'i drag sngags dgod// phyi rim mtshon cha'i rtse mo la// bsreg cing gnon pa'i

spu gri dgod// mu khyud bzhi pa'i 'khor lo b+han+d+ha la yang la// sbal pa sbrul dang nya sram sha/ gnyis pa sha chen tsha ba gsum// bzhi pa dug gi ri lu brgya// lnga pa bya phag spyang tshil gsum// drug pa mi rta khyi yi

tshil// bdun pa mar khu dug chu brgyad// dgu pa khrag sna chang sna bcu// bcu gcig dug rdzas sna tshogs bzhag/ dur khrod ras sam zhing ras la// gong bzhin bris la rdzas kyis bskus// bdun nam dgu ru steng
nas dgab// dmod pa bzlas shing bskong ba bya// drag tu bskul zhing me sbar la// gzugs la mtshon brdag[(]tsha brdeg[)]gdab la bsreg/ gdug pa'i sha sogs rim gyis dbul// them nas rjes shul brnag

pa'i zor// nyin mtshan thun drug sbyin bsreg bya// drag po sbyor ba mchog gi las// ho ban nya yi bde klong du// snying po gsum la dbang du sdud// man ngan gnad mda'i sbyor bas bsreg/ las sbyor nus pa dam du
'brel// phyag rgya chen po'i lus dbang srun// bde ba'i don du rang las 'char// gdug pa rjes gcod sngags kyi dbal// bag med sbyor ba kun 'joms yin// rnal 'byor can las gzhan du min// mdze rims

dag po'i yams dar na// sbyor ba'i rgyal po bstud la brtsam// sa nA ga du raM/ sa nA ga u nan gzer phyung// srog dun raM tsi ta breng shag rbad hur thum myogs rbad/ drag po mngon du phyung ba'i sbyor ba 'di ni/ las

gang gi rtags ma phyin na/ khyad par dang rdzas dang bca' thabs 'phrul par byas la/ sngags pa go mtshon gnyis dang ldan par byas te/ khro bo'idaka' thub dang dam tshig bsrung la las brtsams na 'bras bu re

dogs med pa'o// me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ drag po mngon du phyung ba'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste zhe gsum pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ kha gso'i dus su nya dang stong dang tshes

brgyad dang nyi shu bzhi la mon thod dam/ 'brong gi ru g.yas pa rtse mo ma bcad pa'i nang du khrag sna dang dug sna dang ling+ga dang ming rus bcug la phur bus gdab/ gri yis gtubs zor du bstim/ drag sbyangs
la zor du 'phang ba ni/ e myags ya rngubs mug shag ka dun dgra bo'i srog la thuM ril b+h+yo/ las de dag la rtags med na/ drag sngags mgo bzlog la/ 'khor lo dang thod pa bca'/ zhag gsum du

rnal ma dang sngags bzlog mar brdeg mnan pa dang kha gso 'dra'o// las gang yang rtags med dam stobs chen nang rgyas drag po sngags kyi 'byung ba dkrug par/ thod pa dang 'khor lo la dug shing gi dud pas
bdug kho'i srung ma gzir/ rang gi lus srog 'khor bsrung/ mkha' 'gro gzan la dbab/ sngags kyi dug mda' khong du bskyal/ rang gshed rang la dbab/ lus srog dwangs snyigs dbye/ gsang ba man ngag tu

lto sdeb pa ni/ e myags ya rngubs mug shag ka dun snying gzer sbur nan/ la tsa la tsa ma ri phyung/ e hur thuM dza/ khaM shag rbad/ e myags ya rngubs mug shag ka dun dgra bo'i srog la thuM ri li li b+h+yo/ e myags ya
rngubs mug shag 'di la man ngag byed pa'i bsad pa'i spu gri bsdebs pas/ man ngag gsang ba'i sdebs gsum mo// me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ kha gso ba'i le'u ste zhe bzhi pa'o//// de

nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ khro bo mngon du mthong ba'i don 'di gsungs so// dpal chen pos sngon gdug pa can btul nas bstan pa/ e badzra kro ta ma hA shri he ru ka tri dzaHdzaHdzaH rak+sha thuM ril rbad/

rdzogs par bskyed cing tshogs mchod bya// drag por bzlas shing rngam g.yab btang// 'jig rten gdon rnams rdul du rlog/ sngon byung rjes 'jug phrin las da lta rdzogs// drag thabs 'di yis khro bo mngon du
mthong// zhes gsungs so// 'jig rten zil gyi gnon pa'i me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ mngon du mthong ba'i le'u ste zhe lnga pa'o//// de nas yang 'jigs byed chen po des// zhi bas dug lnga

sbyangs te bsad pa'i don 'di gsungs so// zhi ba'i las rnams bsgrub pa ni// gang yin gzas pa'i ming rus dang/ rdzas dang dug mda' 'phrog pho mo gnyis bsdom srog snying la gnod byed thuM ril b+h+yo/ zhi ba

shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ zhes gsungs so// 'jig rten zil gyi gnod pa'i me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ zhi ba'i las kyi bsad pa'i le'u ste zhe drug pa'o//// de nas yang 'jigs byed chen po des/

nag po mthar byed klu'i don 'di gsungs so// nag po mthar byed man ngag la// klu yi dmod pas thebs pa la/ khrag sna tshogs dang/ dug sna tshogs dang/ gu gul dud pas bdug pa'o// mdze mo'i gos la ling+ga

bca'// sbal gzugs brgyad dang ming gzugs brgyad// pha mes thod pa yod na rab// med na rabs chad thod pa la// nang du ling+ga re bas gril la gzhug/ ngan thod de dang kha sbyar nas// 'dom gang bcas pa'i

sa ru mnan// de 'dra'i drag sngags bzlas pa ni// nan he he b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu/ dzaHdzaH ma ma trag hu ya hu ya/ nr-i rbad nA ga baM bu/ rung bu rbad/ he he duM bu+u duM rbud/ hu ya hu ya nA ga nA rbad rbad/ nA
ga klu'i gnod pa la gdon mi za'o// zhes gsungs so// 'jig rten zil gyis gnod pa'i me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ nA ga mthar byed kyi le'u ste zhe bdun pa'o//// de nas yang 'jigs

byed chen po des/ rgyal po'i smyo 'bog bsad pa'i las 'di gsungs so// seng ge'i thod pa dug dang khrag gis byug/ ling+ga ming rus bcas pa gzhug/ shel gyi phur pa nas tsam brdeg/ thun brdeg dgra yi 'gram

par mnan// de yi drag sngags 'di lta ste// e snying rtsa breng breng hur myogs sa ma ya thibs thuM snying rtsa hur nan/ zhes gsungs so// 'jig rten zil gyis mnan pa'i me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las// rA
tsa smyo 'bog gi le'u ste zhe brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang 'jigs byed chen po des/ drag po'i rdzas kyi man ngag la// thig le bzhi la 'khar phor du// seng ge'i 'o ma bzhos pa dang// phra men nag po sna

tshogs dang// bse zho sbal pa'i rgyu las/ rtsangs pa'i khrag dang de rnams blug/ thig le chen po dang rta yung dug chen pos brgyan byas te/ des ni sbyor ba the tshom med// bstan na 'jig rten phung bar 'gyur// zhes
gsungs so// 'jig rten zil gyis gnon pa'i me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ drag po rdzas kyi le'u ste zhe dgu pa'o//// de nas 'jigs byed chen po des/ mu stegs rngu brag 'don pa'i don 'di

gsungs so// dri ma rkang rjes sa dag las// nyung dkar nyung nag skye tshe la/ khrag sna gsum la 'phang la gtad// ling+ga 'chang las brab par bya// de nas yang rdzas sngags 'di bton to// e snying khrag la phri phri nan/

rA tsa nan/ ho ru sod/ thuM gung a ro la rbad/ shag srin si ta rbad/ yid gnyis the tshom med pa las// drag po mu stegs ngan sngags yin// thams cad dbang du sdud pa yin// zhes gsungs so// 'jig rten zil
gyis gnon pa'i me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ mu stegs ngan sngags kyi le'u ste lnga bcu tham pa'o//// de nas yang 'jigs byed chen po des/ gnod sbyin srog gi gseg brdar gyi don 'di

gsungs so// thams cad dbang du sdud pa yin/ a la tha la phru ba rbad/ tang bum ze ma ni rbad/ skye tshe ra'i khrag dang/ ro ras la dgra bo'i ming bris la/ sus kyang ma mthong sa ru bzlas// ling+ga rabs chad thod
par gzhug/ mi yi lag ngar tho bas brdung// zhes gsungs so// 'jig rten zil gyi gnon pa'i me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ gnod sbyin srog gi gsog brdar gyi le'u ste nga gcig pa'o//// de
nas yang 'jigs byed chen po des/ btsan drag gzer gyi drag sngags 'di gsungs so// dri ma drug la ling+ga bya/ khrag sna dug sna dag gis byug/ ming rus thod pa'i nang du bcug/ gri lcags phur bu

sor bzhi gdab// gong gsum btsan la gnan pa bya// de yi drag sngags 'di lta ste// e ma rag ya rag sha dgra snying pa la rbad rbad thuM thuM/ drag sngags brgyad khri bzhi stong du bzlas/ 'bum du bzlas pas the tshom
med// ces gsungs so// 'jig rten zil gyis gnon pa'i me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ btsan drag gzer gyi le'u ste nga gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don gnyis sngon du

'gro ba'i phyir/ tshad ma bzhi yis rab bstan pa'i// don gyi dgongs pa bsdus pa 'di// rtsol dang bsgrub pa'i mtha' las 'das// 'phro 'du sbyor nas g.yang sa gcod// rgyu rkyen bgrod pa'i sar ma lhung// rdzas

dang rtags la rten mi 'cha'/ mchod dang thugs dam bskang mi dgos// thams cad ngo bo ma bcos pa'o/ kho na chos nyid gcig pa la// lhun grub rang byung longs spyod sku// las dang sbyor ba sna tshogs sprul// sku
gsum ma btsal bgrod thob med// 'di dag chos nyid rol pa'i rgya// chos nyid bde ba rang byung dpal// ye shes chen po rang gsal ba// 'khor 'das dbyings dang ye shes gsal// lus sems gnyis 'dzin

'khrul gol la// ngo bo mi dmigs gnyis kyis dben// snang stong gnyis med ye shes sku// 'dzin rtog mtha' bzhi rang bzhin med// med pa'i ngang las snying po gnas// sgyu ma lhun grub yul la rol// 'khor ba
ma spangs rang sar yal// gsal ba de nyid lhun gyis grub// 'bras bu btsal med bde bar gnas// bdag nyid chen po ye rdzogs pa'o// rkyen dang 'phro 'du rtsal las 'das// phrin las ma btsal lhun gyis
rdzogs// sangs rgyas gsung gi zab mor gnas// bgrod pa dbang gi phyag rgyas btab// rdo rje stong bdag che bar gnas// sangs rgyas sems can ma lus kun// rgyud 'di bzung zhing gnas par bya// bcom
ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa las/ 'khor thams cad yi rang ste mngon par bstod do// dpal tshe bdag gi me rlung skye 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ 'khor la gtad pa'i le'u ste nga gsum pa'o//// rgyud kyi

yang snying dam pa zhes bya ba'i don rgyal ba'i bka'/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dmod pa bsgral ba/ lha yul du grags pa me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so// rgyud 'di dpe sdur sa yang ma rnyed
cing yig nor rgyun 'byams mang yang dpe rgyun chad pa las drag snyam nas bris pa yin///

rgya gar skad du// Ar+ya many+dzu shrI ya mAn+ta ka ma hA ka la g+hu h+ya tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed nag po chen po gsang ba'i rgyud/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje 'joms
byed drag po phyag 'tshal lo// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes pa chen po'i phul du byon nas/ phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad tshogs pas/ 'jam dpal ya mAn+ta kar dbang bskur
bas/ nga rgyal dang dregs pa can thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir/ gnas gcig tu tshogs nas/ gshin rje nag po'i rgyud 'di bka' stsal pa'i le'u ste dang po ste['o] //// de nas 'jam dpal gshin rje'i
gshed kyis/ skye 'gag dang bral ba'i don 'di bstan to// ye nas ma skyes gshin rje nag po'i tshogs// gnyis med 'dus pa'i sras mchog gshin rje'i gshed// kun gyi ye shes dam pa ste// thugs mchog chen
pos 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i// 'khor ba'i nyes skyon thams cad tshar gcod phyir// 'dod chags 'dul ba'i dpal ldan gar gyi bdag/ bye ba phrag brgya dpag tu med pa yang// sprul pa'i sku dag tshad med
