bya'o// 'jam dpal gshin rje nag po'i rgyud las/ rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor bye brag tu dbye ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o//// de nas mgon po gshin rje gshed kyis/ phrin las ya ma rA tsa'i kha thun nag

po 'di gsungs so// dang po sngags pa bdag nyid khro bo gshin rje'i gshed kyi cha lugs su zhugs la/ A+o~M ya mAn+ta ka dza/ ya ma rA tsa hU~M zhes brjod pas/ khro bo gshin rje'i gshed kyi skur gsal ba'i thugs ka nas/

'jigs byed ya ma rA tsa dzar gyis phyung ste/ mdun na sku che ba la yan lag rags pa/ sku mdog smug nag bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhig 'jig rten gyi khams su 'phros pas/ thams cad ya ma rA tsas gang bar bsgom

mo// des gang la bya ba dbang du 'dus nas/ slar ya mAn+ta ka'i mdun na/ 'joms byed chen po bka' ci stsal/ gang bsgo ba bsgrub par bgyi'o zhes 'khod pa la/ las su bya ba'i gnyer bsgo'o// de nas rmad du

byung ba'i gtor ma cha gcig gi nang du/ byi la'i gcin/ byi la'i tshang/ smug chen/ smug chung/ ming rus gtor mar bcug la/ dug dang mar bsres la ling+ga'i thog tu sbreng zhing las kyi gnyer gtad do// de yang zla
ba mar ngo gza' skar ngan pa la bya'o// dang por sku rgyan gcig par gsal bar bskyed pa 'di skad ces bskul lo// hUM gtum chen dregs pa chen po thams cad 'joms pa'i lha// dbang chen bdud 'dul dur
khrod chas kyis brgyan/ khro rngam gdug pas srid gsum thal bar rlog/ sgrol byed sku mchog ma mo 'bangs su 'khol// srid pa gsum na khyod 'dra gzhan na med/ khams gsum sgrol byed phrin las dus la

bab// rab brjid gshin rje'i gshed la phyag 'tshal lo// hU~M ya mAn+ta ka dza hU~M dzaH gtum chen rab brjid gshin rje 'joms mdzad lha// nyi ma 'bum pas lhag pa'i 'od stong phyogs bcu 'gyed// gtum chen mtshon

cha mang po bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar// rab brjid gshin rje'i gshed la phyag 'tshal lo// A+oM g+hu ha dz+nyA na muM hUM/ rdo rje'i sku la klu dbang rab brgyan cing// gcan gzan gdug pa'i pags rlon na bza'

gsol// yi dwags mgo bcad skam rlon phreng bas rgyan dang thod du bcings/ khro bo'i rgyal po gdong drug phyag drug hU~M sgra can// phaT kyis khams gsum dbang sdud zhabs drug gshin rje gnon// A+oM byin du ya ma na
dza ya naM/ brkyang bskum brjid pas gshin rje ya ba ti'i snying ga mnan/ ljags 'dril tshems kyi gseb nas rdo rje'i thog phab pas// 'khor gyi ma mo rnams kyang gcer bur phyung zhing sngam pa

'don// rab tu 'dar zhing bred nas bran du 'khol// tshams rngam khro bo'i brda skad sgra bsgrags pas// 'khor gyi ma mo rnams kyang 'dar cug cug/ A+o~M mu kha le kha dun nan/ tshangs pa 'khor bcas rdul gyi thig

'dzag cing// lha chen khyab 'jug ma hA de ba gnon// phyag na b+han+d+ha rlon pa rab bsnams shing// snying khrag dkrugs shing klad khrag zhal du gsol/ khyung dang 'ug pa lta bu'i khra bsnams shing// dam las 'das pa

rnams la gtong bar mdzad// A+o~M ma ma kha dun ra tsa hU~M nan/ rnal 'byor bdag la gdug cing 'gal byed pa'i// dgra rnams rab tu 'ching zhing phung bar mdzad du gsol// gshin rje nag po ya ma rA tsa gshin rje

kun gyi rje// gtan gyi lha yang khyod la gsol 'debs na// dmigs pa'i mgo nas chems chems 'debs su gsol/ khyod kyi sku dang cha byad ci 'dra mthong ba'i tshe// nad gtong srin po'i tshogs rnams 'dar zhing
'bros/ khyung chen sngon po mkha' la lding ba bzhin// ci la bya ba thogs pa med mkhyen pas// bdag la gnod cing gdug pa'i dgra dang bgegs// yud tsam gyis ni thal bar brlag tu gsol// 'jigs byed de
yi thugs dam dgyes bskul ma// e ka tsa ti gu h+ya ral gcig ma// mi pham khro gnyer g.yu yi ral gcig ma// ral pa sprug pa'i skra gseb re re nas/ khro chung zhal gsum phyag drug stong khams khyab par

'gengs// kun kyang mi bzad 'jigs byed lcags kyu can// lcags kyu gtams pas dmigs pa'i srog rtsa len// gang la bya ba ma thogs thal ba rlog/ phung po sha khrag rus pa zhal du bzhes// A+o~M shri a kro te byi

da rA dza hU~M dzaH ha he de ba ga dzaHhU~M baM ho phaT/ A+o~M ya ma rA tsa sa to me b+h+yo ru lu che ge mo hU~M phaT/ baM ril rbad nan/ A+o~M dub nur dub nur che ge mo nan/ tshal pa nan/ A+oM snying shog me kha la mu lo tsa thun nan// A+oM swa

s+t+wi ru ru gong bkra rA tsa nan/ che ge mo mA ra ya nan/ zhes bskul zhing brdeg go/ de nas spyan drang ba ni/ dbus phyogs mthing nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// mthing nag kham nag ral pa 'khyil

pa'i lha// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil pa yis// sum cu rtsa gsum kun kyang 'dar cug cug/ spyan mig sdang dgu gyen du bzlog pa yis// phyogs bcu'i khro bo kun kyang gan bub bsre// smin ma glog stong 'od

du 'bar ba yis// sprul pa'i pho nya mang pos srid gsum 'gengs// shangs nas rlung byung rdo rje'i 'tshubs nag drag po yis// sa gzhi g.yo zhing bar snang 'khrugs par byed// mche ba zla tshes dkar po gtsigs pa
yis// dgra bgegs srog rtsa dmar po gcod par mdzad// zhal nas khro bo'i brda skad phyung ba yis/ khams gsum srid gsum 'gul zhing ldeg par byed// sma ra ser po 'jigs pa'i me stag
'phro// stong khams 'od kyis 'gengs shing dgra bo bsreg/ phyag drug mtshon cha gdug pa mang pos ni// gnod pa'i dgra bgegs ma lus thal bar brlag/ thugs dam bskul lo gnas 'dir gshegs su
gsol// 'jigs byaid de yi thugs dam rgyud bskul ma// e ka tsa ti 'jigs byed dpal gyi yum// rnal 'byor bdag gi dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis// tshur gshegs tshur gshegs ma gcig lha mo rdo rje dam
tshig ma// sku stod g.yu yi dril bu 'bum gyi brgyan// sku smad stag pags rlon pa'i sham thabs can// g.yu yi ral pas dur khrod khams kun khyab// 'jigs byed thugs dam bskang phyir gshegs su
gsol// dmigs pa'i rtsa ba drung nas dbyung du gsol// bzhengs shig chos kyi dbyings nas gshegs su gsol// thugs dam bskul lo sems can don la bskul// dmigs pa bcol gyi yud tsam phrin las

mdzod// A+o~M ya mAn+ta ka ya ma rA tsa A kar+Sha ya naM/ dzaHhU~M baM hoH// g+hu h+ya a kri dza/ de nas phyag btsal ba/ gdug pa 'dul mdzad gshin rje'i gshed kyi lha// sbrul dang thod rlon mang pos sku yi rgyan du spras// rngam
pa'i nga ros thams cad zil gyis gnon// gtum chen gshin rje'i 'joms la phyag 'tshal lo// thugs rjes bdud 'dul srid pa gsum gyi lha// drag shul mthu brnyes gnod pa'i dgra rnams 'joms// mi bzad

drag po gtum khro thugs rje can// sprul pa ya ma rA tsa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jigs byed sku la mnyes mchog 'bul mdzad ma// sgeg mo ral gcig gshin rje'i gshed kyi yum// sku la ras kyi dU kul na bza'

gsol// ma gcig e ka dza ti'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas mchod pa rim gyis phul nas ni// snying po ma nor rtag tu bsnyen pa bya// de nas e gru gsum gyi nang du/ ri bong gi mgo yang rung/ mkhar gang srin
khyer btags pa dang/ sa 'jams la dmigs pa'i ling+ga byas la/ er bzhag/ gzugs kyi sked pa nas skud pa sngon dmar gyis btags la gtor mar stsal sne gcig sku la gdags/ gcig sngags pa'i lag

par bskur/ ming byang bzhi bris la/ gcig sku'i zhal du 'bul/ gcig gtor mar stsal/ gcig snang srid kyi lha 'dre la dam bdar/ gcig ling+ga'i snying gar glan/ ling+ga'i snying gar dug dang khrag bsres la sbreng/

nyung nag la sngags cing gdab/ gshin rje nag po'i rgyud las/ gsal ba thugs kyi kha thun nag po'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o//// de nas yang mgon po gshin rje'i gshed kyis/ phrin las ya ma rA tsa'i
mda' thun 'di gsungs so// dang por dben pa'i gnas su ni// rdzas dang yo byad tshogs par bsham// dmigs pa'i bris gzugs bkram nas ni// bsnyen bsgrub mchod pa gzhung bzhin bya// de
nas smyug ma tshigs dgu la/ khra dang bya rog 'ug pas bsgron// skyer mde'u zur gsum btsug nas ni// sgro smug bar du ming rus bri// mda' nyid nag por byugs nas su// thun gyi bsnyen pa zhag bdun

gzugs// dmigs pa'i ling+ga la yang brdeg/ thod pa dgra yi phyogs su 'phang// de la dang por lha yi rnal 'byor du bya ba ni/ dang por bdag nyid spyi gtsug tu// yi ge hU~M gcig gsal ba las// A+oM a kro many+dzu shrI
ma d+ha la hU~M/ zhes brjod pas/ 'jam dpal gshin rje'i gshed sku mdog mthing nag/ zhal gsum phyag drug/ g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing nag zhal bgrad mche ba gtsigs pa/ phyag g.yas kyi dang

po zhing gi dbyug pa/ bar ma dgra s+t+wa/ tha ma ral gri/ g.yon dang po sdigs mdzub/ bar ma mdung thung/ tha ma thod rlon dmar gyis bkang ba// zhabs gnyis sha za srin po gnon pa/ zhabs gnyis ma mo khrag

'thung gnon pa/ bzhi ka yang gyad kyi 'dor thabs su zhugs pa/ bdud dang srin po ma mo khrag 'thung bran bzhin du 'khol bar bsgom mo// de'i thugs ka nas yi ge dzaHlas 'phags pa ya ma rA tsa nyung 'bru tsam
sku mdog smug nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pas ba sbu'i bu ga yan chad gtam par bsgom/ thugs kyi ser mda' nyid kyang/ dpag chen gyi mda' g.yag la brgyab pa ltar/ ya ma rA tsa'i thugs mda' dgra bo'i
snying dkyil du brgyab pas/ slar mi ldog pa bsgom mo// thugs mda' 'di nyid skar mda' lam du zhugs pa'am/ me stag phus btab pa bzhin/ las dang nyon mongs pa ni sbyangs bsreg nas/ dgra bo'i snying gi

dkyil du gzer chen btab pa bzhin bsgom mo// gzhu lag pa g.yon gyis thogs pa ni/ gzhu mchog yar gtad pa ni ya mAn+ta ka mar gtad pa ni yum e ka tsA ti zhes kyang bya/ srin mo mgo 'phyangs ma zhes kyang
bya ste/ mig phyed skar du 'tsher ba/ ral pa dmar po'i rtse la bskal pa'i me 'bar ba bsgom/ lag pa g.yas na thugs mda' thogs pa ni/ 'jigs byed ya ma rA tsa nyid du gsal bar bsgom/ de ltar yab yum

gnyis su med pa byang chub sems kyi gzer 'debs de dgra bgegs su la brgyab kyang slar mi ldog par bsgom// A+o~M ya ma rA tsa sa du du da rod me/ e ka dza ti mu kha ya ka sho me/ A+oM be tA li rak+Sha man che ge mo mA

ra ya dza dza hUM phaT/ ces brjod pas/ dgra bo'i tsit+ta'i dkyil du thugs mda' ser chen babs pa bzhin du bsgom mo// de nas 'di skad ces bskul lo// nga ni skyes mchog gshin rje'i rgyal po ste// lag na gsod
pa'i mda' gzhu thogs pa ni// bsgral ba'i zhing bcu ma lus gzhom pa las// gti mug zhe sdang rdzas su 'chang ba med// gzhu mchog yar gtad gshin rje gshed po yin// gzhu mchog mar gtad

yum chen be tA nag mo yin// rgyal mdud byang chub sems kyi ngo bor bstan// chang gzung byang chub sems kyi ngo bo lung bdud rtsi'i snod gzhu rgyud ru tra nag po'i rgyu ma gzengs pa yin/ bsham ni skye mchog don la
zhugs pa'i mkhas pas bshams// brnyen ni dgra dang bgegs chen rnams kyi bsnyen// yab yum gnyis med rol pa'i mkha' dkyil nas// sprul pa ya ma rA tsa'i mda' zor 'phen// mda' ni mtshon gyi rgyal po

ste// dgra bgegs bsgral ba'i lag cha yin// ltong ni thabs dang shes rab ste// gnyis med sbyor ba'i phyag rgya yin// mde'u ni kha chung gting zab ste// tsit+ta'i dkyil du brdeg pa yin// ya ma rA tsa'i skyer mda'

la// ma mo'i tshogs kyi sgro cig bskyon// srin po'i tshogs kyi rgyus kyis dkris// byang chub sems kyi mde'u zhig btsug/ srid pa gsum gyi spyin chus byugs// 'phen no gzas pa'i dgra la 'phen// gshin rje'i

rgyal po'i thugs mda' ya// be tA nag mo'i thun mda' ya// gnyis med sku las sprul pa ni// ya ma rA tsa'i thum mda' ya// rgyob cig dgra bo'i snying gi dkyil du rgyob// A+oM badzra dun ting hed/ ma yaM ting nan/ ting

baM nan/ rA tsa sa du ma ya kro ti ni nan/ hU~M/ nag mo mig rnon bltas bton ma/ khyim phyir 'khor zhing sha la dga'// nag mo chen mo mig 'bru ma// tshe gsum dran byed rgyu ma 'jib cing 'dren// dgra bo'i mig 'bru

bya rog mchu// 'bras bu phyungs shig kha kha ma/ A+o~M kha kha kra gi ma pa ya hU~M phaT/ ri bong dmigs la brdeg go hU~M phra men khra li mgo can ma// thogs med mthu ldan 'joms pa mo// gsod byed chen mo hor pa

mo// hor mo chen mo 'jigs byed ma// chums shig dam nyams dgra la chum// dus la bab po hor mo gsod byed ma// nyams pa'i srog la mda' zor ya// A+o~M ho ra pa tsit+ta tsit+ta rbad// hU~M/ phra men 'ug pa'i mgo
can ma// ltas ngan rgyal mo'i dus la bab// nub mthong 'ug pa'i dus la bab// rno byed spyan gyis srid gsum gzigs// 'jigs byed thugs kyis stong khams khyab// 'jigs byed rkan sgra phyogs bcur

brdeb// 'jigs pa'i 'ug sgra di ri ri// sprul pa'i gshog sgra sha ra ra// 'jang lo rgyob cig 'ug gu mchu// nyams pa'i srog la mA ra ya// A+oM U lu mu kha hab hab/ hub hub phaT/ hU~M bde gshegs thugs las

sprul pa'i mda' mchog dam pa 'di// dgra bo 'brong ltar 'gying ba'i snying gi dkyil du rgyob// rA tsa sa du nan/ gcig ste bde ba thugs kyi mda'// snying la rgyob cig dus la bab// zla gam gdengs pa'i mda'
mchog 'di// dam nyams gsang ba'i mtshan la rgyob// sog ka gdengs pa'i mda' mchog dam pa 'di// dam nyams sog grib g.yas la rgyob// sku yi phyag rgya rgya mdud la// g.yu yi mda' sgra sha ra

ra// lcags kyi gzhu sgra 'u ru 'u ru// sku ni dud ka chen po las// 'byung po kun gyi gshed ma 'byung// gshed bdag ya ma rA tsa'i thugs dam dus la bab// dbang po lnga la thun mda' ya// mig gis bltas pas zhe
sdang skyes// zhe sdang rtsad nas gcod pa'i phyir// mig gi dkyil du mda' thun ya// gru gsum gdengs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// 'jigs byed 'bar ba'i sku snang bas// snom par byed pa sna yin pas// 'dod
chags rtsad nas gcad pa'i phyir// sna yi dkyil du mda' thun ya// ye shes 'bar ba'i mda' mchog dam pa 'di// nyan par byed pa rna ba yin// rna ba'i dkyil du mda' thun ya// gru gsum gdengs pa'i dkyil

'khor nas// sku yi rngam brjid chen po nas// thugs kyi sprul mchog dam pa 'di// smra bar byed pa kha yin te/ kha yis smras pas gti mug byung// gti mug rtsa ba gcad pa'i phyir/ kha yi dkyil du mda' thun

ya// lus kyi byugs pas phrag dog skyes/ phrag dog rtsad nas gcad pa'i phyir// spyi bo'i gtsug tu mda' thun ya// hU~M/ mda' ni phrin las ngang nyid dbyings su 'bigs// spyin ni byang chub sems kyi 'dzin pa'i
don// sgro ni sku gsung thugs kyi ngang// mde'u gnyis med dbyings su 'bigs// gzhu ni shes rab thabs su ldan// rgyud ni ye shes 'od du bsgrims// gsang ba thugs kyi mda' mchog dam pa 'di// rgyob cig

dgra bo'i snying gi dkyil du rgyob// 'phongs shig yab bdud btsan 'gong gnyis la 'phongs// rgyob cig dam nyams dgra la rgyob// dang po srid pa lte bar chags// srid pa chags pa bshig pa'i phyir// lte ba'i

dkyil du mda' thun ya// tshe yi phung po gzhom pa'i phyir// dpral ba'i dkyil du mda' thun ya// 'dod chags drung nas dbyung ba'i phyir// gsang ba'i dkyil du mda' thun ya// A+oM kha la mu la dan ti du+u na

rbad// A+oM sbrun kha sha kha lo u lo ldibs/ A+oM ma baM ru na ma baM ru na mu ra tsi ya rbad/ A+o~M pa tsa ru ru tshal pa kha rbad/ A+oM sad du dad nya ru pa nan/ srad de ma myag don khram/ rag ra tsa ra phaT/ de ltar bya ba'i thabs

ma nor na/ rtags myur du 'ong ba la the tshom med do// gshin rje nag po'i tan+t+ra las/ ya ma rA tsa gsang ba thugs kyi mda' thun gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o//// de nas dpa' bo gshin rje'i gshed kyis/
man ngag gsang ba'i phur thun 'di gsungs so// dur khrod dben pa'i gnas su ni// dkyil 'khor mthing nag gru gsum brtsig/ dmigs pa'i ling+ga bcas nas ni// dam rdzas yo byad tshang bar dgram// lcags
kyi phur pa sor brgyad pa// byin gyis brlabs te tshul bzhin dgod// phrin las cho ga 'di bskul lo// dbus phyogs kham nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// 'jigs byed ya ma rA tsa
gshegs su gsol// yum mchog srin mo mgo 'phyangs dbyings nas bzhengs// yab yum gnyis med rol pa'i mkha' dbyings nas// thugs kyi sprul pa khro bo mi g.yo mgon// dbyug to 'bar ba'i lha mchog
srid pa gsum gyi bdag/ gshin rje 'chi bdag mang po kun 'dul ba/ kha dog nag po bdud 'dul ral gri can// srin mo ma mo stag gzig zhon nas su// ral gris srid pa gsum po thal bar brlog/ srid
gsum 'joms pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// hUM/ sku mdog sngo nag gshin rje gshed kyi lha// ci bgyi'i bka' nyan ma mo'i 'khor gyis bskor// ma mo'i rbod gtong sdang ba'i dgra la gtong// sdigs mdzub 'bar

bas dgra bo'i srog rtsa chod// sdang mig bgrad pas gshin rje'i tshogs rnams 'dul// skan sgra brdeb pas srin po bran du 'khol// srin po khros pas khrag mtsho khong du gsol// spyug glu blang bas ma mo dgra la

gtong// dug gsum zhal du rngubs la phyag 'tshal lo// zhabs 'og gshin rje srin po ma mo kun// dun dun gum gum sdang ba'i dgra la gtod// gshin rje khros te shin tu rngam pa yis// srin po pho mo'i don snying

spar gyis 'debs// srin po khros te shin tu rgyug pa yis// ma mo stong gi don snying spar gyis 'debs// ma mo khros te shin tu 'khrugs pa yis// sdang ba'i dgra bo'i don snying spar gyis 'debs// dmigs pa'i che

ge mo 'di la phur thun ya// A+o~M ya mAn+ta ka sham/ a d+ya a tsa la sham/ A+o~M ma ma dug rtsa tshal pa tshal pa rbad/ ma dug sham/ ya mi sham/ che ge mo srog rtsa rmug ti rbad/ rtsa tsa ra tsa rbad/ ma mo khrag la dun ting

rmugs// srin pos rus pa chom chom tshal// gshin rjes khram la lhan lhan thob// che ge mo khram la ri li li rbad phaT/ phur pa nag po gcig sku stod mi g.yo mgon por bsgom la/ sngags pa bdag nyid kyis dus
gsum du gdab/ chu srin kyi kha man chad bdud kyi bu mo khram gyi bdag mor bsgom/ de nas bskul tshig 'di brjod la yum gyis gdab/ hU~M/ sku mdog dmar mo zangs kyi dril zhags can// zangs kyi ral pa
sprugs pa'i skra gseb nas// ma mo nag mo lnga bcu rtsa bzhi dgra la gtong// lcags kyi phyag sor 'bar ba brdabs pa yis// gshin rje nag po dun dun 'bangs su 'khol/ khro mo'i sdigs mdzub phyar te bsdams
pa yis// ma mo nag mo dun dun 'bangs su 'khor// srin mo 'bum khri 'bum stong thal bar rlog/ dgyes te gad mo drag tu bzhad pa yis// dgra bo dam nyams gtan du brlag par mdzod// mgo 'phyangs ma dza

dzaH bla rtsa la dza dzaH rtsa bo chal dun dun mugs/ nang khrol smad lnga la rtsa baM/ thun baM thun ri li li/ badzra kI la ya che ge mA ra ya phaT/ phrin las 'di bsgrub pa'i dus su/ rmi ltas su mon pa nag po

'am/ bud med nag mo dang 'phrad nas bdag la bkur sti byed na las grub pa yin no// gshin rje nag po'i tan+t+ra las/ ya ma ra tsa gsang ba thugs kyi phur thun gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o//// de nas yang
mgon po gshin rje'i gshed kyis/ gshin rje'i las mkhan bcu mngag pa'i phrin las zor thun 'di gsungs so// dang por gnas dben par bsnyen pa gzhung btsugs te/ dmigs pa'i ling+ga bcas nas/ mda'

'ug pa ma gcig sgro rtsar phug la/ ming byang dang rnel gri mo'i mngal khrag dang/ ra dug spyang dug bong nga nag po blugs la/ dmigs pa bkug ste ling+ga la brdeg go/ dbus phyogs kham nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i
dkyil 'khor nas// 'jigs byed ya ma rA tsa gshegs su gsol// yum mchog be tA nag mo dbyings nas bzhengs// 'jigs byed sku las sprul pa'i bka' nyan pho nya'i tshogs// bka' sdod las mkhan bcu yi
dus la bab// steng gi phyogs nas las mdzad pa// gshin rje'i rgyal po thams cad 'joms pa'i rje// sku mdog mthing nag 'jigs pa'i gzugs// chibs su nyi zla gza' chen bcibs// rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad

sprul par 'gyed// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'bar// phyag na gcod pa'i s+t+wa re bsnams// steng nas dgra bo khug la shog/ A+oM shag tshal pa rbad du nan/ shar gyi phyogs nas 'gugs mdzad pa// gshin rje'i rgyal
po 'chi bdag kun gyi bdud// sku mdog dmar nag 'jigs pa'i gzugs// phyag na rtsis kyi byang bu bsnams// ral pa dmar po gyen du 'bar// srog chags thams cad grangs su
bgrangs// dbugs thog thams cad rtsis su brtsi// shar nas dgra bo khug la shog/ A+o~M tsa dun rbad pu nan/ shar lho mtshams nas 'gugs mdzad pa// gshin rje rgyal po rmigs pa mgo/ sku mdog dud ka

'jigs pa'i gzugs/ phyag na mi mgo rlon pa'i phreng ba bsnams// shar lho'i dgra bgegs khug la shog/ A+o~M phra ma sti tshal pa rbad pu nan// lho yi phyogs nas 'gugs mdzad pa/ gshin rje rgyal po rkong rje brag

gyon rje// lus la brag nag thur mang mnabs// phyag na brag srin 'dul mdzad s+t+wa nag 'phyar// lho nas dgra bgegs khug la shog/ tshal pa sta na ya nan/ ma ru khrag gi sta nan/ rbad pu nan/ lho nub mtshams
nas 'gugs mdzad pa// gshin rje a wa glang mgo can// sku mdog mthing nag 'jigs pa'i gzugs// phyag na tri shul rtse gsum bsnams// lho nub mtshams nas dgra bo khug la shog/ A+o~M sho ma shag ti nan
rbad pu nan/ nub kyi phyogs nas 'gugs mdzad pa// gshin rje'i rgyal po gsod byed ya ba ti// sku mdog dmar nag 'jigs pa'i gzugs// g.yas na zhing gi dbyug to 'phyar// g.yon na 'dzin
pa'i lcags kyu bsnams// nub nas dgra bgegs khug la shog/ A+o~M khram khram so baM rbad pu nan/ nub byang mtshams nas 'gugs mdzad pa// gshin rje'i rgyal po lcogs pa mgo dgu rje// sku mdog dmar nag
'jigs pa'i gzugs// g.yas na zhing gi dbyug to 'phyar// g.yon na 'dzin pa'i lcags kyu bsnams// phyag na gsod byed spu gri bsnams// nub byang dgra bo khug la shog/ oM shrI po la kha rga ma rbad pu

nan// byang gi phyogs nas 'gugs mdzad pa// gshin rje'i rgyal po gsod byed rngam pa ste// sku mdog ljang nag 'jigs pa'i gzugs// phyag na gshog pa'i sta re bsnams// byang gi dgra bo khug la shog/ A+o~M khroM
sti tshal pa rbad pu nan/ byang shar mtshams nas 'gugs mdzad pa// gshin rje'i rgyal po chos kyi gcod spyod rje// sku mdog ljang gser 'jigs pa'i gzugs// phyag na nyes legs khram shing bsnams// byang

shar dgra bo khug la shog/ A+oM kro ma tsa la khroM sti rbad pu nan/ 'og gi phyogs nas dgra bo 'gugs mdzad pa// gshin rje'i rgyal po bdud mkhar 'joms pa ste// sku mdog smug nag 'jigs pa'i gzugs// phyag

na rdung byed tho ba bsnams// 'og nas dgra bo khug la shog/ A+oM kha 'dar ru tra rdul phran rbad pu nan/ zhes phyogs mtshams kun nas bkug la brdeg go// tha mar dgra'i yul phyogs su 'phang ngo// gshin rje nag

po'i tan+t+ra las/ ya ma rA tsa gsang ba'i thugs kyi zor thun gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o//// de nas yang khro bo chen po 'joms pa yis// phrin las khrag thun 'di gsungs so// sngon du bsgrub pa'i cho ga

ni// gzhung nas 'byung ba bzhin bshams la// 'brong chen dar ma'i g.yag ru ru// rak+ta phud dang mtshe nyung blugs// dmigs pa'i ling+ga gtor ma blug/ g.yag ru lag tu thogs nas ni// thun sngags gdab cing
bskul tshig brjod// hU~M/ dmar nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// gsod byed ya ma rA tsa gshegs su gsol// dmar nag brjid pa ma mo kun gyi rje// khro gtum btsan drag srid pa gsum gyi
lha// che btsan dregs pas ma mo 'bangs su 'khol// gsod byed de yi thugs dam dgyes bskul ma// ma gcig srin mo mgo 'phyangs ma// dgra la khrag thun 'bebs shing ma thogs da tshur byon// dgra bo dur
khyim khrag dun mugs// 'jigs byed de yi zhabs kyi chags 'og nas// srid gsum sha khrag mnga' bdag ma mo rnams// dmar lam bstan gyis ma thogs da tshur spyon// khrag thun 'bebs shing ma thogs da tshur
sbyon// srid pa gsum gyi khrag gi mnga' bdag mo// dmar mo mchu 'jib rtsa srog mnga' mdzad ma// g.yas na lcags kyu dgu khri dgu stong bsnams// g.yon gyis bdud kyi khram bam

bsnams// 'khor gyi ma mo stong ni rtsa brgyad kun// thun zor 'phang gis ma thogs da tshur spyon// brgyad phri bzhi stong khrag gi dri snom ma// sha khrag gsum la rol te khrag thun ya// A+o~M muM ya mugs ti subs// che ge

mo la cho cho// bal hub bal hub bal yul/ snying po gong rtsa thun nan/ mthun nan/ lab thun nan/ khrag thun khro khrag che ge mo'i khong khrag la ya zhes ling+ga'i snying gar gtig/ tha mar khyim la gtor ro// gshin rje

nag po'i tan+t+ra las/ ya ma ra tsa gsang ba'i thugs kyi khrag thun gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o//// de nas mgon po gshin rje'i gshed// sku khros rab tu gtsigs nas kyang// dam las 'das pa bsgral

ba'i phyir// phrin las dug thun 'di gsungs so// de nas yang gnas dben par bsgrub pa gzhung btsugs la/ sha khrag dang sol ba bsres pa'i gtor ma la spyan drangs/ spyang dug chang gis brlan pa'i nang du dgra

bo'i mtshan byang bcug la/ pho nyas bkug ste/ nyung nag dang ske tshes brab bo// hU~M/ smug nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// 'jigs byed ya ma rA tsa gshegs su gsol// dbang chen dregs pas phrin
las sku la rdzogs// smug nag 'khyil ba bdud dpung thal bar rlog/ 'jigs byed de yi thugs dam rgyud bskul ma// bdud kyi gtso mo gshin rje'i yum gcig ma// thugs dam dus la babs kyis gshegs su
gsol// yab yum gnyis med rol pa'i mkha' dkyil nas// bka' nyan pho nya phyag brnyan gzungs ma'i 'khor// za byed bdud bcu'i dus la bab// steng gi phyogs nas 'gugs mdzad pa// bdud kyi rgyal po
bskos rje drang dkar rje// g.yas na bdud kyi sbar shad 'bar ba bsnams// g.yon na bdud kyi zhags pa nag po bsdogs// steng gi phyogs nas dgra bo'i khug la shog/ shar gyi phyogs nas dgra bo 'gugs

mdzad pa// bdud kyi rgyal po ma tang khro bdag rje// phyag na bdud kyi zhags pa nag po bsdogs// 'dom ni dgu brgya dgu bcu bgrangs pa bsnams// shar gyi phyogs nas dgra bo khug la shog/ shar lho mtshams

nas dgra bo 'gugs mdzad pa// bdud kyi rgyal po to yo to nag rje// phyag g.yas gsod byed bdud kyi spu gri rnon po bsnams// phyag g.yon bdud kyi sho d+he'u dkar nag 'grems shing 'thor// shar lho'i mtshams

nas dgra bo khug la shog/ lho yi phyogs nas dgra bo'i 'gugs mdzad pa// bdud kyi rgyal po thod bdag thod pa rje// phyag na bdud kyi khram bam stag mgo can// sprul pa stag phrug mang po pho nyar 'gyed// lho yi
phyogs nas dgra bo khug la shog/ lho nub mtshams nas dgra bo 'gugs mdzad pa// bdud kyi rgyal po rkos bdud brang dkar rje// sprul po'i khal du bong bu+u gwa pa la// mdzes pa'i g.yu mthur sngon
po can zhig bkal// phyag na sho d+he mi yi mgo can bsnams// lho nub mtshams nas dgra bo khug la shog/ nub kyi phyogs nas dgra bo 'gugs mdzad pa// bdud kyi bu mo rgyal po mtshams med bdud kyi khro bo

ste// phyag na lcags kyi dril zhags 'chings byed bsnams// nub kyi phyogs nas dgra bo khug la shog/ nub byang mtshams nas 'gugs mdzad pa// bdud kyi rgyal po stong ril mgon nag rje// phyag na bdud kyi sha

nag po'i thod pa bsnams// nub byang dgra bo khug la shog/ byang gi phyogs nas 'gugs pa mdzad pa// bdud kyi rgyal po khra de ru tra rje// phyag g.yas bdud kyi sta nag 'byams pa bsnams// g.yon na mi mgo

rlon pa 'phyar zhing brdebs// byang gi dgra bo khug la shog/ byang shar mtshams nas 'gugs mdzad pa// bdud kyi rgyal po spyi bdud ya ma rje// phyag na bdud kyi tri shul rtse gsum bsnams// phyag g.yon lcags kyi

gze ma rnon po bsnams// byang shar dgra bo khug la shog/ 'og gi phyogs nas 'gugs mdzad pa// bdud kyi rgyal po sa tom nag po rje// phyag g.yas chu srin rgyal mtshan la// yu+u ba gti mug phag gi mgo can

bsnams// g.yon na bdud kyi zhags pa nag po bsnams// skye 'gro sems can sreg par mdzad// 'og gi dgra bo khug la shog/ che ge mo aM ku sha dza dza hU~M/ za byed bdud po khyed rnams kyis// dmigs pa'i dam
nyams dgra bo 'di// 'jig rten phyi mar dus ma 'debs// sems can rang bzhin skye 'chi 'byung// nam mkha' stong par khungs ma dbyung// nam mkha' stong par khungs phyung na// bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu med dam
ci// sems can skal pa chung bar bsnyad ma 'dogs// sems can skal pa chung bar snyad gdags na// khyed la thugs rje mi mnga'o// ma thogs bdud dang gshin rje rnams// dam nyams srog rtsa da drongs
shig/ srog chod khrag 'thung rus 'cho zhig/ dbugs chod mdangs khong yid phrog cig/ sngags pa khros pa las kyi gshin rje ltar// 'jig rten khams kyi gshin rje mi bzad kun// nyams pa'i ro la rol cing
mnabs su gsol// sngags pa khros pa las kyi bdud po 'dra// 'jig rten khams kyi bdud po ma lus kun// nyams pa'i srog la rol te bdud phob cig/ sngags pa khros pa las kyi srin po 'dra// 'jig rten

khams kyi srin po mi zan kun// dam nyams sha khrag srog dbugs zhal du rngubs// dam tshig dus la bab po sa ma ya/ A+o~M khri tang byi shi rak+ta ga ra la man/ ha sa ran bya pra be pra ban du/ tsi ta pra du che ge mo mA ra ya
na/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje'i gshed po'i tan+t+ra las/ ya ma rA tsa gsang ba thugs kyi dug thun gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang mgon po gshin rje'i gshed kyis/

khro bo gshin rje'i gshed rnam par rgyal ba'i man ngag sgrub thabs 'di gsungs so// dur khrod dben pa'i gnas su ni// stegs bu 'dom gang brtsigs nas su// dri chen gyi ni zhal zhal bya// dri chu yi ni chag chag
gdab// mAM sa yi ni go ma ye// thig chen dag ni btab nas su// dbus su dkyil 'khor gru gsum la// mu khyud thod pa'i phreng bas bskor// phyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la// gru chad glo 'bur sgo rnams
bcas// gzhung bzhin rdzogs par bris nas ni// yi dwags kyis ni gos la yang/ khro bo'i gzugs ni bris nas su// spyan dbye mchod dang byin brlabs nas// lha phyag lan bdun mgo gtugs la// gang 'dod
pa yi gsol ba gdab/ gru gsum dbus su bzhugs su gsol// sha chen gtor ma cha gsum bsham// tshil chen me mar kha brgyad gtang// dam rdzas gzhan yang tshogs par dgram// ting 'dzin dkyil

'khor bskyed pa dang// thugs dam bskul ba 'di skad do// ting 'dzin rnams gsum 'phro 'du las// grub nas yi ge hU~M du gyur// hU~M chen mthing nag byin rlabs las// 'od du gsal nas rdo rje rtse lngar gyur//

rdo rje rtse lnga'i 'od zer las// yi ge ya yi sku ru gyur// yi ge ya las sku bskyed pa// khro bo chen po rnam par rgyal// ya man+ta ka gshin rje'i gshed// dbu gsum pa la phyag drug ste// g.yas ni dkar la g.yon ni

dmar// dbus ni sku dang mthun pa'i zhal// sku mdog stang zil bcag 'phro 'dra// zhal bgrad rdo rje'i mche ba gtsigs// spyan dmar glog stong 'gyu ba bzhin// dbu skra kham nag gyen du 'khyil// phyag drug

g.yas kyi dang po na// gser gyi rdo rje rgya gram bsnams// bde gshegs rgyal ba'i thugs kyi mchog/ phyag drug g.yas kyi bar ma na/ kha T+wA~M ga yis rnge'u 'khrol// ma mo mkha' 'gro dbang du sdud// phyag drug g.yas

kyi tha ma na// rdo rje lcags kyu sngon po bsnams// nyon mongs gnas nas 'dren par mdzad// phyag drug g.yon gyi dang po na// dung chen dmar gyis bkang ba bsnams// thugs rje chags pas dbang du sdud// phyag
drug g.yon gyi bar ma na// ba su ta yi zhags pa bsnams// dam las 'das pa 'ching bar mdzod// phyag drug g.yon gyi tha ma na// zhing chung dbyug to smug po bsnams// bdud dang dgra bgegs zil gyis

gnon// sku yang che la sbom ldir rag/ glang chen ko rlon na bza' gsol// stag lpags brjid pa'i sham thabs can// zhing chen g.yang gzhi ya ba kor// thod pa skam rlon se ral kha// sbrul nag stong gis lhu
tshigs brgyan// zhing chen bsgral ba'i gdan stengs na// brkyang bskum tshul du brjid par bzhugs// g.yon na khro mo gnyer gnas ma// za byed chen mo be tA lI// mig gsum gdong ni khro gnyer
can// lus chen me chen 'bar ba la// gzi chen rab tu mdangs gyis blta// gtum mo dug hrul gos gon ma// gyen du skra brdzes gsus mo che// de bzhin lag na rtse gsum thogs// gzi chen rab tu sdigs par

mdzad// bde gshegs sras kyi bka' nod ma// zhing chen bsgral ba'i gdan stengs na// brkyang bskum tshul gyis sbyor mdzad ma// g.yas na sprul pa'i skyes bu ni// sku mdog sngo nag 'jigs pa'i gzugs// rngam
pa'i zhal gdangs dbu skra mdzes// zhal bgrad spyan yang khros pa'i tshul// g.yas na be con mtshon char 'bebs// g.yon na sdigs mdzub me chen 'bar// de bzhin ma he'i gdan la bzhugs// gzhan yang dur
khrod chen po yi// me dpung 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// 'khor ni thogs med btsan thabs can// khro mo kau ri brgyad kyis bskor// phyi rim mu kha brgyad kyis bskor// thal byed chen mo bzhi yis
bskor// dbang phyug ma yi tshogs kyis bskor// yi dwags phal chen dkyil 'khor 'dir// gshegs shing byon pa'i gnas ngan yang// bsnyen bsgrub pa yi lha lags kyis// yal gam can la brtser dgongs
nas// gdug pa 'dul phyir gshegs su gsol// de nas mchod cing bsnyen pa bgrang// mnyam par bzhag ste mi smra bar// ri mo gcig po la blta zhing// mgo ni rma bya bzhin dgug ste// rtse gcig sems kyis

bzlas pa bya// ru rag sha yi phreng ba bgrang// phyag mi btsal zhing lam mi bzur// mi smra ba dang dbang po bsdam// seng ldeng mkhar ba rtag tu thogs// bgrod ka'i gnas su 'gro bar bya// de ltar brtul zhugs

la gnas nas// mi mthun phyogs rnams bsgral ba'i phyir// yi dwags gos ni sor brgyad la// ra khyi phag gi khrag dang ni// dug dang lan tsha ske tshe dang// dri sa rjes sas ling+ga bcas// stegs bu lho nub er

bzhag la// drag po'i las rnams brtsam par bya// de nas yab yum gyi yang snying rgyun grangs pa'i bsnyen pa 'di gsungs so// A+oM shrI many+dzu ya yAn+ta ka a kro te ka trai lo kya bi dza ya/ ya ma rA dza de byi kro tI shwa rI yak+sha dza

dzaH a kra tsakra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ e ka lo mo ti d+hing d+hing hUM hUM phaT phaT/ de nas drag po sprul pa las kyi thun sngags 'di gsungs so// A+oM ya ma rA tsa sa to yaM/ ya ma rA tsa mu to yaM/ ya ma rA tsa kha to khaM/ ya ma rA tsa snying

to laM/ ya ma rA tsa dus sdus/ ya ma rA tsa chub byo/ ya ma ta ka ka la dun b+h+yo/ kring kring rA tsa sa na/ snying shad shad ni dza dza/ kring kring shad shad ni dzaH/ ni mA ra ya/ ma ra du/ ya ma snying/ ya ma khrag tshal pa gam

ril dam pa dum bu hU~M phaT/ de nas gshin rje pho mo 'khor bcas rbad pa'i zor sngags 'di gsungs so// A+oM sa ma ya many+dzu shrI mu tra mAn+ta ka ya ma rA tsa ma ma e ka dza ti dza dza/ trag rak+sha mu tra snying kha

rag mo b+h+yo/ rag mo he ka mi dza dza khal ma ti b+h+yo/ ya ya lo na rtsin dam ma b+h+yo/ snying kha ram srog rtsa kha b+h+yo/ de nas 'jam dpal tshe sgrub kyi snying po 'di gsungs so// A+oM a kro te ka A yuH sa la ya mAn+ta ka A yurga Na

sid+d+hi b+h+rU~M a/ gshin rje nag po'i tan+t+ra las khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i sgrub pa snying po sngags kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o//// de nas yang mgon po gshin rje'i gshed kyis/ dmigs pa'i rten ri mo'i mtshan nyid

'di gsungs so// lha yi dngos grub 'dod pa la// sgrub pa'i rten du bya ba ni// rin chen shing las bzhengs gsol lam// don kun sgrub pa'i ka pA la// ras la ri mo bri ba'i mtshan nyid rnams nges par gsungs
pa ni// gser dang dngul dang 'khar ba zangs// ra gan in+d+ra nI la dang// mthing bu shel dang rin chen nor// rgyal srid 'dod pas gser las bya// longs spyod 'dod pas dngul las bya// nad rnams bshag

phyir 'khar bar bya// zangs ni thams cad dbang du sdud// 'dod pa dag kyang rab tu ster// dgra rnams bshig phyir ra gan te// mchog dang 'dod pa ster ba la// in+d+ra nI la dag la bya// nor ster mthing bu la

yang bsgrag/ dri med shel las byas pa ni// zhi dang rgyas pa'i mchog rnams ster// rin chen sa 'og dngos grub ster// de yi tshad rnams bstan pa ni// gser la sor ni brgyad pa ste// de bzhin dngul la sor bcu

tshad// 'khar ba sor ni bcu drug pa'o// zangs dang ra gan nyi shu'o// bcu drug pa ni in+d+ra nI la'o// mthing bu sor ni brgyad pa ste// shel la sor ni bcu gnyis so// rin chen sor ni brgyad pa ste// mchod na

'dod pa kun ster ro// yang na shing las byas pa ste// rig 'dzin kun gyi mchog 'dod na// tsan+dan shing las byas pa ste// sor ni nyi shu'i tshad du bya// tsam pa ka yi rtsa ba la// sor ni bcu bzhi'i tshad du bya// bde

ba phun sum tshogs pa 'grub// a sho ka yi snying po la// sor lnga tshad du byas pa ni// thams cad kun la dbang byed pas// de bzhin a shwat+tha yi shing dag las// sor drug tshad du byas pa ni// lha min kun yang
'gugs par byed// nA ga ge sar dag las ni// sor bdun tshad du byas pa ni// nad 'jigs dgra rnams rmongs par byed// mi yi thod pa dag la ni// sor ni bcu gnyis tshad byas na// ring bor mi thogs ci
'dod ster// mi thod dag las byas nas ni// sngags bsnyen gud du ma byas te// mchod pa 'bab zhig byas gyur kyang// dgos pa'i don rnams 'grub par byed// yang na dang por ri mo mchog/ dngos grub 'dod
pas bri ba yang// mi ros bgos pa'i ras dag ni// mkhas pas khru gang tshad dag pa// mi yi ro skra nyid dag gi/ pir gyis legs par bri bar bya// tshon gyi kha dog kun med par// ri bong khrag gis

bri yang rung// dbu dgu phyag ni bco brgyad dam// dbu drug phyag ni bcu gnyis dang// dbu gsum phyag ni drug pa ste// de bzhin zhal gcig phyag gnyis sam// rang nyid gang 'dod gzhung bzhin bri// dris nas

me tog dmar po dang// mchod pa dag gis cher mchod la// sgrub pa'i rten du dgram par bya// gzhan gyis mthong na dngos grub yal// 'jam dpal gshin rje nag po'i tan+d+ra las ri mo'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i
le'u ste sum cu tham pa'o//// de nas mgon po gshin rje'i gshed po la// phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi thugs ye shes kyi ngo bo'i sku'i bdag nyid

yin te sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la gnod pa'i bdud dang mu stegs dang srin po dang gshin rje dang yi dwags dang sha za dang ma mo dang dgra dang bgegs la sogs pa thams cad 'dul zhing tshar gcod pa'i gshin

rje'i gshed por rdo rje'i ming gis dbang bskur gnang ba stsal/ bsngags pa mdzad nas/ lnga brgya dus kyi snyigs ma la bstan pa gnyan po srung bar bskos/ de nas gshin rje dang ma mo'i 'khor tshogs thams cad
kyis mgrin gcig tu bstod cing phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces zer to// mi gnas mi dmigs chos skur dag pa las// bdud 'dul khro bo mchog tu skur sprul te// thugs rje'i gzi ldan gdug pa thabs kyis
'dul/ khro rgyal gshin rje'i gshed la phyag 'tshal lo// mnyam med sku mnga' gtum chen 'bar ba'i sku// dug gsum za byed bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar// ma lus 'joms mdzad khro bo bgegs kyi gtso// mthar
byed gzhon nu khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// lhag pa'i ye shes spyan gsum rnam par dag/ thugs rje'i spyan ldan khro bas rab bsdigs mdzad// ma rungs 'joms mdzad khro bo dus dgra'i gshed// mnyam nyid ye

shes spyan la phyag 'tshal bstod/ khro mchog ye shes thabs kyi sku mnga' bas// dpag bsam shing ltar re ba skong mdzad pa// mchod pas sdig byang mthong na bde 'thob pa// 'dod pa ma lus stsol la phyag 'tshal

lo/ khro gtum mi bzad rtsub pa'i sgra ldan pa/ khyod kyi mtshan thos tsam gyis bgegs rnams phung// 'bar ba'i sku mthong gsung sgra thos pa yis// dgra bgegs mi brlag mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ khro bo'i rgyal po

khro chen gshin rje gshed// brjid pa'i sku la stag lpags na bza' gsol// mthu mchog bstan pa'i sbrul nag sku la bcings// 'j-igs byed mtha' yas sgrol la phyag 'tshal lo// 'od phung stug po bskal pa'i me
dpung 'bar// ye shes 'od 'phro gti mug 'joms pa'i sku// stong khams dbang du sdud la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub phyogs kyi chos rab rin chen dag khro bo'i dbu rgyan thod phreng con pan
mdzes// 'dod khams dbang du sdud la phyag 'tshal lo// ye shes mkha' 'gro sngaun po'i mdog tu gyur// sku mdog sngo nag dbyar gyi sprin lta bu// dug gsum mun khang 'joms par dam bcas pa// dri med ye
shes mche ba dkar po gtsigs// ma rungs sdigs pa'i mdzub mo bsgrengs byas shing// thabs kyi zhags pas 'gro ba ma lus 'dren// mtshungs med thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di dang pha rol gnyis
kar bde 'tshal na// lha mchog khyod lta rten ni gzhan mi bzhugs// yun gyi lhar kyang khyod la gsol 'debs na// ri rab gser gyi ngos la bya gnas pa// bya yi rang bzhin bor nas gser du snang// thams
cad khyod kyi skur ni mos bskyed pas// so so'i rang bzhin bor nas khro bor gsal// mi phyed dad pa mchog gis phyag 'tshal lo// yid bzhin rin chen mchog tu 'bar 'dra ba/ khyod kyi sku mthong rim gro
bgyid 'tshal ni// bdag cag 'khor dang 'bangs su gtogs pa rnams// sman pa'i don rnams phun sum tshogs par stsol/ khro bo'i rgyal po dri med ye shes sku// rab tu mi bzad khro bo'i gzir snang ba// chos

nyid mnyam pa'i ngang las mi g.yo bar// thugs rje'i tshul gyis khro la phyag 'tshal lo// nang gi chos nyid dag pa'i tshul sbyangs shing// phyi rol dam rdzas gces par ma bgyis te// rdos po'i dngos 'di 'phags
la mig ces kyang// bdag cag lus rnams 'phags la yon phul na// gnyis med don gyi mchod par bzhengs su gsol// bdag cag rigs rgyud 'khor du rtogs rnams kyis// lus ngag yid gsum dad
pas phyag 'tshal lo// dad pa rab kyis 'phags mgon mi gtong na// 'gro la phan phyir khro rgyal khyod bsgom na// mi mthun phyogs rnams rdul du brlag tu gsol// zhes kun gyis bstod cing phyag 'tshal
lo// gshin rje nag po'i tan+t+ra las/ 'khor gyis bstod pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o//// de nas gshin rje dang ma mo dang mkha' 'gro thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu smras pa/ bdag rnams dus
rnams thams cad du// mgon po gshin rje'i gshed kyi bka' dang dam las mi 'da' zhing/ bka' ci stsal ba bgyid do// gal te dam bcas pa ltar ma bgyis na/ mgon po nyid kyis bdag cag rnams
mngon du bsgral te/ snying 'gas par gyur cig par dam bcas so// de nas 'khor thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin du dam bca' nas so so rang rang gi gnas su dong ngo// 'jam dpal gshin rje nag po'i
rgyud las zhabs kyi don bsdus pa dam bcas pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o//// gshin rje nag po'i rgyud las slob dpon chen po ma hA ne bi ku ta pa tas bsgyur ba rdzogs

so//// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+Ya many+dzu shrI gu h+ya tan+t+ra rA dza sha ba ka tanA b+ha sa kalpa bash+tsi ma rA dza sA d+ha kA\u0f85 ga ma kro d+ha bi dza ya tan+t+ra bash+ts-i mA bi bash+tsi ma nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa

'jam dpal gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ pra khog snang gi brtag pa phyi ma'i rgyal po sgrub pa'i lung/ khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i yang phyi ma zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i gshed la phyag 'tshal

lo// 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas 'jam dpal dbyangs kyis ni/ khro bo ming ni gshin rje'i gshed// mtshon cha me ltar 'bar bas 'khrigs// drag la mthu rtsal drag ldan pa// de mthong nas ni

khro bo gzhan// thams cad kun gyis lag cha shor// de bzhin du ni 'jig rten pa// lha rnams lus kyis 'dud par byed// gzhan yang thal mo sbyar byas te// skrag nas bstod pa mang po byed// lha rnams mang po ji
snyed kun// 'jam dpal khro bo'i gzi brjid kyis// gzir bzhin du ni rab smras pa// bcom ldan mgon po bdag cag gis// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// skyabs su mchi yis bka' stsol cig/ rab
tu mi bzad 'jigs pa'i sku// gzi brjid 'bar bas phyogs khyab bo/ khams gsum 'khrug par mdzad pa mthong// gang tshe lha dang lha min rnams// skra gnas skyabs su dong ba na// de tshe 'jam dpal

dbyangs kyis ni/ khro bo slar yang zhi bar gyur// gshin rje'i gshed ces bya ba yang/ khro bo chen po zhi ba la// de nas skyabs su dong ba yi// lha rnams kun gyis rab smras pa/ khyod kyi brtson 'grus mchog 'tshal
ba// ji lta bur ni nges par bgyi// ji lta bur ni dang bar 'gyur// bdag cag the tshom chen po skyes/ khro bos lha rnams tshig gsan nas// gshin rje gshed kyis bka' stsal pa// nga ni dus gsum sngon du
byung// sangs rgyas kun gyi sngon du byung// nga ni dus gsum phyis kyang 'byung// nga ni dus gsum da ltar byung// nga ni lnga brgya tha ma'i tshe// nga yi bstan pa 'byung bar byed//
bstan pa thams cad nub pa'i tshe// nga yi bstan pa 'byung bar byed// las ngan mtshams med byed pa'i tshe// de tshe nga yi bstan pa 'byung// zas ngan lci ba za ba'i tshe// de tshe nga yi bstan pa

'byung// gos ngan dug hrul gon pa'i tshe// de tshe nga yi bstan pa 'byung// nga ni dus gsum 'byung ba'i sku// bstan pa thams cad nub pa'i tshe// de tshe nga yi bstan pa 'byung// ji lta bur ni zhi 'gyur yang// nga ni thams cad zhi ba'i sku// ji lta bur ni khros gyur kyang// thams cad
khros pa nga yi sku// lha rnams thams cad khyod nyon cig/ gzi brjid chen po khyod rnams kun// gang tshe gsum la skyabs song ba/ de'i tshe nga yi mi bzad pa/ khro bo yid la gnas par gyis// dkon
mchog gsum la gnas pa dang// de yi bka' yang bskyang ba dang// sems can kun la snyeng brtse'i phyir// nga yi yid ni zhi 'gyur gyis/ khyod rnams skyabs su dong ba dang// byang chub sems dang ldan pa

yis// thams cad don ni bsgrub pa'i mchog/ yi ge 'bru ni bcu bdun pa'o// de yi snying po yid las phyung// lha rnams kun gyis gzung bar gyis// gshin rje'i gshed po bdag nyid kyi// snying po rab tu gsungs

pa ni// de nas sa yang g.yos par 'gyur// rgya mtsho yang ni rab tu 'khrugs// gnod sbyin dang ni srin po dang// sha za la sogs phung bar gyur// lha rnams kun gyis phyag 'tshal zhing// yan lag kun nas ba spu

langs// gshin rje'i gshed po khro bo yis// gtso bo'i snying po de gzung ngo// de nas dam chos bsrung ba'i phyir// khro bo rnam par rgyal ba yis// rtog pa 'di ni de dag la// gshin rje'i gshed kyis rgyas par

gsungs// de nas khro bo rnam rgyal gyi// rtog pa khro bo nyid kyis gsungs// snying rje byang chub sems ldan pa'i// lha rnams kyis thos dgar gyur nas// dkon mchog gsum ni bsrung ba'i phyir// so so yi ni rtog pa

bshad// de dag gi ni rtsa ba'i rgyud/ khro bo nyid kyis rab gsungs pa/ khro bo rnam rgyal zhes bya 'di// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pas// sngon du phyag byas khro bo yi// zhal nas ji bzhin thos nas kyang/ khro bo

nyid kyis gsungs pa yi// rgyud 'di byang chub sems rnams kyis// snying rje de bzhin rgyas pa dang// rnam pa mang por byin gyis brlabs// 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud 'byung ba
zhes bya ba'i skabs te le'u dang po'o//// de nas khro bo rnam par rgyal// 'jam dpal khro bos bshad pa yi// rtog pa rmad du byung ba'i mchog/ mdor ni rab tu bshad par bya// de la 'di yi dkyil 'khor
ni// dngos grub thams cad sbyin mdzad pa'i// 'jig rten gsum po 'khrugs par mdzad// yi dwags mang po zhes bya'o// thams cad du ni dkyil 'khor 'di// gnas 'di gang du 'grub 'gyur ba// sngags

pas thog ma nyid du ni// de yi gnas ni brtag par bya// shing gcig pa'am dur khrod dam/ khyim stong dang ni bzhi mdo dang// mchod rten dang ni mu gnyis dang// thibs po stong pa lam srang rnying// skyed mos tshal

dang ri yi rtse// chu bo'i 'gram dang ri nags tshal// yang na rgya mtsho'i 'gram dang ni// lha chen gyi ni gnas kyang rung// ba lang lhas sam g.yul gyi sa// khyad par du ni yul gtsang bar// gang du yid ni dga' bar
yang// der ni dkyil 'khor rab tu bya// de nas rig 'dzin nan tan gyis// sa ni yang dag sbyangs byas te// ba tshwa med cing ma gas pa// mnyam zhing zug rngu med pa la// nub dang shar yang byang gi

mtho ba dang/ kha dog snum pa lhag par bzang// ba las byung ba rnam lnga dang// ldan pa yi ni lci bas byug/ ci rigs par ni byugs nas kyang// slob dpon gyis ni khrus byas la// smyung bar 'dug ste mnyam bzhag

nas/ khro bo'i bsrung bas byin gyis brlab// yi dwags phal chen zhes bya ba'i// dkyil 'khor gsang mchog nub mo bri// zar ma'i ras sam ras bal la// thig skud sum sgril mdzes pa yi// grwa bzhi'i sa dang sgo

bzhi bar// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig gdab ste// thog mar shar dang byang nas ni// lho dang nub kyi bar du'o// thig skud de ni phyogs mtshams nas// de nas kyang ni drang bar bya// shar dang lho yi mtshams

dang ni// nub dang byang gi mtshams dag tu// thig gis rab tu tshad byas te// gru bzhi'i bar ni thig gdab bo// rim pa gcig pa mdzes pa la// sgo bzhi dag gis mdzes par bya// lho phyogs kyi ni sgo phye la// lhag

ma rnams ni gcad par bya// dkyil 'khor dang ni 'tsham pa yi// dbus su pad+ma bri bar bya// pad+ma dang ni phyogs bzhi'i sgo// the tshom med par mnyam par bya// mdzes byed sgo yi phyed du bya// 'gram pa 'dab ma'i

tshad du mnyam// nye ba 'di ni mdzes byed kyang// mdzes byed dang ni 'dra bar bya// cho ga bzhin du dkyil 'khor de// kun tu thig ni btab nas kyang// phyi nas tshul bzhin rig 'dzin gyis// dur khrod thal bas bri

ba ni// rtag tu shar byang la sogs pa'i// grwa yi nang ni de dag tu// mkhas pas be con phyag rgya bri// phyogs kyi sgor ni yi dwags bzhag/ gzhan yang yi dwags lnga pa ni// pad+ma'i steng du bsam par bya// de bzhin phyi

sgo'i nang dag dang// phyogs rnams de dag thams cad du// mi ro mgo med yi dwags rnams// dur khrod thal bas dngar te bri// de phyir yi dwags phal chen yin/ khru gang la sogs rim pa nas/ khru brgyad pa yi

bar du ste// de las lhag par yang mi bri// rtag tu bdag nyid mchod pa ni/ khru gang bar ni bri bar bya// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang// mi rgyal sgrub pa khru dor bstan// sems can kun ni bskrad pa dang// de bzhin
gzhig la khru gsum pa/ khru bzhi dbang dang dgug pa yi// las rnams kyi ni mchog tu gsungs/ khru lnga nad dang mi nad dang// dgra rnams med par bsad pa'i mchog khru drug bgegs rnams thams cad

dang// gdon rnams nges pa zlog par byed/ khru bdun pas ni lha yi rnams// dbang dang dgug pa'i las rnams byed/ khru brgyad pas ni dngos grub kun// smin byed mchog tu shis par bya// de ltar ci rigs bris
nas ni// de nas gtsang mas nye reg bya// chu yi phyir ni chu yi snod// chus ni rab tu dgang bar bya// de bzhin me tog don du yang// me tog sdug gu dri zhim dang// me tog phreng ba snod mchog

gzhan// legs par dgang zhing mdzes par bya// dri yi don du tsan+dan mchog/ tsan+dan dkar po dmar po blang// a ga ru dang sbyar ba yi// gu gul bdug pa'ang de bzhin no// mar gyi me yi mar me dang// mkhas
pas snying po 'jam pa'o// drag po yi ni las dag la// tshil chen gyis ni bya bar bshad// gtor ma nya dang sha la sogs// sbyar dug la sogs lhag par dbul// de ltar tshogs rnams bsags nas ni// de nas

rig sngags 'chang ba yis// sangs rgyas kun la phyag byas te// byang chub sems la dmigs nas ni// ri mo yi ni las rnam dag/ gal te 'dri bar ma nus na// yi dwags phal chen dbus dag tu// pad+ma sngar bris
gang yin pa// de yi steng du yi dwags ni// mkhas pas yid kyis bsam par bya// yi dwags kyi ni sngags mchog gis// bsam pa dag ni byas nas ni// grwa yi dbyug pa bzhi po yang// sngags pa nyid kyis bsam

par bya// gal te 'dri bar nus na ni// sngags nyid steng du gzhag par bya// sgo yi yi dwags bzhi po yang// gal te bri bar ma nus na// de bzhin yi dwags 'dzin sngags kyis// byin gyis brlab par gsungs pa

ste// de yi nang du rang sngags kyis// byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir// rkang lag mgo bo phrag pa dang// gzhan yang de bzhin lag pa'i phreng// thod pa keng rus mi lpags rlon// ro yi phreng ba bsam par

bya// de yi nang du rang sngags kyis// byin gyis brlab tu gzhug par bya// de ltar cho ga bzhin bsams nas// mjug tu khro bo gshin rje'i gshed// sngags brjod pas ni spyan drangs nas// rang gi snying pos
bzhugs su gsol// khro bo 'khrugs pa 'jigs mdzad pa// sku ni me lce 'bar ba 'dra// gzi brjid 'phags pa bsam pa ni// sku mdog stang zil bcag 'phro 'dra// zhal drug sku yang kham par 'dug/ smin ma

kham nag mig kyang ser// spyan gsum mig ni zlum pa la// phyag ni bcu gnyis pa yi gzugs// de bzhin yi dwags steng na bzhugs// zhabs drug gis ni mdzes par byas// tri shul ral gri dbyug dgra s+t+wa// sbyin

pa'i phyir ni phyag brkyang ba// lcags kyu yi ni mtshon cha dag/ g.yas kyi phyag na de bzhin gnas// de bzhin g.yon pa drug po yang// thod pa shag ti to ma ra// mdzub mos bsdigs dang zhags pa dang// phyag na

dbyug to bsam par bya// mi mgo rlon dang skam po dang// yi dwags phreng bas rnam par brgyan// stag gi pags pa na bzar gsol// sku yang che la gsus khyim che// zhal gyi dbyibs ni du ma ste// skra ni rgya mtsho
'khrugs pa 'dra// zhal gcig bzhad kyang zhal gcig zhi// zhal gcig 'jigs par bgrad pa'i zhal// zhal gcig zhal ni gdangs pa ste// ljags kyang bskyod par mdzad pa dang// zhal gcig

mche ba gtsigs pa ste// de ltar bsams nas legs par ni// snying pos spyan drang yon chab dbul// de nas dri dang sbyar ba'i chus// mchod yon cho ga bzhin phul nas// yi dwags kyi ni spyi bor yang// me tog

dmar po sbyin par bya// de nas tsan dan dmar phul ba// blo ldan gyis ni khro bo la'o// dri yi 'og tu lha bshos dag/ tsan dan gyis ni gtor ba'o// me tog dang ni phreng ba rnams// me tog sngags kyis dbul bar

bya// me tog sngags kyis rim bzhin du// me tog cho ga bzhin phul nas// ji ltar snying po'i sngags kyis kyang/ khro bo gtso bo'i snying ga dang/ khro bo yi ni spyi bor yang// snying po rnam par dgod par bya// mtshogs

mar de yi mtshogs ma dang// de yi gtsug dang spyi gtsug gzhag/ de yi lus la go cha dang// mtshon cha'i gnas su mtshon cha'o// me tog yid kyis bzhag pa ni// ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin du bya// de ltar mchod
nas bdug pa ni// sngags kyis btab ste de la 'bul// de nas me mar rab 'bar ba// phyogs brgyad du yang dgod par bya// 'byung po'i gtor ma khro bo la// phul nas yi dwags phal chen gyi// phyi rol du ni

mkhas pa yis// sme gtor rnams ni sbyin par bya/ khro bo'i gtso la de phyogs te// de nas yang ni bdug par dbul// de yi phyi rol chu bcas snod// me tog gis ni bkang ste gzhag/ cho ga khrus byas smyung ba
yi// slob ma dag ni bos nas kyang// thams cad sngags kyis gzi bskyed la/ khro bo yi ni snying po yis// lag gnyis me tog byin nas ni// gos kyis gdong ni g.yogs par bya// dkon mchog gsum ni dran
byas te// slob dpon gyis ni gzhug par bya// rang gi snying pos me tog nyid// dkyil 'khor la ni gtor du gzhug/ de nas be con zhes bya ba'i// phyag rgya sngags pas de la bstan// dkon mchog gsum ni

gsang ba yi// dam tshig de la sbyin par bya// khro bo gtso bo'i sngags kyis ni// sngags zhes pa'i ni dbang bskur ba// chu dang me tog dag gis kyang// bsgrub phyir de la sbyin par bya/ khro bo'i snying pos de nas

kyang// cho ga bzhin du dbang bskur nas// me tog bdug pa phreng ldan pa'i// snying po de la sbyin par bya/ khro bo yi ni snying po mchog/ des kyang de ltar mnos nas ni// de nas bla ma la btud nas// ci nus sbyin

pas mchod par bya// sngags pas bla ma la mchod na// dngos grub thob 'gyur gzhan du min// slob mar snying po byin nas kyang// me tog tsan dan la sogs pas// mchod pa byas te de nas snod// dri chu+u la sogs
pas bkang ste// phyi rol du ni sngar bzhag pa// de blangs yon chab phul nas ni// 'jam dbyangs khro bo mi bzad pa// mthu rtsal drag pos gshegs su gsol// bzhud nas kyang ni yon chu

de// dkyil 'khor la yang dbul bar bya// rgya che sa yi dkyil 'khor na// dngos grub mtshungs med 'dod pa yi// de tshe yang dag rig 'dzin gyis// de ltar mchod pa rtag tu bya// de nas dngos grub thob 'gyur

ba'o// 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa las/ yi dwags phal pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtog pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang gsang sngags rnams 'byung ste// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH pre ta mu kha

kha da kla swA hA// dbus kyi yi dwags kyi snying po'o// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH A kro d+ha bi dza ya ag ni ra dz+wa li ta/ dzi hwe pre te shwa ri hUM phaT// de ni grwa'i be con bzhi'i sngags so// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH pre

ta thod la k+pa ya hUM phaT/ shar gyi sgo'i yi dwags kyi'o// A+oM pre ta big+h+nan+ta ka hUM phaT/ lho sgo'i yi dwags kyi'o// oM pre ta dz+wA la hUM/ nub kyi sgo'i yi dwags kyi'o// oM k+Shi pra pre tod ga ta hUM phaT/ byang gi sgo'i yi

dwags kyi'o// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ pre ta mA le bi kr-i te/ pre ta mA le bi kr-i te/ pre ta mA ke bi kr-i te/ gu h+ya be tsi ka mu khi sarba rak+Sho pa dza Sh+to hUM phaT/ yi dwags phreng ba'i 'o// de dag ni yi dwags kyi dkyil

'khor gyi tshogs so// da ni khro bo gshin rje'i gshed spyan drang ba la sogs pa'i sngags rnams 'byung ngo// oM na mo bud+d+ha d+harma saM g+he b+h+yaH kro d+ha pa ra bI ri sarba ma ye na/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ oM AHhUM i daM pre ta A sa na/

pre tod ga ta na rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM phaT swA hA/ khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed spyan drang ba'i sngags so// oM dz+wA la dz+wA la ti bi gra ha hUM phaT/ go cha'i 'o// oM A kro d+he ka ya mAn+ta ka ha na ma tha b+hany+dza hUM phaT/ 'di ni khro bo'i

rgyal po rang gi rtog pa yin pas// de'i sngags yi ge bcu bdun pa'o// oM AHhUM/ de nyid kyi snying po'o/ oM kA la hUM phaT// mtshogs ma'i'o// oM ya mAn+ta ka e ka bI ra hUM/ spyi gtsug gi'o// oM be b+ha swa tAn+ta ka hUM

phaT/ mtshon cha'i sngags so// 'di ni khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed kyi yan lag lnga pa'o// oM e ka bI ra ya mAn+ta ka bi sa ra swA hA/ ar+g+ha'i sngags so// oM bA ka tsi ta sho ne tra ra tra/ saM gan+d+ha bi gra hi swA hA/ dri'i

sngags so// oM di pya puSh+pa mA l+ya d+ha ri Ne swA hA/ me tog gi sngags so// oM tsi ti d+hu pa pri yA ya swA hA/ bdug pa'i sngags so// oM dI bya dz+yo tiSh+Na ti swA hA// mar me'i sngags so// oM b+hi mAn+ta ka te dzo ba liM ni swA hA/ lha

bshos kyi sngags so// oM sarba a mI She b+h+ya ba ha ri Ne swA hA/ sme gtor thams cad kyi sngags so// oM di bya na na b+h+yo dzi ni ha ra ha ra draM draM khA hi swA hA/ gtor ma thams cad 'bul ba'i sngags so// oM khu khu ni pre tog+ta

ti/ pra ta mA li la li ni/ m+lA m+lA kle d+ha pri pri ti shi phriM driMHdriM driM driM khu khu ni gri ha ba liM swA hA/ yi dwags dang ma mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi gtor ma'i sngags so/ khro bo rnam par rgyal pa'i rtog pa las/ yi

dwags phal pa'i gtor ma'i sngags ste le'u gsum pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang 'jam dbyangs kyi/ khro bo dpa' bo gcig pu ni// tshad med gzi brjid bdag nyed che// de yi phyag rgya bshad par bya// lag pa g.yas pa

'dun byas pa// dkon mchog gsum gyi dam tshig go/ mngon par bstod par byed pa ni// phyag rgya cho ga bzhin du bcings// rig 'dzin dag gis rtag par ni// lag pa'i sor mo thams cad kyis// mthe bo legs par sbas pa

ni// rab tu bsdams nas bzang po bcings// cho ga shes pas be con rgya// snying po sngags sam logs shig tu// sngags pa phyag rgya sngags kyis bcings// gzhan du nam yang mi bcing ngo// oM na mo bud+d+ha d+harma sang g+ha b+h+yaH oM sarba ta thA

ga te/ kro d+ha bi dzA ya/ ag ni ra dz+wA li ta dzi hwA pre ta shi ra hUM phaT/ be con gyi phyag rgya'i sngags so// phyag rgya gcig tu gyur pa 'di/ khro bo'i snying po sngags 'bar byed// mtshon cha ma lus pa yi gtso// bdud rnams thams cad zhi bar

byed// ji ltar dkyil 'khor du bri ba// de yi cho ga bshad par bya// be con dbyig pa lta bu'i tshul// 'di ni be con zhes par bshad/ khyad par du ni de yi rtser// yi dwags mgo bo mkhas pas bri// yi dwags mang po rtag tu bri// de

las gzhan du nam yang min// rig 'dzin gyis ni cho ga bzhin// rgya 'di dur khrod thal bas so// yang na 'di nyid logs shig tu// gang gi tshe na bsgrub 'dod pa// sgrub po dngos grub 'dod pa yi// rang gi dkyil 'khor du

bri'o// de nas phyag rgya bsgrub pa yi// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni bshad par bya// gru bzhi snga ma bzhin du ste// yi dwags phal chen 'dir yang bri// de yi dbus su be con bzhag/ phyogs brgyad rnams su'ang de bzhin no// phyag rgya dgu

yang brgyad dang ldan pa yi// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor zhes kyang bya'o// de bzhin du ni lho phyogs sgo// phye ste de nas mchod par bya// phyag rgya sngags ni ma lus pa'o// khro bo'i rgyal po rab tu gdug/ de yi 'dir ni mchod

'gyur bas// gsang ba'i mchod pa'i rim gyis so// oM na mo bud+d+ha d+harma sang g+he b+h+yaH oM sarba ta thA ga ta kro d+ha bi dza ya/ ag ni ra dz+wA li ta dza hwA pre ta shi ra hUM phaT hUM/ 'di ni khro bo'i rgyal po rab tu gzhug pa'i be con

gyi phyag rgya'i sngags so// 'dis las thams cad bsgrub par bya'o// de nas dngos grub kun gyi mchog khro bo'i gtso bo de kho na// gsang ba'i mchog dang ldan pa yi// be con sgrub pa bshad par bya// snying po ze ba

mdzes pa yi// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad byas la// 'dab ma rtse mo'i phyogs brgyad du// be con khro bo'i bar bcug bri// dbus su dgu pa bzhag nas ni// gzhan rnams shar phyogs nas brtsams te// bskor ba'i tshul
du go rim bzhin// me tog dag gis gzhag par bya// be con gyi ni rtse mor hUM// yi dwags spyi bor gzhag par bya// thog mar oM dang ldan byas te// oM dang na maHmchod par 'gyur// AHni khro bo

rnam rgyal gyi// sa bon dam tshig yin par bshad// oM AHhUM/ oM na mo bud+d+ha d+harma saM g+he b+h+yaH sangs rgyas kun gyis mngon par bstod// be con rnams ni thams cad kyang// rang gi phyag gi bskul bar bya// thams
cad rang gi dam tshig ldan// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su 'byung// bskul ba'i phyag dang rab ldan zhing/ khro bo'i lta bas brtag pa dang// rang rang sku 'dzin bskul nas ni// de ma thag tu las byed

'gyur// AHni khro bo rnam rgyal gyi/ khro bo'i lta bas brtag pa'o// rang gi dam tshig dang ldan pas// hUM dang ldan pas bskul ba bzhin// zhi ba rgyas pa dbang dang dgug/ dbye ba dang ni bskrad pa rnams// gsang
ba'i mchod pas sbyor ba yi// bdag gis mdor ni bshad par bya// de yi thog mar yi ge oM// de las gzhan pa sngags 'phel byed// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig nyid// gsum pa yin par yongs su

bsgrag/ sngags kyi bskul ba'i tshig 'di dag/ dngos grub ster ba bzhi pa ste// 'di ni sngags pa'i tshig gis tshig/ sarba ta thA ga ta zhes// brjod pa sngags kyi bdag nyid do// mjug gi hUM ni khro bo yi// sngags ni
'phel bar byed par bshad// de las de bzhin khyad par du// rang gi bskul ba'i tshig gis byed// dbang du bya bar 'dod par ni// rang gi ngo bo smos par bya// lha dbang dbang du byos shig ces// brjod nas

mtha' mar swA hA sbyar// zhi ba'i phyir ni skul ba nyid// mjug tu shAn+tiM brtag par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs las byung// mtshungs pa med pa'i dpal 'dod bas// skul ba'i tshig gi mjug tu ni// na

maHswA hA rtag tu sbyar// rgyas pa'i phyir ni sngon bzhin du// bskul nas bauSha Ta bya bar bshad// rgyas phyir bskul ba'i thog ma dang/ khro bo'i hUM ni tha mar sbyar// gsad pa la ni phaT ces pa// 'bar ba 'di las
lhag pa yin// rigs rnams 'jig par bya ba la// hUM dbus khro dang ldan pa'i phaT// de bzhin bskrad la bskul ba yis// mgo dang bzhug tu hUM gzhag go// yang dag 'bar ba'i phaT kyang gzhag/ gsang ba'i
mchod pa'i cho gar grags// de ltar mchod pa'i rim pa dar// be con dgu ni byas par 'gyur// gsang ba'i mchod pa sbyar ba ni// bdug pa me tog de bzhin dri// mar me gtor ma de bzhin te// bzlas pa med

kyang 'grub par 'gyur// dbang du bya dang dbye ba dang// bskrad dang gsad pa la sogs ni// ji skad gsungs pa'i tshul dag dang// de dang sbyor ba de 'dra bas// tshes grangs dag dang skar ma dang// smyung ba dag
kyang bya mi dgos// gsang ba'i mchod pa'i cho ga shes// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor legs byas la// ji ltar 'dod pa rang dgar spyod// ci yang rung ba'i gtor ma dang// lo ma me tog 'bras bus

kyang// gang gis gshin rje gshed po yi// snying po phyag rgya mchod byed pa// byang chub sems dang ldan gyur cing// rab tu gus na zla drug gis// de ni ci 'dod dgos pa rnyed// ji ltar 'dod pa'i las kyang

byed// 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo khro bo rnam par rgyal ba las/ be con phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du bsgrub pa'i mchod pa'i rtog pa ste le'u bzhi pa'o//// de nas be con phyag rgya yi// ji skad

gsungs pa de dag bsgrub// de yi dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'ang gzhan// dkyil na yi dwags zhes bya ba// bsgrub pas mtshan mo dur khrod du// dur khrod bdag gi thal ba yis// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi bri// me ro'i

ro smad dag dang ldan// bla re rnga yab me long dril// me tog bdug pas mdzes par bya// lha rdzas yi dwags mang po dngar// thod pa brgyad kyis rnam par spras// phyis ni be con phyag rgya yang// mgo med ro yi steng

du bri// dkyil na yi dwags zhes bya ba'i// thams cad 'khrugs byed dkyil 'khor 'di// khro bo gtso bo'i phyag rgya yis// mchod pa ji skad gsungs pa bya// sme gtor thams cad byin nas ni// gtsang ma go cha

bgos nas kyang// 'bum phrag gcig ni sngar bsnyen pa// byas nas 'di ni brtsam par bya// phyugs chen dag gi khrag gis kyang// shis pa'i thod pa bkang nas kyang// de bzhin mi las byung ba'i sha/ phyag rgya yis
ni dbul bar bya// phyugs chen gyi ni tshil bu las// mar me 'bar ba byas pa dag/ de yi phyi rol phyogs brgyad du// sngags kyis bsrungs te dbul bar bya// cho ga shes pas de lta bur// byas nas bsgrub la
'jug par bya// dpal ldan gos ni dmar po gyon// tsan+dan dmar pos bskus nas ni// cung zad dag kyang mi 'byed par// mar gyis brgyad la gcig pus so// dpa' la sems drag mthu ldan pa'i// grogs ni

gsum dang lhan cig tu// blo dang ldan pas sems drag cing// dbang po bsdams pa'i sgrub pa po// yi dwags kyi ni dkyil 'khor du// sgrub pa'i las la 'jug par bya// de nas mtshan mo phyag rgya bcing// brtan
par 'dug la legs par bzlas// bgegs rnams sna tshogs mtshan gcig tu// 'byung ste de las rgyal bar bya'o// de ltar srin po'i tshogs chen las// rgyal nas phyag rgya 'grub par 'gyur// mi 'grub pa yi

las rnams kyang// de nas thogs pa med par byed// 'jam dpal dbyangs kyi khro bo yang// bskul nas 'dir ni thog pa med// ha na bi s+pho Ta bany+dza pany+dza zhes// bskul ba'i mtha' mar hUM brjod cing// g.yon

brkyang ba yi tshul gnas nas/ khros pas ri rtse bgrod dka' dang// ra ba yang thog sgo khang dang// pu shu kha bad ra ba dag/ skad cig gis ni bsnyil bar byed// d+ha ra b+hi s+pho Ta bany+dza bany+dza zhes// bskul

pa'i mjug tu hUM brjod na// ri bo dag ni mang po dang// de bzhin lha min sgo dag dang// de bzhin gzhan dang sa dag kyang// ji ltar 'dod pa 'gas par byed// pA tsa bi d+h+wa na saM she zhes// bskul nas tha mar hUM

brjod na// phyag rgya 'di yis chu rnams ni// thogs pa med par skem par byed// mtsho chen dang ni chu bo dang// rgya mtsho dag kyang skem par byed// stam+b+ha ya zhes lan gnyis brjod// tha mar hUM dang de nas mu// de

nas de yi mjug tu hUM// sai na stam b+ha zhes sbyar na// pa tsa bi d+h+wan+sa ya sho Sha ya sho Sha ya da hUM phaT/ ri bo la ni gnas pa bzhin// nges par myur du gnon par 'gyur// tha mar hUM bzhag de nas driM// k+Sho b+ha ya zhes

lan gnyis brjod// de yi tha mar yi ge ma// mkhas pa dag gis sbyar na ni// dpung rnams 'khrugs para'agyur ba la/ khros na ngo mtshar ci zhig che// tha mar hUM dang ga bzhag la// de nas tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha gzhag/ sngags

pas gal te sbyar nas ni// cho ga 'di yis glang po gnon// ha na bi d+h+wan+sa mA ra ya// bskul nas tha mar hUM brjod cing// de bzhin tha mar phaT brjod na// dpung dag rab tu 'chi bar 'gyur/ kha kha khA hi khA hi

zhes// bskul nas tha mar hUM brjod na// dpung rnams phan tshun 'khrug par ni// thogs pa med par rab tu 'gyur// tha mar hUM dang de bzhin phaT// driM driMdzaM dza driM driM dag/ nges pa dag tu sbyar na ni// sngags pa khro

dang ldan pa yis/ khrag gi char 'bab byed par gsungs// tha mar hUM brjod ha ha hA hA bai tA li hUM phaT ces bdag gir byas// sngags pa dpa' dang ldan pa yis// bskul na myur du rmongs par 'gyur// tha mar hUM

brjod ha ha ha ha// de bzhin an+ta ya dang phaT// bskul ba 'di dang ldan byas na// 'gro ba dag ni rmongs par 'gyur// tha mar hUM brjod de nas hUM// gong bzhin driM driM dza dza bzhag/ tha mar driM dang phaT ldan
na// 'gro ba de ma thag tu 'bebs/ khro bo chen po 'di yis ni// phyag rgya de ltar 'grub 'gyur na// de tshe las rnams thams cad ni// yid kyis bskul ba tsam gyis ni// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
kyis// dam tshig rab tu skong ba yin// grub pa dag ni gang 'dod pa// de ni thogs pa med par byed// 'di yi sngon du bsnyen pa ni// cho ga bzhin du 'bum byas nas// blo dang ldan pas bsgrub la 'jug/ gal

te der ni ma grub na// de tshe de bzhin gshegs pa yi// snga ma dam tshig bskul ba bzhin// de nas slar yang sngags rnams la// thogs pa med par de bzhin sbyar// phyag 'tshal ba dang kun tu ldan// de yi thog
mar oM bzhag la// oM zhes bya ba gzhan yang gzhag/ AHzhes bya ba gnyis pa'o// de yi tshig gi mjug tu hUM// bzhag ste de nas tshig rnams kun// de ltar kro ta bi dza ya// ag+ni dz+wA li dzi hwA ta

shir// tshig rnams gzhan ni brjod par bya// de nas de yi tha mar hUM// de bzhin tshig gi tha mar oM// tha mar AHgzhag de yi mthar// hUM dang si ti lan gnyis bsgom// pra phu ta zhes lan gnyis bsgom// de nas
de bzhin gshegs pa yi// bka' rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya// khro bo'i gtso bo de yi ni// bka' bzhin byed de de bzhin 'gyur// gang gi mngon du bsnyen bya ba// de yi bskul ba'i cho ga ni// ji skad

gsungs pa'i las rnams la// ma grub na ni nges par bya// gzhan du sngags ni gzir byas na// bdag nyid nges par 'chi bar 'gyur/ khyad par du ni dpa' bo yi/ khro bo'i gtso bo'i snying po 'di// phyag rgya 'dis
ni gzir byas na// 'gro ba ma lus 'khrug par 'gyur// 'di ni gang la bzlas pa yi// sngags rnams de la dgos med par// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa dang// de dag kun gyi lus kyang chad// phyag rgya
'dis ni gzir na ni// dpag tshad bdun gyi dkyil 'khor na// gzhan gyi sngags rnams gang yod dang// dgra rnams dregs pa med par byed// 'byung po skrag par byed pa dang// de bzhin lha rnams 'khrugs par
byed// khro bo rab tu 'ga' bar byed// gshin rje'i gshed po'i mthu yang bskyed// yi dwags ro langs rigs dag ni// de bzhin rab tu 'jigs par gsungs// byad dang gnod pa skrag pa yang// rab tu bskul
nas 'jigs par byed// bgegs rnams thams cad 'jigs par byed// 'chi ba thams cad med par byed// phongs pa thams cad med byed la// be con phyag rgya drag po'i sngags// dgra dang de bzhin gzhan dag

dang// skye bo dag la 'di bcings bstan// gshin rje'i gshed po sbyar na ni// de yi mod la srog kyang 'phrog/ mdor na snying po phyag rgya 'di// rtog pa rang gi dam tshig brtan/ khro bo'i zhal nas gsungs pa

'di// gsang ba rab tu bstan pa yin// gshin rje'i gshed po gcig tu ba'i// sngags pas khro bo'i gtso bo yi// snying po phyag rgya be con dang// snying po dag gis sbyar bar bya/ khro bo rnam par rgyal ba 'jam

dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa las/ be con gyi phyag rgya'i rtog pa ste le'u lnga pa'o//// de nas yi ge bcu bdun pa'i// rtsa ba'i sngags ni gang yin pa// de yi phyag rgya gzhan dag kyang// ro langs zhes ni bya

ba yod// gshin rje'i gshed po drag brtson pa'i// snying ni dga' byed gsang ba'o// sngags pa dag gis gang dag tu// bcings pa de ni byin rlob pa// ro langs zhes bya'i phyag rgya 'di/ khro bos gsungs pa bshad
par bya// dur khrod dag ni thams cad ni// gong la rtag tu rag lus pa'o// de nas lag pa gnyis ka yi// sor mo phan tshun bsnol ba yis// mdzub mo gnyis kas srin lag gnyis// legs par

bzung nas dgug par bya// gung mo sor mo sgreng ste sbyar// mthe'u chung gnyis kyang nang du gzhug/ de bzhin du ni mthe bong gnyis// phan tshun bsnol mar brkyang ste sbyar// shes rab can gyi ro langs 'di// rtag tu

tshul bzhin khro bas bstan/ khro bo gtso bo'i sngags gang ni// yi ge bcu bdun legs gsungs pa// de nyid 'di dang sbyar bar bya// ro langs phyag rgya ldan pa ste// bdag nyid 'dod pa thams cad ster// ha har

gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor du// cho ga bzhin du sbyar bar bya// ha har gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// khro bo 'bar byed bshad par bya// yi dwags phal chen bshad pa bzhin// 'di yang gru bzhi lham par bya/ khyad par du

ni phyogs kun du// mkhas pas me ri 'bar bar bya/ khru brgyad lhag chad med par ni/ cho ga bzhin du bri bar bya// sgo sgo dag tu gsal shing gis// phug pa'i yi dwags khrag can gzhag/ dbus su mgo dang bral
ba yi// mi ro ro smad gsal bar gzhag/ yi dwags phal chen dkyil 'khor bzhin// tha mar yi dwags phreng ba dgod/ khro bo'i dag gi rtsa ba'i sngags// mtshogs ma spyi gtsug la sogs bsrung/ yi ge bcu bdun

blo ldan gyis// mgo med ro yi steng du gzhag/ zhal drug pa la zhabs kyang drug/ de bzhin phyag ni bcu gnyis pa// rab tu 'bar ba drag po'i gzugs// snga ma bzhin du gzhag par bya// yi dwags mang po sbyar ba
ni// snga ma bzhin du bzhag nas ni// me tog bdug pa phreng la sogs// sngags pas de la mchod par bya// 'dir ni gtor ma gsungs pa yang// sha chen gyis bya gzhan du min/ khrag gi gtor ma'i cho ga
dang// de bzhin bdug pa'ang kun sme ba'o// de nas dpal ldan rig 'dzin pas// ro langs phyag rgya bcings nas ni// gtor ma me tog la sogs dbul// rnam pa kun tu khro bos bya// dkyil 'khor du ni 'khor
yug gi// phyogs brgyad dag tu mar me dgod// dur khrod dag gi mgal dum mam// yang na gsal shing dag gis bud// seng ldeng dag gi gzar bu yis// tshil chen dag la lan bdun du// lho phyogs me las

bsregs nas ni// de nas khro bo bsgrub par bya// de la sngon du bsnyen pa dang// bzlas pa dag ni bstan pa min// rig 'dzin nyid kyi sems stobs nyid// 'di yi rgyur 'di shes par bya// lho phyogs sgor ni nan
tan tu// rma med pa yi ro bzhag ste// snying gar ro langs rgya bzhag la// de la rab tu bskor bar bya// de nas khros pa chen po yis// shin tu bkrus shing legs par brgyan// dri dang me tog dmar sngon
gyis// legs pa dag tu mchod nas ni// mkhas pas ro langs phyag rgya yis// thog dmar bdag nyid bsrung bar bya// gshin rje'i gshed byed yan lag lnga// de bzhin las la sbyar bar

bya// dpa' bo mthu chen bdag nyid kyis// ral gri lag par blangs nas ni// dpa' bo'i rkang pa g.yon pa yi// de yi snying gar mnan nas ni/ khro bo yi ni gtso bo yi// yi ge bcu bdun sngags bzlas so// oM A

kro d+hi ka ya mAn+ta ka ha na ma tha b+hany+dza hUM phaT/ 'di ni rtsa ba'i sngags yi ge bcu bdun pa'o// de yis drag por bskul ba dang// yi dwags de ni g.yo bar 'gyur// ha har gyur par 'khrugs pa dang// de bzhin ha ha'i
sgra yang 'byin// de nas bdag gis langs pa la// mtshon cha rnon po 'bar ba yis// bcad pa'i sha dang khrag bcas pa// ar+g+haM de la dbul bar bya// rig pa 'dzin pa de yi ni// sems kyi drod ni de shes
nas// ar+g+haM blangs te dkyil 'khor ni// ha har gyur pas 'jigs par byed// de nas bdag nyid chen po des// 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs mthong nas// gshin rje'i gshed po dpa' bo yi// ro langs phyag

rgya bstan par bya// de nas gshin rje'i gshed po ni// yi dwags lus la gnas pa des// ro langs nyid kyi rgya mthong nas// rig pa 'dzin pa de yi ni// sems drod rig nas 'dod pa'i mchog/ sbyin par byed par
gdon mi za// khro bo'i rgyal po slar gshegs nas// mi ro sa la 'gyel bar 'gyur// de yi lus ni de nyid kyang// gser du 'gyur bar gdon mi za// de tshe grogs po rnams dang yang// sems can rnams la ci
bder sbyin// bdag nyid chen po dpa' bo yi// bsgrub par bshad pa 'di yin te// sems ni rab tu dpa' bas bya'i// ngan ngon gzhan gyis yang mi bya// sems dpa' zhan pa'i sgrub pa pos/ khro bo'i rgyal po de

bsgrubs na// de ni langs nas myur bar ni// grogs dang bcas pas gsod par 'gyur// ro langs phyag rgya mi shes na// sems ni ji ltar drag gyur kyang/ khro bo'i rgyal po de yis ni// sgrub pa po de bsad par
'gyur// rig 'dzin mchog gis gang dag tu// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig gis// brgyan cing khro bo skul byed pa'i// ro langs phyag rgya bcings pa der// gdon mi za bar khro bos ni// legs par byin gyis

rlob par 'gyur// myur du mchog kyang stsol bar mdzad// 'grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za// oM na mo bud+d+ha d+harma sang g+he b+h+yaHA kro d+hi ka ya mAn+ta ka ha na ma tha b+hany+dza/ hUM pre ta bi rak+Sha rak+Sha mA na pa tsa ta thA ga ta Adz+nyA pa ya

ti swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' brgyan pa// ro langs khro bo'i phyag rgya'i sngags so// ha har gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor du// ro langs phyag rgya rang sngags dang// ldan na myur du khro bo yis// nges par byin
gyis rlob par 'gyur// dbang po dag gi sbyor bas ni// sngar bsnyen la sogs med par yang// sgrub pa po ni 'dod pa bzhin/ khro bo nges par myur du 'grub// yang na ro langs phyag rgya 'di// skyes
bu sems ni mi dpa' bas// ha har gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor du// bdag nyid kyis ni dam tshig gis// mkhas pas bzung nas bzlas par bya// de nyid kyis ni dbang bskur nas// ji ltar myur bar gang du'ang
rung// khro bo mchog gi ri mo'am// dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin byas pa'am// de bzhin sku gzugs gzhag pa'ang rung// yid dang dbang po bsdams byas te// thog mar chig 'bum bzlas par bya// de ltar sngon du

bsnyen pa ni// ji ltar 'dod par byas nas gdod// phyi nas smyung bar byas nas de// ro langs phyag rgya sgrub la 'jug/ ha har gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// cho ga bzhin du dur khrod bri// yang ni sems ni mi dpa'

bas// dur khrod thal bas khyim du bri/ khyim de stong ba yin na rung// gal te khyim de mi stong na// ha har gyur pa mthong ba dang// zhag bdun lon ma thag tu 'jig/ de nas yi dwags mang po las// gsang ba'i

mchod pa ci rigs bya// de nas lho phyogs sgor 'dug ste// byang gi sgo ru kha bltas la// rang gi dam tshig las gsungs pa'i// ro langs phyag rgya bcings te bzlas// zla ba mar gyi tshes brgyad la// blo ldan cho ga

shes pa yis// mtshan mo stan cig 'dug nas ni// nyi ma shar gyi bar du bzlas// de nas khro bo drag po yi// ro langs lha mo 'grub par 'gyur/ khro bo ha ha'i sngags dag dang// skul ba'i tshig gis mchog rnams
kyis// ji skad gsungs pa'i las rnams ni// thams cad de nas byed par 'gyur// be con zhes bya'i phyag rgya la'ang// de dag nyid la myur du sbyar// sbyar na dogs pa med par yang// 'di ni de dag byed par

'gyur// ro langs phyag rgya bsgrub pa bri// sngags pa dgongs pa gsungs pa'o// da ni zhan pa'i sems rnams kyis// sgrub pa dag ni gsum po 'byung// cho ga bzhin du sngar bshad pa'i// yi dwags mang po de tshe

bri// gang yang rung bar ji rigs par// phyag rgya rnams kyis sbyar bar bya// de nas yi dwags mang po yi// dkyil 'khor blta na sdug pa 'di/ khyim mam yang na gzhan du'ang rung// de tshe dkyil 'khor bris nas

ni// de dbus yi dwags spyi bo la// ro langs phyag rgya 'di bzhag go/ khro bo yi ge gzi bskyed pa// zhi zhing kun tu dga' byed pa// ro langs snying po'i phyag rgya ni// bcings nas de la sbyar bar bya// de nas ro

langs phyag rgya yis// gsang ba'i yi ge bcu gsum pa'o// zhi ba gzhan yang shes byas nas// ji ltar 'dod par bzlas par bya// oM AHhUM be tA li rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM swA hA// ro langs phyag rgya'i snying po 'di// gang yang
rung ba ci 'dod par// gcur bsgyur pa yi 'bum grangs su// cho ga bzhin du bzlas na ni// rmad du byung ba'i las rnams kyang// yid kyis bsam pas byed par 'gyur// gsang ba'i rig pa gsang
ba 'di// las rnams thams cad byed pa'o// de nas da ni 'di yi las/ khro bo'i rgyal po nyid kyis ni// rtog pa 'di las gang gsungs pa// de dag mdo ru bshad par bya// gnon dang gzir dang rmongs pa

dang// de bzhin dbab pa'i cho ga dang// dbang du byed dang ldan pa dang// gsad pa dang ni bskrad pa dang// phan tshun 'thab cing brdeg pa dang// de bzhin gzhan yang mig 'khrul dang// zhi dang rgyas par sbyor ba
dang// de bzhin dga' bar byed pa dang// 'gugs par byed pa'i cho ga yang// mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya// ro langs phyag rgya las bsgrub phyir// cho ga bzhin du sngar bsnyen bya// so so'i don rnams

bsgrub pa'i phyir// cho ga 'di dag brtsam par bya// rma bya'i 'jug ma'i sgro dag la// mkhas pas mdongs ni brgya yod pa// bam po gcig tu sbas nas ni// bu mos bkal ba'i skud pa yis// seng ldeng shing gi yu

ba ni// 'phan med khru gang brtsam pa la// cho ga bzhin du bcing bar bya// yu+u ba de yi rtse mo la'ang// mchod rten bzang po legs par bya// gro ga la ni gi haM gis/ khro bos mthar byas ro langs dri// shes pas
mchod rten 'og tu bzhag/ de nas zla ba gzas zin pa'i// nub mo yi dwags phal chen gyi// dkyil 'khor mtsho 'gram bris nas bzlas// de ltar bsgrub phyir sngags pa yis// mjug ma de la yid gtad
nas// lag pa g.yon pas bzung nas ni// zla ba de la blta zhing bzlas// sems ni bdud kyis ma dkrugs par// sems dpa'i stobs kyis kha cig la// drod dang du ba 'bar ba dag/ mjug ma de las 'byung
bar 'gyur// dro bar gyur pa mthong na ni// byang chub sems dpa' 'dra ba yis// sems can rnams ni thams cad la// des ni phan thogs gnod par nus// mjug ma bzang po de las ni// du ba 'byung ba mthong
na yang// myur du mi snang bar yang 'gyur// 'dod pa'i gzugs can yid mgyogs bzhin// rgas pa dang ni 'chi ba'ang med// gnod sbyin rnams ni yongs su bskor// sems can chen po de yis gzis// gal te
de ni 'bar gyur na// rig 'dzin dpal dang ldan par 'gyur// nam mkha' la ni myur du 'gro/ bde ba kun dang ldan pa yi// rig 'dzin rnams kyi mchog tu gyur// gal te zla ba gzas btang la// de tshe grub par

ma gyur na'ang// mjug ma gang yang rung ba gcig/ lan cig tsam ni bskor bas kyang// dpung rnams gnon pa'i dngos grub 'byung// myos pas 'grangs pa'i glang po dang// stag dang seng ge wa rnams dang// rta
dang shing rta bya rnams dang// gru dang gru chen bzhon pa rnams// bskor na thams cad gnod par byed// mnan pa dag las thar bar yang// mjug ma 'dis ni gdon mi za// de nas gzhan yang ro
langs kyis// gzir bar bya ba gsang bar bshad// de nas tshil chen blangs nas ni// de yang thod pa'i nang du bzhag/ e shwa ma ra dmar po yi// shing bal 'jam pos snying po byas// gdol pa'i me yis 'bar

byas nas// nyi ma zla ba gzas zin tshe// thod pa'i dud pa blangs nas ni// zla ba'am yang na nyi ma dag/ btang gi bar du bzlas par bya// yang na arka'i shing bal gyis// de yi 'og tu lcags thur gyis// mig
gnyis dag ni bsku bar bya// de ltar mig gnyis bskus pa yis// gang dag bltas pa de dag ni// gzir par gyur pa gdon mi za// de nas gdong bkrus bltas na ni// slar yang de las thar bar 'gyur// de

nas gzhan yang rmongs pa ni// rmongs par byed pa'i mchog bshad do// arka shing gi rtsa ba dang// ka na ka yi rtsa ba dang// a shwa ma ra ru rta dang// mo ha ni yi rtsa ba dang// ma hA nI la'i rtsa ba dang// shar bu ka ra

ldan byas shing// yi dwags me tog snying por rnyid pa'ang ldan// mdun so dag dang ldan byas te// skyes pa dag gam bud med kyi// gsang dbang pags pa dang ldan pa// bu mo 'dod pa ma spyad pas// mar gyi brgyad la

legs par btag/ phyis ni bud med khrag dag dang// bong bu'i khu bas sbru bar bya// dur khrod thal ba dang sbyar te// de nas mar gyi tshes brgyad la// thog mar yi dwags mang bris nas// rig pa 'dzin pas nub

mo bzlas// stong rtsa brgyad ni legs bzlas na// de nas rdzas ni 'grub par 'gyur// rmongs par byed pa'i phye ma 'di// sems can kun la sbyar na ni// de nas rmongs par byed par 'gyur// de la the tshom mi

bya'o// 'thab mo dang ni rtsod pa dang// rgyal po'i g.yul ngo chen po dang// bdag gi phyogs ni bsrung ba'i phyir// sbyor ba shes pas bskul ba yi// rgyal mtshan dag ni bsgreng ba ni// dgra rnams kun tu rmongs par

'gyur// phye ma de yis reg na ni// de ma thag tu mi rnams rmongs// tshur zhugs na ni thar bar 'gyur// nges par gzhan du ma yin no// de nas gzhan yang dbab pa yi// cho ga'i mchog ni bshad par bya// ji ltar
'byung po thams cad ni// mod la 'bab par 'gyur ba'o// stag gi pags pa dang ldan par// sbrul gy-i shun par btags nas ni// dug dang yung ba'i rtsa ba dang// mo ha na dang ma la ti// ra yi gcin las
btags par ni// de nas de dag ri lu bya// tsa na ka yi 'bras bu'i tshad// bdun nam brgyad dam dgu'am yang// gzhan yang ri bong khrag dag dang// gur gum las ni btags nas su// bdun nam brgyad dam
dgu dag tu// ri lu snga ma bzhin du bya// de nas snga ma'i ri lu dag/ sngags pas thod pa'i nang du gzhag/ mar gyi tshes brgyad mtshan mo ni// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya// gur gum can ni a ri

sta'i// snod ni gtsang mar gzhag par bya// de nas stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te// rtse mo rab tu sbyar bar bya// sngar ni legs par sbyar ba yi// ri lu tha mal 'dug pa la// btab na myur du 'bab par ni// ring por
mi thogs gzhan du min// babs nas myur tu gtang ba ni// de nas gur gum ri lus bya'o// de nas gzhan yang sgrub pa yis// dbang du byed pa dag gi mchog/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i yid las 'byung// las kyis

nges 'gyur bshad par bya// rak+ta zhes ni 'dir grags pa// rtsa ba rak+ta mU li ka/ de blangs sha ra pu ka dang// mi las byung ba'i mdun so dang// tshub tshub mas gtsubs pa'i shing lo ni// lding zhing lhag dang bcas pa dag/ gzhan nu

zhes kyang byung/ mas bskor ba'i lo mar bcas// bung ba yi ni lo ma dag/ gzhon nu mas ni mtshan mo btag/ de nas bdag gi sbyar ba de// phye ma mchog ni lan bdun du// bdag gi khu bas sbru bar bya// de nas

bdag gi dkyil 'khor la// pad+ma'i snying po la gzhug nas// gtsang mas kyang bcings nas mar gyi tshes brgyad la// blo ldan lag par bzung nas ni// sngags kyis stong du gdab par bya// phye ma'i rgyal po dbang byed
pa// de nas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// bza' ba'am yang na btung sbyin la// yang na phye ma 'gam par bya// yang na rlung gi phyogs su gtang// yang na gos la lan cig gdab// yang na byug pa'am so yi

rtsi// gang la'ang de dag sbyar byas na// de la 'dis ni lan cig gis// myos shing dregs pa'i dgra dag ni// rgyang ring nas kyang dbang du 'gyur// bran bzhin du ni legs par byed// phye ma 'di yis reg pa
ni// shin tu rjes su 'breng bar 'gyur// gal te rgyang ni ring po nas// phye mas reg par mi 'gyur na// de yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni// phye ma 'di yis gdab par bya// zhag bdun gyis ni rig 'dzin
gyi// ming ni 'di yis thos nas kyang// bdag nyid dang ni nor bdag gi/ gdon mi za bar dbang du 'gyur// de nas sbyor ba 'ba' zhig gis// 'khon pa'i las dag bshad par bya// rma bya'i mdongs ni bzang po
